original: 1st kāṇḍa
analyzed: st kāṇḍa

original: anādinidhanam brahma śabdatattvaṃ yad akṣaram /
analyzed: an ādi nidhanam brahma śabda tattvam yat akṣaram

original: vivartate 'rthabhāvena prakriyā jagato yataḥ // BVaky_1.1 //
analyzed: vivartate rtha bhāvena prakriyā jagataḥ yatas

original: ekam eva yad āmnātaṃ bhinnaśaktivyapāśrayāt /
analyzed: ekam eva yat āmnātam bhinna śakti vyapāśrayāt

original: apṛthaktve 'pi śaktibhyaḥ pṛthaktveneva vartate // BVaky_1.2 //
analyzed: apṛthaktve pi śaktibhyaḥ pṛthaktvena iva vartate

original: adhyāhitakalāṃ yasya kālaśaktim upāśritāḥ /
analyzed: adhyāhita kalām yasya kālaśaktim upāśritāḥ

original: janmādayo vikārāḥ ṣaḍ bhāvabhedasya yonayaḥ // BVaky_1.3 //
analyzed: janma ādayaḥ vikārāḥ ṣaṭ bhāva bhedasya yonayaḥ

original: ekasya sarvabījasya yasya ceyam anekadhā /
analyzed: ekasya sarva bījasya yasya ca iyam anekadhā

original: bhoktṛbhoktavyarūpeṇa bhogarūpeṇa ca sthitiḥ // BVaky_1.4 //
analyzed: bhoktṛ bhoktavya rūpeṇa bhoga rūpeṇa ca sthitiḥ

original: prāptyupāyo 'nukāraś ca tasya vedo maharṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: prāpti upāyaḥ nukāraḥ ca tasya vedaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: eko 'py anekavartmeva samāmnātaḥ pṛthak pṛthak // BVaky_1.5 //
analyzed: ekaḥ u pi aneka vartmā iva samāmnātaḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: bhedānāṃ bahumārgatvaṃ karmaṇy ekatra cāṇgatā /
analyzed: bhedānām bahu mārga tvam karmaṇi ekatra ca aṇga tā

original: śabdānāṃ yataśaktitvaṃ tasya śākhāsu dṛṣyate // BVaky_1.6 //
analyzed: śabdānām yata śakti tvam tasya śākhāsu dṛṣyate

original: smṛtayo bahurūpās ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprayojanāḥ /
analyzed: smṛtayaḥ bahu rūpāḥ ca dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanāḥ

original: tam evāśritya liṅgebhyo vedavidbhiḥ prakalpitāḥ // BVaky_1.7 //
analyzed: tam eva āśritya liṅgebhyaḥ veda vidbhiḥ prakalpitāḥ

original: tasyārthavādarūpāṇi niśritāḥ svavikalpajāḥ /
analyzed: tasya arthavāda rūpāṇi niśritāḥ sva vikalpa jāḥ

original: ekatvināṃ dvaitināṃ ca pravādā bahudhāgatā // BVaky_1.8 //
analyzed: ekatvinām dvaitinām ca pravādāḥ bahudhā āgatā

original: satyā visuddhis tatroktā vidyaivekapadāgamā /
analyzed: satyā visuddhiḥ tatra uktā vidyā eva eka pada āgamā

original: yuktā praṇavarūpeṇa sarvavādāvirodhinā // BVaky_1.9 //
analyzed: yuktā praṇava rūpeṇa sarva vāda avirodhinā

original: vidhātus tasya lokānām aṅgopāṅganibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: vidhātuḥ tasya lokānām aṅga upāṅga nibandhanāḥ

original: vidyābhedāḥ pratāyante jnānasaṃskārahetavaḥ // BVaky_1.10 //
analyzed: vidyā bhedāḥ pratāyante jnāna saṃskāra hetavaḥ

original: āsannaṃ brahmaṇas tasya tapasām uttamaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: āsannam brahmaṇaḥ tasya tapasām uttamam tapaḥ

original: prathamaṃ chandasām aṅgam āhur vyākaraṇaṃ budhāḥ // BVaky_1.11 //
analyzed: prathamam chandasām aṅgam āhuḥ vyākaraṇam budhāḥ

original: prāptarūpavibhāgāyā yo vācaḥ paramo rasaḥ /
analyzed: prāpta rūpa vibhāgāyāḥ yaḥ vācaḥ paramaḥ rasaḥ

original: yat tat puṇyatamaṃ jyotis tasya mārgo 'yam ānjasasḥ // BVaky_1.12 //
analyzed: yat tat puṇyatamam jyotiḥ tasya mārgaḥ yam ānjasasaḥ

original: arthapravṛttitattvānāṃ śabdā eva nibandhanam /
analyzed: artha pravṛtti tattvānām śabdāḥ eva nibandhanam

original: tattvāvabodjaḥ śabdānaṃ nāsti vyākaraṇād ṛte // BVaky_1.13 //
analyzed: tattva avabodjaḥ na asti vyākaraṇāt ṛte

original: tad dvāram apavargasya vāṅmalānāṃ cikitsitam /
analyzed: tat dvāram apavargasya vāc malānām cikitsitam

original: pavitraṃ sarvavidyānām adhividyaṃ prakāsate // BVaky_1.14 //
analyzed: pavitram sarva vidyānām adhividyam prakāsate

original: yathārthajātayaḥ sarvāḥ sabākṛtinibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: yathā artha jātayaḥ sarvāḥ

original: tathaiva loke vidyānām esā vidyā parāyanam // BVaky_1.15 //
analyzed: tathā eva loke vidyānām ā esā vidyā parāyanam

original: idam ādyaṃ padasthānaṃ siddhisopānaparvaṇām /
analyzed: idam ādyam pada sthānam siddhi sopāna parvaṇām

original: iyaṃ sā mokṣamāṇānām ajihmā rājapaddhatiḥ // BVaky_1.16 //
analyzed: iyam sā mokṣamāṇānām a jihmā rāja paddhatiḥ

original: atrātītaviparyāsaḥ kevalām anupasyati /
analyzed: atra atīta viparyāsaḥ kevalām

original: chandasyas chandasāṃ yonim ātmā chandomayīṃ tanum // BVaky_1.17 //
analyzed: chandasyaḥ chandasām yonim ātmā chandaḥ mayīm tanum

original: pratyasthamitabhedāyā yad vāco rūpam uttamam /
analyzed: yat vācaḥ rūpam uttamam

original: yad asminn eva tamasi jyotiḥ suddhaṃ vivartate // BVaky_1.18 //
analyzed: yat asmin eva tamasi jyotiḥ suddham vivartate

original: vaikṛtaṃ samati krāntā mūrtivyāpāradarśanam /
analyzed: vaikṛtam samati krāntāḥ mūrti vyāpāra darśanam

original: vyatītyālokatamasī prakāśaṃ yam upāsate // BVaky_1.19 //
analyzed: vyatītya āloka tamasī prakāśam yam upāsate

original: yatra vāco nimettāni cihnānīvākṣarasmṛteḥ /
analyzed: yatra vācaḥ nimettāni cihnāni iva akṣara smṛteḥ

original: śabdapūrveṇa yogena bhāsante pratibimbavat // BVaky_1.20 //
analyzed: śabda pūrveṇa yogena bhāsante pratibimba vat

original: atharvaṇām aṅgirasāṃ sāṃnām ṛgyajuṣasya ca /
analyzed: atharvaṇām aṅgirasām sām nām ṛk yajuṣasya ca

original: yasminn uccāvacā varṇāḥ pṛthaksthitaparigrahāḥ // BVaky_1.21 //
analyzed: yasmin uccāvacāḥ varṇāḥ pṛthak sthita parigrahāḥ

original: yad ekaṃ prakriyābhedair bahudhā pravibhajyate /
analyzed: yat ekam prakriyā bhedaiḥ bahudhā pravibhajyate

original: tad vyākaraṇaṃ āgamya paraṃ brahmādhigamyate // BVaky_1.22 //
analyzed: tat vyākaraṇam āgamya param brahma adhigamyate

original: nityāḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhās tatrāmnātā maharṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: nityāḥ śabda artha saṃbandhāḥ tatra āmnātāḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: sūtrāṇāṃ sānutantrāṇāṃ bhāṣyāṇāṃ ca praṇetṛbhiḥ // BVaky_1.23 //
analyzed: sūtrāṇām sa anutantrāṇām bhāṣyāṇām ca praṇetṛbhiḥ

original: apoddhārapadārthāḥ ye ye cārthāḥ sthitalakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: apoddhāra padārthāḥ ye ye ca arthāḥ sthita lakṣaṇāḥ

original: anvākhyeyāś ca ye śabdā ye cāpi pratipādakāḥ // BVaky_1.24 //
analyzed: anvākhyeyāḥ ca ye śabdāḥ ye ca api pratipādakāḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvena yogyabhāvena ca sthitāḥ /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvena yogya bhāvena ca sthitāḥ

original: dharme ye pratyaye cāṅgaṃ saṃbandhāḥ sādhvasādhuṣu // BVaky_1.25 //
analyzed: dharme ye pratyaye ca aṅgam saṃbandhāḥ sādhu asādhuṣu

original: te liṅgaiś ca svaśabdaiś ca śāstre 'sminn upavarṇitāḥ /
analyzed: te liṅgaiḥ ca sva śabdaiḥ ca śāstre smin upavarṇitāḥ

original: smṛtyartham anugamyante ke cid eva yathāgamam // BVaky_1.26 //
analyzed: smṛti artham anugamyante ke cid eva yathāgamam

original: śiṣṭebhya āgamāt siddhāḥ sādhavo dharmasādhanam /
analyzed: śiṣṭebhyaḥ āgamāt siddhāḥ sādhavaḥ dharma sādhanam

original: arthapratyāyanābhede viparītās tv asādhavaḥ // BVaky_1.27 //
analyzed: artha pratyāyana abhede viparītāḥ tu asādhavaḥ

original: nityatve kṛtakatve vā teṣām ādir na vidyate /
analyzed: nitya tve kṛtaka tve vā teṣām ādiḥ na vidyate

original: prāṇinām iva sā caiṣā vyavasthānityatocyate // BVaky_1.28 //
analyzed: prāṇinām iva sā ca eṣā vyavasthā anitya tā ucyate

original: nānarthikām imāṃ kaś cid vyavasthāṃ kartum arhati /
analyzed: na anarthikām imām kaḥ cit vyavasthām kartum arhati

original: tasmān nibadhyate śiṣṭaiḥ sādhutvaviṣayā smṛtiḥ // BVaky_1.29 //
analyzed: tasmāt nibadhyate śiṣṭaiḥ sādhu tva viṣayā smṛtiḥ

original: na cāgamād ṛte dharmas tarkeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: na ca āgamāt ṛte dharmaḥ tarkeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate

original: ṛṣīṇām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy āgamapūrvakam // BVaky_1.30 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām api yat jñānam tat api āgama pūrvakam

original: dharmasya cāvyavacchinnāḥ panthāno ye vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: dharmasya ca avyavacchinnāḥ panthānaḥ ye vyavasthitāḥ

original: na tāṃl lokaprasiddhatvāt kaś cit tarkeṇa bādhate // BVaky_1.31 //
analyzed: na tān loka prasiddha tvāt kaḥ cit tarkeṇa bādhate

original: avasthādeśakālānāṃ bhedād bhinnāsu śaktiṣu /
analyzed: avasthā deśa kālānām bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu

original: bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhir atidurlabhā // BVaky_1.32 //
analyzed: bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā

original: nirjñātaśakter dravyasya tāṃ tān arthakriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: nirjñāta śakteḥ dravyasya tām tān arthakriyām prati

original: viśiṣṭadravyasaṃbandhe sā śaktiḥ pratibadhyate // BVaky_1.33 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa dravya saṃbandhe sā śaktiḥ pratibadhyate

original: yatnenānumito 'py arthaḥ kuśalair anumātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: yatnena anumitaḥ u pi arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ

original: abhiyuktatarair anyair anyathaivopapādyate // BVaky_1.34 //
analyzed: abhiyuktataraiḥ anyaiḥ anyathā eva upapādyate

original: pareṣām asamākhyeyam abhyāsād eva jāyate /
analyzed: pareṣām a samākhyeyam abhyāsāt eva jāyate

original: maṇirūpyādivijñānaṃ tadvidāṃ nānumānikam // BVaky_1.35 //
analyzed: maṇi rūpya ādi vijñānam tad vidām na ānumānikam

original: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca vyatikramya vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam ca vyatikramya vyavasthitāḥ

original: pitṛrakṣaḥpiśācānāṃ karmajā eva siddhayaḥ // BVaky_1.36 //
analyzed: pitṛ rakṣaḥ piśācānām karma jāḥ eva siddhayaḥ

original: āvirbhūtaprakāśānām anupaplutacetasām /
analyzed: āvirbhūta prakāśānām an upapluta cetasām

original: atītānāgatajñānaṃ pratyakṣān na viśiṣyate // BVaky_1.37 //
analyzed: atīta anāgata jñānam pratyakṣāt na viśiṣyate

original: atīndriyān asaṃvedyān paśyanty ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: atīndriyān a saṃvedyān paśyanti ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā

original: ye bhāvān vacanaṃ teṣāṃ nānumānena bādhate // BVaky_1.38 //
analyzed: ye bhāvān vacanam teṣām na anumānena bādhate

original: yo yasya svam iva jñānaṃ darśanaṃ nātiśaṅkate /
analyzed: yaḥ yasya svam iva jñānam darśanam na atiśaṅkate

original: sthitaṃ pratyakṣapakṣe taṃ katham anyo nivartayet // BVaky_1.39 //
analyzed: sthitam pratyakṣa pakṣe tam katham anyaḥ nivartayet

original: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ pāpam ity etasmin padadvaye /
analyzed: idam puṇyam idam pāpam iti etasmin pada dvaye

original: ācaṇḍālamanuṣyāṇām alpaṃ śāstraprayojanam // BVaky_1.40 //
analyzed: ā caṇḍāla manuṣyāṇām alpam śāstra prayojanam

original: caitanyam iva yaś cāyam avicchedena vartate /
analyzed: caitanyam iva yaḥ ca ayam avicchedena vartate

original: āgamas tam upāsīno hetuvādair na bādhyate // BVaky_1.41 //
analyzed: āgamaḥ tam upāsīnaḥ hetuvādaiḥ na bādhyate

original: hastasparśād ivāndhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā /
analyzed: hasta sparśāt iva andhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā

original: anumānapradhānena vinipāto na durlabhaḥ // BVaky_1.42 //
analyzed: anumāna pradhānena vinipātaḥ na durlabhaḥ

original: tasmād akṛtakaṃ śāstraṃ smṛtiṃ ca sanibandhanām /
analyzed: tasmāt akṛtakam śāstram smṛtim ca sa nibandhanām

original: āśrityārabhyate śiṣṭaiḥ sādhutvaviṣayā smṛtiḥ // BVaky_1.43 //
analyzed: āśritya ārabhyate śiṣṭaiḥ sādhu tva viṣayā smṛtiḥ

original: dvāv upādānaśabdeṣu śabdau śabdavido viduḥ /
analyzed: dvau upādāna śabdeṣu śabdau śabda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: eko nimittaṃ śabdānām aparo 'rthe prayujyate // BVaky_1.44 //
analyzed: ekaḥ nimittam śabdānām aparaḥ rthe prayujyate

original: avibhakto vibhaktebhyo jāyate 'rthasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: avibhaktaḥ vibhaktebhyaḥ jāyate rthasya vācakaḥ

original: śabdas tatrārtharūpātmā saṃbandham upagacchati // BVaky_1.45 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ tatra artha rūpa ātmā saṃbandham upagacchati

original: ātmabhedaṃ tayoḥ ke cid astīty āhuḥ purāṇagāḥ /
analyzed: ātma bhedam tayoḥ ke cid asti iti āhuḥ purāṇa gāḥ

original: buddhibhedād abhinnasya bhedam eke pracakṣate // BVaky_1.46 //
analyzed: buddhi bhedāt abhinnasya bhedam eke pracakṣate

original: araṇisthaṃ yathā jyotiḥ prakāśāntarakāraṇam /
analyzed: araṇi stham yathā jyotiḥ prakāśa antara kāraṇam

original: tadvac chabdo 'pi buddhisthaḥ śrutīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ pṛthak // BVaky_1.47 //
analyzed: tadvat śabdaḥ api buddhi sthaḥ śrutīnām kāraṇam pṛthak

original: vitarkitaḥ purā buddhyā kva cid arthe niveśitaḥ /
analyzed: vitarkitaḥ purā buddhyā kva cit arthe niveśitaḥ

original: karaṇebhyo vivṛttena dhvaninā so 'nugṛhyate // BVaky_1.48 //
analyzed: karaṇebhyaḥ vivṛttena dhvaninā saḥ nugṛhyate

original: nādasya kramajātatvān na pūrvo na paraś ca saḥ /
analyzed: nādasya krama jāta tvāt na pūrvaḥ na paraḥ ca saḥ

original: akramaḥ kramarūpeṇa bhedavān iva jāyate // BVaky_1.49 //
analyzed: akramaḥ krama rūpeṇa bhedavān iva jāyate

original: pratibimbaṃ yathānyatra sthitaṃ toyakriyāvaśāt /
analyzed: pratibimbam yathā anyatra sthitam toya kriyā vaśāt

original: tatpravṛttim ivānveti sa dharmaḥ sphoṭanādayoḥ // BVaky_1.50 //
analyzed: tad pravṛttim iva anveti sa dharmaḥ sphoṭana ādayoḥ

original: ātmarūpaṃ yathā jñāne jñeyarūpaṃ ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: ātma rūpam yathā jñāne jñeya rūpam ca dṛśyate

original: artharūpaṃ tathā śabde svarūpaṃ ca prakāśate // BVaky_1.51 //
analyzed: artha rūpam tathā śabde sva rūpam ca prakāśate

original: āṇḍabhāvam ivāpanno yaḥ kratuḥ śabdasaṃjñakaḥ /
analyzed: āṇḍa bhāvam iva āpannaḥ yaḥ kratuḥ śabda saṃjñakaḥ

original: vṛttis tasya kriyārūpā bhāgaśo bhajate kramam // BVaky_1.52 //
analyzed: vṛttiḥ tasya kriyā rūpā bhāgaśas bhajate kramam

original: yathaikabuddhiviṣayā mūrtir ākriyate paṭe /
analyzed: yathā eka buddhi viṣayā mūrtiḥ ākriyate paṭe

original: mūrtyantarasya tritayam evaṃ śabde 'pi dṛśyate // BVaky_1.53 //
analyzed: mūrti antarasya tritayam evam śabde dṛśyate

original: yathā prayoktuḥ prāg buddhiḥ śabdeṣv eva pravartate /
analyzed: yathā prayoktuḥ prāk buddhiḥ śabdeṣu eva pravartate

original: vyavasāyo grahītṝṇām evaṃ teṣv eva jāyate // BVaky_1.54 //
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ grahītṝṇām evam teṣu eva jāyate

original: arthopasarjanībhūtān abhidheyeṣu keṣu cit /
analyzed: artha upasarjanī bhūtān abhidheyeṣu keṣu cit

original: caritārthān parārthatvān na lokaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_1.55 //
analyzed: caritārthān parārtha tvāt na lokaḥ pratipadyate

original: grāhyatvaṃ grāhakatvaṃ ca dve śaktī tejaso yathā /
analyzed: grāhya tvam grāhaka tvam ca dve śaktī tejasaḥ yathā

original: tathaiva sarvaśabdānām ete pṛthag avasthite // BVaky_1.56 //
analyzed: tathā eva sarva śabdānām ete pṛthak avasthite

original: viṣayatvam anāpannaiḥ śabdair nārthaḥ prakāśyate /
analyzed: viṣaya tvam an āpannaiḥ śabdaiḥ na arthaḥ prakāśyate

original: na sattayaiva te 'rthānām agṛhītāḥ prakāśakāḥ // BVaky_1.57 //
analyzed: na sattayā eva te rthānām agṛhītāḥ prakāśakāḥ

original: ato 'nirjñātarūpatvāt kim āhety abhidhīyate /
analyzed: atas nirjñāta rūpa tvāt kim āha iti abhidhīyate

original: nendriyāṇāṃ prakāśye 'rthe svarūpaṃ gṛhyate tathā // BVaky_1.58 //
analyzed: na indriyāṇām prakāśye rthe sva rūpam gṛhyate tathā

original: bhedenāvagṛhītau dvau śabdadharmāv apoddhṛtau /
analyzed: bhedena avagṛhītau dvau śabda dharmau apoddhṛtau

original: bhedakāreṣu hetutvam avirodhena gacchataḥ // BVaky_1.59 //
analyzed: bheda kāreṣu hetu tvam avirodhena gacchataḥ

original: vṛddhyādayo yathā śabdāḥ svarūpopanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhi ādayaḥ yathā śabdāḥ svarūpa upanibandhanāḥ

original: ādaicpratyāyitaiḥ śabdaiḥ saṃbandhaṃ yānti saṃjñibhiḥ // BVaky_1.60 //
analyzed: ā t ai c pratyāyitaiḥ śabdaiḥ saṃbandham yānti saṃjñibhiḥ

original: agniśabdas tathaivāyam agniśabdanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: agni śabdaḥ tathā eva ayam agni śabda nibandhanaḥ

original: agniśrutyaiti saṃbandham agniśabdābhidheyayā // BVaky_1.61 //
analyzed: agni śrutyā eti saṃbandham agni śabda abhidheyayā

original: yo ya uccāryate śabdo niyataṃ na sa kāryabhāk /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ uccāryate śabdaḥ niyatam na sa kārya bhāj

original: anyapratyāyane śaktir na tasya pratibadhyate // BVaky_1.62 //
analyzed: anya pratyāyane śaktiḥ na tasya pratibadhyate

original: uccaran paratantratvād guṇaḥ kāryair na yujyate /
analyzed: uccaran paratantra tvāt guṇaḥ kāryaiḥ na yujyate

original: tasmāt tadarthaiḥ kāryāṇāṃ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyate // BVaky_1.63 //
analyzed: tasmāt tad arthaiḥ kāryāṇām saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyate

original: sāmānyam āśritaṃ yad yad upamānopameyayoḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyam āśritam yat yat upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: tasya tasyopamāneṣu dharmo 'nyo vyatiricyate // BVaky_1.64 //
analyzed: tasya tasya upamāneṣu dharmaḥ nyaḥ vyatiricyate

original: guṇaḥ prakarṣahetur yaḥ svātantryeṇopadiśyate /
analyzed: guṇaḥ prakarṣa hetuḥ yaḥ svātantryeṇa upadiśyate

original: tasyāśritād guṇād eva prakṛṣṭatvaṃ pratīyate // BVaky_1.65 //
analyzed: tasya āśritāt guṇāt eva prakṛṣṭa tvam pratīyate

original: tasyābhidheyabhāvena yaḥ śabdaḥ samavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya abhidheya bhāvena yaḥ śabdaḥ samavasthitaḥ

original: tasāpy uccāraṇe rūpam anyat tasmād vivicyate // BVaky_1.66 //
analyzed: uccāraṇe rūpam anyat tasmāt vivicyate

original: prāk samjñinābhisaṃbandhāt saṃjñā rūpapadārthikā /
analyzed: prāk samjñinā abhisaṃbandhāt saṃjñā rūpa pada arthikā

original: ṣaṣṭyāś ca prathamāyāś ca nimittatvāya kalpate // BVaky_1.67 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyāḥ ca prathamāyāḥ ca nimitta tvāya kalpate

original: tatrārthavattvāt prathamā saṃjñāśabdād vidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra arthavat tvāt prathamā saṃjñā śabdāt vidhīyate

original: asyete vyatirekaś ca tadarthād eva jāyate // BVaky_1.68 //
analyzed: asya ite vyatirekaḥ ca tad arthāt eva jāyate

original: svaṃ rūpam iti kaiś cit tu vyaktiḥ saṃjñopadiśyate /
analyzed: svam rūpam iti kaiḥ cit tu vyaktiḥ saṃjñā upadiśyate

original: jāteḥ kāryāṇi saṃsṛṣṭā jātis tu pratipadyate // BVaky_1.69 //
analyzed: jāteḥ kāryāṇi saṃsṛṣṭā jātiḥ tu pratipadyate

original: saṃjñinīṃ vyaktim icchanti sūtre grāhyām athāpare /
analyzed: saṃjñinīm vyaktim icchanti sūtre grāhyām atha apare

original: jātipratyāyitā vyaktiḥ pradeśeṣūpatiṣṭhate // BVaky_1.70 //
analyzed: jāti pratyāyi tā vyaktiḥ pradeśeṣu upatiṣṭhate

original: kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cid ekatvavādinaḥ /
analyzed: kārya tve nitya tāyām vā ke cid eka tva vādinaḥ

original: kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cin nānātvavādinaḥ // BVaky_1.71 //
analyzed: kārya tve nitya tāyām vā ke cid nānātva vādinaḥ

original: padabhede 'pi varṇānām ekatvaṃ na nivartate /
analyzed: pada bhede pi varṇānām eka tvam na nivartate

original: vākyeṣu padam ekaṃ ca bhinneṣv apy upalabhyate // BVaky_1.72 //
analyzed: vākyeṣu padam ekam ca bhinneṣu api upalabhyate

original: na varṇavyatirekeṇa padam anyac ca vidyate /
analyzed: na varṇa vyatirekeṇa padam anyat ca vidyate

original: vākyaṃ varṇapadābhyāṃ ca pravibhāgo na kaś cana // BVaky_1.73 //
analyzed: vākyam varṇa padābhyām ca pravibhāgaḥ na kaḥ cana

original: pade na varṇā vidyante varṇeṣv avayavā na ca /
analyzed: pade na varṇāḥ vidyante varṇeṣu avayavāḥ na ca

original: vākyāt padānām atyantaṃ pravibhāgo na kaś cana // BVaky_1.74 //
analyzed: vākyāt padānām atyantam pravibhāgaḥ na kaḥ cana

original: bhinnadarśanam āśritya vyavahāro 'nugamyate /
analyzed: bhinna darśanam āśritya vyavahāraḥ nugamyate

original: tatra yan mukhyam ekeṣāṃ tatrānyeṣāṃ viparyayaḥ // BVaky_1.75 //
analyzed: tatra yat mukhyam ekeṣām tatra anyeṣām viparyayaḥ

original: sphotasyābhinnakālasya dhvanikālānupātinaḥ /
analyzed: sphotasya abhinna kālasya dhvani kāla anupātinaḥ

original: grahaṇopādhibhedena vṛttibhedaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_1.76 //
analyzed: grahaṇa upādhi bhedena vṛtti bhedam pracakṣate

original: svabhāvabhedān nityatve hrasvadīrghaplutādiṣu /
analyzed: svabhāva bhedāt nitya tve hrasva dīrgha pluta ādiṣu

original: prākṛtasya dhvaneḥ kālaḥ śabdasyety upacaryate // BVaky_1.77 //
analyzed: prākṛtasya dhvaneḥ kālaḥ śabdasya iti upacaryate

original: śabdasya grahaṇe hetuḥ prākṛto dhvanir iṣyate /
analyzed: śabdasya grahaṇe hetuḥ prākṛtaḥ dhvaniḥ iṣyate

original: sthitibhedanimittatvaṃ vaikṛtaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_1.78 //
analyzed: sthiti bheda nimitta tvam vaikṛtaḥ pratipadyate

original: śabdasyordhvam abhivyakter vṛttibhedaṃ tu vaikṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śabdasya ūrdhvam abhivyakteḥ vṛtti bhedam tu vaikṛtaḥ

original: dhvanayaḥ samupohante sphoṭātmā tair na bhidyate // BVaky_1.79 //
analyzed: dhvanayaḥ samupohante sphoṭa ātmā taiḥ na bhidyate

original: indriyasyaivasaṃskāraḥ śabdasyaivobhavasya vā /
analyzed: indriyasya eva saṃskāraḥ śabdasya eva ubhavasya vā

original: kriyate dhvanibhir vādās trayo 'bhivyaktivādinām // BVaky_1.80 //
analyzed: kriyate dhvanibhiḥ vādāḥ trayaḥ bhivyakti vādinām

original: indriyasyaiva saṃskāraḥ samādhānāñjanādibhiḥ /
analyzed: indriyasya eva saṃskāraḥ samādhāna añjana ādibhiḥ

original: viṣayasya tu saṃskāraḥ tadgandhapratipattaye // BVaky_1.81 //
analyzed: viṣayasya tu saṃskāraḥ tad gandha pratipattaye

original: cakṣuṣaḥ prāpyakāritve tejasā tu dvayor api /
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ prāpya kāri tve tejasā tu dvayoḥ api

original: viṣayendriyayor iṣṭā saṃskāraḥ sa kramo dhvaneḥ // BVaky_1.82 //
analyzed: viṣaya indriyayoḥ iṣṭā saṃskāraḥ sa kramaḥ dhvaneḥ

original: sphoṭarūpāvibhāgena dhvaner grahaṇam iṣyate /
analyzed: sphoṭa rūpa avibhāgena dhvaneḥ grahaṇam iṣyate

original: kaiś cit dhvanir asaṃvedyaḥ svatantro 'nyaiḥ prakalpitaḥ // BVaky_1.83 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit dhvaniḥ asaṃvedyaḥ svatantraḥ nyaiḥ prakalpitaḥ

original: yathānuvākaḥ śloko vā soḍhatvam upagacchate /
analyzed: yathā anuvākaḥ ślokaḥ vā soḍha tvam upagacchate

original: āvṛttyā na tu sa granthaḥ pratyāvṛtti nirūpyate // BVaky_1.84 //
analyzed: āvṛttyā na tu sa granthaḥ pratyāvṛtti nirūpyate

original: pratyayair anupākhyeyair grahaṇānuguṇais tathā /
analyzed: pratyayaiḥ anupākhyeyaiḥ grahaṇa anuguṇaiḥ tathā

original: dhvaniprakāśite śabde svarūpam avadhāryate // BVaky_1.85 //
analyzed: dhvani prakāśite śabde svarūpam avadhāryate

original: nādair āhitabījāyām antyena dhvaninā saha /
analyzed: nādaiḥ āhitabījāyām antyena dhvaninā saha

original: āvṛttaparipākāyāṃ buddhau śabdo 'vadhāryate // BVaky_1.86 //
analyzed: āvṛtta paripākāyām buddhau śabdaḥ vadhāryate

original: asataś cāntarāle yāñ chabdān astīti manyate /
analyzed: asataḥ ca antarāle yām śabdān asti iti manyate

original: pratipattur aśaktiḥ sā grahaṇopāya eva saḥ // BVaky_1.87 //
analyzed: pratipattuḥ aśaktiḥ sā grahaṇa upāyaḥ eva saḥ

original: bhedānukāro jñānasya vācaś copaplavo dhruvaḥ /
analyzed: bheda anukāraḥ jñānasya vācaḥ ca upaplavaḥ dhruvaḥ

original: kramopasṛṣṭarūpā vāg jñānaṃ jñeyavyapāśrayam // BVaky_1.88 //
analyzed: krama upasṛṣṭa rūpā vāc jñānam jñeya vyapāśrayam

original: *jñeyena na vinā jñānaṃ vyavahāre 'vatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: jñeyena na vinā jñānam vyavahāre vatiṣṭhate

original: nālabdhakramayā vācā kaś cid artho 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_1.89 *//
analyzed: na a labdha kramayā vācā kaḥ cit arthaḥ bhidhīyate  /

original: yathādyasaṃkhyāgrahaṇam upāyaḥ pratipattaye /
analyzed: yathā ādi a saṃkhyā grahaṇam upāyaḥ pratipattaye

original: saṃkhyāntarāṇāṃ bhede 'pi tathā śabdāntaraśrutiḥ // BVaky_1.90 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā antarāṇām bhede tathā śabda antara śrutiḥ

original: pratyekaṃ vyañjakā bhinna varṇavākyapadeṣu ye /
analyzed: pratyekam vyañjakāḥ varṇa vākya padeṣu ye

original: teṣām atyantabhede 'pi saṃkīrṇā iva śaktayaḥ // BVaky_1.91 //
analyzed: teṣām atyanta bhede pi saṃkīrṇāḥ iva śaktayaḥ

original: yathaiva darśanaiḥ pūrvair dūrāt saṃtamase 'pi vā /
analyzed: yathā eva darśanaiḥ pūrvaiḥ dūrāt vā

original: anyathākṛtya viṣayam anyathaivādhyavasyati // BVaky_1.92 //
analyzed: anyathākṛtya viṣayam anyathā eva adhyavasyati

original: vyajyamāne tathā vākye vākyābhivyaktihetubhiḥ /
analyzed: vyajyamāne tathā vākye vākya abhivyakti hetubhiḥ

original: bhāgāvagraharūpeṇa pūrvaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate // BVaky_1.93 //
analyzed: bhāga avagraha rūpeṇa pūrvam buddhiḥ pravartate

original: yathānupūrvīniyamo vikāre kṣīrabījayoḥ /
analyzed: yathā ānupūrvī niyamaḥ vikāre kṣīra bījayoḥ

original: tathaiva pratipattṝṇāṃ niyato buddhiṣu kramaḥ // BVaky_1.94 //
analyzed: tathā eva pratipattṝṇām niyataḥ buddhiṣu kramaḥ

original: bhāgavatsv api teṣv eva rūpabhedo dhvaneḥ kramāt /
analyzed: bhāgavatsu api teṣu eva rūpa bhedaḥ dhvaneḥ kramāt

original: nirbhāgeṣv abhyupāyo vā bhāgabhedaprakalpanam // BVaky_1.95 //
analyzed: nirbhāgeṣu abhyupāyaḥ vā bhāga bheda prakalpanam

original: anekavyaktyabhivyaṅgyā jātiḥ sphoṭa iti smṛtā /
analyzed: aneka vyakti abhivyaṅgyā jātiḥ sphoṭaḥ iti smṛtā

original: kaiś cit vyaktaya evāsya dhvanitvena prakalpitāḥ // BVaky_1.96 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit vyaktayaḥ eva asya dhvani tvena prakalpitāḥ

original: avikārasya śabdasya nimittair vikṛto dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: avikārasya śabdasya nimittaiḥ vikṛtaḥ dhvaniḥ

original: upalabdhau nimittatvam upayāti prakāśavat // BVaky_1.97 //
analyzed: upalabdhau nimitta tvam upayāti prakāśa vat

original: na cānityeṣv abhivyaktir niyamena vyavasthitā /
analyzed: na ca anityeṣu abhivyaktiḥ niyamena vyavasthitā

original: āśrayair api nityānāṃ jātīnāṃ vyaktir iṣyate // BVaky_1.98 //
analyzed: āśrayaiḥ api nityānām jātīnām vyaktiḥ iṣyate

original: deśādibhiś ca saṃbandho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyavatām api /
analyzed: deśa ādibhiḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kāyavatām api

original: deśabhedavikalpe 'pi na bhedo dhvaniśabdayoḥ // BVaky_1.99 //
analyzed: deśa bheda vikalpe pi na bhedaḥ dhvani śabdayoḥ

original: grahaṇagrāhyayoḥ siddhā yogyatā niyatā yathā /
analyzed: grahaṇa grāhyayoḥ siddhā yogyatā niyatā yathā

original: vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi tathaiva sphoṭanādayoḥ // BVaky_1.100 //
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāve tathā eva sphoṭa nādayoḥ

original: sadṛśagrahaṇānāṃ ca gandhādīnāṃ prakāśakam /
analyzed: sadṛśa grahaṇānām ca gandha ādīnām prakāśakam

original: nimittaṃ niyataṃ loke pratidravyam avasthitam // BVaky_1.101 //
analyzed: nimittam niyatam loke pratidravyam avasthitam

original: prakāśakānāṃ bhedāṃś ca prakāśyo 'rtho 'nuvartate /
analyzed: prakāśakānām bhedān ca prakāśyaḥ rthaḥ nuvartate

original: tailodakādibhede tat pratyakṣaṃ pratibimbake // BVaky_1.102 //
analyzed: taila udaka ādi bhede tat pratyakṣam pratibimbake

original: viruddhaparimāṇeṣu vajrādarśatalādiṣu /
analyzed: viruddha parimāṇeṣu vajra ādarśa tala ādiṣu

original: parvatādisarūpāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāsti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_1.103 //
analyzed: parvata ādi sarūpāṇām bhāvānām na asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: tasmād abhinnakāleṣu varṇavākyapadādiṣu /
analyzed: tasmāt abhinna kāleṣu varṇa vākya pada ādiṣu

original: vṛttikālaḥ svakālaś ca nādabhedād vibhajyate // BVaky_1.104 //
analyzed: vṛtti kālaḥ sva kālaḥ ca nāda bhedāt vibhajyate

original: yaḥ saṃyogavibhāgābhyāṃ karaṇair upajanyate /
analyzed: yaḥ saṃyoga vibhāgābhyām karaṇaiḥ upajanyate

original: sa sphoṭaḥ śabdajāḥ śabdā dhvanayo 'nyair udāhṛtāḥ // BVaky_1.105 //
analyzed: sa sphoṭaḥ śabda jāḥ śabdāḥ dhvanayaḥ nyaiḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: alpe mahati vā śabde sphoṭakālo na bhidyate /
analyzed: alpe mahati vā śabde sphoṭa kālaḥ na bhidyate

original: paras tu śabdasaṃtānaḥ pracayāpacayātmakaḥ // BVaky_1.106 //
analyzed: paraḥ tu śabda saṃtānaḥ pracaya apacaya ātmakaḥ

original: dūrāt prabheva dīpasya dhvanimātraṃ tu lakṣyate /
analyzed: dūrāt prabhā iva dīpasya dhvani mātram tu lakṣyate

original: ghaṇṭādūnāṃ ca śabdeṣu vyakto bhedaḥ sa dṛśyate // BVaky_1.107 //
analyzed: ca śabdeṣu vyaktaḥ bhedaḥ sa dṛśyate

original: dravyābhighātāt pracitau bhinnau dīrghaplutāv api /
analyzed: dravya abhighātāt pracitau bhinnau dīrgha plutau api

original: kampe tūparate jātā nādā vṛtter viśeṣakāḥ // BVaky_1.108 //
analyzed: kampe tu uparate jātāḥ nādāḥ vṛtteḥ viśeṣakāḥ

original: anavasthitakampe 'pi karaṇe dhvanayo 'pare /
analyzed: anavasthita kampe pi karaṇe dhvanayaḥ pare

original: sphoṭād evopajāyante jvālā jvālāntarād iva // BVaky_1.109 //
analyzed: sphoṭāt eva upajāyante jvālāḥ jvālā antarāt iva

original: vāyor aṇūnāṃ jñānasya śabdatvāpattir iṣyate /
analyzed: vāyoḥ aṇūnām jñānasya śabda tva āpattiḥ iṣyate

original: kaiś cid darśanabhedo hi pravādeṣv anavasthitaḥ // BVaky_1.110 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit darśana bhedaḥ hi pravādeṣu anavasthitaḥ

original: *labdhakriyāḥ prayatnena vaktur icccānuvartinā /
analyzed: labdha kriyāḥ prayatnena vaktuḥ icchā anuvartinā

original: sthāneṣv abhihato vāyuḥ śabdatvaṃ pratipadyate // BVaky_1.111 *//
analyzed: sthāneṣu abhihataḥ vāyuḥ śabda tvam pratipadyate

original: *tasya kāraṇasāmarthyād vegapracayadharmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasya kāraṇa sāmarthyāt vega pracaya dharmaṇaḥ

original: saṃnipātād vibhajyante sāravatyo 'pi mūrtayaḥ // BVaky_1.112 *//
analyzed: saṃnipātāt vibhajyante sāravatyaḥ pi mūrtayaḥ

original: *aṇavaḥ sarvaśaktitvād bhedasaṃsargavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: aṇavaḥ sarva śakti tvāt bheda saṃsarga vṛttayaḥ

original: chāyātapatamaḥśabda- bhāvena pariṇāminaḥ // BVaky_1.113 *//
analyzed: chāyā ātapa tamaḥ śabda bhāvena pariṇāminaḥ

original: *svaśaktau vyajyamānāyāṃ prayatnena samīritāḥ /
analyzed: sva śaktau vyajyamānāyām prayatnena samīritāḥ

original: abhrāṇīva pracīyante śabdākhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // BVaky_1.114 *//
analyzed: abhrāṇi iva pracīyante śabda ākhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ

original: *athāyam āntaro jñātā sūkṣmavāgātmani sthitaḥ /
analyzed: atha ayam āntaraḥ jñātā sūkṣma vāc ātmani sthitaḥ

original: vyaktaye svasya rūpasya śabdatvena vivartate // BVaky_1.115 *//
analyzed: vyaktaye svasya rūpasya śabda tvena vivartate

original: *sa manobhāvam āpadya tejasā pākam āgataḥ /
analyzed: sa manobhāvam āpadya tejasā pākam āgataḥ

original: vāyum āviśati prāṇam athāsau samudīryate // BVaky_1.116 *//
analyzed: vāyum āviśati prāṇam atha asau samudīryate  /

original: *antaḥkaraṇatattvasya vāyur āśrayatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa tattvasya vāyuḥ āśraya tām gataḥ

original: taddharmeṇa samāviṣṭas tejasaiva vivartate // BVaky_1.117 *//
analyzed: tad dharmeṇa samāviṣṭaḥ tejasā eva vivartate  /

original: *vibhajan svātmano granthīñ chrutirūpaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ /
analyzed: vibhajan sva ātmanaḥ granthīm chruti rūpaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ

original: prāṇo varṇān abhivyajya varṇeṣv evopalīyate // BVaky_1.118 *//
analyzed: prāṇaḥ varṇān abhivyajya varṇeṣu eva upalīyate  /

original: *ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān mano yuṅkte vivakṣayā /
analyzed: ātmā buddhyā samarthya arthān manaḥ yuṅkte vivakṣayā

original: manaḥ kāyāgnim āhanti sa prerayati mārutam // BVaky_1.119 *//
analyzed: manaḥ kāya agnim āhanti sa prerayati mārutam

original: ajasravṛttir yaḥ śabdaḥ sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate /
analyzed: ajasra vṛttiḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ sūkṣma tvāt na upalabhyate

original: vyajanād vāyur iva sa svanimittāt pratīyate // BVaky_1.120 //
analyzed: vyajanāt vāyuḥ iva sa sva nimittāt pratīyate

original: tasya prāṇe ca yā śaktir yā ca buddhau vyavasthitā /
analyzed: tasya prāṇe ca yā śaktiḥ yā ca buddhau vyavasthitā

original: vivartamānā sthāniṣu saiṣā bhedaṃ prapadyate // BVaky_1.121 //
analyzed: vivartamānā sthāniṣu sā eṣā bhedam prapadyate

original: śabdeṣv evāśritā śaktir viśvasyāsya nibandhanī /
analyzed: śabdeṣu evā āśritā śaktiḥ viśvasya asya nibandhanī

original: yannetraḥ pratibhātmāyaṃ bhedarūpaḥ pratāyate // BVaky_1.122 //
analyzed: yad netraḥ pratibhā ātmā ayam bheda rūpaḥ pratāyate

original: śabdādibhedaḥ śabdena vyākhyāto rūpyate yataḥ /
analyzed: śabda ādi bhedaḥ śabdena vyākhyātaḥ rūpyate yatas

original: tasmād arthavidhāḥ sarvāḥ śabdamātrāsu niśritāḥ // BVaky_1.123 //
analyzed: tasmāt artha vidhāḥ sarvāḥ śabda mātrāsu niśritāḥ

original: (ṣaḍgādibhedaḥ a)
analyzed: ṣaḍga ādi bhedaḥ a

original: śabdasyapariṇāmo 'yam ity āmnāyavido viduḥ /
analyzed: śabdasya apariṇāmaḥ yam iti āmnāya vidaḥ viduḥ

original: chandobhya eva prathamam etad viśvaṃ pravartate // BVaky_1.124 //
analyzed: chandobhyaḥ eva prathamam etat viśvam pravartate

original: vibhajya bahudhātmānaṃ sa cchandasyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: vibhajya bahudhā ātmānam sa chandasyaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: chandomayībhir mātrābhir bahudhaiva viveśa tam // BVaky_1.125 //
analyzed: chandaḥ mayībhiḥ mātrābhiḥ bahudhā eva viveśa tam

original: sādhvī vāg bhūyasī yeṣu puruṣeṣu vyavasthitā /
analyzed: sādhvī vāc bhūyasī yeṣu puruṣeṣu vyavasthitā

original: adhikaṃ vartate teṣu puṇyaṃ rūpaṃ prajāpateḥ // BVaky_1.126 //
analyzed: adhikam vartate teṣu puṇyam rūpam prajāpateḥ

original: prājāpatyaṃ mahat tejas tatpātrair iva saṃvṛttam /
analyzed: prājāpatyam mahat tejaḥ tat pātraiḥ iva saṃvṛttam

original: śarīrabhede viduṣāṃ svāṃ yonim upadhāvati // BVaky_1.127 //
analyzed: śarīrabhede viduṣām svām yonim upadhāvati

original: yad etan maṇḍalaṃ bhāsvad dhāma citrasya rādhasaḥ /
analyzed: yat etat maṇḍalam bhāsvat dhāma citrasya rādhasaḥ

original: tadbhāvam abhisaṃbhūya vidyāyāṃ pravilīyate // BVaky_1.128 //
analyzed: tad bhāvam abhisaṃbhūya vidyāyām pravilīyate

original: itikartavyatā loke sarvā śabdavyapāśrayā /
analyzed: itikartavya tā loke sarvā śabda vyapāśrayā

original: yāṃ pūrvāhitasaṃskāro bālo 'pi pratipadyate // BVaky_1.129 //
analyzed: yām pūrva āhita saṃskāraḥ bālaḥ pi pratipadyate

original: ādyaḥ kāraṇavinyāsaḥ prāṇasyordhvaṃ samīraṇam /
analyzed: ādyaḥ kāraṇa vinyāsaḥ prāṇasya ūrdhvam samīraṇam

original: sthānānām abhighātaś ca na vinā śabdabhāvanām // BVaky_1.130 //
analyzed: sthānānām abhighātaḥ ca na vinā śabda bhāvanām

original: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamād ṛte /
analyzed: na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte

original: anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena bhāsate // BVaky_1.131 //
analyzed: anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena bhāsate

original: vāgrūpatā cet utkrāmed avabodhasya śāśvatī /
analyzed: vāc rūpa tā ced utkrāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī

original: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī // BVaky_1.132 //
analyzed: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī

original: sā sarvavidyāśilpānāṃ kalānāṃ copabandhanī /
analyzed: sā sarva vidyā śilpānām kalānām ca upabandhanī

original: tadvaśād abhiniṣpannaṃ sarvaṃ vastu vibhajyate // BVaky_1.133 //
analyzed: tad vaśāt abhiniṣpannam sarvam vastu vibhajyate

original: saiṣā saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃjñā bahir antaś ca vartate /
analyzed: sā eṣā saṃsāriṇām saṃjñā bahis antar ca vartate

original: tanmātrām avyatikrāntaṃ caitanyaṃ sarvajātiṣu // BVaky_1.134 //
analyzed: tanmātrām avyatikrāntam caitanyam sarva jātiṣu

original: arthakriyāsu vāk sarvān samīhayati dehinaḥ /
analyzed: arthakriyāsu vāc sarvān samīhayati dehinaḥ

original: tadutkrāntau visaṃjño 'yaṃ dṛśyate kāṣṭakuḍyavat // BVaky_1.135 //
analyzed: tad utkrāntau visaṃjñaḥ yam dṛśyate kāṣṭa kuḍya vat

original: *bhedodgrāhavivartena labdhākāraparigrahā /
analyzed: bheda udgrāha vivartena labdha ākāra parigrahā

original: āmnātā sarvavidyāsu vāg eva prakṛtiḥ parā // BVaky_1.136 *//
analyzed: āmnātā sarva vidyāsu vāc eva prakṛtiḥ parā

original: *ekatvam anatikrāntā vāṅnetrā vāṅnibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: eka tvam an atikrāntāḥ vāc netrāḥ vāc nibandhanāḥ

original: pṛthak pratyavabhāsante vāgvibhāgā gavādayaḥ // BVaky_1.137 *//
analyzed: pṛthak pratyavabhāsante vāc vibhāgāḥ go ādayaḥ

original: *ṣaḍdvāraṃ ṣaḍadhiṣṭhānāṃ [ṣaṭpra]bodhāṃ ṣaḍavyayām /
analyzed: ṣaṣ dvāram ṣaṣ adhiṣṭhānām ṣaṣ prabodhām ṣaṣ avyayām

original: te mṛtyum ativartante ye vai vācam upāsate // BVaky_1.138 *//
analyzed: te mṛtyum ativartante ye vai vācam upāsate  /

original: pravibhāge yathā kartā tayā kārye pravartate /
analyzed: pravibhāge yathā kartā tayā kārye pravartate

original: avibhāge tathā saiva kāryatvenāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_1.139 //
analyzed: avibhāge tathā sā eva kārya tvena avatiṣṭhate

original: *pravibhajyātmanātmānaṃ sṛṣṭvā bhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
analyzed: pravibhajya ātmanā ātmānam sṛṣṭvā bhāvān pṛthagvidhān

original: sarveśvaraḥ sarvamayaḥ svapne bhoktā pravartate // BVaky_1.140 *//
analyzed: sarva īśvaraḥ sarva mayaḥ svapne bhoktā pravartate  /

original: svamātrā paramātrā vā śrutyā prakramyate yathā /
analyzed: sva mātrā para mātrā vā śrutyā prakramyate yathā

original: tathaiva rūḍhatām eti tayā hy artho vidhīyate // BVaky_1.141 //
analyzed: tathā eva rūḍha tām eti tayā hi arthaḥ vidhīyate

original: atyantam atathābhūte nimitte śrutyapāśrayāt /
analyzed: atyantam a tathābhūte nimitte śruti apāśrayāt

original: dṛśyate 'lātacakrādau vastvākāranirūpaṇā // BVaky_1.142 //
analyzed: dṛśyate lāta cakra ādau vastu ākāra nirūpaṇā

original: api prayoktur ātmānaṃ śabdam antar avasthitam /
analyzed: api prayoktuḥ ātmānam śabdam antar avasthitam

original: prāhur mahāntam ṛṣabhaṃ yena sāyujyam iṣyate // BVaky_1.143 //
analyzed: prāhuḥ mahāntam ṛṣabham yena sāyujyam iṣyate

original: tasmād yaḥ śabdasaṃskāraḥ sā siddhiḥ paramātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ śabda saṃskāraḥ sā siddhiḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: tasya pravṛttitattvajñas tad brahmāmṛtam aśnute // BVaky_1.144 //
analyzed: tasya pravṛtti tattva jñaḥ tat brahma amṛtam aśnute

original: *prāṇavṛttim atikrānte vācas tattve vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa vṛttim atikrānte vācaḥ tattve vyavasthitaḥ

original: kramasaṃhārayogena saṃhṛtyātmānam ātmani // BVaky_1.145 *//
analyzed: krama saṃhāra yogena saṃhṛtya ātmānam ātmani

original: *vācaḥ saṃskāram ādhāya vācaṃ jñāne niveśya ca /
analyzed: vācaḥ saṃskāram ādhāya vācam jñāne niveśya ca

original: vibhajya bandhanāny asyāḥ kṛtvā tāṃ chinnabandhanām // BVaky_1.146 *//
analyzed: vibhajya bandhanāni asyāḥ kṛtvā tām chinna bandhanām

original: *jyotir āntaram āsādya cchinnagranthiparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: jyotiḥ āntaram āsādya chinna granthi parigrahaḥ

original: kāraṇajyotiṣaikatvaṃ chittvā granthīn pravartate // BVaky_1.147 *//
analyzed: kāraṇa jyotiṣā eka tvam chittvā granthīn pravartate

original: na jātv akartṛkam kaś cid āgamaṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: na jātu a kartṛkam kaḥ cit āgamam pratipadyate

original: bījaṃ sarvāgamāpāye trayy evāto vyavasthitā // BVaky_1.148 //
analyzed: bījam sarva āgama apāye trayī eva atas vyavasthitā

original: astaṃ yāteṣu vādeṣu kartṛṣv anyeṣv asatsv api /
analyzed: astam yāteṣu vādeṣu kartṛṣu anyeṣu asatsu api

original: śrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmaṃ loko na vyativartate // BVaky_1.149 //
analyzed: śruti smṛti uditam dharmam lokaḥ na vyativartate

original: jñāne svābhāvike nārthaḥ śāstraiḥ kaś cana vidyate /
analyzed: jñāne svābhāvike na arthaḥ śāstraiḥ kaḥ cana vidyate

original: dharmo jñānasya hetuś cet tasyāmnāyo nibandhanam // BVaky_1.150 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ jñānasya hetuḥ ced tasya āmnāyaḥ nibandhanam

original: vedaśāstrāvirodhī ca tarkaś cakśur apaśyatām /
analyzed: veda śāstra avirodhī ca tarkaḥ cakśuḥ apaśyatām

original: rūpamātrād dhi vākyārthaḥ kevalaṃ nātitiṣṭhati // BVaky_1.151 //
analyzed: rūpa mātrāt hi vākya arthaḥ kevalam na atitiṣṭhati

original: sato 'vivakṣā pārārthyaṃ vyaktir arthasya laiṅgikī /
analyzed: sataḥ vivakṣā pārārthyam vyaktiḥ arthasya laiṅgikī

original: iti nyāyo bahuvidhas tarkeṇa pravibhajyate // BVaky_1.152 //
analyzed: iti nyāyaḥ bahuvidhaḥ tarkeṇa pravibhajyate

original: śabdānām eva sā śaktis tarko yaḥ puruṣāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: śabdānām eva sā śaktiḥ tarkaḥ yaḥ puruṣa āśrayaḥ

original: sa śabdānugato nyāyo 'nāgameṣv anibandhanaḥ // BVaky_1.153 //
analyzed: sa śabda anugataḥ nyāyaḥ na āgameṣu a nibandhanaḥ

original: *yad udumbaravarṇānāṃ ghaṭīnāṃ maṇḍalaṃ mahat /
analyzed: yat udumbara varṇānām ghaṭīnām maṇḍalam mahat

original: pītaṃ na gamayet svargaṃ kiṃ tat kratugataṃ nayet // BVaky_1.154 *//
analyzed: pītam na gamayet svargam kim tat kratu gatam nayet  /

original: rūpādayo yathā dṛṣṭāḥ paryarthaṃ yataśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa ādayaḥ yathā dṛṣṭāḥ paryartham yata śaktayaḥ

original: śabdās tathaiva dṛśyante viṣāpaharaṇādiṣu // BVaky_1.155 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ tathā eva dṛśyante viṣa apaharaṇa ādiṣu

original: yathaiṣāṃ tatra sāmarthyaṃ dharme 'py evaṃ pratīyatām /
analyzed: yathā eṣām tatra sāmarthyam dharme pi evam pratīyatām

original: sādhūnāṃ sādhubhis tasmād vācyam abhyudayārthinām // BVaky_1.156 //
analyzed: sādhūnām sādhubhiḥ tasmāt vācyam abhyudaya arthinām

original: sarvo 'dṛṣṭaphalān arthān āgamāt pratipadyate /
analyzed: sarvaḥ dṛṣṭa phalān arthān āgamāt pratipadyate

original: viparītaṃ ca sarvatra śakyate vaktum āgame // BVaky_1.157 //
analyzed: viparītam ca sarvatra śakyate vaktum āgame

original: sādhutvajñānaviṣayā seyaṃ vyākaraṇasmṛtiḥ /
analyzed: sādhu tva jñāna viṣayā sā iyam vyākaraṇa smṛtiḥ

original: avicchedena śiṣṭānām idaṃ smṛtinibandhanam // BVaky_1.158 //
analyzed: avicchedena śiṣṭānām idam smṛti nibandhanam

original: vaikharyā madhyamāyāś ca paśyantyāś caitad adbhutam /
analyzed: vaikharyāḥ madhyamāyāḥ ca paśyantyāḥ ca etat adbhutam

original: anekatīrthabhedāyās trayyā cācaḥ paraṃ param // BVaky_1.159 //
analyzed: aneka tīrtha bhedāyāḥ trayyā ca acaḥ param param

original: *gaur iva prakṣaraty ekā rasam uttamaśālinī /
analyzed: gauḥ iva prakṣarati ekā rasam uttama śālinī

original: divyādivyena rūpeṇa bhāratī gauḥ śucismitā // BVaky_1.160 *//
analyzed: divya adivyena rūpeṇa bhāratī gauḥ śuci smitā

original: *etayor antaraṃ paśya sūkṣmayoḥ spandamānayoḥ /
analyzed: etayoḥ antaram paśya sūkṣmayoḥ spandamānayoḥ

original: prāṇāpānāntare nityam ekā sarvasya tiṣṭhati // BVaky_1.161 *//
analyzed: prāṇa apāna antare nityam ekā sarvasya tiṣṭhati

original: *anyā tv apreryamāṇaiva vinā prāṇena vartate /
analyzed: anyā tu a preryamāṇā eva vinā prāṇena vartate

original: jāyate hi tataḥ prāṇo vācam āpyāyayan punaḥ // BVaky_1.162 *//
analyzed: jāyate hi tatas prāṇaḥ vācam āpyāyayan punar

original: *prāṇenāpyāyitā saivaṃ vyavahāranibandhanī /
analyzed: prāṇena āpyāyitā sā evam vyavahāra nibandhanī

original: sarvasyocchvāsam āsādya na vāg vadati karhi cit // BVaky_1.163 *//
analyzed: sarvasya ucchvāsam āsādya na vāc vadati karhi cit

original: *ghoṣiṇī jātanirghoṣā aghoṣā ca pravartate /
analyzed: ghoṣiṇī jāta nirghoṣā aghoṣā ca pravartate

original: tayor api ca ghoṣiṇyā nirghoṣaiva garīyasī // BVaky_1.164 *//
analyzed: tayoḥ api ca ghoṣiṇyāḥ nirghoṣā eva garīyasī

original: *sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛtavarṇaparigrahā /
analyzed: sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛta varṇa parigrahā

original: vaikharī vāk prayoktṝṇāṃ prāṇavṛttinibandhanā // BVaky_1.165 *//
analyzed: vaikharī vāc prayoktṝṇām prāṇa vṛtti nibandhanā

original: *kevalaṃ buddhyupādāna- kramarūpānupātinī /
analyzed: kevalam buddhi upādāna krama rūpa anupātinī

original: prāṇavṛttim atikramya madhyamā vāk pravartate // BVaky_1.166 *//
analyzed: prāṇa vṛttim atikramya madhyamā vāc pravartate  /

original: *avibhāgā tu paśyantī sarvataḥ saṃhṛtakramā /
analyzed: avibhāgā tu paśyantī sarvatas saṃhṛta kramā

original: svarūpajyotir evāntaḥ sūkṣmā vāg anapāyinī // BVaky_1.167 *//
analyzed: sva rūpa jyotiḥ eva antar sūkṣmā vāc anapāyinī  /

original: *pīyūṣāpūryamāṇāpi nityam āgantubhir malaiḥ /
analyzed: pīyūṣa āpūryamāṇā api nityam āgantubhiḥ malaiḥ

original: antyā kaleva somasya nātyantam abhidhīyate // BVaky_1.168 *//
analyzed: antyā kalā iva somasya na atyantam abhidhīyate

original: *yasyāṃ dṛṣṭasvarūpāyām adhikāro nivartate /
analyzed: yasyām dṛṣṭa svarūpāyām adhikāraḥ nivartate

original: puruṣe ṣoḍaśakale tām āhur amṛtāṃ kalām // BVaky_1.169 *//
analyzed: puruṣe ṣoḍaśa kale tām āhuḥ amṛtām kalām

original: *prāptoparāgarūpā sā viplavair anuṣaṅgibhiḥ /
analyzed: prāpta uparāga rūpā sā viplavaiḥ anuṣaṅgibhiḥ

original: vaikharī sattvamātreva guṇair na vyavakīryate // BVaky_1.170 *//
analyzed: vaikharī sattva mātrā iva guṇaiḥ na vyavakīryate

original: tadvibhāgāvibhāgābhyāṃ kriyamāṇām avasthitam /
analyzed: tad vibhāga avibhāgābhyām kriyamāṇām avasthitam

original: svabhāvajñais tu bhāvānāṃ dṛśyante śabdaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_1.171 //
analyzed: svabhāva jñaiḥ tu bhāvānām dṛśyante śabda śaktayaḥ

original: anādim avyavacchinnāṃ śrutim āhur akartṛkām /
analyzed: anādim avyavacchinnām śrutim āhuḥ akartṛkām

original: śiṣṭair nibadhyamānā tu na vyavacchidyate smṛtiḥ // BVaky_1.172 //
analyzed: śiṣṭaiḥ nibadhyamānā tu na vyavacchidyate smṛtiḥ

original: avibhāgād vivṛttānām abhikhyā svapnavac chrutau /
analyzed: avibhāgāt vivṛttānām abhikhyā svapna vat śrutau

original: bhāvatattvaṃ tu vijñāya liṅgebhyo vihitā smṛtiḥ // BVaky_1.173 //
analyzed: bhāva tattvam tu vijñāya liṅgebhyaḥ vihitā smṛtiḥ

original: kāyavāgbuddhiviṣayā ye malāḥ samavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: kāya vāc buddhi viṣayāḥ ye malāḥ samavasthitāḥ

original: cikitsālakṣaṇādhyātma- śāstrais teṣāṃ viśuddhayaḥ // BVaky_1.174 //
analyzed: cikitsā lakṣaṇa adhyātma śāstraiḥ teṣām viśuddhayaḥ

original: śabdaḥ saṃskārahīno yo gaur iti prayuyukṣyate /
analyzed: śabdaḥ saṃskāra hīnaḥ yaḥ gauḥ iti prayuyukṣyate

original: tam apabhraṃśam icchanti viśiṣṭārthaniveśinam // BVaky_1.175 //
analyzed: tam apabhraṃśam icchanti viśiṣṭa artha niveśinam

original: asvagoṇyādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavo viṣayāntare /
analyzed: a sva goṇī ādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavaḥ viṣaya antare

original: nimittabhedāt sarvatra sādhutvaṃ ca vyavasthitam // BVaky_1.176 //
analyzed: nimitta bhedāt sarvatra sādhu tvam ca vyavasthitam

original: te sādhuṣv anumānena pratyayotpattihetavaḥ /
analyzed: te sādhuṣu anumānena pratyaya utpatti hetavaḥ

original: tādātmyam upagamyeva śabdārthasya prakāśakāḥ // BVaky_1.177 //
analyzed: tādātmyam upagamya iva śabda arthasya prakāśakāḥ

original: na śiṣṭair anugamyante paryāyā iva sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: na śiṣṭaiḥ anugamyante paryāyāḥ iva sādhavaḥ

original: te yataḥ smṛtiśāstreṇa tasmāt sākṣād avācakāḥ // BVaky_1.178 //
analyzed: te yatas smṛti śāstreṇa tasmāt sākṣāt avācakāḥ

original: aṃbvaṃbv iti yathā bālaḥ śikṣamāṇo 'pabhāṣate /
analyzed: aṃbu aṃbu iti yathā bālaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ upabhāṣate

original: avyaktaṃ tadvidāṃ tena vyaktau bhavati niścayaḥ // BVaky_1.179 //
analyzed: avyaktam tad vidām tena vyaktau bhavati niścayaḥ

original: evaṃ sādhau prayoktavye yo 'pabhraṃśaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: evam sādhau prayoktavye yā upabhraṃśaḥ prayujyate

original: tena sādhuvyavahitaḥ kaś cid artho 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_1.180 //
analyzed: tena sādhu vyavahitaḥ kaḥ cit arthaḥ bhidhīyate

original: pāraṃparyād apabhraṃśā viguṇeṣv abhidhātṛṣu /
analyzed: pāraṃparyāt apabhraṃśāḥ viguṇeṣu abhidhātṛṣu

original: prasiddhim āgatā yena teṣāṃ sādhur avācakaḥ // BVaky_1.181 //
analyzed: prasiddhim āgatāḥ yena teṣām sādhuḥ avācakaḥ

original: daivī vāg vyatikīrṇeyam aśaktair abhidhātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: daivī vāc vyatikīrṇā iyam aśaktaiḥ abhidhātṛbhiḥ

original: anityadarśināṃ tv asmin vāde buddhiviparyayaḥ // BVaky_1.182 //
analyzed: anitya darśinām tu asmin vāde buddhi viparyayaḥ

original: ubhayeṣām avicchedād anyaśabdavivakṣayā /
analyzed: ubhayeṣām avicchedāt anya śabda vivakṣayā

original: yo 'nyaḥ prayujyate śabdo na so 'rthasyābhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_1.183 //
analyzed: yaḥ nyaḥ prayujyate śabdaḥ na saḥ rthasya abhidhāyakaḥ

original: ākhyātaṃ śabdasaṃghāto jātiḥ saṃghātavartinī /
analyzed: ākhyātam śabda saṃghātaḥ jātiḥ saṃghāta vartinī

original: eko 'navayavaḥ śabdaḥ kramo buddhyanusaṃhṛtiḥ // BVaky_2.1 //
analyzed: ekaḥ nava yavaḥ śabdaḥ kramaḥ buddhi anusaṃhṛtiḥ

original: padam ādyaṃ pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ sāpekṣam ity api /
analyzed: padam ādyam pṛthak sarvam padam sāpekṣam iti api

original: vākyaṃ prati matir bhinnā bahudhā nyāyadarśinām // BVaky_2.2 //
analyzed: vākyam prati matiḥ bhinnā bahudhā nyāya darśinām

original: nighātādivyavasthārthaṃ śāstre yat paribhāṣitam /
analyzed: nighāta ādi vyavasthā artham śāstre yat paribhāṣitam

original: sākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ tena na sarvaṃ tulyalakṣaṇaṃ // BVaky_2.3 //
analyzed: sākāṅkṣa avayavam tena na sarvam tulya lakṣaṇam

original: sākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ bhede parānākāṅkṣaśabdakam /
analyzed: sa ākāṅkṣa avayavam bhede para an ākāṅkṣa śabdakam

original: karmapradhānaṃ guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam ucyate // BVaky_2.4 //
analyzed: karma pradhānam guṇavat eka artham vākyam ucyate

original: saṃbodhanapadaṃ yac ca tat kriyāyā viśeṣakam /
analyzed: saṃbodhana padam yat ca tat kriyāyāḥ viśeṣakam

original: tathā tiṅantaṃ tatrāhus tiṅantasya viśeṣakam // BVaky_2.5 //
analyzed: tathā tiṅ antam tatra āhuḥ tiṅ antasya viśeṣakam

original: yathānekam api ktvāntaṃ tiṅantasya viśeṣakam /
analyzed: yathā anekam api ktvā antam tiṅ antasya viśeṣakam

original: tathā tiṅantaṃ tatrāhus tiṅantasya viśeṣakam // BVaky_2.6 //
analyzed: tathā tiṅ antam tatra āhuḥ tiṅ antasya viśeṣakam

original: yathaika eva sarvārtha- prakāśaḥ pravibhajyate /
analyzed: yathā ekaḥ eva sarva artha prakāśaḥ pravibhajyate

original: dṛśyabhedānukāreṇa vākyārthāvagamas tathā // BVaky_2.7 //
analyzed: dṛśya bheda anukāreṇa vākya artha avagamaḥ tathā

original: citrasyaikasya rūpasya yathā bhedanidarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: citrasya ekasya rūpasya yathā bheda nidarśanaiḥ

original: nīlādibhiḥ samākhyānaṃ kriyate bhinnalakṣaṇaiḥ // BVaky_2.8 //
analyzed: nīla ādibhiḥ samākhyānam kriyate bhinna lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: tathaivaikasya vākyasya nirākāṅkṣasya sarvataḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva ekasya vākyasya nirākāṅkṣasya sarvatas

original: śabdāntaraiḥ samākhyānaṃ sākāṅkṣair anugamyate // BVaky_2.9 //
analyzed: śabda antaraiḥ samākhyānam sa ākāṅkṣaiḥ anugamyate

original: yathā pade vibhajyante prakṛtipratyayādayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā pade vibhajyante prakṛti pratyaya ādayaḥ

original: apoddhāras tathā vākye padānām upapadyate // BVaky_2.10 //
analyzed: apoddhāraḥ tathā vākye padānām upapadyate

original: varṇāntarasarūpatvaṃ varṇabhāgeṣu dṛṣyate /
analyzed: varṇa antara sarūpa tvam varṇa bhāgeṣu dṛṣyate

original: padāntarasarūpāś ca padabhāgā iva sthitāḥ // BVaky_2.11 //
analyzed: pada anta rasa rūpāḥ ca pada bhāgāḥ iva sthitāḥ

original: bhāgair anarthakair yuktā vṛṣabhodakayāvakāḥ /
analyzed: bhāgaiḥ anarthakaiḥ yuktāḥ vṛṣabha udaka yāvakāḥ

original: anvayavyatirekau tu vyavahāranibandhanam // BVaky_2.12 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau tu vyavahāra nibandhanam

original: śabdasya na vibhāgo 'sti kuto 'rthasya bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: śabdasya na vibhāgaḥ sti kutas rthasya bhaviṣyati

original: vibhāgaiḥ prakriyābhedam avidvān pratipadyate // BVaky_2.13 //
analyzed: vibhāgaiḥ prakriyā bhedam a vidvān pratipadyate

original: brāhmaṇārtho yathā nāsti kaś cid brāhmaṇakambale /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthaḥ yathā na asti kaḥ cit brāhmaṇa kambale

original: devadattādayo vākye thataiva syur anarthakāḥ // BVaky_2.14 //
analyzed: devadatta ādayaḥ vākye syuḥ anarthakāḥ

original: sāmānyārthas tirobhūto na viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: sāmānya arthaḥ tirobhūtaḥ na viśeṣe vatiṣṭhate

original: upāttasya kutas tyāgo nivṛttaḥ kvāvatiṣṭhatām // BVaky_2.15 //
analyzed: upāttasya kutas tyāgaḥ nivṛttaḥ kva avatiṣṭhatām

original: aśābdo yadi vākyārthaḥ padārtho 'pi tathā bhavet /
analyzed: aśābdaḥ yadi vākya arthaḥ tathā bhavet

original: evaṃ sati ca saṃbandhaḥ śabdasyārthena hīyate // BVaky_2.16 //
analyzed: evam sati ca saṃbandhaḥ śabdasya arthena hīyate

original: viśeśaśabdāḥ keṣāṃ cit sāmānyapratirūpakāḥ /
analyzed: viśeśa śabdāḥ keṣām cit sāmānya pratirūpakāḥ

original: śabdāntarābhisaṃbandhād vyajyante pratipattṛṣu // BVaky_2.17 //
analyzed: śabda antara abhisaṃbandhāt vyajyante pratipattṛṣu

original: teṣāṃ tu kṛtsno vākyārthaḥ pratibhedaṃ samāpyate /
analyzed: teṣām tu kṛtsnaḥ vākya arthaḥ pratibhedam samāpyate

original: vyaktopavyañjanā siddhir arthasya pratipatṛṣu // BVaky_2.18 //
analyzed: vyakta upavyañjanā siddhiḥ arthasya pratipatṛṣu

original: sa vyaktaḥ kramavāñ chabda upāṃśu yam adhīyate /
analyzed: sa vyaktaḥ kramavān śabdaḥ upāṃśu yam adhīyate

original: akramas tu vitatyeva buddhir yatrāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.19 //
analyzed: akramaḥ tu vitatya iva buddhiḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate

original: yathotkṣepaviśeṣe 'pi karmabhedo na gṛhyate /
analyzed: yathā utkṣepa viśeṣe pi karma bhedaḥ na gṛhyate

original: āvṛttau vyajyate jātiḥ karmabhir bhramaṇādibhiḥ // BVaky_2.20 //
analyzed: āvṛttau vyajyate jātiḥ karmabhiḥ bhramaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: varṇavākyapadeṣv evaṃ tulyopavyañjanā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: varṇa vākya padeṣu evam tulya upavyañjanā śrutiḥ

original: atyantabhede tattvasya sarūpeva pratīyate // BVaky_2.21 //
analyzed: atyanta bhede tattvasya sarūpā iva pratīyate

original: nityeṣu ca kutaḥ pūrvaṃ paraṃ vā paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: nityeṣu ca kutas pūrvam param vā paramārthataḥ

original: ekasyaiva tu sā śaktir yad evam avabhāsate // BVaky_2.22 //
analyzed: ekasya eva tu sā śaktiḥ yat evam avabhāsate

analyzed: ciram kṣipram iti jñāne kāla bhedāt ṛte yathā

original: bhinnakāle prakāśete sa dharmo hrasvadīrghayoḥ // BVaky_2.23 //
analyzed: bhinna kāle prakāśete sa dharmaḥ hrasva dīrghayoḥ

original: na nityaḥ kramamātrābhiḥ kālo bhedam ihārhati /
analyzed: na nityaḥ krama mātrābhiḥ kālaḥ bhedam iha arhati

original: vyāvartinīnāṃ mātrāṇām abhāve kīdṛśaḥ kramaḥ // BVaky_2.24 //
analyzed: vyāvartinīnām mātrāṇām abhāve kīdṛśaḥ kramaḥ

original: tābhyo yā jāyate buddhir ekā sā bhāgavarjitā /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ yā jāyate buddhiḥ ekā sā bhāga varjitā

original: sā hi svaśaktyā bhinneva kramapratyavamarśinī // BVaky_2.25 //
analyzed: sā hi sva śaktyā bhinnā iva krama pratyavamarśinī

original: kramollekhānuṣaṅgeṇa tasyāṃ yad bījam āhitam /
analyzed: krama ullekha anuṣaṅgeṇa tasyām yat bījam āhitam

original: tattvanānātvayos tasya niruktir nāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.26 //
analyzed: tattva nānātvayoḥ tasya niruktiḥ na avatiṣṭhate

original: bhāvanāsamaye tv etat kramasāmarthyam akramam /
analyzed: bhāvanā samaye tu etat krama sāmarthyam akramam

original: vyāvṛttabhedo yenārtho bhedavān upalabhyate // BVaky_2.27 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta bhedaḥ yena arthaḥ bhedavān upalabhyate

original: padāni vākye tāny eva varṇās te ca pade yadi /
analyzed: padāni vākye tāni eva varṇāḥ te ca pade yadi

original: varṇeṣu varṇabhāgānāṃ bhedaḥ syāt paramāṇuvat // BVaky_2.28 //
analyzed: varṇeṣu varṇa bhāgānām bhedaḥ syāt paramāṇu vat

original: bhāgānām anupaśleṣān na varṇo na padaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: bhāgānām an upaśleṣāt na varṇaḥ na padam bhavet

original: teṣām avyapadeśyatvāt kim anyad vyapadiśyatām // BVaky_2.29 //
analyzed: teṣām a vyapadeśya tvāt kim anyat vyapadiśyatām

original: yad antaḥśabdatattvaṃ tu bhāgair ekaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: yat antar śabda tattvam tu bhāgaiḥ ekam prakāśitam

original: tam āhur apare śabdaṃ tasya vākye tathaikatām // BVaky_2.30 //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ apare śabdam tasya vākye tathā ekatām

analyzed: artha bhāgaiḥ tathā teṣām antaraḥ rthaḥ prakāśyate

original: ekasyaivātmano bhedau śabdārthāv apṛthaksthitau // BVaky_2.31 //
analyzed: ekasya eva ātmanaḥ bhedau śabda arthau apṛthak sthitau

original: prakāśakaprakāśyatvaṃ kāryakāraṇarūpatā /
antarmātrātmanas tasya śabdatattvasya sarvadā // BVaky_2.32 //
analyzed: antar mātra ātmanaḥ tasya śabda tattvasya sarvadā

original: tasyaivāstitvanāstitve sāmarthye samavasthite /
analyzed: tasya eva astitva nāstitve sāmarthye samavasthite

original: akrame kramanirbhāse vyavahāranibandhane // BVaky_2.33 //
saṃpratyayapramāṇatvāt padārthāstitvakalpane /
analyzed: saṃpratyaya pramāṇa tvāt padārtha astitva kalpane

original: padārthābhyuccaye tyāgād ānarthakyaṃ prasajyate // BVaky_2.34 //
analyzed: padārtha abhyuccaye tyāgāt ānarthakyam prasajyate

original: rājaśabdena rājārtho bhinnarūpeṇa gamyate /
analyzed: rāja śabdena rāja arthaḥ bhinna rūpeṇa gamyate
