analyzed: vṛttau ākhyāta sadṛśam padam anyat prayujyate

original: yathāśvakarṇa ity ukte vinaivāśvena gamyate /
analyzed: yathā aśvakarṇaḥ iti ukte vinā eva aśvena gamyate

original: kaś cid eva viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayas tathā // BVaky_2.36 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit eva viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayaḥ tathā

original: vākyeṣu arthāntaragataḥ sādṛśyaparikalpane /
analyzed: vākyeṣu artha antara gataḥ sādṛśya parikalpane

original: keṣāṃ cit rūḍhiśabdatvaṃ śāstra evānugamyate // BVaky_2.37 //
analyzed: keṣām cit rūḍhi śabda tvam śāstre eva anugamyate

original: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
analyzed: upādāya api ye heyāḥ tān upāyān pracakṣate

original: upāyānāṃ ca niyamo nāvaśyam avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.38 //
analyzed: upāyānām ca niyamaḥ na avaśyam avatiṣṭhate

original: arthaṃ kathaṃ cit puruṣaḥ kaś cit saṃpratipadyate /
analyzed: artham katham cit puruṣaḥ kaḥ cit saṃpratipadyate

original: saṃsṛṣṭā vā vibhaktā cā bhedā vākyanibandhanāḥ // BVaky_2.39 //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ vā vibhaktā bhedāḥ vākya nibandhanāḥ

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandho buddhyā prakramyate yadā /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhaḥ buddhyā prakramyate yadā

original: vākyārthasya tadaiko 'pi varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit // BVaky_2.40 //
analyzed: vākya arthasya varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit

original: kevalena padenārtho yāvān evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: kevalena padena arthaḥ yāvān eva abhidhīyate

original: vākyasthaṃ tāvato 'rthasya tad āhur abhidhāyakam // BVaky_2.41 //
analyzed: vākya stham tāvataḥ rthasya tat āhuḥ abhidhāyakam

original: saṃbandhe sati yat tv anyad ādhikyam upajāyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhe sati yat tu anyat ādhikyam upajāyate

original: vākyārtam eva taṃ prāhur anekapadasaṃśrayam // BVaky_2.42 //
analyzed: vākya ārtam eva tam prāhuḥ aneka pada saṃśrayam

original: sa tv anekapadastho 'pi pratibhedaṃ samāpyate /
analyzed: sa tu pratibhedam samāpyate

original: jātivat samudāye 'pi saṃkhyāvat kalpyate 'paraiḥ // BVaky_2.43 //
analyzed: jāti vat samudāye pi saṃkhyā vat kalpyate paraiḥ

original: sarvabhedānuguṇyaṃ tu sāmānyam apare viduḥ /
analyzed: sarva bheda ānuguṇyam tu sāmānyam apare viduḥ

original: tad arthāntarasaṃsargād bhajate bhedarūpatām // BVaky_2.44 //
analyzed: tat artha antara saṃsargāt bhajate bheda rūpa tām

original: bhedān ākāṅkṣatas tasya yā pariplavamāmatā /
analyzed: bhedān ākāṅkṣataḥ tasya yā

original: avacchinatti saṃbandhas tāṃ viśeṣe niveśayan // BVaky_2.45 //
analyzed: avacchinatti saṃbandhaḥ tām viśeṣe niveśayan

original: kāryānumeyaḥ saṃbandho rūpaṃ tasya na vidyate /
analyzed: kārya anumeyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ rūpam tasya na vidyate

original: asattvabhūtam atyantam atas taṃ pratijānate // BVaky_2.46 //
analyzed: asattva bhūtam atyantam atas tam pratijānate

original: niyataṃ sādhane sādhyaṃ kriyā niyatasādhanā /
analyzed: niyatam sādhane sādhyam kriyā niyata sādhanā

original: sa saṃnidhānamātreṇa niyamaḥ saṃprakāśate // BVaky_2.47 //
analyzed: sa saṃnidhāna mātreṇa niyamaḥ saṃprakāśate

original: guṇabhāvena sākāṅkṣaṃ tatra nāma pravartate /
analyzed: guṇa bhāvena sākāṅkṣam tatra nāma pravartate

original: sādhyatvena nimittāni kriyāpadam apekṣate // BVaky_2.48 //
analyzed: sādhya tvena nimittāni kriyā padam apekṣate

original: santa eva viśeṣā ye padārtheṣv avibhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: santaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ ye padārtheṣu a vibhāvitāḥ

original: te kramād anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam // BVaky_2.49 //
analyzed: te kramāt anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam

original: śabdānāṃ kramamātre ca nānyaḥ śabdo 'sti vācakaḥ /
analyzed: śabdānām krama mātre ca na anyaḥ vācakaḥ

original: kramo hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_2.50 //
analyzed: kramaḥ hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyam na vidyate

original: ye ca saṃbhavino bhedāḥ padārtheṣv avibhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca saṃbhavinaḥ bhedāḥ padārtheṣu a vibhāvitāḥ

original: te saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣv ayaṃ kramaḥ // BVaky_2.51 //
analyzed: te saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣu ayam kramaḥ

original: varṇānāṃ ca padānāṃ ca kramamātraniveśinī /
analyzed: varṇānām ca padānām ca krama mātra niveśinī

original: padākhyā vākyasaṃjñā ca śabdatvaṃ neṣyate tayoḥ // BVaky_2.52 //
analyzed: pada ākhyā vākya saṃjñā ca śabda tvam na iṣyate tayoḥ

original: samāne 'pi tu śabdatve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt /
analyzed: samāne tu śabda tve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt

original: prativarṇaṃ tv asau nāsti padasyārtham ato viduḥ // BVaky_2.53 //
analyzed: prativarṇam tu asau na asti padasya artham atas viduḥ

original: yathā sāvayavā varṇā vinā vācyena kena cit /
analyzed: yathā sa avayavāḥ varṇāḥ vinā vācyena kena cit

original: arthavantaḥ samuditā vākyam apy evam iṣyate // BVaky_2.54 //
analyzed: arthavantaḥ samuditāḥ vākyam api evam iṣyate

original: anarthakāny apāyatvāt padārthenārthavanti vā /
analyzed: anarthakāni apāya tvāt padārthena arthavanti vā

original: krameṇoccaritāny āhur vākyārthaṃ bhinnalakṣaṇam // BVaky_2.55 //
analyzed: krameṇa uccaritāni āhuḥ vākya artham bhinna lakṣaṇam

original: nityatve samudāyānāṃ jāter vā parikalpane /
analyzed: nitya tve samudāyānām jāteḥ vā parikalpane

original: ekasyaikārthatām āhur vākyasyāvyabhicāriṇīm // BVaky_2.56 //
analyzed: ekasya eka artha tām āhuḥ vākyasya avyabhicāriṇīm

original: abhedapūrvakābhedāḥ kalpitā vākyavādibhiḥ /
analyzed: abheda pūrvaka abhedāḥ kalpitāḥ vākya vādibhiḥ

original: bhedapūrvān abhedāṃs tu manyante padadarśinaḥ // BVaky_2.57 //
analyzed: bheda pūrvān abhedān tu manyante pada darśinaḥ

original: padaprakṛtibhāvaś ca vṛttibhedena varṇyate /
analyzed: pada prakṛti bhāvaḥ ca vṛtti bhedena varṇyate

original: padānāṃ saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā padāśrayā // BVaky_2.58 //
analyzed: padānām saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā pada āśrayā

original: padāmnāyaś ca yady anyaḥ saṃhitāyā nidarśakaḥ /
analyzed: pada āmnāyaḥ ca yadi anyaḥ saṃhitāyāḥ nidarśakaḥ

original: nityas tatra kathaṃ kāryaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇadarśanāt // BVaky_2.59 //
analyzed: nityaḥ tatra katham kāryam padam lakṣaṇa darśanāt

original: prativarṇam asaṃvedyaḥ padārthapratyayo yathā /
analyzed: prativarṇam asaṃvedyaḥ padārtha pratyayaḥ yathā

original: padeśv evam asaṃvedyaṃ vākyārthasya nirūpaṇam // BVaky_2.60 //
analyzed: padeṣu evam asaṃvedyam vākya arthasya nirūpaṇam

original: vākyārthaḥ saṃniviśate padeṣu sahavṛttiṣu /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ saṃniviśate padeṣu sahavṛttiṣu

original: yathā tathaiva varṇeṣu padārthaḥ sahavṛttiṣu // BVaky_2.61 //
analyzed: yathā tathā eva varṇeṣu padārthaḥ sahavṛttiṣu

original: sūkṣmaṃ grāhyaṃ yathānyena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saha gṛhyate /
analyzed: sūkṣmam grāhyam yathā anyena saṃsṛṣṭam saha gṛhyate

original: varṇo 'py anyena varṇena saṃbaddho vācakas tathā // BVaky_2.62 //
analyzed: varṇaḥ pi anyena varṇena saṃbaddhaḥ vācakaḥ tathā

original: padasyoccāraṇād artho yathā kaś cin nirūpyate /
analyzed: padasya uccāraṇāt arthaḥ yathā kaḥ cit nirūpyate

original: varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā so 'rthaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_2.63 //
analyzed: varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā saḥ ṛthaḥ pratīyate

original: prāptasya yasya sāmarthyān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: prāptasya yasya sāmarthyāt niyama arthā punar śrutiḥ

original: tenātyantaṃ viśeṣeṇa sāmānyaṃ yadi bādhyate // BVaky_2.64 //
analyzed: tena atyantam viśeṣeṇa sāmānyam yadi bādhyate

original: yajeteti tato dravyaṃ prāptaṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: yajeta iti tatas dravyam prāptam sāmarthya lakṣaṇam

original: vrīhiśrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhis tathā // BVaky_2.65 //
analyzed: vrīhi śrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhiḥ tathā

original: tasmād vrīhitvam adhikaṃ vrīhiśabdaḥ prakalpayet /
analyzed: tasmāt vrīhi tvam adhikam vrīhi śabdaḥ prakalpayet

original: dravyatvam aviruddhatvāt prāptyarthaḥ san na bādhate // BVaky_2.66 //
analyzed: dravya tvam a viruddha tvāt prāpti arthaḥ san na bādhate

original: tena cāpi vyavacchinne dravyatve sahacāriṇi /
analyzed: tena ca api vyavacchinne dravya tve sahacāriṇi

original: asaṃbhavād viśeṣāṇāṃ tatrānyeṣām adarśanam // BVaky_2.67 //
analyzed: asaṃbhavāt viśeṣāṇām tatra anyeṣām adarśanam

original: na ca sāmānyavat sarve kriyāśabdena lakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: na ca sāmānya vat sarve kriyā śabdena lakṣitāḥ

original: viśeṣā na hi sarveṣāṃ satāṃ śabdo 'bhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_2.68 //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ na hi sarveṣām satām śabdaḥ abhidhāyakaḥ

original: śuklādayo guṇāḥ santo yathā tatrāvivakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: śukla ādayaḥ guṇāḥ santaḥ yathā tatra avivakṣitāḥ

original: tathāvivakṣā bhedānāṃ dravyatvasahacāriṇām // BVaky_2.69 //
analyzed: tathā a vivakṣā bhedānām dravya tva sahacāriṇām

original: asaṃnidhau pratinidhir mā bhūn nityasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a saṃnidhau pratinidhiḥ mā bhūt nityasya karmaṇaḥ

original: kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopa ity upapadyate // BVaky_2.70 //
analyzed: kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopaḥ iti upapadyate

original: viśiṣṭaiva kriyā yena vākyārthaḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: viśiṣṭā eva kriyā yena vākya arthaḥ parikalpyate

original: dravyābhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyāntaram // BVaky_2.71 //
analyzed: dravya abhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyā antaram

original: nirjñātārthaṃ padaṃ yac ca tadarthe pratipādite /
analyzed: nirjñāta artham padam yat ca tad arthe pratipādite

original: pikādi yad avijñātaṃ tat kim ity anuyujyate // BVaky_2.72 //
analyzed: pika ādi yat avijñātam tat kim iti anuyujyate

original: sāmarthyaprāpitaṃ yac ca vyaktyartham anuṣajyate /
analyzed: sāmarthya prāpitam yat ca vyakti artham anuṣajyate

original: śrutir evānuṣaṅgeṇa bādhikā liṅgavākyayoḥ // BVaky_2.73 //
analyzed: śrutiḥ eva anuṣaṅgeṇa bādhikā liṅga vākyayoḥ

original: aprāpto yas tu śuklādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate /
analyzed: a prāptaḥ yaḥ tu śukla ādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate

original: sa yatnaprāpito vākye śrutidharmavilakṣaṇaḥ // BVaky_2.74 //
analyzed: sa yatna prāpitaḥ vākye śruti dharma vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: abhinnam eva vākyaṃ tu yady abhinnārtham iṣyate /
analyzed: abhinnam eva vākyam tu yadi abhinna artham iṣyate

original: tat sarvaṃ śrutibhūtatvān na śrutyaiva virotsyate // BVaky_2.75 //
analyzed: tat sarvam śruti bhūta tvāt na śrutyā eva virotsyate

original: vākyānāṃ samudāyaś ca ya ekārthaprasiddhaye /
analyzed: vākyānām samudāyaḥ ca yaḥ eka artha prasiddhaye

original: sākāṅkṣāvayavas tatra vākyārtho 'pi na vidyate // BVaky_2.76 //
analyzed: sākāṅkṣā avayavaḥ tatra na vidyate

original: prāsaṅgikam idaṃ kāryam idaṃ tantreṇa labhyate /
analyzed: prāsaṅgikam idam kāryam idam tantreṇa labhyate

original: idam āvṛttibhedābhyām atra bādhasamuccayau // BVaky_2.77 //
analyzed: idam āvṛtti bhedābhyām atra bādha samuccayau

original: ūho 'smin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandho 'sya na bādhyate /
analyzed: ūhaḥ smin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sya na bādhyate

original: sāmānyasyātideśo 'yaṃ viśeṣo 'trātidiśyate // BVaky_2.78 //
analyzed: sāmānyasya atideśaḥ yam

original: arthitvam atra sāmarthyam asminn artho na bhidyate /
analyzed: arthi tvam atra sāmarthyam asmin arthaḥ na bhidyate

original: śāstrāt prāptādhikāro 'yaṃ vyudāso 'sya kriyāntare // BVaky_2.79 //
analyzed: śāstrāt prāpta adhikāraḥ yam vyudāsaḥ sya kriyā antare

original: iyaṃ śrutyā kramaprāptir iyam uccāraṇād iti /
analyzed: iyam śrutyā krama prāptiḥ iyam uccāraṇāt iti

original: kramo 'yam atra balavān asmiṃs tu na vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_2.80 //
analyzed: kramaḥ yam atra balavān asmin tu na vivakṣitaḥ

original: idaṃ parāṅgaiḥ saṃbaddham aṅgānām aprayojakam /
analyzed: idam para aṅgaiḥ saṃbaddham aṅgānām aprayojakam

original: prayojakam idaṃ teṣām atredaṃ nāntarīyakam // BVaky_2.81 //
analyzed: prayojakam idam teṣām atrā idam nāntarīyakam

original: idaṃ pradhānaṃ śeṣo 'yaṃ viniyogakramas tv ayam /
analyzed: idam pradhānam śeṣaḥ yam viniyoga kramaḥ tu ayam

original: sākṣād asyopakārīdam idam ārād viśeṣakam // BVaky_2.82 //
analyzed: sākṣāt asya upakāri idam idam ārāt viśeṣakam

original: śaktivyāpārabhedo 'smin phalam atra tu bhidyate /
analyzed: śakti vyāpāra bhedaḥ smin phalam atra tu bhidyate

original: saṃbandhāj jātabhedo 'yaṃ bhedas tatrāvivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_2.83 //
analyzed: saṃbandhāt jāta bhedaḥ yam bhedaḥ tatra avivakṣitaḥ

original: prasajyapratiṣedho 'yaṃ paryudāso 'yam atra tu /
analyzed: prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ yam paryudāsaḥ yam atra tu

original: idaṃ gauṇam idaṃ mukhyaṃ vyāpīdaṃ guru laghv idam // BVaky_2.84 //
analyzed: idam gauṇam idam mukhyam vyāpi idam guru laghu idam

original: bhedenāṅgāṅgibhāvo 'sya bahubhedaṃ vikalpyate /
analyzed: bhedena aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ bahu bhedam vikalpyate

original: idaṃ niyamyate 'syātra yogyatvam upajāyate // BVaky_2.85 //
analyzed: idam niyamyate sya atra yogya tvam upajāyate

original: asya vākyāntare dṛṣṭāl liṅgād bhedo 'numīyate /
analyzed: asya vākya antare dṛṣṭāt liṅgāt bhedaḥ numīyate

original: ayaṃ śabdair apoddhṛtya padārthaḥ pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.86 //
analyzed: ayam śabdaiḥ apoddhṛtya padārthaḥ pravibhajyate

original: iti vākyeṣu ye dharmāḥ padārthopanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: iti vākyeṣu ye dharmāḥ padārtha upanibandhanāḥ

original: sarve tena prakalperan padaṃ cet syad avācakam // BVaky_2.87 //
analyzed: sarve tena prakalperan padam ced syat avācakam

original: avibhakte 'pi vākyārthe śaktibhedād apoddhṛte /
analyzed: avibhakte pi vākya arthe śakti bhedāt apoddhṛte

original: vākyāntaravibhāgena yathoktaṃ na virudhyate // BVaky_2.88 //
analyzed: vākya antara vibhāgena yathā uktam na virudhyate

original: yathaivaikasya gandhasya bhedena parikalpanā /
analyzed: yathā eva ekasya gandhasya bhedena parikalpanā

original: puṣpādiṣu tathā vākye 'py arthabhedo 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_2.89 //
analyzed: puṣpa ādiṣu tathā vākye pi artha bhedaḥ bhidhīyate

original: gavaye narasiṃhe vāpy ekajñānāvṛte yathā /
analyzed: gavaye narasiṃhe vā api eka jñāna āvṛte yathā

original: bhāgaṃ jātyantarasyaiva sadṛśaṃ pratipadyate // BVaky_2.90 //
analyzed: bhāgam jāti antarasya eva sadṛśam pratipadyate

original: aprasiddhaṃ tu yaṃ bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati /
analyzed: aprasiddham tu yam bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati

original: tāvaty asaṃvidaṃ mūḍhaḥ sarvatra pratipadyate // BVaky_2.91 //
analyzed: tāvati a saṃvidam mūḍhaḥ sarvatra pratipadyate

original: tathā pikādiyogena vākye 'tyantavilakṣaṇe /
analyzed: tathā pika ādi yogena vākye tyanta vilakṣaṇe

original: sadṛśasyeva saṃjñānam asato 'rthasya manyate // BVaky_2.92 //
analyzed: sadṛśasya iva saṃjñānam asataḥ rthasya manyate

original: ekasya bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedaś ca lakṣyate /
analyzed: ekasya bhāge sādṛśyam bhāge bhedaḥ ca lakṣyate

original: nirbhāgasya prakāśasya nirbhāgeṇaiva cetasā // BVaky_2.93 //
analyzed: nirbhāgasya prakāśasya nirbhāgeṇa eva cetasā

original: tathaiva bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedo 'vasīyate /
analyzed: tathā eva bhāge sādṛśyam bhāge bhedaḥ vasīyate

original: bhāgābhāve 'pi vākyānām atyantaṃ bhinnadharmaṇām // BVaky_2.94 //
analyzed: bhāga abhāve pi vākyānām atyantam bhinna dharmaṇām

original: rūpanāśe padānāṃ syāt kathaṃ cāvadhikalpanā /
analyzed: rūpa nāśe padānām syāt katham ca avadhi kalpanā

original: agṛhītāvadhau śabde kathaṃ cārtho vivicyate // BVaky_2.95 //
analyzed: agṛhīta avadhau śabde katham ca arthaḥ vivicyate

original: saṃsarga iva rūpāṇāṃ śabde 'nyatra vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ iva rūpāṇām śabde nyatra vyavasthitaḥ

original: nānārūpeṣu tadrūpaṃ tantreṇāparam iṣyate // BVaky_2.96 //
analyzed: nānā rūpeṣu tad rūpam tantreṇa aparam iṣyate

original: tasminn abhede bhedānāṃ saṃsarga iva vartate /
analyzed: tasmin abhede bhedānām saṃsargaḥ iva vartate

original: rūpaṃ rūpāntarāt tasmād ananyat pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.97 //
analyzed: rūpam rūpa antarāt tasmāt ananyat pravibhajyate

original: śāstre pratyāyakasyāpi kvacid ekatvam āśritam /
analyzed: śāstre pratyāyakasya api kvacid eka tvam āśritam

original: pratyāyyena kvacid bhedo grahaṇagrāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ // BVaky_2.98 //
analyzed: pratyāyyena kvacid bhedaḥ grahaṇa grāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ

original: ū ity abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prakalpitam /
analyzed: iti abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyam prakalpitam

original: lṛluṭor grahaṇe bhedo grāhyābhyāṃ parikalpitaḥ // BVaky_2.99 //
analyzed: lṛ luṭoḥ grahaṇe bhedaḥ grāhyābhyām parikalpitaḥ

original: yasyety etad aṇo rūpaṃ saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam /
analyzed: yasya iti etat aṇoḥ rūpam saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam

original: na hi pratīyamānena grahaṇasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_2.100 //
analyzed: na hi pratīyamānena grahaṇasya asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: ū ity etad abhinnaṃ ca bhinnavākyanibandhanam /
analyzed: iti etat abhinnam ca bhinna vākya nibandhanam

original: bhedena grahaṇaṃ yasya pararūpam iva dvayoḥ // BVaky_2.101 //
analyzed: bhedena grahaṇam yasya para rūpam iva dvayoḥ

original: plutasyāṅgavivṛddhiṃ ca samāhāram acos tathā /
analyzed: plutasya aṅga vivṛddhim ca samāhāram a coḥ tathā

original: vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣv atyantam āśritaḥ // BVaky_2.102 //
analyzed: vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣu atyantam āśritaḥ

original: ardharcādiṣu śabdeṣu rūpabhedaḥ kramād yathā /
analyzed: ardharca ādiṣu śabdeṣu rūpa bhedaḥ kramāt yathā

original: tantrāt tathaikaśabdatve bhinnānāṃ śrutir anyathā // BVaky_2.103 //
analyzed: tantrāt tathā eka śabda tve bhinnānām śrutiḥ anyathā

original: saṃhitāviṣaye varṇāḥ svarūpeṇāvikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: saṃhitā viṣaye varṇāḥ sva rūpeṇa avikāriṇaḥ

original: śabdāntaratvaṃ yāntīva śaktyantaraparigrahāt // BVaky_2.104 //
analyzed: śabda antara tvam yānti iva śakti antara parigrahāt

original: indriyādivikāreṇa dṛṣṭaṃ grāhyeṣu vastuṣu /
analyzed: indriya ādi vikāreṇa dṛṣṭam grāhyeṣu vastuṣu

original: ātmatyāgād ṛte bhinnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa kramaḥ śrutau // BVaky_2.105 //
analyzed: ātmatyāgāt ṛte bhinnam grahaṇam sa kramaḥ śrutau

original: abhidhānakriyābhedāc chabdeṣv avikṛteṣv api /
analyzed: abhidhāna kriyā bhedāt śabdeṣu a vikṛteṣu api

original: rūpam atyantabhedena tad evaikaṃ prakāśate // BVaky_2.106 //
analyzed: rūpam atyanta bhedena tat eva ekam prakāśate

original: ṛco vā gītimātraṃ vā sāma dravyāntaraṃ na tu /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ vā gīti mātram vā sāma dravya antaram na tu

original: gītibhedāt tu gṛhyante tā eva vikṛtā ṛcaḥ // BVaky_2.107 //
analyzed: gīti bhedāt tu gṛhyante tāḥ eva vikṛtāḥ ṛcaḥ

original: upāyāc chrutisaṃhāre bhinnānām ekaśeṣiṇām /
analyzed: upāyāt śruti saṃhāre bhinnānām eka śeṣiṇām

original: tantreṇoccāraṇe teṣāṃ śāstre sādhutvam ucyate // BVaky_2.108 //
analyzed: tantreṇa uccāraṇe teṣām śāstre sādhu tvam ucyate

original: parigṛhya śrutiṃ caikāṃ rūpabhedavatām api /
analyzed: parigṛhya śrutim ca ekām rūpa bhedavatām api

original: tantreṇoccāraṇaṃ kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ // BVaky_2.109 //
analyzed: tantreṇa uccāraṇam kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ

original: sarūpāṇāṃ ca vākyānāṃ śāstreṇāpratipāditam /
analyzed: sarūpāṇām ca vākyānām śāstreṇa a pratipāditam

original: tantreṇoccāraṇād ekaṃ rūpaṃ sādhūpalabhyate // BVaky_2.110 //
analyzed: tantreṇa uccāraṇāt ekam rūpam sādhu upalabhyate

original: ekasyānekarūpatvaṃ nālikādiparigrahāt /
analyzed: ekasya aneka rūpa tvam nālikā ādi parigrahāt

original: yathā tathaiva tantrāt syād bahūnām ekarūpatā // BVaky_2.111 //
analyzed: yathā tathā eva tantrāt syāt bahūnām eka rūpa tā

original: yathā padasarūpāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: yathā pada sarūpāṇām vākyānām saṃbhavaḥ pṛthak

original: tathā vākyāntarābhāve syād eṣāṃ pṛthagarthatā // BVaky_2.112 //
analyzed: tathā vākya antara abhāve syāt eṣām pṛthak artha tā

original: abhidheyaḥ padasyārtho vākyasyārthaḥ prayojanam /
analyzed: abhidheyaḥ padasya arthaḥ vākyasya arthaḥ prayojanam

original: yasya tasya na saṃbandho vākyānām upapadyate // BVaky_2.113 //
analyzed: yasya tasya na saṃbandhaḥ vākyānām upapadyate

original: tatra kriyāpadāny eva vyapekṣante parasparam /
analyzed: tatra kriyā padāni eva vyapekṣante parasparam

original: kriyāpadānuṣaktas tu saṃbandho 'tha pratīyate // BVaky_2.114 //
analyzed: kriyā pada anuṣaktaḥ tu pratīyate

original: āvṛttir anuvādo vā padārthavyaktikalpane /
analyzed: āvṛttiḥ anuvādaḥ vā padārtha vyakti kalpane

original: pratyekaṃ tu samāpto 'rthaḥ sahabhūteṣu vartate // BVaky_2.115 //
analyzed: pratyekam tu samāptaḥ ṛthaḥ saha bhūteṣu vartate

original: avikalpitavākyārthe vikalpā bhāvanāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: a vikalpita vākya arthe vikalpāḥ bhāvanā āśrayāḥ

original: atrādhikaraṇe vādāḥ pūrveṣāṃ bahudhā matāḥ // BVaky_2.116 //
analyzed: atra adhikaraṇe vādāḥ pūrveṣām bahudhā matāḥ

original: abhyāsāt pratibhāhetuḥ sarvaḥ śabdo 'paraiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsāt pratibhā hetuḥ sarvaḥ paraiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bālānāṃ ca tiraścāṃ ca yathārthapratipādane // BVaky_2.117 //
analyzed: bālānām ca tiraścām ca yathā artha pratipādane

original: anāgamaś ca so 'bhyāsaḥ samayaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: anāgamaḥ ca saḥ bhyāsaḥ samayaḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: anantaram idaṃ kāryam asmād ity upadarśakaḥ // BVaky_2.118 //
analyzed: anantaram idam kāryam asmāt iti upadarśakaḥ

original: asty arthaḥ sarvaśabdānāṃ iti pratyāyyalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: asti arthaḥ sarva śabdānām iti pratyāyya lakṣaṇam

original: apūrvadevatāsvargaiḥ samam āhur gavādiṣu // BVaky_2.119 //
analyzed: a pūrva devatā svargaiḥ samam āhuḥ go ādiṣu

original: prayogadarśanābhyāsād ākārāvagrahas tu yaḥ /
analyzed: prayoga darśana abhyāsāt ākāra avagrahaḥ tu yaḥ

original: na sa śabdasya viṣayaḥ sa hi yatnāntarāśrayaḥ // BVaky_2.120 //
analyzed: na sa śabdasya viṣayaḥ sa hi yatna antara āśrayaḥ

original: ke cid bhedāḥ prakāśyante śabdais tadabhidhāyibhiḥ /
analyzed: ke cid bhedāḥ prakāśyante śabdaiḥ tad abhidhāyibhiḥ

original: anuniṣpādinaḥ kāṃś cic chabdārthān iti manyate // BVaky_2.121 //
analyzed: anuniṣpādinaḥ kān cit śabda arthān iti manyate

original: jāteḥ pratyāyake śabde yā vyaktir anuṣaṅgiṇī /
analyzed: jāteḥ pratyāyake śabde yā vyaktiḥ anuṣaṅgiṇī

original: na tadvyaktigatān bhedāñ jātiśabdo 'valambate // BVaky_2.122 //
analyzed: na tad vyakti gatān jāti śabdaḥ valambate

original: ghaṭādīnāṃ na cākārān pratyāyayati vācakaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādīnām na ca ākārān pratyāyayati vācakaḥ

original: vastumātraniveśitvāt tadgatir nāntarīyakā // BVaky_2.123 //
analyzed: vastu mātra niveśi tvāt tad gatiḥ nāntarīyakā

original: kriyā vinā prayogeṇa na dṛṣṭā śabdacoditā /
analyzed: kriyā vinā prayogeṇa na dṛṣṭā śabda coditā

original: prayogas tv anuniṣpādī śabdārtha iti gamyate // BVaky_2.124 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu anuniṣpādī śabda arthaḥ iti gamyate

original: niyatās tu prayogā ye niyataṃ yac ca sādhanam /
analyzed: niyatāḥ tu prayogāḥ ye niyatam yat ca sādhanam

original: teṣāṃ śabdābhidheyatvam aparair anugamyate // BVaky_2.125 //
analyzed: teṣām śabda abhidheya tvam aparaiḥ anugamyate

original: samudāyo 'bhidheyo vāpy avikalpasamuccayaḥ /
analyzed: samudāyaḥ bhidheyaḥ vā api a vikalpa samuccayaḥ

original: asatyo vāpi saṃsargaḥ śabdārthaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate // BVaky_2.126 //
analyzed: asatyaḥ vā api saṃsargaḥ śabda arthaḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: asatyopādhi yat satyaṃ tad vā śabdanibandhanām /
analyzed: asatya upādhi yat satyam tat vā śabda nibandhanām

original: śabdo vāpy abhijalpatvam āgato yāti vācyatām // BVaky_2.127 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ vā api abhijalpa tvam āgataḥ yāti vācya tām

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād rūpam ekīkṛtaṃ yatā /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt rūpam ekīkṛtam yatā

original: śabdasyārthena taṃ śabdam abhijalpaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_2.128 //
analyzed: śabdasya arthena tam śabdam abhijalpam pracakṣate

original: tayor apṛthagātmatve rūḍhir avyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: tayoḥ apṛthak ātma tve rūḍhiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: kiṃ cid eva kva cid rūpaṃ prādhānyenāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.129 //
analyzed: kim cit eva kva cit rūpam prādhānyena avatiṣṭhate

original: loke 'rtharūpatāṃ śabdaḥ pratipannaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: loke ṛtha rūpa tām śabdaḥ pratipannaḥ pravartate

original: śāstre tūbhayarūpatvaṃ pravibhaktaṃ vivakṣayā // BVaky_2.130 //
analyzed: śāstre tu ubhaya rūpa tvam pravibhaktam vivakṣayā

original: aśakteḥ sarvaśakter vā śabdair eva prakalpitā /
analyzed: aśakteḥ sarva śakteḥ vā śabdaiḥ eva prakalpitā

original: ekasyārthasya niyatā kriyādiparikalpanā // BVaky_2.131 //
analyzed: ekasya arthasya niyatā kriyā ādi parikalpanā

original: yo vārtho buddhiviṣayo bāhyavastunibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vā arthaḥ buddhi viṣayaḥ bāhya vastu nibandhanaḥ

original: sa bāhyaṃ vastv iti jñātaḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate // BVaky_2.132 //
analyzed: sa bāhyam vastu iti jñātaḥ śabda arthaḥ iti gamyate

original: ākāravantaḥ saṃvedyā vyaktismṛtinibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: ākāravantaḥ saṃvedyāḥ vyakti smṛti nibandhanāḥ

original: ete pratyavabhāsante saṃvinṃātraṃ tv ato 'nyathā // BVaky_2.133 //
analyzed: ete pratyavabhāsante tu atas nyathā

original: yathendriyaṃ saṃnipatad vaicitreṇopadarśakaṃ /
analyzed: yathā indriyam saṃnipatat vaicitreṇa upadarśakam

original: tathaiva śabdād arthasya pratipattir anekadhā // BVaky_2.134 //
analyzed: tathā eva śabdāt arthasya pratipattiḥ anekadhā

original: vaktrānyathaiva prakrānto bhinneṣu pratipattṛṣu /
analyzed: vaktrā anyathā eva prakrāntaḥ bhinneṣu pratipattṛṣu

original: svapratyayānukāreṇa śabdārthaḥ pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.135 //
analyzed: sva pratyaya anukāreṇa śabda arthaḥ pravibhajyate

original: ekasminn api dṛśye 'rthe darśanaṃ bhidyate pṛthak /
analyzed: ekasmin api dṛśye rthe darśanam bhidyate pṛthak

original: kālāntareṇa caiko 'pi taṃ paśyaty anyathā punaḥ // BVaky_2.136 //
analyzed: kāla antareṇa ca ekaḥ tam paśyati anyathā punar

original: ekasyāpi ca śabdasya nimittair avyavasthitaiḥ /
analyzed: ekasya api ca śabdasya nimittaiḥ avyavasthitaiḥ

original: ekena bahubhiś cārtho bahudhā parikalpyate // BVaky_2.137 //
analyzed: ekena bahubhiḥ ca arthaḥ bahudhā parikalpyate

original: tasmād adṛṣṭatattvānāṃ sāparādhaṃ bahucchalaṃ /
analyzed: tasmāt adṛṣṭa tattvānām sa aparādham bahu chalam

original: darśanaṃ vacanaṃ vāpi nityam evānavasthitam // BVaky_2.138 //
analyzed: darśanam vacanam vā api nityam eva anavasthitam

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ darśanaṃ yac ca tattve kiṃ cid avasthitam /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām darśanam yat ca tattve kim cit avasthitam

original: na tena vyavahāro 'sti na tac chabdanibandhanaṃ // BVaky_2.139 //
analyzed: na tena vyavahāraḥ sti na tat śabda nibandhanam

original: talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva /
analyzed: talavat dṛśyate vyoma khadyotaḥ havyavāṭ iva

original: naiva cāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ // BVaky_2.140 //
analyzed: na eva ca asti talam vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ

original: tasmāt pratyakṣam apy arthaṃ vidvān īkṣeta yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣam api artham vidvān īkṣeta yuktitaḥ

original: na darśanasya prāmāṇyād dṛśyam arthaṃ prakalpayet // BVaky_2.141 //
analyzed: na darśanasya prāmāṇyāt dṛśyam artham prakalpayet

original: asamākhyeyatattvānām arthānāṃ laukikair yathā /
analyzed: asamākhyeya tattvānām arthānām laukikaiḥ yathā

original: vyavahāre samākhyānaṃ tat prajño na vikalpayet // BVaky_2.142 //
analyzed: vyavahāre samākhyānam tat prajñaḥ na vikalpayet

original: vicchedagrahaṇe 'rthānāṃ pratibhānyaiva jāyate /
analyzed: viccheda grahaṇe rthānām pratibhā anyā eva jāyate

original: vākyārtha iti tām āhuḥ padārthair upapāditām // BVaky_2.143 //
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ iti tām āhuḥ padārthaiḥ upapāditām

original: idaṃ tad iti sānyeṣām anākyeyā kathaṃ cana /
analyzed: idam tat iti sā anyeṣām an ākyeyā katham cana

original: pratyātmavṛtti siddhā sā kartrāpi na nirūpyate // BVaky_2.144 //
analyzed: pratyātma vṛtti siddhā sā kartrā api na nirūpyate

original: upaśleṣam ivārthānāṃ sā karoty avicāritā /
analyzed: upaśleṣam iva arthānām sā karoti avicāritā

original: sārvarūpyam ivāpannā viṣayatvena vartate // BVaky_2.145 //
analyzed: sārvarūpyam iva āpannā viṣaya tvena vartate

original: sākśāc chabdena janitāṃ bhāvanānugamena vā /
analyzed: śabdena janitām bhāvanā anugamena vā

original: itikartavyatāyāṃ tāṃ na kaś cid ativartate // BVaky_2.146 //
analyzed: itikartavya tāyām tām na kaḥ cit ativartate

original: pramāṇatvena tāṃ lokaḥ sarvaḥ samanugacchati /
analyzed: pramāṇa tvena tām lokaḥ sarvaḥ samanugacchati

original: samārambhāḥ pratāyante tiraścām api tadvaśāt // BVaky_2.147 //
analyzed: samārambhāḥ pratāyante tiraścām api tad vaśāt

original: yathā dravyaviśeṣāṇāṃ paripākair ayatnajāḥ /
analyzed: yathā dravya viśeṣāṇām paripākaiḥ ayatna jāḥ

original: madādiśaktayo dṛṣṭāḥ pratibhās tadvatāṃ tathā // BVaky_2.148 //
analyzed: mad ādi śaktayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ pratibhāḥ tadvatām tathā

original: svaravṛttiṃ vikurute madhau puṃskokilasya kaḥ /
analyzed: svara vṛttim vikurute madhau puṃskokilasya kaḥ

original: jantvādayaḥ kulāyādi- karaṇe śikṣitāḥ katham // BVaky_2.149 //
analyzed: jantu ādayaḥ kulāya ādi karaṇe śikṣitāḥ katham

original: āhāraprītyapadveṣa- plavanādikriyāsu kaḥ /
analyzed: āhāra prīti apa dveṣa plavana ādi kriyāsu kaḥ

original: jātyanvayaprasiddhāsu prayoktā mṛgapakṣiṇām // BVaky_2.150 //
analyzed: jāti anvaya prasiddhāsu prayoktā mṛga pakṣiṇām

original: bhāvanānugatād etad āgamād eva jāyate /
analyzed: bhāvanā anugatāt etat āgamāt eva jāyate

original: āsattiviprakarṣābhyām āgamas tu viśiṣyate // BVaky_2.151 //
analyzed: āsatti viprakarṣābhyām āgamaḥ tu viśiṣyate

original: svabhāvavaraṇābhāsa- yogādṛṣṭopapāditām /
analyzed: svabhāva varaṇa ābhāsa yoga adṛṣṭa upapādi tām

original: viśiṣṭopahitāṃ ceti pratibhāṃ ṣaḍvidhāṃ viduḥ // BVaky_2.152 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa upahitām ca iti pratibhām ṣaḍvidhām viduḥ

original: yathā saṃyogibhir dravyair lakṣite 'rthe prayujyate /
analyzed: yathā saṃyogibhiḥ dravyaiḥ lakṣite rthe prayujyate

original: gośabdo na tv asau teṣāṃ viśeśāṇāṃ prakāśakaḥ // BVaky_2.153 //
analyzed: go śabdaḥ na tu asau teṣām prakāśakaḥ

original: ākāravarṇāvayavaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭeṣu gavādiṣu /
analyzed: ākāra varṇa avayavaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭeṣu go ādiṣu

original: śabdaḥ pravartamāno 'pi na tān aṅgīkaroty asau // BVaky_2.154 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ pi na tān aṅgīkaroti asau

original: saṃsthānavarṇāvayavair viśiṣṭe 'rthe prayujyate /
analyzed: saṃsthāna varṇa avayavaiḥ viśiṣṭe rthe prayujyate

original: śabdo na tasyāvayave pravṛttir upalabhyate // BVaky_2.155 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ na tasya avayave pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate

original: durlabhaṃ kasya cil loke sarvāvayavadarśanaṃ /
analyzed: durlabham kasya cit loke sarva avayava darśanam

original: kaiś cit tv avayavair dṛṣṭair arthaḥ kṛtso 'numīyate // BVaky_2.156 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit tu avayavaiḥ dṛṣṭaiḥ arthaḥ kṛtsaḥ numīyate

original: tathā jātyutpalādīnāṃ gandhena sahacāriṇām /
analyzed: tathā jātyutpala ādīnām gandhena sahacāriṇām

original: nityasaṃbandhināṃ dṛṣṭaṃ guṇānām avadhāraṇam // BVaky_2.157 //
analyzed: nitya saṃbandhinām dṛṣṭam guṇānām avadhāraṇam

original: saṃkhyāpramāṇasaṃsthāna- nirapekṣaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: saṃkhyā pramāṇa saṃsthāna nirapekṣaḥ pravartate

original: bindau ca samudāye ca vācakaḥ salilādiṣu // BVaky_2.158 //
analyzed: bindau ca samudāye ca vācakaḥ salila ādiṣu

original: saṃskārādiparicchinne tailādau yo vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃskāra ādi paricchinne taila ādau yaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: āhaikadeśaṃ tattvena tasyāvayavavartinā // BVaky_2.159 //
analyzed: āha eka deśam tattvena tasya avayava vartinā

original: yenārthenābhisaṃbaddham abhidhānaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: yena arthena abhisaṃbaddham abhidhānam prayujyate

original: tadarthāpagame tasya prayogo vinivartate // BVaky_2.160 //
analyzed: tad artha apagame tasya prayogaḥ vinivartate

original: yāṃs tu saṃbhavino dharmān antarṇīya prayujyate /
analyzed: yān tu saṃbhavinaḥ dharmān antarṇīya prayujyate

original: śabdas teṣāṃ na sāṃnidhyaṃ niyamena vyapekṣate // BVaky_2.161 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ teṣām na sāṃnidhyam niyamena vyapekṣate

original: yathā romaśaphādīnāṃ vyabhicāre 'pi dṛśyate /
analyzed: yathā roma śapha ādīnām vyabhicāre dṛśyate

original: gośabdo na tathā jāter viprayoge pravartate // BVaky_2.162 //
analyzed: go śabdaḥ na tathā jāteḥ viprayoge pravartate

original: tasmāt saṃbhavino 'rthasya śabdāt saṃpratyaye sati /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃbhavinaḥ rthasya śabdāt saṃpratyaye sati

original: adṛṣṭaviprayogārthaḥ saṃbandhitvena gamyate // BVaky_2.163 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa viprayoga arthaḥ saṃbandhi tvena gamyate

original: vācikā dyotikā va syur dvitvādīnāṃ vibhaktayaḥ /
analyzed: vācikāḥ dyotikāḥ va syuḥ dvi tva ādīnām vibhaktayaḥ

original: syād vā saṃkhyāvato 'rthasya samudāyo 'bhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_2.164 //
analyzed: syāt vā saṃkhyāvataḥ rthasya samudāyaḥ abhidhāyakaḥ

original: vinā saṃkhyābhidhānād vā saṃkhyābhedasamanvitān /
analyzed: vinā saṃkhyā abhidhānāt vā saṃkhyā bheda samanvitān

original: arthān svarūpabhedena kāmś cid āhur gavādayaḥ // BVaky_2.165 //
analyzed: arthān svarūpa bhedena cit āhuḥ go ādayaḥ

original: ye śabdā nityasaṃbandhā viveke jñātaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: ye śabdāḥ nitya saṃbandhāḥ viveke jñāta śaktayaḥ

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ teṣām artho vibhajyate // BVaky_2.166 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām teṣām arthaḥ vibhajyate

original: yāvac cāvyabhicāreṇa tayoḥ śakyaṃ prakalpanam /
analyzed: yāvat ca avyabhicāreṇa tayoḥ śakyam prakalpanam

original: niyamas tatra na tv evaṃ niyamo nuṭśabādiṣu // BVaky_2.167 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ tatra na tu evam niyamaḥ nuṭ śap ādiṣu

original: saṃbhave nābhidhānasya lakṣaṇatvaṃ prakalpate /
analyzed: saṃbhave nā abhidhānasya lakṣaṇa tvam prakalpate

original: āpekṣikyo hi saṃsarge niyatāḥ śabdaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_2.168 //
analyzed: āpekṣikyaḥ hi saṃsarge niyatāḥ śabda śaktayaḥ

original: na kūpasūpayūpānām anvayo 'rthasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: na kūpa sūpa yūpānām anvayaḥ rthasya dṛśyate

original: ato 'rthāntaravācitvaṃ saṃghātasyaiva gamyate // BVaky_2.169 //
analyzed: atas ṛtha antara vāci tvam saṃghātasya eva gamyate

original: anvākhyānāni bhidyante śabdavyutpattikarmasu /
analyzed: anvākhyānāni bhidyante śabda vyutpatti karmasu

original: bahūnāṃ saṃbhave 'rthānāṃ nimittaṃ kiṃ cid iṣyate // BVaky_2.170 //
analyzed: bahūnām saṃbhave rthānām nimittam kim cit iṣyate

original: vairavāsiṣṭhagiriśās tathaikāgārikādayaḥ /
analyzed: vaira vāsiṣṭha giriśāḥ tathā ekāgārika ādayaḥ

original: kaiś cit kathaṃ cid ākhyātā nimittāvadhisaṃkaraiḥ // BVaky_2.171 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit katham cit ākhyātāḥ nimitta avadhi saṃkaraiḥ

original: yathā pathaḥ samākhyānaṃ vṛkṣavalmīkaparvataiḥ /
analyzed: yathā pathaḥ samākhyānam vṛkṣa valmīka parvataiḥ

original: aviruddhaṃ gavādīnāṃ bhinnaiś ca sahacāribhiḥ // BVaky_2.172 //
analyzed: a viruddham go ādīnām bhinnaiḥ ca sahacāribhiḥ

original: anyathā ca samākhyānam avasthābhedadarśibhiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā ca samākhyānam avasthā bheda darśibhiḥ

original: kriyate kiṃśukādīnām ekadeśāvadhāraṇaṃ // BVaky_2.173 //
analyzed: kriyate kiṃśuka ādīnām eka deśa avadhāraṇam

original: kaiś cin nirvacanaṃ bhinnaṃ girater garjater gameḥ /
analyzed: kaiḥ cit nirvacanam bhinnam girateḥ garjateḥ gameḥ

original: gavater gadater vāpi gaur ity atrānudarśitam // BVaky_2.174 //
analyzed: gavateḥ gadateḥ vā api gauḥ iti atra anudarśitam

original: gaur ity eva svarūpād vā gośabdo goṣu vartate /
analyzed: gauḥ iti eva svarūpāt vā go śabdaḥ goṣu vartate

original: vyutpādyate na vā sarvaṃ kaiś cic cobhayatheṣyate // BVaky_2.175 //
analyzed: vyutpādyate na vā sarvam kaiḥ cit ca ubhayathā iṣyate

original: sāmānyenopadeśaś ca śāstre laghvartham āśritaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyena upadeśaḥ ca śāstre laghu artham āśritaḥ

original: jātyantaravad anyasya viśeṣāḥ pratipādakāḥ // BVaky_2.176 //
analyzed: jāti antara vat anyasya viśeṣāḥ pratipādakāḥ

original: arthāntare ca yad vṛttaṃ tat prakṛtyantaraṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: artha antare ca yat vṛttam tat prakṛti antaram viduḥ

original: tulyarūpaṃ na tad rūḍhāv anyasminn anuṣajyate // BVaky_2.177 //
analyzed: tulya rūpam na tat rūḍhau anyasmin anuṣajyate

original: bhinnāv ijiyajī dhātū niyatau viṣayāntare /
analyzed: bhinnau iji yajī dhātū niyatau viṣaya antare

original: kaiś cit kathaṃ cid uddiṣṭau citraṃ hi pratipādanam // BVaky_2.178 //
analyzed: kaiḥ cit katham cit uddiṣṭau citram hi pratipādanam

original: evaṃ ca vālavāyādi jitvarīvad upācaret /
analyzed: evam ca vālavāya ādi jitvarī vat upācaret

original: bhedābhedābhyupagame na virodho 'sti kaś cana // BVaky_2.179 //
analyzed: bheda abheda abhyupagame na virodhaḥ sti kaḥ cana

original: aḍādīnāṃ vyavasthārthaṃ pṛthaktvena prakalpanam /
analyzed: aṭ ādīnām vyavasthā artham pṛthaktvena prakalpanam

original: dhātūpasargayoḥ śāstre dhātur eva tu tādṛśaḥ // BVaky_2.180 //
analyzed: dhātu upasargayoḥ śāstre dhātuḥ eva tu tādṛśaḥ

original: tathā hi saṃgrāmayateḥ sopasargād vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi saṃgrāmayateḥ sa upasargāt vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kriyāviśeṣāḥ samghāte prakramyante tathāvidhāḥ // BVaky_2.181 //
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣāḥ samghāte prakramyante tathāvidhāḥ

original: kāryāṇām antaraṅgatvam evaṃ dhātūpasargayoḥ /
analyzed: kāryāṇām antaraṅga tvam evam dhātu upasargayoḥ

original: sādhanair yāti saṃbandhaṃ tathābhūtaiva sā kriyā // BVaky_2.182 //
analyzed: sādhanaiḥ yāti saṃbandham tathābhūtā eva sā kriyā

original: prayogārtheṣu siddhaḥ san bhettavyo 'rtho viśiṣyate /
analyzed: prayoga artheṣu siddhaḥ san bhettavyaḥ rthaḥ viśiṣyate

original: prāk ca sādhanasaṃbandhāt kriyā naivopajāyate // BVaky_2.183 //
analyzed: prāk ca sādhana saṃbandhāt kriyā na eva upajāyate

original: dhātoḥ sādhanayogasya bhāvinaḥ prakramād yathā /
analyzed: dhātoḥ sādhana yogasya bhāvinaḥ prakramāt yathā

original: dhātutvaṃ karmabhāvaś ca tathānyad api dṛśyatām // BVaky_2.184 //
analyzed: dhātu tvam karma bhāvaḥ ca tathā anyat api dṛśyatām

original: bījakāleṣu saṃbandhād yathā lākṣārasādayaḥ /
analyzed: bīja kāleṣu saṃbandhāt yathā lākṣā rasa ādayaḥ

original: varṇādipariṇāmena phalānām upakurvate // BVaky_2.185 //
analyzed: varṇa ādi pariṇāmena phalānām upakurvate

original: buddhisthād abhisaṃbandhāt tathā dhātūpasargayoḥ /
analyzed: buddhi sthāt abhisaṃbandhāt tathā dhātu upasargayoḥ

original: abhyantarīkṛtād bhedaḥ padakāle prakāśate // BVaky_2.186 //
analyzed: abhyantarīkṛtāt bhedaḥ pada kāle prakāśate

original: kva cit saṃbhavino bhedāḥ kevalair anidarśitāḥ /
analyzed: kva cit saṃbhavinaḥ bhedāḥ kevalaiḥ a nidarśitāḥ

original: upasargeṇa saṃbandhe vyajyante pranirādinā // BVaky_2.187 //
analyzed: upasargeṇa saṃbandhe vyajyante pra niḥ ādinā

original: sa vācako viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavād dyotako 'pi vā /
analyzed: sa vācakaḥ viśeṣāṇām saṃbhavāt vā

original: śaktyādhānāya vā dhātoḥ sahakārī prayujyate // BVaky_2.188 //
analyzed: śakti ādhānāya vā dhātoḥ sahakārī prayujyate

original: sthādibhiḥ kevalair yac ca gamanādi na gamyate /
analyzed: sthā ādibhiḥ kevalaiḥ yat ca gamana ādi na gamyate

original: tatrānumānād dvividhāt taddharmā prādir ucyate // BVaky_2.189 //
analyzed: tatra anumānāt dvividhāt tad dharmā prādiḥ ucyate

original: aprayoge 'dhiparyoś ca yāvad dṛṣṭaṃ kriyāntaram /
analyzed: a prayoge dhi paryoḥ ca yāvat dṛṣṭam kriyā antaram

original: tasyābhidhāyako dhātuḥ saha tābhyām anarthakaḥ // BVaky_2.190 //
analyzed: tasya abhidhāyakaḥ dhātuḥ saha tābhyām anarthakaḥ

original: tathaiva svārthikāḥ ke cit saṃghātāntaravṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva sva arthikāḥ ke cid saṃghāta antara vṛttayaḥ

original: anarthakena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtyarthānuvādinaḥ // BVaky_2.191 //
analyzed: anarthakena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ prakṛti artha anuvādinaḥ

original: nipātā dyotakāḥ ke cit pṛthagarthaprakalpane /
analyzed: nipātāḥ dyotakāḥ ke cit pṛthak artha prakalpane

original: āgamā iva ke cit tu saṃbhūyārthasya sādhakāḥ // BVaky_2.192 //
analyzed: āgamāḥ iva ke cid tu saṃbhūya arthasya sādhakāḥ

original: upariṣṭāt purastād vā dyotakatvaṃ na bhidyate /
analyzed: upariṣṭāt purastāt vā dyotaka tvam na bhidyate

original: teṣu prayujyamāneṣu bhinnārtheṣv api sarvathā // BVaky_2.193 //
analyzed: teṣu prayujyamāneṣu bhinna artheṣu api sarvathā

original: cādayo na prayujyante padatve sati kevalāḥ /
analyzed: ca ādayaḥ na prayujyante pada tve sati kevalāḥ

original: pratyayo vācakatve 'pi kevalo na prayujyate // BVaky_2.194 //
analyzed: pratyayaḥ vācaka tve pi kevalaḥ na prayujyate

original: samuccitābhidhāne tu vyatireko na vidyate /
analyzed: samuccita abhidhāne tu vyatirekaḥ na vidyate

original: asattvabhūto bhāvaś ca tiṅpadair abhidhīyate // BVaky_2.195 //
analyzed: a sattva bhūtaḥ bhāvaḥ ca tiṅ padaiḥ abhidhīyate

original: samuccitābhidhāne 'pi viśiṣṭārthābhidhāyinām /
analyzed: samuccita abhidhāne viśiṣṭa artha abhidhāyinām

original: guṇair padānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ paratantrās tu cādayaḥ // BVaky_2.196 //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ padānām saṃbandhaḥ paratantrāḥ tu ca ādayaḥ

original: janayitvā kriyā kā cit saṃbandhaṃ vinivartate /
analyzed: janayitvā kriyā kā cit saṃbandham vinivartate

original: śrūyamāṇe kriyāśabde saṃbandho jāyate kva cit // BVaky_2.197 //
analyzed: śrūyamāṇe kriyā śabde saṃbandhaḥ jāyate kva cit

original: tatra ṣaṣṭhī pratipadaṃ samāsasya nivṛttaye /
analyzed: tatra ṣaṣṭhī pratipadam samāsasya nivṛttaye

original: vihitā darśanārthaṃ tu kārakaṃ pratyudāhṛtam // BVaky_2.198 //
analyzed: vihitāḥ darśana artham tu kārakam pratyudāhṛtam

original: sa copajātaḥ saṃbandho vinivṛtte kriyāpade /
analyzed: sa ca upajātaḥ saṃbandhaḥ vinivṛtte kriyā pade

original: karmapravacanīyena tatra tatra niyamyate // BVaky_2.199 //
analyzed: karmapravacanīyena tatra tatra niyamyate

original: yena kriyāpadākṣepaḥ sa kārakavibhaktibhiḥ /
analyzed: yena kriyā pada ākṣepaḥ sa kāraka vibhaktibhiḥ

original: yujyate vir yathā tasya likhāv anupasargatā // BVaky_2.200 //
analyzed: yujyate viḥ yathā tasya likhau an upasarga tā

original: tiṣṭhater aprayogaś ca dṛṣṭo 'praty ajayann iti /
analyzed: tiṣṭhateḥ a prayogaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ prati ajayan iti

original: sunv abhīty ābhimukhye ca kevalo 'pi prayujyate // BVaky_2.201 //
analyzed: sunu abhi iti ābhimukhye ca kevalaḥ pi prayujyate

original: karmapravacanīyatvaṃ kriyāyoge vidhīyate /
analyzed: karmapravacanīya tvam kriyā yoge vidhīyate

original: ṣatvādivinivṛttyarthaṃ svatyādīnāṃ vidharmaṇām // BVaky_2.202 //
analyzed: ṣa tva ādi vinivṛtti artham sva ti ādīnām vidharmaṇām

original: hetuhetumator yoga- paricchede 'nunā kṛte /
analyzed: hetu hetumatoḥ yoga paricchede nunā kṛte

original: ārambhād bādhyate prāptā tṛtīyā hetulakṣaṇā // BVaky_2.203 //
analyzed: ārambhāt bādhyate prāptā tṛtīyā hetu lakṣaṇā

original: kriyāyā dyotako nāyaṃ na saṃbandhasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ dyotakaḥ na ayam na saṃbandhasya vācakaḥ

original: nāpi kriyāpadākṣepi saṃbandhasya tu bhedakaḥ // BVaky_2.204 //
analyzed: nā api kriyā pada ākṣepi saṃbandhasya tu bhedakaḥ

original: anarthakānāṃ saṃghātaḥ sārthako 'narthakas tathā /
analyzed: anarthakānām saṃghātaḥ sārthakaḥ narthakaḥ tathā

original: varṇānāṃ padam arthena yuktaṃ nāvayavāḥ pade // BVaky_2.205 //
analyzed: varṇānām padam arthena yuktam na avayavāḥ pade

original: padānām arthayuktānāṃ saṃghāto bhidyate punaḥ /
analyzed: padānām artha yuktānām saṃghātaḥ bhidyate punar

original: arthāntarāvabodhena saṃbandhavigamena ca // BVaky_2.206 //
analyzed: artha antara avabodhena saṃbandha vigamena ca

original: sārthakānarthakau bhede saṃbandhaṃ nādhigacchataḥ /
analyzed: sārthaka anarthakau bhede saṃbandham na adhigacchataḥ

original: adhigacchata ity eke kuṭīrādinidarśanāt // BVaky_2.107 //
analyzed: adhigacchate iti eke kuṭīra ādi nidarśanāt

original: arthavadbhyo viśiṣṭārthaḥ saṃghāta upajāyate /
analyzed: arthavadbhyaḥ viśiṣṭa arthaḥ saṃghātaḥ upajāyate

original: nopajāyata ity eke samāsasvārthikādiṣu // BVaky_2.208 //
analyzed: na upajāyate iti eke samāsa svārthika ādiṣu

original: ke cid dhi yutasiddhārthā bhede nirjñātaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: ke cit hi yuta siddhārthāḥ bhede nirjñāta śaktayaḥ

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ke cit kalpitaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_2.209 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām ke cid kalpita śaktayaḥ

original: śāstrārtha eva varṇānām arthavattve pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: śāstra arthaḥ eva varṇānām arthavat tve pradarśitaḥ

original: dhātvādīnāṃ hi śuddhānāṃ laukiko 'rtho na vidyate // BVaky_2.210 //
analyzed: dhātu ādīnām hi śuddhānām laukikaḥ rthaḥ na vidyate

original: kṛttaddhitānām arthaś ca kevalānām alaukikaḥ /
analyzed: kṛt taddhitānām arthaḥ ca kevalānām alaukikaḥ

original: prāg vibhaktes tadantasya tathaivārtho na vidyate // BVaky_2.211 //
analyzed: prāk vibhakteḥ tad antasya tathā eva arthaḥ na vidyate

original: abhivyaktataro yo 'rthaḥ pratyayānteṣu lakṣyate /
analyzed: abhivyaktataraḥ yaḥ rthaḥ pratyaya anteṣu lakṣyate

original: arthavattāprakaraṇād āśritaḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ // BVaky_2.212 //
analyzed: arthavat tā prakaraṇāt āśritaḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ

original: ātmabhedo na cet kaś cid varṇebhyaḥ padavākyayoḥ /
analyzed: ātma bhedaḥ na ced kaḥ cit varṇebhyaḥ pada vākyayoḥ

original: anyonyāpekṣayā śaktyā varṇaḥ syād abhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_2.213 //
analyzed: anyonya apekṣayā śaktyā varṇaḥ syāt abhidhāyakaḥ

original: varṇena kena cin nyūnaḥ saṃghāto yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ /
analyzed: varṇena kena cit nyūnaḥ saṃghātaḥ yaḥ abhidhāyakaḥ

original: na cec chabdāntaram asāv anyūnas tena gamyate // BVaky_2.214 //
analyzed: na ced śabda antaram asau anyūnaḥ tena gamyate

original: sa tasmin vācake śabde nimittāt smṛtim ādadhat /
analyzed: sa tasmin vācake śabde nimittāt smṛtim ādadhat

original: sākṣād iva vyavahitaṃ śabdenārtham upohate // BVaky_2.215 //
analyzed: sākṣāt iva vyavahitam śabdena artham upohate

original: padavācyo yathā nārthaḥ kaś cid gaurakharādiṣu /
analyzed: pada vācyaḥ yathā na arthaḥ kaḥ cit gaura khara ādiṣu

original: saty api pratyaye 'tyantaṃ samudāye na gamyate // BVaky_2.216 //
analyzed: sati api pratyaye tyantam samudāye na gamyate

original: samanvita ivārthātmā padārthair yaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: samanvitaḥ iva artha ātmā padārthaiḥ yaḥ pratīyate

original: padārthadarśanaṃ tatra tathaivānupakārakam // BVaky_2.217 //
analyzed: padārtha darśanam tatra tathā eva anupakārakam

original: samudāyāvayavayor bhinnārthatve ca vṛttiṣu /
analyzed: samudāya avayavayoḥ bhinna artha tve ca vṛttiṣu

original: yugapad bhedasaṃsargau viruddhāv anuṣaṅgiṇau // BVaky_2.218 //
analyzed: yugapad bheda saṃsargau viruddhau anuṣaṅgiṇau

original: kaś ca sādhanamātrārthān adhyādīn parikalpayet /
analyzed: kaḥ ca sādhana mātra arthān adhi ādīn parikalpayet

original: aprayuktapadaś cārtho bahuvrīhau kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_2.219 //
analyzed: a prayukta padaḥ ca arthaḥ bahuvrīhau katham bhavet

original: prajñusaṃjñvādyavayavair na cāsty arthāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: prajñu saṃjñu ādi avayavaiḥ na ca asti artha avadhāraṇam

original: tasmāt saṃghāta evaiko viśiṣṭārthanibandhanam // BVaky_2.220 //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃghātaḥ eva ekaḥ viśiṣṭa artha nibandhanam

original: gargā ity eka evāyaṃ bahuṣv artheṣu vartate /
analyzed: gargāḥ iti ekaḥ eva ayam bahuṣu artheṣu vartate

original: dvandvasaṃjño 'pi saṃghāto bahūnām abhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_2.221 //
analyzed: dvandva saṃjñaḥ saṃghātaḥ bahūnām abhidhāyakaḥ

original: yathaikaśeṣe bhujyādiḥ pratyekam avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: yathā ekaśeṣe bhuji ādiḥ pratyekam avatiṣṭhate

original: kriyaivaṃ dvandvavācye 'rthe pratyekaṃ pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.222 //
analyzed: kriyā evam dvandva vācye rthe pratyekam pravibhajyate

original: yac ca dvandvapadārthasya tacchabdena vyapekṣaṇam /
analyzed: yat ca dvandva padārthasya tad śabdena vyapekṣaṇam

original: sāpi vyāvṛttarūpe 'rthe sarvanāmasarūpatā // BVaky_2.223 //
analyzed: sā api vyāvṛtta rūpe rthe sarvanāma sarūpa tā

original: yathā ca khadiracchede bhāgeṣu kramavāṃs chidiḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca khadira chede bhāgeṣu kramavān chidiḥ

original: tathā dvandvapadārthasya bhāgeṣu kramadarśanam // BVaky_2.224 //
analyzed: tathā dvandva padārthasya bhāgeṣu krama darśanam

original: saṅghaikadeśe prakrāntān yathā saṅghānupātinaḥ /
analyzed: saṅgha eka deśe prakrāntān yathā saṅgha anupātinaḥ

original: kriyāviśeṣān manyante sa dvandvāvayave kramaḥ // BVaky_2.225 //
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣān manyante sa dvandva avayave kramaḥ

original: pratipādayatā vṛttim abuddhān vākyapūrvikām /
analyzed: pratipādayatā vṛttim abuddhān vākya pūrvikām

original: vṛttau padārthabhedena prādhānyam upadarśitam // BVaky_2.226 //
analyzed: vṛttau padārtha bhedena prādhānyam upadarśitam

original: abhedād abhidheyasya nañsamāse vikalpitam /
analyzed: abhedāt abhidheyasya nañ samāse vikalpitam

original: prādhānyaṃ bahudhā bhāṣye doṣās tu prakriyāgatāḥ // BVaky_2.227 //
analyzed: prādhānyam bahudhā bhāṣye doṣāḥ tu prakriyā gatāḥ

original: jahatsvārthavikalpe ca sarvārthatyāgam icchatā /
analyzed: jahat sva artha vikalpe ca sarva artha tyāgam icchatā

original: bahuvrīhipadārthasya tyāgaḥ sarvasya darśitaḥ // BVaky_2.228 //
analyzed: bahuvrīhi padārthasya tyāgaḥ sarvasya darśitaḥ

original: śāstre kva cit prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: śāstre kva cit prakṛti arthaḥ pratyayena abhidhīyate

original: prakṛtau vinivṛttāyāṃ pratyayārthaś ca dhātubhiḥ // BVaky_2.229 //
analyzed: prakṛtau vinivṛttāyām pratyaya arthaḥ ca dhātubhiḥ

original: yam artham āhatur bhinnau pratyayāv eka eva tam /
analyzed: yam artham āhatuḥ bhinnau pratyayau ekaḥ eva tam

original: kva cid āha pacantīti dhātus tābhyāṃ vinā kva cit // BVaky_2.230 //
analyzed: kva cit āha pacanti iti dhātuḥ tābhyām vinā kva cit

original: anvākhyānasmṛter ye ca pratyayārthā nibandhanam /
analyzed: anvākhyāna smṛteḥ ye ca pratyaya arthāḥ nibandhanam

original: nirdiṣṭās te prakṛtyarthāḥ smṛtyantara udāhṛtāḥ // BVaky_2.231 //
analyzed: nirdiṣṭāḥ te prakṛti arthāḥ smṛti antare udāhṛtāḥ

original: prasiddher udvamikarīty evaṃ śāstre 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: prasiddheḥ udvami karī iti evam śāstre abhidhīyate

original: vyavahārāya manyante śāstrārthaprakriyā yataḥ // BVaky_2.232 //
analyzed: vyavahārāya manyante śāstra artha prakriyāḥ yatas

original: śāstreṣu prakriyābhedair avidyaivopavarṇyate /
analyzed: śāstreṣu prakriyā bhedaiḥ avidyā eva upavarṇyate

original: anāgamavikalpā tu svayaṃ vidyopavartate // BVaky_2.233 //
analyzed: anāgama vikalpā tu svayam vidyā upavartate

original: anibaddhaṃ nimitteṣu nirupākhyaṃ phalaṃ yathā /
analyzed: anibaddham nimitteṣu nirupākhyam phalam yathā

original: tathā vidyāpy anākhyeyā śāstropāyeva lakṣyate // BVaky_2.234 //
analyzed: tathā vidyā api anākhyeyā śāstra upāyā iva lakṣyate

original: yathābhyāsaṃ hi vāg arthe pratipattiṃ samīhate /
analyzed: yathābhyāsam hi vāc arthe pratipattim samīhate

original: svabhāva iva cānādir mithyābhyāso vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_2.235 //
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ iva ca anādiḥ mithyā abhyāsaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: utprekṣate sāvayavaṃ paramāṇum apaṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: utprekṣate sa avayavam paramāṇum apaṇḍitaḥ

original: tathāvayavinaṃ yuktam anyair avayavaiḥ punaḥ // BVaky_2.236 //
analyzed: tathā avayavinam yuktam anyaiḥ avayavaiḥ punar

original: ghaṭādidarśanāl lokaḥ paricchinno 'vasīyate /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi darśanāt lokaḥ paricchinnaḥ vasīyate

original: samārambhāc ca bhāvānām ādimad brahma śāśvatam // BVaky_2.237 //
analyzed: samārambhāt ca bhāvānām ādimat brahma śāśvatam

original: upāyāḥ śikṣamāṇānāṃ bālānām upalāpanāḥ /
analyzed: upāyāḥ śikṣamāṇānām bālānām upalāpanāḥ

original: asatye vartmani sthitvā tataḥ satyaṃ samīhate // BVaky_2.238 //
analyzed: asatye vartmani sthitvā tatas satyam samīhate

original: anyathā pratipadyārthaṃ padagrahaṇapūrvakam /
analyzed: anyathā pratipadya artham pada grahaṇa pūrvakam

original: punar vākye tam evārtham anyathā pratipadyate // BVaky_2.239 //
analyzed: punar vākye tam eva artham anyathā pratipadyate

original: upāttā bahavo 'py arthā yeṣv ante pratiṣedhanam /
analyzed: upāttāḥ bahavaḥ pi arthāḥ yeṣu ante pratiṣedhanam

original: kriyate te nivartante tasmāt tāṃs tatra nāśrayet // BVaky_2.240 //
analyzed: kriyate te nivartante tasmāt tān tatra na āśrayet

original: vṛkṣo nāstīti vākyaṃ ca viśiṣṭābhāvalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ na asti iti vākyam ca viśiṣṭa abhāva lakṣaṇam

original: nārthe na buddhau saṃbandho nivṛtter avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.241 //
analyzed: na arthe na buddhau saṃbandhaḥ nivṛtteḥ avatiṣṭhate

original: vicchedapratipattau ca yady astīty avadhāryate /
analyzed: viccheda pratipattau ca yadi asti iti avadhāryate

original: aśabdavācyā sā buddhir nivartyeta sthitā katham // BVaky_2.242 //
analyzed: aśabda vācyā sā buddhiḥ nivartyeta sthitā katham

original: atha yaj jñānam utpannaṃ tan mithyeti nañā kṛtam /
analyzed: atha yat jñānam utpannam tat mithyā iti nañā kṛtam

original: naño vyāpārabhede 'sminn abhāvāvagatiḥ katham // BVaky_2.243 //
analyzed: nañaḥ vyāpāra bhede smin abhāva avagatiḥ katham

original: nirādhārapravṛttau ca prākpravṛttir naño bhavet /
analyzed: nirādhāra pravṛttau ca prāk pravṛttiḥ nañaḥ bhavet

original: athādhāraḥ sa evāsya niyamārthā śrutir bhavet // BVaky_2.244 //
analyzed: atha ādhāraḥ saḥ eva asya niyama arthā śrutiḥ bhavet

original: niyamadyotanārthā vāpy anuvādo yathā bhavet /
analyzed: niyama dyotana arthāḥ vā api anuvādaḥ yathā bhavet

original: kaś cid evārthavāṃs tatra śabdaḥ śeṣās tv anarthakāḥ // BVaky_2.245 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit eva arthavān tatra śabdaḥ śeṣāḥ tu anarthakāḥ

original: viruddhaṃ cābhisaṃbandham udāhāryādibhiḥ kṛtam /
analyzed: viruddham ca abhisaṃbandham udāhārya ādibhiḥ kṛtam

original: vākye samāpte vākyārtham anyathā pratipadyate // BVaky_2.246 //
analyzed: vākye samāpte vākya artham anyathā pratipadyate

original: padānāṃ pravibhāgena yādṛśaḥ parikalpyate // BVaky_2.247 //
analyzed: padānām pravibhāgena yādṛśaḥ parikalpyate

original: athāsaṃsṛṣṭa evārthaḥ padeṣu samavasthitaḥ /

analyzed: vākya arthasya abhyupāyaḥ ekasya pratipādane

original: pūrvaṃ padeṣv asaṃsṛṣṭo yaḥ kramād upacīyate /
analyzed: pūrvam padeṣu a saṃsṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ kramāt upacīyate

original: chinnagrathitakalpatvāt tad viśiṣṭataraṃ viduḥ // BVaky_2.249 //
analyzed: chinna grathita kalpa tvāt tat viśiṣṭataram viduḥ

original: ekam āhur anekārthaṃ śabdam anye parīkṣakāḥ /

analyzed: nimitta bhedāt ekasya sārvārthyam tasya bhidyate

analyzed: artha prakaraṇābhyām vā yogāt śabda antareṇa vā

analyzed: tathā saḥ eva go śabdaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

analyzed: prasiddhi bhedāt gauṇa tvam mukhya tvam ca upajāyate

original: eko mantras tathādhyātmam adhidaivam adhikratu /

analyzed: asaṃkareṇa sarva arthaḥ bhinna śaktiḥ avasthitaḥ

original: gotvānuṣaṅgo vāhīke nimittāt kaiś cid iṣyate /

original: arthamātraṃ viparyastaṃ śabdaḥ svārthe vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_2.255 //
analyzed: artha mātram viparyastam śabdaḥ sva arthe vyavasthitaḥ

original: arthamātraṃ viparyastaṃ svarūpe tu śrutiḥ sthitā // BVaky_2.256 //
analyzed: artha mātram viparyastam svarūpe tu śrutiḥ sthitā

original: ekatvaṃ tu sarūpatvāc chabdayor gauṇamukhyayoḥ /

analyzed: prāhuḥ atyanta bhede pi bheda mārga anudarśinaḥ

analyzed: anarthakānām pāṭhaḥ vā śeṣaḥ tu anyaḥ pratīyate

analyzed: atyanta bhedaḥ sarveṣām tad saṃbandhāt tu tadvatām

original: anyā saṃskārasāvitrī karmaṇy anyā prayujyate /

original: vākyarūpasya vākyārthe vṛttir anyānapekṣayā // BVaky_2.262 //
analyzed: vākya rūpasya vākya arthe vṛttiḥ anya anapekṣayā

analyzed: siddhi asiddhi kṛtā teṣām gauṇa mukhya prakalpanā

original: arthaprakaraṇāpekṣo yo vā śabdāntaraiḥ saha /

original: yuktaḥ pratyāyayaty arthaṃ taṃ gauṇam apare viduḥ // BVaky_2.264 //

analyzed: sa mukhyaḥ iti vijñeyaḥ rūpa mātra nibandhanaḥ

original: yas tv anyasya prayogeṇa yatnād iva niyujyate /

original: yac cāpy ekaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ caritāstikriyaṃ kva cit /

na sarvaḥ pratyayas tasmin prasiddha iva jāyate // BVaky_2.286 //

analyzed: yaḥ tasmāt lakṣyate bhedaḥ tam asatyam pracakṣate

analyzed: na tathā alāta cakrasya vicchinnam spṛśyate hi tat

analyzed: nagareṣu na te tadvat gandharvanagareṣu api

analyzed: tāvān na mṛd mayeṣu asti tasmāt te viṣayaḥ kanaḥ

analyzed: alpa deśa antara avastham pratibimbam tu dṛśyate

analyzed: na te svapna ādiṣu svasya tadvat arthasya sādhakāḥ

analyzed: yathā prasiddhiḥ lokasya tathā tat avasīyate

analyzed: na tābhyām vyavahāraḥ sti śabdāḥ loka nibandhanāḥ

analyzed: tatas nyasya api sāṃnidhyāt sa karoti prakāśanam

analyzed: tasmāt prayojakāt anyān api pratyāyayati asau

analyzed: dhūmam api anabhipretam janayati eka sādhanam

analyzed: avivakṣitam api artham prakāśayate saṃnidheḥ

original: yathaivātyantasaṃsṛṣṭas tyaktum artho na śakyate /

analyzed: tathā saṃbandhī pravivaktum na śakyate

analyzed: prayojakaḥ rthaḥ śabdasya rūpa abhede pi gamyate

original: kva cid guṇapradhānatvam arthānām avivakṣitam /

original: kva cit sāṃnidhyam apy eṣāṃ pratipattāv akāraṇam // BVaky_2.304 //
analyzed: kva cit sāṃnidhyam api eṣām pratipattau akāraṇam

original: *yac cānupāttaṃ śabdena tat kasmiṃś cit pratīyate /
analyzed: yat ca anupāttam śabdena tat kasmin cit pratīyate

original: kva cit pradhānam evārtho bhavaty ayasya lakṣaṇam // BVaky_2.305 *//
analyzed: kva cit pradhānam eva arthaḥ bhavati ayasya lakṣaṇam  /

original: *ākhyātaṃ taddhitārthasya yat kiṃ cid upadarśakam /
analyzed: ākhyātam taddhita arthasya yat kim cit upadarśakam

analyzed: guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya tatra dṛṣṭaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: *nirdeśe liṅgasaṃkhyānāṃ saṃnidhānam akāraṇam /
analyzed: nirdeśe liṅga saṃkhyānām saṃnidhānam akāraṇam

original: pramāṇam ardhahrasādāv anupāttaṃ pratīyate // BVaky_2.307 //
analyzed: pramāṇam ardhahrasa ādau anupāttam pratīyate

original: hrasvasyārdhaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tasyāsaṃnidhāv api /
analyzed: hrasvasya ardham ca yat dṛṣṭam tat tasya asaṃnidhau api

original: hrasvasya lakṣaṇārthatvāt tadvad evābhidhīyate // BVaky_2.308 //
analyzed: hrasvasya lakṣaṇa artha tvāt tadvat eva abhidhīyate

original: dīrghaplutābhyāṃ tasya syān mātrayā vā viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: dīrgha plutābhyām tasya syāt mātrayā vā viśeṣaṇam

original: jāter vā lakṣaṇāya syāt sarvathā saptaparṇavat // BVaky_2.309 //
analyzed: jāteḥ vā lakṣaṇāya syāt sarvathā sapta parṇa vat

original: gantavyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sūrya iti kālasya lakṣaṇe /
analyzed: gantavyam dṛśyatām sūryaḥ iti kālasya lakṣaṇe

original: jñāyatāṃ kāla ity etat sopāyam abhidhīyate // BVaky_2.310 //
analyzed: jñāyatām kālaḥ iti etat sa upāyam abhidhīyate

original: vidhyaty adhanuṣety atra viśeṣeṇa nidarśyate /
analyzed: vidhyati a dhanuṣā iti atra viśeṣeṇa nidarśyate

original: sāmānyam āśrayaḥ śakter yaḥ kaś cit pratipādakaḥ // BVaky_2.311 //
analyzed: sāmānyam āśrayaḥ śakteḥ yaḥ kaḥ cit pratipādakaḥ

original: kākebhyo rakṣyatāṃ sarpir iti bālo 'pi coditaḥ /
analyzed: kākebhyaḥ rakṣyatām sarpiḥ iti coditaḥ

original: upaghātapare vākye na śvādibhyo na rakṣati // BVaky_2.312 //
analyzed: upaghāta pare vākye na śva ādibhyaḥ na rakṣati

original: prakṣālane śarāvāṇāṃ sthānanirmārjanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: prakṣālane śarāvāṇām sthāna nirmārjanam tathā

original: anuktam api rūpeṇa bhujyaṅgatvāt pratīyate // BVaky_2.313 //
analyzed: anuktam api rūpeṇa bhuji aṅga tvāt pratīyate

original: vākyāt prakaraṇād arthād aucityād deśakālataḥ /
analyzed: vākyāt prakaraṇāt arthāt aucityāt deśa kālataḥ

original: śabdārthāḥ pravibhajyante na rūpād eva kevalāt // BVaky_2.314 //
analyzed: śabda arthāḥ pravibhajyante na rūpāt eva kevalāt

original: saṃsargo viprayogaś ca sāhacaryaṃ virodhitā /
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ viprayogaḥ ca sāhacaryam virodhi tā

original: arthaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdasyānyasya saṃnidhiḥ // BVaky_2.315 //
analyzed: arthaḥ prakaraṇam liṅgam śabdasya anyasya saṃnidhiḥ

original: sāmarthyam aucitī deśaḥ kālo vyaktiḥ svarādayaḥ /
analyzed: sāmarthyam aucitī deśaḥ kālaḥ vyaktiḥ svara ādayaḥ

original: śabdārthasyānavacchede viśeṣasmṛtihetavaḥ // BVaky_2.316 //
analyzed: śabda arthasya anavacchede viśeṣa smṛti hetavaḥ

original: bhedapakṣe 'pi sārūpyād bhinnārthāḥ pratipattṛṣu /
analyzed: bheda pakṣe pi sārūpyāt bhinna arthāḥ pratipattṛṣu

original: niyatā yānty abhivyaktiṃ śabdāḥ prakaraṇādibhiḥ // BVaky_2.317 //
analyzed: niyatāḥ yānti abhivyaktim śabdāḥ prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: nāmākhyātasarūpā ye kāryāntaranibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: nāma ākhyāta sarūpāḥ ye kārya antara nibandhanāḥ

original: śabdā vākyasya teṣv artho na rūpād adhigamyate // BVaky_2.318 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ vākyasya teṣu arthaḥ na rūpāt adhigamyate

original: yā pravṛttinivṛttyarthā stutinindāprakalpanā /
analyzed: yā pravṛtti nivṛtti arthā stuti nindā prakalpanā

original: kuśalaḥ pratipattā tām ayathārthāṃ samīhate // BVaky_2.319 //
analyzed: kuśalaḥ pratipattā tām ayathārthām samīhate

original: vidhīyamānaṃ yat krarma dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprayojanam /
analyzed: vidhīyamānam yat krarma dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanam

original: stūyate sā stutis tasya kartur eva prayojikā // BVaky_2.320 //
analyzed: stūyate sā stutiḥ tasya kartuḥ eva prayojikā

original: vyāghrādivyapadeśena yathā bālo nivartyate /
analyzed: vyāghra ādi vyapadeśena yathā bālaḥ nivartyate

original: asatyo 'pi tathā kaś cit pratyavāyo 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_2.321 //
analyzed: asatyaḥ pi tathā kaḥ cit pratyavāyaḥ abhidhīyate

original: na saṃvidhānāṃ kṛtvāpi pratyavāye tathāvidhe /
analyzed: na saṃvidhānām kṛtvā api pratyavāye tathāvidhe

original: śāstreṇa pratiṣiddhe 'rthe vidvān kaś cit pravartate // BVaky_2.322 //
analyzed: śāstreṇa pratiṣiddhe rthe vidvān kaḥ cit pravartate

original: sarpeṣu saṃvidhāyāpi siddhair mantrauṣadhādibhiḥ /
analyzed: sarpeṣu saṃvidhāya api siddhaiḥ mantra auṣadha ādibhiḥ

original: nānyathā pratipattavyaṃ na dato gamayed iti // BVaky_2.323 //
analyzed: na anyathā pratipattavyam na dataḥ gamayet iti

original: kva cit tattvasamākhyānaṃ kriyate stutinindayoḥ /
analyzed: kva cit tattva samākhyānam kriyate stuti nindayoḥ

original: tatrāpi ca pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś copadiśyate // BVaky_2.324 //
analyzed: tatra api ca pravṛttiḥ ca nivṛttiḥ ca upadiśyate

original: rūpaṃ sarvapadārthānāṃ vākyārthopanibandhanam /
analyzed: rūpam sarva padārthānām vākya artha upanibandhanam

original: sāpekṣā ye tu vākyārthāḥ padārthair eva te samāḥ // BVaky_2.325 //
analyzed: sāpekṣāḥ ye tu vākya arthāḥ padārthaiḥ eva te samāḥ

original: vākyaṃ tad api manyante yat padaṃ caritakriyam /
analyzed: vākyam tat api manyante yat padam carita kriyam

original: antareṇa kriyāśabdaṃ vākyāder dvitvadarśanāt // BVaky_2.326 //
analyzed: antareṇa kriyā śabdam vākya ādeḥ dvi tva darśanāt

original: ākhyātaśabde niyataṃ sādhanaṃ yatra gamyate /
analyzed: ākhyāta śabde niyatam sādhanam yatra gamyate

original: tad apy ekaṃ samāptārthaṃ vākyam ity abhidhīyate // BVaky_2.327 //
analyzed: tat api ekam samāpta artham vākyam iti abhidhīyate

original: śabdavyavahitā buddhir aprayuktapadāśrayā /
analyzed: śabda vyavahitā buddhiḥ a prayukta pada āśrayā

original: anumānaṃ tadarthasya pratyaye hetur ucyate // BVaky_2.328 //
analyzed: anumānam tad arthasya pratyaye hetuḥ ucyate

original: [this verse is only in Rau]
analyzed: this verse is only in rau

original: apare tu padasyaiva tam arthaṃ pratijānate /
analyzed: apare tu padasya eva tam artham pratijānate

original: śabdāntarābhisaṃbandham antareṇa vyavasthitam // BVaky_2.329 //
analyzed: śabda antara abhisaṃbandham antareṇa vyavasthitam

original: yasminn uccarite śabde yadā yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: yasmin uccarite śabde yadā yaḥ rthaḥ pratīyate

original: tam āhur arthaṃ tasyaiva nānyad arthasya lakṣaṇam // BVaky_2.330 //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ artham tasya eva na anyat arthasya lakṣaṇam

original: kriyārthopapadeśv evaṃ sthānināṃ gamyate kriyā /
analyzed: kriyā artha upapadeṣu evam sthāninām gamyate kriyā

original: vṛttau nirādibhiś caivaṃ krāntādyarthaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_2.331 //
analyzed: vṛttau nirādibhiḥ ca evam krānta ādi arthaḥ pratīyate

original: tāni śabdāntarāṇy eva paryāyā iva laukikāḥ /
analyzed: tāni śabda antarāṇi eva paryāyāḥ iva laukikāḥ

original: arthaprakaraṇābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ svārtho niyamyate // BVaky_2.332 //
analyzed: artha prakaraṇābhyām tu teṣām sva arthaḥ niyamyate

original: pratibodhābhyupāyās tu ye taṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ prati /
analyzed: pratibodha abhyupāyāḥ tu ye tam tam puruṣam prati

original: nāvaśyaṃ te 'bhisaṃbaddhāḥ śabdā jñeyena vastunā // BVaky_2.333 //
analyzed: na avaśyam te bhisaṃbaddhāḥ śabdāḥ jñeyena vastunā

original: asatyāṃ pratipattau vā mithyā vā pratipādane /
analyzed: asatyām pratipattau vā mithyā vā pratipādane

original: svair arthair nityasaṃbandhās te te śabdā vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_2.334 //
analyzed: svaiḥ arthaiḥ nitya saṃbandhāḥ te te śabdāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: yathāprakaraṇaṃ dvāram ity asyāṃ karmaṇaḥ śrutau /
analyzed: yathāprakaraṇam dvāram iti asyām karmaṇaḥ śrutau

original: badhāna dehi vety etad upāyād avagamyate // BVaky_2.335 //
analyzed: badhāna dehi vā iti etat upāyāt avagamyate

original: tatra sādhanavṛttir yaḥ śabdaḥ sattvanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādhana vṛttiḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ sattva nibandhanaḥ

original: na sa pradhānabhūtasya sādhyasyārthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_2.336 //
analyzed: na sa pradhāna bhūtasya sādhyasya arthasya vācakaḥ

original: svārthamātraṃ prakāśyāsau sāpekṣo vinivartate /
analyzed: sva artha mātram prakāśya asau sa apekṣaḥ vinivartate

original: arthas tu tasya saṃbandhī prakalpayati saṃnidhim // BVaky_2.337 //
analyzed: arthaḥ tu tasya saṃbandhī prakalpayati saṃnidhim

original: pārārthyasyāviśiṣṭatvān na śabdāc chabdasaṃnidhiḥ /
analyzed: pārārthyasya a viśiṣṭa tvāt na śabdāt śabda saṃnidhiḥ

original: nārthāc chabdasya sāṃnidhyaṃ na śabdād arthasaṃnidhiḥ // BVaky_2.338 //
analyzed: na arthāt śabdasya sāṃnidhyam na śabdāt artha saṃnidhiḥ

original: naṣṭarūpam ivākhyātam ākṣiptaṃ karmavācinā /
analyzed: naṣṭa rūpam iva ākhyātam ākṣiptam karma vācinā

original: yadi prāptaṃ pradhānatvaṃ yugapad bhāvasattvayoḥ // BVaky_2.339 //
analyzed: yadi prāptam pradhāna tvam yugapad bhāva sattvayoḥ

original: tais tu nāmasarūpatvam ākhyātasyāsya varṇyate /
analyzed: taiḥ tu nāma sarūpa tvam ākhyātasya asya varṇyate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyavahāro vibhajyate // BVaky_2.340 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyavahāraḥ vibhajyate

original: na cāpi rūpāt saṃdehe vācakatvaṃ nivartate /
analyzed: na ca api rūpāt saṃdehe vācaka tvam nivartate

original: ardhaṃ paśor iti yathā sāmarthyāt tad dhi kalpate // BVaky_2.341 //
analyzed: ardham paśoḥ iti yathā sāmarthyāt tat hi kalpate

original: sarvaṃ sattvapadaṃ śuddhaṃ yadi bhāvanibandhanam /
analyzed: sarvam sattva padam śuddham yadi bhāva nibandhanam

original: saṃsarge ca vibhakto 'sya tasyārtho na pṛthag yadi // BVaky_2.342 //
analyzed: saṃsarge ca vibhaktaḥ tasya arthaḥ na pṛthak yadi

original: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātaṃ nāmnāṃ sattvapradhānatā /
analyzed: kriyā pradhānam ākhyātam nāmnām sattva pradhāna tā

original: catvāri padajātāni sarvam etad virudhyate // BVaky_2.343 //
analyzed: catvāri pada jātāni sarvam etat virudhyate

original: vākyasya buddhau nityatvam arthayogaṃ ca laukikam /
analyzed: vākyasya buddhau nitya tvam artha yogam ca laukikam

original: dṛṣṭvā catuṣṭvaṃ nāstīti vadaty audumbarāyaṇaḥ // BVaky_2.344 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā catuṣṭvam na asti iti vadati audumbarāyaṇaḥ

original: vyāptimāṃś ca laghuś caiva vyavahāraḥ padāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: vyāptimān ca laghuḥ ca eva vyavahāraḥ padāśrayaḥ

original: loke śāstre ca kāryārthaṃ vibhāgenaiva kalpitaḥ // BVaky_2.345 //
analyzed: loke śāstre ca kārya artham vibhāgena eva kalpitaḥ

original: na loke pratipattṝṇām arthayogāt prasiddhayaḥ /
analyzed: na loke pratipattṝṇām artha yogāt prasiddhayaḥ

original: tasmād alaukiko vākyād anyaḥ kaś cin na vidyate // BVaky_2.346 //
analyzed: tasmāt alaukikaḥ vākyāt anyaḥ kaḥ cit na vidyate

original: anyatra śrūyamāṇaiś ca liṅgair vākyaiś ca sūcitāḥ /
analyzed: anyatra śrūyamāṇaiḥ ca liṅgaiḥ vākyaiḥ ca sūcitāḥ

original: svārthā eva pratīyante rūpābhedād alakṣitāḥ // BVaky_2.347 //
analyzed: svārthāḥ eva pratīyante rūpa abhedāt alakṣitāḥ

original: utsargavākye yat tyaktam aśabdam iva śabdavat /
analyzed: utsarga vākye yat tyaktam aśabdam iva śabdavat

original: tad bādhakeṣu vākyeṣu śrutam anyatra gamyate // BVaky_2.348 //
analyzed: tat bādhakeṣu vākyeṣu śrutam anyatra gamyate

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ śrutir dadhni prakrāntā māṭharād vinā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām śrutiḥ dadhni prakrāntā māṭharāt vinā

original: māṭharas takrasaṃbandhāt tatrācaṣṭe yathārthatām // BVaky_2.349 //
analyzed: māṭharaḥ takra saṃbandhāt tatra ācaṣṭe yathārtha tām

original: anekākhyātayoge 'pi vākyaṃ nyāyāpavādayoḥ /
analyzed: aneka ākhyāta yoge pi vākyam nyāya apavādayoḥ

original: ekam eveṣyate kaiś cid bhinnarūpam iva sthitam // BVaky_2.350 //
analyzed: ekam evā iṣyate kaiḥ cit bhinna rūpam iva sthitam

original: niyamaḥ pratiṣedhaś ca vidhiśeṣas tathā sati /
analyzed: niyamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca vidhi śeṣaḥ tathā sati

original: dvitīye yo lug ākhyātas taccheṣam alukaṃ viduḥ // BVaky_2.351 //
analyzed: dvitīye yaḥ luk ākhyātaḥ tad śeṣam alukam viduḥ

original: nirākāṅkṣāṇi nirvṛttau pradhānāni parasparam /
analyzed: nirākāṅkṣāṇi nirvṛttau pradhānāni parasparam

original: teṣām anupakāritvāt kathaṃ syād ekavākyatā // BVaky_2.352 //
analyzed: teṣām anupakāri tvāt katham syāt eka vākya tā

original: viśeṣavidhinārthitvād vākyaśeṣo 'numīyate /
analyzed: viśeṣa vidhinā arthi tvāt vākyaśeṣaḥ numīyate

original: vidheyavan nivartye 'rthe tasmāt tulyaṃ vyapekṣaṇam // BVaky_2.353 //
analyzed: vidheya vat nivartye rthe tasmāt tulyam vyapekṣaṇam

original: saṃjñāśabdaikadeśo yas tasya lopo na vidyate /
analyzed: saṃjñā śabda eka deśaḥ yaḥ tasya lopaḥ na vidyate

original: viśiṣṭarūpā sā saṃjñā kṛtā ca na nivartate // BVaky_2.354 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa rūpā sā saṃjñā kṛtā ca na nivartate

original: saṃjñāntarāc ca dattāder nānyā saṃjñā pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃjñā antarāt ca datta ādeḥ na anyā saṃjñā pratīyate

original: saṃjñinaṃ devadattākhyaṃ dattaśabdaḥ kathaṃ vadet // BVaky_2.355 //
analyzed: saṃjñinam devadatta ākhyam datta śabdaḥ katham vadet

original: sarvair avayavais tulyaṃ saṃbandhaṃ samudāyavat /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ avayavaiḥ tulyam saṃbandham samudāyavat

original: ke cic chabdasvarūpāṇāṃ manyante sarvasaṃjñibhiḥ // BVaky_2.356 //
analyzed: ke cit śabda svarūpāṇām manyante sarva saṃjñibhiḥ

original: varṇānām arthavattvaṃ tu saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñibhir bhavet /
analyzed: varṇānām arthavat tvam tu saṃjñānām saṃjñibhiḥ bhavet

original: saṃbaddho 'vayavaḥ saṃjñā- praviveke na kalpate // BVaky_2.357 //
analyzed: saṃbaddhaḥ vayavaḥ saṃjñā praviveke na kalpate

original: sarvasvarūpair yugapat saṃbandhe sati saṃjñinaḥ /
analyzed: sarva svarūpaiḥ yugapad saṃbandhe sati saṃjñinaḥ

original: naikadeśasarūpebhyas tatpratyāyanasaṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_2.358 //
analyzed: na eka deśa sarūpebhyaḥ tad pratyāyana saṃbhavaḥ

original: ekadeśāt tu saṃghāte keṣāṃ cij jāyate smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: eka deśāt tu saṃghāte keṣām cit jāyate smṛtiḥ

original: smṛtes tu viṣayāc chabdāt saṃghātārthaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_2.359 //
analyzed: smṛteḥ tu viṣayāt śabdāt saṃghāta arthaḥ pratīyate

original: ekadeśāt smṛtir bhinne saṃghāte niyatā katham /
analyzed: eka deśāt smṛtiḥ bhinne saṃghāte niyatā katham

original: kathaṃ pratīyamānaḥ syāc chabdo 'rthasyābhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_2.360 //
analyzed: katham pratīyamānaḥ syāt śabdaḥ rthasya abhidhāyakaḥ

original: ekadeśasarūpās tu tais tair bhedaiḥ samanvitāḥ /
analyzed: eka deśa sarūpāḥ tu taiḥ taiḥ bhedaiḥ samanvitāḥ

original: anuniṣpādinaḥ śabdāḥ saṃjñāsu samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_2.361 //
analyzed: anuniṣpādinaḥ śabdāḥ saṃjñāsu samavasthitāḥ

original: sādhāraṇatvāt saṃdhigdhāḥ sāmarthyān niyatāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: sādhāraṇa tvāt saṃdhigdhāḥ sāmarthyāt niyata āśrayāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ye sādhavas teṣu śāstre lopādi śiṣyate // BVaky_2.362 //
analyzed: teṣām ye sādhavaḥ teṣu śāstre lopa ādi śiṣyate

original: tulyāyām anuniṣpattau jye-drā-ghā ity asādhavaḥ /
analyzed: tulyāyām anuniṣpattau jyedrāghāḥ iti asādhavaḥ

original: na hy anvākhyāyake śāstre teṣu dattādivat smṛtiḥ // BVaky_2.363 //
analyzed: na hi anvākhyāyake śāstre teṣu datta ādi vat smṛtiḥ

original: kṛtaṇatvāś ca ye śabdā nityāḥ kharaṇasādayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta ṇa tvāḥ ca ye śabdāḥ nityāḥ kharaṇasa ādayaḥ

original: ekadravyopadeśitvāt tān sādhūn saṃpracakṣate // BVaky_2.364 //
analyzed: eka dravya upadeśi tvāt tān sādhūn saṃpracakṣate

original: gotrāṇy eva tu tāny āhuḥ saṃjñāśaktisamanvayāt /
analyzed: gotrāṇi eva tu tāni āhuḥ saṃjñā śakti samanvayāt

original: nimittāpekṣaṇaṃ teṣu svārthe nāvaśyam iṣyate // BVaky_2.365 //
analyzed: nimitta apekṣaṇam teṣu sva arthe na avaśyam iṣyate

original: vyavahārāya niyamaḥ saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñini kva cit /
analyzed: vyavahārāya niyamaḥ saṃjñānām saṃjñini kva cit

original: nitya eva tu saṃbandho ḍitthādiṣu gavādivat // BVaky_2.366 //
analyzed: nityaḥ eva tu saṃbandhaḥ ḍittha ādiṣu gavādi vat

original: kṛtakatvād anityatvaṃ saṃbandhasyopapadyate /
analyzed: kṛtaka tvāt anitya tvam saṃbandhasya upapadyate

original: saṃjñāyāṃ sā hi puruṣair yathākāmaṃ niyujyate // BVaky_2.367 //
analyzed: saṃjñāyām sā hi puruṣaiḥ yathākāmam niyujyate

original: yathā hi pāṃsulekhānāṃ bālakair madhukrādayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā hi pāṃsu lekhānām bālakaiḥ madhukra ādayaḥ

original: saṃjñāḥ kriyante sarvāsu saṃjñāsv eṣaiva kalpanā // BVaky_2.368 //
analyzed: saṃjñāḥ kriyante sarvāsu saṃjñāsu eṣā eva kalpanā

original: vṛddhyādīnāṃ ca śāstre 'smiñ chaktyavacchedalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhi ādīnām ca śāstre c śakti avaccheda lakṣaṇaḥ

original: akṛtrimo hi saṃbandho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavat // BVaky_2.369 //
analyzed: akṛtrimaḥ hi saṃbandhaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya vat

original: saṃjñā svarūpam āśritya nimitte sati laukikī /
analyzed: saṃjñā svarūpam āśritya nimitte sati laukikī

original: kā cit pravartate kā cin nimittāsaṃnidhāv api // BVaky_2.370 //
analyzed: kā cit pravartate kā cit nimitta asaṃnidhau api

original: śāstre 'pi mahatī saṃjñā svarūpopanibandhanā /
analyzed: śāstre pi mahatī saṃjñā sva rūpa upanibandhanā

original: anumānaṃ nimittasya saṃnidhāne pratīyate // BVaky_2.371 //
analyzed: anumānam nimittasya saṃnidhāne pratīyate

original: āvṛtter anumānaṃ vā sārūpyāt tatra gamyate /
analyzed: āvṛtteḥ anumānam vā sārūpyāt tatra gamyate

original: śabdabhedānumānaṃ vā śaktibhedasya vā gatiḥ // BVaky_2.372 //
analyzed: śabda bheda anumānam vā śakti bhedasya vā gatiḥ

original: kva cid viṣayabhedena kṛtrimā vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: kva cit viṣaya bhedena kṛtrimā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: saṃkhyāyām ekaviṣayaṃ vyavasthānaṃ dvayor api // BVaky_2.373 //
analyzed: saṃkhyāyām eka viṣayam vyavasthānam dvayoḥ api

original: viṣayaṃ kṛtrimasyāpi laukikaḥ kva cid uccaran /
analyzed: viṣayam kṛtrimasya api laukikaḥ kva cit uccaran

original: vyāpnoti dūrāt saṃbuddhau tathā hi grahaṇaṃ dvayoḥ // BVaky_2.374 //
analyzed: vyāpnoti dūrāt saṃbuddhau tathā hi grahaṇam dvayoḥ

original: saṅghaikaśeṣadvandveṣu ke cit sāmarthyalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: saṅgha eka śeṣa dvandveṣu ke cit sāmarthya lakṣaṇam

original: pratyāśrayam avasthānaṃ kriyāṇāṃ pratijānate // BVaky_2.375 //
analyzed: pratyāśrayam avasthānam kriyāṇām pratijānate

original: bhojanaṃ phalarūpābhyām ekaikasmin samāpyate /
analyzed: bhojanam phala rūpābhyām ekaikasmin samāpyate

original: anyathā hi vyavasthāne na tadarthaḥ prakalpyate // BVaky_2.376 //
analyzed: anyathā hi vyavasthāne na tad arthaḥ prakalpyate

original: annādānādi rūpāṃ ca sarve tṛptiphalāṃ bhujim /
analyzed: anna āda anādi ca sarve tṛpti phalām bhujim

original: pratyekaṃ pratipadyante na tu nāṭyakriyām iva // BVaky_2.377 //
analyzed: pratyekam pratipadyante na tu nāṭya kriyām iva

original: pādyavat sā vibhāgena sāmarthyād avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: pādya vat sā vibhāgena sāmarthyāt avatiṣṭhate

original: bhujiḥ karoti bhujyarthaṃ na tantreṇa pradīpavat // BVaky_2.378 //
analyzed: bhujiḥ karoti bhuji artham na tantreṇa pradīpa vat

original: dṛśyādis tu kriyaikāpi tathābhūteṣu karmasu /
analyzed: dṛśya ādiḥ tu kriyā ekā api tathābhūteṣu karmasu

original: āvṛttim antareṇāpi samudāyāśrayā bhavet // BVaky_2.379 //
analyzed: āvṛttim antareṇa api samudāya āśrayā bhavet

original: bhinnavyāpārarūpāṇāṃ vyavahārādidarśane /
analyzed: bhinna vyāpāra rūpāṇām vyavahāra ādi darśane

original: kartṝṇāṃ darśanaṃ bhinnaṃ saṃbhūyārthasya sādhakam // BVaky_2.380 //
analyzed: kartṝṇām darśanam bhinnam saṃbhūya arthasya sādhakam

original: lakṣyasya lokasiddhatvāc chāstre liṅgasya darśanāt /
analyzed: lakṣyasya loka siddha tvāt śāstre liṅgasya darśanāt

original: arthiṣv ādaikṣu bhedena vṛddhisaṃjñā samāpyate // BVaky_2.381 //
analyzed: arthiṣu bhedena vṛddhi saṃjñā samāpyate

original: śatādānapradhānatvād daṇḍane śatakarmake /
analyzed: śata ādāna pradhāna tvāt daṇḍane śata karmake

original: arthināṃ guṇabhede 'pi saṃkhyeyo 'rtho na bhidyate // BVaky_2.382 //
analyzed: arthinām guṇa bhede saṃkhyeyaḥ rthaḥ na bhidyate

original: saṅghasyaiva vidheyatvāt kāryavat pratipādane /
analyzed: saṅghasya eva vidheya tvāt kārya vat pratipādane

original: tatra tantreṇa saṃbandhaḥ samāsābhyastasaṃjñayoḥ // BVaky_2.383 //
analyzed: tatra tantreṇa saṃbandhaḥ samāsa abhyasta saṃjñayoḥ

original: lakṣaṇārthā śrutir yeṣāṃ kāṃ cid eva kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa arthā śrutiḥ yeṣām kām cit eva kriyām prati

original: tair vyastaiś ca samastaiś ca sa dharma upalakṣyate // BVaky_2.384 //
analyzed: taiḥ vyastaiḥ ca samastaiḥ ca sa dharmaḥ upalakṣyate

original: vṛṣalair na praveṣṭavyam ity etasmin gṛhe yathā /
analyzed: vṛṣalaiḥ na praveṣṭavyam iti etasmin gṛhe yathā

original: pratyekaṃ saṃhatānāṃ ca praveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_2.385 //
analyzed: pratyekam saṃhatānām ca praveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: saṃbhūya tv arthalipsādi- pratiṣedhopadeśane /
analyzed: saṃbhūya tu artha lipsā ādi pratiṣedha upadeśane

original: pṛthag apratiṣiddhatvāt pravṛttir na virudhyate // BVaky_2.386 //
analyzed: pṛthak a pratiṣiddha tvāt pravṛttiḥ na virudhyate

original: vyavāyalakṣaṇārthātvād aṭkupvāṅādibhis tathā /
analyzed: vyavāya lakṣaṇa artha ātvāt a ṭ ku pu āṅ ādibhiḥ tathā

original: pratyekaṃ vā samastair vā ṇatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_2.387 //
analyzed: pratyekam vā samastaiḥ vā ṇa tvam na pratiṣidhyate

original: anugrahārthā bhoktṝṇāṃ bhujir ārabhyate yadā /
analyzed: anugraha arthā bhoktṝṇām bhujiḥ ārabhyate yadā

original: deśakālādyabhedena nānugṛhṇāti tān asau // BVaky_2.388 //
analyzed: deśa kāla ādi abhedena na anugṛhṇāti tān asau

original: pātrādibhedān nānātvaṃ yasyaikasyopadiśyate /
analyzed: pātra ādi bhedāt nānātvam yasya ekasya upadiśyate

original: viparyaye vā bhinnasya tasyaikatvaṃ prakalpyate // BVaky_2.389 //
analyzed: viparyaye vā bhinnasya tasya eka tvam prakalpyate

original: saṃhatyāpi ca kurvāṇā bhedena pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: saṃhatya api ca kurvāṇāḥ bhedena pratipāditāḥ

original: svaṃ svaṃ bhojyaṃ vibhāgena prāptaṃ saṃbhūya bhuñjate // BVaky_2.390 //
analyzed: svam svam bhojyam vibhāgena prāptam saṃbhūya bhuñjate

original: vīpsāyā viṣayābhāvād virodhād anyasaṃkhyayā /
analyzed: vīpsāyāḥ viṣaya abhāvāt virodhāt anya saṃkhyayā

original: dvidhā samāptyayogāc ca śatam saṅghe 'vatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.391 //
analyzed: dvidhā samāpti ayogāt ca śatam saṅghe vatiṣṭhate

original: bhujir dvandvaikaśeṣābhyāṃ yatrānyaiḥ saha śiṣyate /
analyzed: bhujiḥ dvandva ekaśeṣābhyām yatra anyaiḥ saha śiṣyate

original: tatrāpi lakṣaṇārthatvād dvidhā vākyaṃ samāpyate // BVaky_2.392 //
analyzed: tatra api lakṣaṇa artha tvāt dvidhā vākyam samāpyate

original: vākyāntarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ samāptiḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: vākya antarāṇām pratyekam samāptiḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: rūpāntareṇa yuktānāṃ vākyanāṃ tena saṃgrahaḥ // BVaky_2.393 //
analyzed: rūpa antareṇa yuktānām vākyanām tena saṃgrahaḥ

original: na vākyasyābhidheyāni bhedavākyāni kāni cit /
analyzed: na vākyasya abhidheyāni bheda vākyāni kāni cit

original: tasmiṃs tūccarite bhedāṃs tathānyān pratipadyate // BVaky_2.394 //
analyzed: tasmin tu uccarite bhedān tathā anyān pratipadyate

original: yeṣāṃ samasto vākyārthaḥ pratibhedaṃ samāpyate /
analyzed: yeṣām samastaḥ vākya arthaḥ pratibhedam samāpyate

original: teṣāṃ tadānīṃ bhinnasya kiṃ padārthasya sattayā // BVaky_2.395 //
analyzed: teṣām tadānīm bhinnasya kim padārthasya sattayā

original: atha tair eva janitaḥ so 'rtho bhinneṣu vartate /
analyzed: atha taiḥ eva janitaḥ saḥ rthaḥ bhinneṣu vartate

original: pūrvasyārthasya tena syād virodhaḥ saha vā sthitiḥ // BVaky_2.396 //
analyzed: pūrvasya arthasya tena syāt virodhaḥ saha vā sthitiḥ

original: sahasthitau virodhitvaṃ syād viśiṣṭāviśiṣṭayoḥ /
analyzed: saha sthitau virodhi tvam syāt viśiṣṭa aviśiṣṭayoḥ

original: vyabhicārī tu saṃbandhas tyāge 'rthasya prasajyate // BVaky_2.397 //
analyzed: vyabhicārī tu saṃbandhaḥ tyāge rthasya prasajyate

original: ekaḥ sādhāraṇo vācyaḥ pratiśabdam avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ vācyaḥ pratiśabdam avasthitaḥ

original: saṅghe saṅghiṣu cārthātmā samnidhānanideśakaḥ // BVaky_2.398 //
analyzed: saṅghe saṅghiṣu ca artha ātmā samnidhāna nideśakaḥ

original: yathā sādhāraṇe svatvaṃ tyāgasya ca phalaṃ dhane /
analyzed: yathā sādhāraṇe sva tvam tyāgasya ca phalam dhane

original: prītiś cāvikalā tadvat saṃbandho 'rthena tadvatām // BVaky_2.399 //
analyzed: prītiḥ ca avikalā tadvat saṃbandhaḥ rthena tadvatām

original: varṇānām arthavattāyāṃ tenaivārthena tadvati /
analyzed: varṇānām arthavat tāyām tena eva arthena tadvati

original: samudāye na caikatvaṃ bhedena vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.400 //
