analyzed: samudāye na ca eka tvam bhedena vyavatiṣṭhate

original: ekenaiva pradīpena sarve sādhāraṇaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: ekena eva pradīpena sarve sādhāraṇam dhanam

original: paśyanti tadvad ekena supā saṃkhyābhidhīyate // BVaky_2.401 //
analyzed: paśyanti tadvat ekena supā saṃkhyā abhidhīyate

original: nārthavattā pade varṇe vākye caivaṃ viśiṣyate /
analyzed: na arthavat tā pade varṇe vākye ca evam viśiṣyate

original: abhyāsāt prakramo 'nyas tu viruddha iva dṛśyate // BVaky_2.402 //
analyzed: abhyāsāt prakramaḥ tu viruddhaḥ iva dṛśyate

original: viniyogād ṛte śabdo na svārthasya prakāśakaḥ /
analyzed: viniyogāt ṛte śabdaḥ na sva arthasya prakāśakaḥ

original: arthābhidhānasaṃbandham uktidvāraṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_2.403 //
analyzed: artha abhidhāna saṃbandham ukti dvāram pracakṣate

original: yathā praṇihitaṃ cakṣur darśanāyopakalpate /
analyzed: yathā praṇihitam cakṣuḥ darśanāya upakalpate

original: tathābhisaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavaty arthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_2.404 //
analyzed: tathā abhisaṃhitaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati arthasya vācakaḥ

original: kriyāvyavetaḥ saṃbandho dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: kriyā vyavetaḥ saṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ karaṇa karmabhiḥ

original: abhidhāniyamas tasmād abhidhānābhidheyayoḥ // BVaky_2.405 //
analyzed: abhidhā niyamaḥ tasmāt abhidhāna abhidheyayoḥ

original: bahuṣv ekābhidhāneṣu sarveṣv ekārthakāriṣu /
analyzed: bahuṣu eka abhidhāneṣu sarveṣu eka artha kāriṣu

original: yat prayoktābhisaṃdhatte śabdas tatrāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.406 //
analyzed: yat prayoktā abhisaṃdhatte śabdaḥ tatra avatiṣṭhate

original: āmnāyaśabdān abhyāse ke cid āhur anarthakān /
analyzed: āmnāya śabdān abhyāse ke cid āhuḥ anarthakān

original: svarūpamātravṛttīṃś ca pareṣāṃ pratipādane // BVaky_2.407 //
analyzed: sva rūpa mātra vṛttīn ca pareṣām pratipādane

original: abhidhānakriyāyogād arthasya pratipādakān /
analyzed: abhidhāna kriyā yogāt arthasya pratipādakān

original: niyogabhedān manyante tān evaikatvadarśinaḥ // BVaky_2.408 //
analyzed: niyoga bhedān manyante tān eva eka tva darśinaḥ

original: teṣām atyantanānātvaṃ nānātvavyavahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām atyanta nānātvam nānātva vyavahāriṇaḥ

original: akṣādīnām iva prāhur ekajātisamanvayāt // BVaky_2.409 //
analyzed: akṣa ādīnām iva prāhuḥ eka jāti samanvayāt

original: prayogād abhisaṃdhānam anyad eṣu na vidyate /
analyzed: prayogāt abhisaṃdhānam anyat eṣu na vidyate

original: viṣaye yataśaktitvāt sa tu tatra vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_2.410 //
analyzed: viṣaye yata śakti tvāt sa tu tatra vyavasthitaḥ

original: nānātvasyaiva saṃjñānam arthaprakaraṇādibhiḥ /
analyzed: nānātvasya eva saṃjñānam artha prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: na jātv arthāntare vṛttir anyārthānāṃ kathaṃ cana // BVaky_2.411 //
analyzed: na jātu artha antare vṛttiḥ anya arthānām katham cana

original: padarūpam ca yad vākyam astitvopanibandhanam /
analyzed: pada rūpam ca yat vākyam astitva upanibandhanam

original: kāmaṃ vimarśas tatrāyaṃ na vākyāvayave pade // BVaky_2.412 //
analyzed: kāmam vimarśaḥ tatra ayam na vākya avayave pade

original: yathaivānarthakair varṇair viśiṣṭo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: yathā eva anarthakaiḥ varṇaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ bhidhīyate

original: padair anarthakair evaṃ viśiṣṭo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_2.413 //
analyzed: padaiḥ anarthakaiḥ evam viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ bhidhīyate

original: yad antarāle jñānaṃ tu padārtheṣūpajāyate /
analyzed: yat antarāle jñānam tu padārtheṣu upajāyate

original: pratipatter upāyo 'sau prakramānavadhāraṇāt // BVaky_2.414 //
analyzed: pratipatteḥ sau prakrama an avadhāraṇāt

original: pūrvair arthair anugato yathārthātmā paraḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: pūrvaiḥ arthaiḥ anugataḥ yathā artha ātmā paraḥ paraḥ

original: saṃsarga eva prakrāntas tathānyeṣv arthavastuṣu // BVaky_2.415 //
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ eva prakrāntaḥ tathā anyeṣu artha vastuṣu

original: aṅgīkṛte tu keṣāṃ cit sādhyenārthena sādhane /
analyzed: aṅgīkṛte tu keṣām cit sādhyena arthena sādhane

original: ārādhaniyamārthaiva sādhanānāṃ punaḥ śrutiḥ // BVaky_2.416 //
analyzed: ārādha niyama arthā eva sādhanānām punar śrutiḥ

original: ādhāre niyamābhāvāt tadākṣepo na vidyate /
analyzed: ādhāre niyama abhāvāt tad ākṣepaḥ na vidyate

original: sāmarthyāt saṃbhavas tasya śrutis tv anyanivṛttaye // BVaky_2.417 //
analyzed: sāmarthyāt saṃbhavaḥ tasya śrutiḥ tu anya nivṛttaye

original: kriyā kriyāntarād bhinnā niyatādhārasādhanā /
analyzed: kriyā kriyā antarāt bhinnā niyata ādhāra sādhanā

original: prakrāntā pratipattṝṇāṃ bhedāḥ saṃbodhahetavaḥ // BVaky_2.418 //
analyzed: prakrāntā pratipattṝṇām bhedāḥ saṃbodha hetavaḥ

original: avibhāgaṃ tu śabdebhyaḥ kramavadbhyo 'padakramam /
analyzed: avibhāgam tu śabdebhyaḥ padakramam

original: prakāśate tadanyeṣāṃ vākyaṃ vākyārtha eva ca // BVaky_2.419 //
analyzed: prakāśate tad anyeṣām vākyam vākya arthaḥ eva ca

original: svarūpaṃ vidyate yasya tasyātmā na nirūpyate /
analyzed: svarūpam vidyate yasya tasya ātmā na nirūpyate

original: nāsti yasya svarūpaṃ tu tasyaivātmā nirūpyate // BVaky_2.420 //
analyzed: na asti yasya svarūpam tu tasya eva ātmā nirūpyate

original: aśabdam apare 'rthasya rūpanirdhāraṇaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: a śabdam apare rthasya rūpa nirdhāraṇam viduḥ

original: arthāvabhāsarūpā ca śabdebhyo jāyate smṛtiḥ // BVaky_2.421 //
analyzed: artha avabhāsa rūpā ca śabdebhyaḥ jāyate smṛtiḥ

original: anyathaivāgnisaṃbandhād dāhaṃ dagdho 'bhimanyate /
analyzed: anyathā eva agni saṃbandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ bhimanyate

original: anyathā dāhaśabdena dāhārthaḥ saṃpratīyate // BVaky_2.422 //
analyzed: anyathā dāha śabdena dāha arthaḥ saṃpratīyate

original: pṛthaṅniviṣṭatattvānāṃ pṛthagarthānupātinām /
analyzed: pṛthak niviṣṭa tattvānām pṛthak artha anupātinām

original: indriyāṇāṃ yathā kāryam ṛte dehān na kalpate // BVaky_2.423 //
analyzed: indriyāṇām yathā kāryam ṛte dehāt na kalpate

original: tathā padānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthagarthaniveśinām /
analyzed: tathā padānām sarveṣām pṛthak artha niveśinām

original: vākyebhyaḥ pravibhaktānām arthavattā na vidyate // BVaky_2.424 //
analyzed: vākyebhyaḥ pravibhaktānām arthavat tā na vidyate

original: saṃsargarūpaṃ saṃsṛṣṭeṣv arthavastuṣu gṛhyate /
analyzed: saṃsarga rūpam saṃsṛṣṭeṣu artha vastuṣu gṛhyate

original: nātropākhyāyate tattvam apadārthasya darśanāt // BVaky_2.425 //
analyzed: na atra upākhyāyate tattvam a padārthasya darśanāt

original: darśanasyāpi yat satyaṃ na tathā darśanaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: darśanasya api yat satyam na tathā darśanam sthitam

original: vastu saṃsargarūpeṇa tad arūpaṃ nirūpyate // BVaky_2.426 //
analyzed: vastu saṃsarga rūpeṇa tat arūpam nirūpyate

original: astitvenānuṣakto vā nivṛttyātmani vā sthitaḥ /
analyzed: astitvena anuṣaktaḥ vā nivṛttya ātmani vā sthitaḥ

original: artho 'bhidhīyate yasmād ato vākyaṃ prayujyate // BVaky_2.427 //
analyzed: arthaḥ abhidhīyate yasmāt atas vākyam prayujyate

original: kriyānuṣaṅgeṇa vinā na padārthaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: kriyā anuṣaṅgeṇa vinā na padārthaḥ pratīyate

original: satyo vā viparīto vā vyavahāre na so 'sty ataḥ // BVaky_2.428 //
analyzed: satyaḥ vā viparītaḥ vā vyavahāre na saḥ sti atas

original: sad ity etat tu yad vākyaṃ tad abhūd asti neti vā /
analyzed: sat iti etat tu yat vākyam tat abhūt asti na iti vā

original: kriyābhidhānasaṃbandham antareṇa na gamyate // BVaky_2.429 //
analyzed: kriyā abhidhāna saṃbandham antareṇa na gamyate

original: ākhyātapadavācye 'rthe sādhanopanibandhane /
analyzed: ākhyāta pada vācye rthe sādhana upanibandhane

original: vinā sattvābhidhānena nākāṅkṣā vinivartate // BVaky_2.430 //
analyzed: vinā sattva abhidhānena na ākāṅkṣā vinivartate

original: prādhānyāt tu kriyā pūrvam arthasya pravibhajyate /
analyzed: prādhānyāt tu kriyā pūrvam arthasya pravibhajyate

original: sādhyaprayuktāny aṅgāni phalaṃ tasya prayojakam // BVaky_2.431 //
analyzed: sādhya prayuktāni aṅgāni phalam tasya prayojakam

original: prayoktaivābhisaṃdhatte sādhyasādhanarūpatām /
analyzed: prayoktā eva abhisaṃdhatte sādhya sādhana rūpa tām

original: arthasya cābhisaṃbandha- kalpanāṃ prasamīhate // BVaky_2.432 //
analyzed: arthasya ca abhisaṃbandha kalpanām prasamīhate

original: pacikriyāṃ karotīti karmatvenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: paci kriyām karoti iti karma tvena abhidhīyate

original: paktiḥ karaṇarūpaṃ tu sādhyatvena pratīyate // BVaky_2.433 //
analyzed: paktiḥ karaṇa rūpam tu sādhya tvena pratīyate

original: yo 'ṃśo yenopakāreṇa prayoktṝṇāṃ vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ṃśaḥ yena upakāreṇa prayoktṝṇām vivakṣitaḥ

original: arthasya sarvaśaktitvāt sa tathaiva vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_2.434 //
analyzed: arthasya sarva śakti tvāt sa tathā eva vyavasthitaḥ

original: ārādvṛttiṣu saṃbandhaḥ kadā cid abhidhīyate /
analyzed: ārāt vṛttiṣu saṃbandhaḥ kadā cid abhidhīyate

original: āśliṣṭo yo 'nupaśliṣṭaḥ sa kadā cit pratīyate // BVaky_2.435 //
analyzed: āśliṣṭaḥ yaḥ nupaśliṣṭaḥ sa kadā cit pratīyate

original: saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vibhaktatvaṃ saṃsargaś ca vivekinām /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭānām vibhakta tvam saṃsargaḥ ca vivekinām

original: nānātmakānām ekatvaṃ nānātvaṃ ca viparyaye // BVaky_2.436 //
analyzed: nānā ātmakānām eka tvam nānātvam ca viparyaye

original: sarvātmakatvād arthasya nairātmyād vā vyavasthitam /
analyzed: sarva ātmaka tvāt arthasya nairātmyāt vā vyavasthitam

original: atyantayataśaktitvāc chabda eva nibandhanam // BVaky_2.437 //
analyzed: atyanta yata śakti tvāt śabdaḥ eva nibandhanam

original: vastūpalakṣaṇaḥ śabdo nopakārasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: vastu upalakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ na upakārasya vācakaḥ

original: na svaśaktiḥ padārthānāṃ saṃspraṣṭuṃ tena śakyate // BVaky_2.438 //
analyzed: na sva śaktiḥ padārthānām saṃspraṣṭum tena śakyate

original: saṃbandhidharmā saṃyogaḥ svaśabdenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhi dharmā saṃyogaḥ sva śabdena abhidhīyate

original: saṃbandhaḥ samavāyas tu saṃbandhitvena gamyate // BVaky_2.439 //
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ tu saṃbandhi tvena gamyate

original: lakṣaṇād vyavatiṣṭhante padārthā na tu vastutaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣaṇāt vyavatiṣṭhante padārthāḥ na tu vastutas

original: upakārāt sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ cid anugamyate // BVaky_2.440 //
analyzed: upakārāt saḥ evā arthaḥ katham cit anugamyate

original: vākyārtho yo 'bhisaṃbandho na tasyātmā kva cit sthitaḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ yaḥ bhisaṃbandhaḥ na tasya ātmā kva cit sthitaḥ

original: vyavahāre padārthānāṃ tam ātmānaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_2.441 //
analyzed: vyavahāre padārthānām tam ātmānam pracakṣate

original: padārthe samudāye vā samāpto naiva vā kva cit /
analyzed: padārthe samudāye vā samāptaḥ nā eva vā kva cit

original: padārtharūpabhedena tasyātmā pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.442 //
analyzed: padārtha rūpa bhedena tasya ātmā pravibhajyate

original: anvākhyānāya yo bhedaḥ pratipattinibandhanam /
analyzed: anvākhyānāya yaḥ bhedaḥ pratipatti nibandhanam

original: sākāṅkṣāvayavaṃ bhede tenānyad upavarṇyate // BVaky_2.443 //
analyzed: sākāṅkṣa avayavam bhede tena anyat upavarṇyate

original: anekaśakter ekasya pravibhāgo 'nugamyate /
analyzed: aneka śakteḥ ekasya pravibhāgaḥ nugamyate

original: ekārthatvaṃ hi vākyasya mātrayāpi pratīyate // BVaky_2.444 //
analyzed: eka artha tvam hi vākyasya mātrayā api pratīyate

original: saṃpratyayārthād bāhyo 'rthaḥ sann asan vā vibhajyate /
analyzed: saṃpratyaya arthāt bāhyaḥ rthaḥ san asan vā vibhajyate

original: bāhyīkṛtya vibhāgas tu śaktyapoddhāralakṣaṇaḥ // BVaky_2.445 //
analyzed: bāhyīkṛtya vibhāgaḥ tu śakti apoddhāra lakṣaṇaḥ

original: pratyayārthātmaniyatāḥ śaktayo na vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: pratyaya artha ātma niyatāḥ śaktayaḥ na vyavasthitāḥ

original: anyatra ca tato rūpaṃ na tāsām upalabhyate // BVaky_2.446 //
analyzed: anyatra ca tatas rūpam na tāsām upalabhyate

original: bahuśv api tiṅanteṣu sākāṅkṣeṣv ekavākyatā /
analyzed: api tiṅ anteṣu sākāṅkṣeṣu eka vākya tā

original: tiṅā tiṅbhyo nighātasya paryudāsas tathārthavān // BVaky_2.447 //
analyzed: tiṅā tiṅbhyaḥ nighātasya paryudāsaḥ tathā arthavān

original: ekatiṅ yasya vākyaṃ tu śāstre niyatalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: eka tiṅ yasya vākyam tu śāstre niyata lakṣaṇam

original: tasyātiṅgrahaṇenārtho vākyabhedān na vidyate // BVaky_2.448 //
analyzed: tasya a tiṅ grahaṇena arthaḥ vākya bhedāt na vidyate

original: tiṅantāntarayukteṣu yuktayukteṣu vā punaḥ /
analyzed: tiṅ anta antara yukteṣu yukta yukteṣu vā punar

original: mṛgaḥ paśyata yātīti bhedābhedau na tiṣṭhataḥ // BVaky_2.449 //
analyzed: mṛgaḥ paśyata yāti iti bheda abhedau na tiṣṭhataḥ

original: itikartavyatārthasya sāmarthyād yatra kāṅkṣyate /
analyzed: itikartavya tā arthasya sāmarthyāt yatra kāṅkṣyate

original: aśabdalakṣaṇākāṅkṣaṃ samāptārthaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_2.450 //
analyzed: a śabda lakṣaṇa ākāṅkṣam samāpta artham tat ucyate

original: tattvānvākhyānamātre tu yāvān artho 'nuṣajyate /
analyzed: tattva anvākhyāna mātre tu yāvān arthaḥ nuṣajyate

original: vināpi tatprayogeṇa śruter vākyaṃ samāpyate // BVaky_2.451 //
analyzed: vinā api tad prayogeṇa śruteḥ vākyam samāpyate

original: ciṅkramyamāṇo 'dhīṣvātra japaṃś caṅkramaṇaṃ kuru /
analyzed: ciṅkramyamāṇaḥ dhīṣva atra japan caṅkramaṇam kuru

original: tādarthyasyāviśeṣe 'pi śabdād bhedaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_2.452 //
analyzed: tādarthyasya aviśeṣe pi śabdāt bhedaḥ pratīyate

original: phalavantaḥ kriyābhedāḥ kriyāntaranibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: phalavantaḥ kriyā bhedāḥ kriyā antara nibandhanāḥ

original: asaṃkhyātāḥ kramoddeśair ekākhyātanidarśitāḥ // BVaky_2.453 //
analyzed: asaṃkhyātāḥ krama uddeśaiḥ eka ākhyāta nidarśitāḥ

original: nivṛtabhedā sarvaiva kriyākhyāte 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: nivṛta bhedā sarvā eva kriyā ākhyāte bhidhīyate

original: śruter aśakyā bhedānāṃ pravibhāgaprakalpanā // BVaky_2.454 //
analyzed: śruteḥ aśakyā bhedānām pravibhāga prakalpanā

original: aśvamedhena yakṣyante rājānaḥ sattram āsate /
analyzed: aśvamedhena yakṣyante rājānaḥ sattram āsate

original: brāhmaṇā iti nākhyāta- rūpād bhedaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_2.455 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ iti na ākhyāta rūpāt bhedaḥ pratīyate

original: sakṛc chrutā saptadaśasv anāvṛttāpi yā kriyā /
analyzed: sakṛt śrutā saptadaśasu an āvṛttā api yā kriyā

original: prajāpatyeṣu sāmarthyāt sā bhedaṃ pratipadyate // BVaky_2.456 //
analyzed: prajāpatyeṣu sāmarthyāt sā bhedam pratipadyate

original: devadattādiṣu bhujiḥ pratyekam avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: devadatta ādiṣu bhujiḥ pratyekam avatiṣṭhate

original: pratisvatantraṃ vākyaṃ vā bhedena pratipadyate // BVaky_2.457 //
analyzed: prati svatantram vākyam vā bhedena pratipadyate

original: uccāraṇe tu vākyānām anyad rūpaṃ na gṛhyate /
analyzed: uccāraṇe tu vākyānām anyat rūpam na gṛhyate

original: pratipattau tu bhinnānām anyad rūpaṃ pratīyate // BVaky_2.458 //
analyzed: pratipattau tu bhinnānām anyat rūpam pratīyate

original: ekaṃ grahaṇavākyaṃ ca sāmānyenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: ekam grahaṇa vākyam ca sāmānyena abhidhīyate

original: kartarīti yathā tac ca paśvādiṣu vibhajyate // BVaky_2.459 //
analyzed: kartari iti yathā tat ca paśu ādiṣu vibhajyate

original: yadi ākāṅkṣā nivarteta tadbhūtasya sakṛc chrutau /
analyzed: yadi ākāṅkṣā nivarteta tad bhūtasya sakṛt śrutau

original: naivānyenābhisaṃbandhaṃ tad upeyāt kathaṃ cana // BVaky_2.460 //
analyzed: na eva anyena abhisaṃbandham tat upeyāt katham cana

original: ekarūpam anekārthaṃ tasmād upanibandhanam /
analyzed: eka rūpam aneka artham tasmāt upanibandhanam

original: yonir vibhāgavākyānāṃ tebhyo 'nanyad iva sthitam // BVaky_2.461 //
analyzed: yoniḥ vibhāga vākyānām tebhyaḥ na anyat iva sthitam

original: kva cit kriyā vyaktibhāgair upakāre pravartate /
analyzed: kva cit kriyā vyakti bhāgaiḥ upakāre pravartate

original: sāmānyabhāga evāsyāḥ kva cid arthasya sādhakaḥ // BVaky_2.462 //
analyzed: sāmānya bhāgaḥ eva asyāḥ kva cit arthasya sādhakaḥ

original: kālabhinnāś ca ye bhedā ye cāpy uṣṭrāsikādiṣu /
analyzed: kāla bhinnāḥ ca ye bhedāḥ ye ca api uṣṭra asika ādiṣu

original: prakrame jātibhāgasya śabdātmā tair na bhidyate // BVaky_2.463 //
analyzed: prakrame jāti bhāgasya śabda ātmā taiḥ na bhidyate

original: ekasaṃkhyeṣu bhedeṣu bhinnā jātyādibhiḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: eka saṃkhyeṣu bhedeṣu bhinnāḥ jāti ādibhiḥ kriyāḥ

original: bhedena viniyujyante tacchabdasya sakṛc chrutau // BVaky_2.464 //
analyzed: bhedena viniyujyante tad śabdasya sakṛt śrutau

original: akṣādeṣu yathā bhinnā bhakṣibhañjidivikriyāḥ /
analyzed: akṣa ādeṣu yathā bhinnāḥ bhakṣi bhañji divi kriyāḥ

original: prayogakālābhede 'pi pratibhedaṃ pṛthak sthitāḥ // BVaky_2.465 //
analyzed: prayoga kāla abhede pi pratibhedam pṛthak sthitāḥ

original: akṣiṇāṃ tantriṇāṃ tantram upāyas tulyarūpatā /
analyzed: akṣiṇām tantriṇām tantram upāyaḥ tulya rūpa tā

original: eṣāṃ kramo vibhaktānāṃ tannibaddhā sakṛc chrutiḥ // BVaky_2.466 //
analyzed: eṣām kramaḥ vibhaktānām tad nibaddhā sakṛt śrutiḥ

original: dvāv apy upāyau śabdānāṃ prayoge samavasthitau /
analyzed: dvau api upāyau śabdānām prayoge samavasthitau

original: kramo vā yaugapadyaṃ vā yau loko nātivartate // BVaky_2.467 //
analyzed: kramaḥ vā yaugapadyam vā yau lokaḥ na ativartate

original: krame vibhajyate rūpaṃ yaugapadye na bhidyate /
analyzed: krame vibhajyate rūpam yaugapadye na bhidyate

original: kriyā tu yaugapadye 'pi kramarūpānupātinī // BVaky_2.468 //
analyzed: kriyā tu yaugapadye krama rūpa anupātinī

original: bhedasaṃsargaśaktī dve śabdād bhinne iva sthite /
analyzed: bheda saṃsarga śaktī dve śabdāt bhinne iva sthite

original: yaugapadye 'py anekena prayoge bhidyate śrutiḥ // BVaky_2.469 //
analyzed: yaugapadye pi anekena prayoge bhidyate śrutiḥ

original: abhinno rūpabhedena ya eko 'rtho vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: abhinnaḥ rūpa bhedena yaḥ ekaḥ rthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: tasyāvayavadharmeṇa samudāyo 'nugamyate // BVaky_2.470 //
analyzed: tasya avayava dharmeṇa samudāyaḥ nugamyate

original: bhedanirvacane tv asya pratyedaṃ vā samāpyate /
analyzed: bheda nirvacane tu asya pratyedam vā samāpyate

original: śrutir vacanabhinnā vā vākyabhede 'vatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.471 //
analyzed: śrutiḥ vacana bhinnā vā vākya bhede vatiṣṭhate

original: tatraikavacanānto vā so 'kṣaśabdaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: tatra ekavacana antaḥ vā saḥ kṣa śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: pratyekaṃ vā bahutvena pravibhāgo yathāśruti // BVaky_2.472 //
analyzed: pratyekam vā bahu tvena pravibhāgaḥ yathāśruti

original: dviṣṭhāni yāni vākyāni teṣv apy ekatvadarśinām /
analyzed: dviṣṭhāni yāni vākyāni teṣu api eka tva darśinām

original: anekaśakter ekasya svaśaktiḥ pravibhajyate // BVaky_2.473 //
analyzed: aneka śakteḥ ekasya sva śaktiḥ pravibhajyate

original: atyantabhinnayor vā syāt prayoge tantralakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: atyanta bhinnayoḥ vā syāt prayoge tantra lakṣaṇaḥ

original: upāyas tatra saṃsargaḥ pratipattṛṣu bhidyate // BVaky_2.474 //
analyzed: upāyaḥ tatra saṃsargaḥ pratipattṛṣu bhidyate

original: bhedenādhigatau pūrvaṃ śabdau tulyaśrutī punaḥ /
analyzed: bhedena adhigatau pūrvam śabdau tulya śrutī punar

original: tantreṇa pratipattāraḥ prayoktrā pratipāditāḥ // BVaky_2.475 //
analyzed: tantreṇa pratipattāraḥ prayoktrā pratipāditāḥ

original: ekasyāpi vivakṣāyām anuniṣpadyate paraḥ /
analyzed: ekasya api vivakṣāyām anuniṣpadyate paraḥ

original: vinābhisaṃdhinā śabdaḥ śaktirūpaḥ prakāśate // BVaky_2.476 //
analyzed: vinā abhisaṃdhinā śabdaḥ śakti rūpaḥ prakāśate

original: anekā śaktir ekasya yugapac chrūyate kva cit /
analyzed: anekā śaktiḥ ekasya yugapad śrūyate kva cit

original: agniḥ prakāśadāhābhyām ekatrāpi niyujyate // BVaky_2.477 //
analyzed: agniḥ prakāśa dāhābhyām ekatra api niyujyate

original: āvṛttiśaktibhinnārthe vākye sakṛd api śrute /
analyzed: āvṛtti śakti bhinna arthe vākye sakṛt api śrute

original: liṅgād vā tantradharmād vā vibhāgo vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_2.478 //
analyzed: liṅgāt vā tantra dharmāt vā vibhāgaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate

original: saṃprasāraṇasaṃjñāyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ varṇavākyayoḥ /
analyzed: saṃprasāraṇa saṃjñāyām liṅgābhyām varṇa vākyayoḥ

original: pravibhāgas tathā sūtra ekasminn eva jāyate // BVaky_2.479 //
analyzed: pravibhāgaḥ tathā sūtre ekasmin eva jāyate

original: tathā dvirvacane 'cīti tantropāyād alakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tathā dvirvacane ci iti tantra upāyāt alakṣaṇaḥ

original: ekaśeṣeṇa nirdeśo bhāṣya eva pradarśitaḥ // BVaky_2.480 //
analyzed: eka śeṣeṇa nirdeśaḥ bhāṣye eva pradarśitaḥ

original: prāyeṇa saṃkṣeparucīn alpavidyāparigrahān /
analyzed: prāyeṇa saṃkṣepa rucīn alpa vidyā parigrahān

original: saṃprāpya vaiyākaraṇān saṃgrahe 'stam upāgate // BVaky_2.481 //
analyzed: saṃprāpya vaiyākaraṇān saṃgrahe stam upāgate

original: kṛte 'tha pātañjalinā guruṇā tīrthadarśinā /
analyzed: kṛte pātañjalinā guruṇā tīrtha darśinā

original: sarvesaṃ nyāyabījānāṃ mahābhāṣye nibandhane // BVaky_2.482 //
analyzed: nyāya bījānām mahābhāṣye nibandhane

original: alabdhagādhe gāmbhīryād uttāna iva sauṣṭhavāt /
analyzed: a labdha gādhe gāmbhīryāt uttānaḥ iva sauṣṭhavāt

original: tasminn akṛtabuddhīnām naivāvāsthita niścayaḥ // BVaky_2.483 //
analyzed: tasmin akṛtabuddhīnām na eva avāsthita niścayaḥ

original: vaijisaubhavaharyakṣaiḥ śuṣkatarkānusāribhiḥ /
analyzed: vaiji saubhava haryakṣaiḥ śuṣka tarka anusāribhiḥ

original: ārṣe viplāvite granthe saṃgrahapratikañcuke // BVaky_2.484 //
analyzed: ārṣe viplāvite granthe saṃgraha prati kañcuke

original: yaḥ pātañjaliśiṣyebhyo bhraṣṭo vyākaraṇāgamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pātañjali śiṣyebhyaḥ bhraṣṭaḥ vyākaraṇa āgamaḥ

original: kālena dākṣiṇātyeṣu granthamātro vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_2.485 //
analyzed: kālena dākṣiṇātyeṣu grantha mātraḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: parvatād āgamaṃ labdhvā bhāṣyabījānusāribhiḥ /
analyzed: parvatāt āgamam labdhvā bhāṣya bīja anusāribhiḥ

original: sa nīto bahuśākhatvaṃ cāndrācāryādibhiḥ punaḥ // BVaky_2.486 //
analyzed: sa nītaḥ bahu śākha tvam cāndra ācārya ādibhiḥ punar

original: nyāyaprasthānamārgāṃs tān abhyasya svam ca darśanam /
analyzed: nyāya prasthāna mārgān tān abhyasya svam ca darśanam

original: praṇīto guruṇāsmākam ayam āgamasaṃgrahaḥ // BVaky_2.487 //
analyzed: praṇītaḥ guruṇā asmākam ayam āgama saṃgrahaḥ

original: vartmanām atra keṣām cid vastumātram udāhṛtam /
analyzed: vartmanām atra keṣām cit vastu mātram udāhṛtam

original: kāṇḍe tṛtīye nyakṣena bhaviṣyati vicāraṇā // BVaky_2.488 //
analyzed: kāṇḍe tṛtīye nyakṣena bhaviṣyati vicāraṇā

original: prajñā vivekaṃ labhate bhinnair āgamadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: prajñā vivekam labhate bhinnaiḥ āgama darśanaiḥ

original: kiyad vā śakyam unnetuṃ svatarkam anudhāvatā // BVaky_2.489 //
analyzed: kiyat vā śakyam unnetum sva tarkam anudhāvatā

original: tat tad utprekṣamāṇānāṃ purāṇair āgamair vinā /
analyzed: tat tat utprekṣamāṇānām purāṇaiḥ āgamaiḥ vinā

original: anupāsitavṛddhānāṃ vidyā nātiprasīdati // BVaky_2.490 //
analyzed: anupāsita vṛddhānām vidyā na atiprasīdati

original: 3,1: Jātisamuddeśa
analyzed: jāti samuddeśa

original: dvidhā kaiś cit padaṃ bhinnaṃ caturdhā pañcadhāpi vā /
analyzed: dvidhā kaiḥ cit padam bhinnam caturdhā pañcadhā api vā

original: apoddhṛtyaiva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratyayādivat // BVaky_3,1.1 //
analyzed: apoddhṛtya eva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛti pratyaya ādi vat

original: padārthānām apoddhāre jātir vā dravyam eva vā /
analyzed: padārthānām apoddhāre jātiḥ vā dravyam eva vā

original: padārthau sarvaśabdānāṃ nityāv evopavarṇitau // BVaky_3,1.2 //
analyzed: padārthau sarva śabdānām nityau eva upavarṇitau

original: keṣāṃ cit sāhacaryeṇa jātiḥ śaktyupalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: keṣām cit sāhacaryeṇa jātiḥ śakti upalakṣaṇam

original: khadirādiṣv aśakteṣu śaktaḥ pratinidhīyate // BVaky_3,1.3 //
analyzed: khadira ādiṣu a śakteṣu śaktaḥ pratinidhīyate

original: asvātantryaphalo bandhiḥ pramāṇādīva śiṣyate /
analyzed: asvātantrya phalaḥ bandhiḥ pramāṇāt iva śiṣyate

original: ato jātyabhidhāne 'pi śaktihīnaṃ na gṛhyate // BVaky_3,1.4 //
analyzed: atas jāti abhidhāne śakti hīnam na gṛhyate

original: saṃśleṣamātraṃ badhnātir yadi syāt tu vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśleṣa mātram badhnātiḥ yadi syāt tu vivakṣitaḥ

original: śaktyāśraye tato liṅgaṃ pramāṇādyanuśāsanam // BVaky_3,1.5 //
analyzed: śakti āśraye tatas liṅgam pramāṇa ādi anuśāsanam

original: svā jātiḥ prathamaṃ śabdaiḥ sarvair evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: svā jātiḥ prathamam śabdaiḥ sarvaiḥ evā abhidhīyate

original: tato 'rthajātirūpeṣu tadadhyāropakalpanā // BVaky_3,1.6 //
analyzed: tatas ṛtha jāti rūpeṣu tad adhyāropa kalpanā

original: yathā rakte guṇe tattvaṃ kaṣāye vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: yathā rakte guṇe tattvam kaṣāye vyapadiśyate

original: saṃyogisannikarṣāc ca vastrādiṣv api gṛhyate // BVaky_3,1.7 //
analyzed: saṃyogi sannikarṣāt ca vastra ādiṣu api gṛhyate

original: tathā śabdārthasaṃbandhāc chabde jātir avasthitā /
analyzed: tathā śabda artha saṃbandhāt śabde jātiḥ avasthitā

original: vyapadeśe 'rthajātīnāṃ jātikāryāya kalpate // BVaky_3,1.8 //
analyzed: vyapadeśe rtha jātīnām jāti kāryāya kalpate

original: jātiśabdaikaśeṣe sā jātīnāṃ jātir iṣyate /
analyzed: jāti śabda ekaśeṣe sā jātīnām jātiḥ iṣyate

original: śabdajātaya ity atra tajjātiḥ śabdajātiṣu // BVaky_3,1.9 //
analyzed: śabda jātayaḥ iti atra tad jātiḥ śabda jātiṣu

original: yā śabdajātiḥ śabdeṣu śabdebhyo bhinnalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: yā śabda jātiḥ śabdeṣu śabdebhyaḥ bhinna lakṣaṇā

original: jātiḥ sā śabdajātitvam avyatikramya vartate // BVaky_3,1.10 //
analyzed: jātiḥ sā śabda jāti tvam a vyatikramya vartate

original: arthajātyabhidhāne 'pi sarve jātyabhidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: artha jāti abhidhāne sarve jāti abhidhāyinaḥ

original: vyāpāralakṣaṇā yasmāt padārthāḥ samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,1.11 //
analyzed: vyāpāra lakṣaṇāḥ yasmāt padārthāḥ samavasthitāḥ

original: jātau padārthe jātir vā viśeṣo vāpi jātivat /
analyzed: jātau padārthe jātiḥ vā viśeṣaḥ vā api jāti vat

original: śabdair apekṣyate yasmād atas te jātivācinaḥ // BVaky_3,1.12 //
analyzed: śabdaiḥ apekṣyate yasmāt atas te jāti vācinaḥ

original: dravyadharmā padārthe tu dravye sarvo 'rtha ucyate /
analyzed: dravya dharmā padārthe tu dravye sarvaḥ rthaḥ ucyate

original: dravyadharmāśrayād dravyam ataḥ sarvo 'rtha iṣyate // BVaky_3,1.13 //
analyzed: dravya dharma āśrayāt dravyam atas sarvaḥ rthaḥ iṣyate

original: anupravṛttidharmo vā jātiḥ syāt sarvajātiṣu /
analyzed: anupravṛtti dharmaḥ vā jātiḥ syāt sarva jātiṣu

original: vyāvṛttidharmasāmānyaṃ viśeṣe jātir iṣyate // BVaky_3,1.14 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtti dharma sāmānyam viśeṣe jātiḥ iṣyate

original: saṃyogidharmabhedena deśe ca parikalpite /
analyzed: saṃyogi dharma bhedena deśe ca parikalpite

original: teṣu deśeṣu sāmānyam ākāśasyāpi vidyate // BVaky_3,1.15 //
analyzed: teṣu deśeṣu sāmānyam ākāśasya api vidyate

original: adeśānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ deśāḥ saṃbandhino yathā /
analyzed: adeśānām ghaṭa ādīnām deśāḥ saṃbandhinaḥ yathā

original: ākāśasyāpy adeśasya deśāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā // BVaky_3,1.16 //
analyzed: ākāśasya api adeśasya deśāḥ saṃbandhinaḥ tathā

original: bhinnavastvāśrayā buddhiḥ saṃyogiṣv anuvartate /
analyzed: bhinna vastu āśrayā buddhiḥ saṃyogiṣu anuvartate

original: samavāyiṣu bhedasya grahaṇaṃ vinivartate // BVaky_3,1.17 //
analyzed: samavāyiṣu bhedasya grahaṇam vinivartate

original: ataḥ saṃyogideśānāṃ gauṇatvaṃ parikalpyate /
analyzed: atas saṃyogi deśānām gauṇa tvam parikalpyate

original: avivekāt pradeśebhyo mukhyatvaṃ samavāyinām // BVaky_3,1.18 //
analyzed: avivekāt pradeśebhyaḥ mukhya tvam samavāyinām

original: anupravṛttirūpā yā prakhyā tām ākṛtiṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: anupravṛtti rūpā yā prakhyā tām ākṛtim viduḥ

original: ke cid vyāvṛttirūpāṃ tu dravyatvena pracakṣate // BVaky_3,1.19 //
analyzed: ke cit vyāvṛtti rūpām tu dravya tvena pracakṣate

original: bhinnā iti paropādhir abhinnā iti vā punaḥ /
analyzed: bhinnāḥ iti para upādhiḥ abhinnāḥ iti vā punar

original: bhāvātmasu prapañco 'yaṃ saṃsṛṣṭeṣv eva jāyate // BVaky_3,1.20 //
analyzed: bhāva ātmasu prapañcaḥ yam saṃsṛṣṭeṣu eva jāyate

original: naikatvaṃ nāpi nānātvaṃ na sattvam na ca nāstitā /
analyzed: na ekatvam na api nānātvam na sattvam na ca nāstitā

original: ātmatattveṣu bhāvānām asaṃsṛṣṭeṣu vidyate // BVaky_3,1.21 //
analyzed: ātma tattveṣu bhāvānām asaṃsṛṣṭeṣu vidyate

original: sarvaśaktyātmabhūtatvaṃ ekasyaiveti nirṇaye /
analyzed: sarva śakti ātma bhūta tvam ekasya eva iti nirṇaye

original: bhāvānām ātmabhedasya kalpanā syād anarthikā // BVaky_3,1.22 //
analyzed: bhāvānām ātma bhedasya kalpanā syāt anarthikā

original: tasmād dravyādayaḥ sarvāḥ śaktayo bhinnalakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dravya ādayaḥ sarvāḥ śaktayaḥ bhinna lakṣaṇāḥ

original: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ puruṣārthasya sādhikā na tu kevalāḥ // BVaky_3,1.23 //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ puruṣa arthasya sādhikāḥ na tu kevalāḥ

original: yathaiva cendriyādīnām ātmabhūtā samagratā /
analyzed: yathā eva ca indriya ādīnām ātma bhūtā samagra tā

original: tathā saṃbandhisaṃbandha- saṃsarge 'pi pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.24 //
analyzed: tathā saṃbandhi saṃbandha saṃsarge pi pratīyate

original: na tad utpadyate kiṃ cid yasya jātir na vidyate /
analyzed: na tat utpadyate kim cit yasya jātiḥ na vidyate

original: ātmābhivyaktaye jātiḥ kāraṇānāṃ prayojikā // BVaky_3,1.25 //
analyzed: ātma abhivyaktaye jātiḥ kāraṇānām prayojikā

original: kāraṇeṣu padaṃ kṛtvā nityānityeṣu jātayaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇeṣu padam kṛtvā nitya anityeṣu jātayaḥ

original: kva cit kāryeṣv abhivyaktim upayānti punaḥ punaḥ // BVaky_3,1.26 //
analyzed: kva cit kāryeṣu abhivyaktim upayānti punar punar

original: nirvarttyamānaṃ yat karma jātis tatrāpi sādhanam /
analyzed: nirvarttyamānam yat karma jātiḥ tatra api sādhanam

original: svāśrayasyābhiniṣpattyai sā kriyāṇāṃ prayojikā // BVaky_3,1.27 //
analyzed: sva āśrayasya abhiniṣpattyai sā kriyāṇām prayojikā

original: vidhau vā pratiṣedhe vā brāhmaṇatvādi sādhanam /
analyzed: vidhau vā pratiṣedhe vā brāhmaṇa tva ādi sādhanam

original: vyaktyāśritāsritā jāteḥ saṃkhyājātir viśeṣikā // BVaky_3,1.28 //
yathā jalādibhir vyaktaṃ mukham evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: yathā jala ādibhiḥ vyaktam mukham eva abhidhīyate

original: tathā dravyair abhivyaktā jātir evābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,1.29 //
analyzed: tathā dravyaiḥ abhivyaktā jātiḥ eva abhidhīyate

original: yathendriyagato bheda indriyagrahaṇād ṛte /
analyzed: yathā indriya gataḥ bhedaḥ indriya grahaṇāt ṛte

original: indriyārtheṣv adṛśyo 'pi jñānabhedāya kalpate // BVaky_3,1.30 //
analyzed: indriya artheṣu adṛśyaḥ u pi jñāna bhedāya kalpate

original: tathātmarūpagrahaṇāt keṣāṃ cid vyaktayo vinā /
analyzed: tathā ātma rūpa grahaṇāt keṣām cit vyaktayaḥ vinā

original: sāmānyajñānabhedānām upayānti nimittatām // BVaky_3,1.31 //
analyzed: sāmānya jñāna bhedānām upayānti nimitta tām

original: satyāsatyau tu yau bhāgau pratibhāvaṃ vyavasthitau /
analyzed: satya asatyau tu yau bhāgau pratibhāvam vyavasthitau

original: satyaṃ yat tatra sā jātir asatyā vyaktayaḥ smṛtāḥ // BVaky_3,1.32 //
analyzed: satyam yat tatra sā jātiḥ asatyāḥ vyaktayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: saṃbandhibhedāt sattaiva bhidyamānā gavādiṣu /
analyzed: saṃbandhi bhedāt sattā eva bhidyamānā gavā ādiṣu

original: jātir ity ucyate tasyāṃ sarve śabdā vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,1.33 //
analyzed: jātiḥ iti ucyate tasyām sarve śabdāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: tāṃ prātipadikārthaṃ ca dhātvarthaṃ ca pracakṣate /
analyzed: tām prātipadika artham ca dhātvartham ca pracakṣate

original: sā nityā sā mahān ātmā tām āhus tvatalādayaḥ // BVaky_3,1.34 //
analyzed: sā nityā sā mahān ātmā tām āhuḥ

original: prāptakramā viśeṣeṣu kriyā saivābhidhīyate /
analyzed: prāpta kramā viśeṣeṣu kriyā sā eva abhidhīyate

original: kramarūpasya saṃhāre tat sattvam iti kathyate // BVaky_3,1.35 //
analyzed: krama rūpasya saṃhāre tat sattvam iti kathyate

original: saiva bhāvavikāreṣu ṣaḍ avasthāḥ prapadyate /
analyzed: sā eva bhāva vikāreṣu ṣaḍ avasthāḥ prapadyate

original: krameṇa śaktibhiḥ svābhir evaṃ pratyavabhāsate // BVaky_3,1.36 //
analyzed: krameṇa śaktibhiḥ svābhiḥ evam pratyavabhāsate

original: ātmabhūtaḥ kramo 'py asyā yatredaṃ kāladarśanam /
analyzed: ātma bhūtaḥ asyāḥ yatra idam kāla darśanam

original: paurvāparyādirūpeṇa pravibhaktam iva sthitam // BVaky_3,1.37 //
analyzed: paurvāparya ādi rūpeṇa pravibhaktam iva sthitam

original: tirobhāvābhyupagame bhāvānāṃ saiva nāstitā /
analyzed: tirobhāva abhyupagame bhāvānām sā eva nāstitā

original: labdhakrame tirobhāve naśyatīti pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.38 //
analyzed: labdha krame tirobhāve naśyati iti pratīyate

original: pūrvasmāt pracyutā dharmād aprāptā cottaraṃ padam /
analyzed: pūrvasmāt pracyutā dharmāt aprāptā ca uttaram padam

original: tadantarāle bhedānām āśrayāj janma kathyate // BVaky_3,1.39 //
analyzed: tad antarāle bhedānām āśrayāt janma kathyate

original: āśrayaḥ svātmamātrā vā bhāvā vā vyatirekinaḥ /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ sva ātma mātrāḥ vā bhāvāḥ vā vyatirekinaḥ

original: svaśaktayo vā sattāyā bhedadarśanahetavaḥ // BVaky_3,1.40 //
analyzed: sva śaktayaḥ vā sattāyāḥ bheda darśana hetavaḥ

original: pṛthivyādiṣv abhivyaktau na saṃsthānam apekṣate /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādiṣu abhivyaktau na saṃsthānam apekṣate

original: anucchinnāśrayāj jātir anitye 'py āśraye sthitā // BVaky_3,1.41 //
analyzed: an ucchinna āśrayāt jātiḥ anitye pi āśraye sthitā

original: anucchedyāśrayām eke sarvāṃ jātiṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: anucchedya āśrayām eke sarvām jātim pracakṣate

original: na yaugapadyaṃ pralaye sarvasyeti vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,1.42 //
analyzed: na yaugapadyam pralaye sarvasya iti vyavasthitāḥ

original: prakṛtau pravilīneṣu bhedeṣv ekatvadarśinām /
analyzed: prakṛtau pravilīneṣu bhedeṣu eka tva darśinām

original: dravyasattvaṃ prapadyante svāśrayā eva jātayaḥ // BVaky_3,1.43 //
analyzed: dravya sattvam prapadyante sva āśrayāḥ eva jātayaḥ

original: brāhmaṇatvādayo bhāvāḥ sarvaprāṇiṣv avasthitāḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa tva ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ sarva prāṇiṣu avasthitāḥ

original: abhivyaktāḥ svakāryāṇāṃ sādhakā ity api smṛtiḥ // BVaky_3,1.44 //
analyzed: abhivyaktāḥ sva kāryāṇām sādhakāḥ iti api smṛtiḥ

original: citrādiṣv apy abhivyaktir jātīnāṃ kaiścid iṣyate /
analyzed: citra ādiṣu api abhivyaktiḥ jātīnām kaiścid iṣyate

original: prāṇyāśritās tu tāḥ prāptau nimittaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ // BVaky_3,1.45 //
analyzed: prāṇi āśritāḥ tu tāḥ prāptau nimittam puṇya pāpayoḥ

original: jñānaṃ tv asmad viśiṣṭānāṃ tāsu sarvendriyam viduḥ /
analyzed: jñānam tu asmat viśiṣṭānām tāsu sarva indriyam viduḥ

original: ābhyāsān maṇirūpyādi- viśeṣeṣv iva tadvidām // BVaky_3,1.46 //
analyzed: ā abhyāsāt maṇi rūpya ādi viśeṣeṣu iva tad vidām

original: jātyutpalādigandhādau bhedatattvaṃ yad āśritam /
analyzed: jāti utpala ādi gandha ādau bheda tattvam yat āśritam

original: tad bhāvapratyayair loke 'nityatvān nābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,1.47 //
analyzed: tat bhāva pratyayaiḥ loke nitya tvāt na abhidhīyate

original: asvaśabdābhidhānās tu narasiṃhādijātayaḥ /
analyzed: a sva śabda abhidhānāḥ tu narasiṃha ādi jātayaḥ

original: sarūpāvayavevānyā tāsu śrutir avasthitā // BVaky_3,1.48 //
analyzed: sarūpa avayavā iva anyā tāsu śrutiḥ avasthitā

original: jātyavasthāparicchede saṃkhyā saṃkhyātvam eva vā /
analyzed: jāti avasthā paricchede saṃkhyā saṃkhyā tvam eva vā

original: viprakarṣe 'pi saṃsargād upakārāya kalpate // BVaky_3,1.49 //
analyzed: viprakarṣe pi saṃsargāt upakārāya kalpate

original: lakṣaṇā śabdasaṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kāryasiddhaye /
analyzed: lakṣaṇā śabda saṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kārya siddhaye

original: saṃkhyākarmādiśaktīnāṃ śrutisāmye 'pi dṛśyate // BVaky_3,1.50 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā karma ādi śaktīnām śruti sāmye dṛśyate

original: na vinā saṃkhyayā kaś cit sattvabhūto 'rtha ucyate /
analyzed: na vinā saṃkhyayā kaḥ cit sattva bhūtaḥ rthaḥ ucyate

original: ataḥ sarvasya nirdeśe saṃkhyā syād avivakṣitā // BVaky_3,1.51 //
analyzed: atas sarvasya nirdeśe saṃkhyā syāt avivakṣitā

original: ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā keṣāṃ cid avivakṣitam /
analyzed: ekatvam vā bahutvam vā keṣām cit avivakṣitam

original: tad dhi jātyabhidhānāya dvitvaṃ tu syād vivakṣitam // BVaky_3,1.52 //
analyzed: tat hi jāti abhidhānāya dvi tvam tu syāt vivakṣitam

original: yady etau vyādhitau syātāṃ deyaṃ syād idam auṣadham /
analyzed: yadi etau vyādhitau syātām deyam syāt idam auṣadham

original: ity evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'rthasya dvitvaṃ syād avivakṣitam // BVaky_3,1.53 //
analyzed: iti evam lakṣaṇe rthasya dvi tvam syāt avivakṣitam

original: ekādiśabdavācyāyāḥ karmasv aṅgatvam iṣyate /
analyzed: eka ādi śabda vācyāyāḥ karmasu aṅga tvam iṣyate

original: saṃkhyāyāḥ khanati dvābhyām iti rūpād dhi sāśritā // BVaky_3,1.54 //
analyzed: saṃkhyāyāḥ khanati dvābhyām iti rūpāt hi sā āśritā

original: yajeta paśunety atra saṃskārasyāpi saṃbhave /
analyzed: yajeta paśunā iti atra saṃskārasya api saṃbhave

original: yathā jātis tathaikatvaṃ sādhanatvena gamyate // BVaky_3,1.55 //
analyzed: yathā jātiḥ tathā ekatvam sādhana tvena gamyate

original: liṅgāt tu syāt dvitīyādes tad ekatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
analyzed: liṅgāt tu syāt dvitīya ādeḥ tat eka tvam vivakṣitam

original: ekārthaviṣayatve ca tal liṅgaṃ jātisaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,1.56 //
analyzed: eka artha viṣaya tve ca tat liṅgam jāti saṃkhyayoḥ

original: anyatrāvihitasyaiva sa vidhiḥ prathamaṃ paśoḥ /
analyzed: anyatra a vihitasya eva sa vidhiḥ prathamam paśoḥ

original: kriyāyām aṅgabhāvaś ca tat tv etasmād vivakṣitam // BVaky_3,1.57 //
analyzed: kriyāyām aṅga bhāvaḥ ca tat tu etasmāt vivakṣitam

original: grahās tv anyatra vihitā bhinnasaṃkhyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: grahāḥ tu anyatra vihitāḥ bhinna saṃkhyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: prājāpatyā navety evam- ādibhedasamanvitāḥ // BVaky_3,1.58 //
analyzed: prājāpatyāḥ nava iti evam ādi bheda samanvitāḥ

original: aṅgatvena pratītānāṃ saṃmārge tv aṅgināṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga tvena pratītānām saṃmārge tu aṅginām punar

original: nirdeśaṃ prati yā saṃkhyā sā kathaṃ syād vivakṣitā // BVaky_3,1.59 //
analyzed: nirdeśam prati yā saṃkhyā sā katham syāt vivakṣitā

original: nānyatra vidhir astīti saṃskāro nāpi cāṅgitā /
analyzed: na anyatra vidhiḥ asti iti saṃskāraḥ nā api ca aṅgi tā

original: hetuḥ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyā yatnāt sā hi vivakṣitā // BVaky_3,1.60 //
analyzed: hetuḥ saṃkhyā vivakṣāyāḥ yatnāt sā hi vivakṣitā

original: saṃmārjane viśeṣaś ca na grahe kva cid āśritaḥ /
analyzed: saṃmārjane viśeṣaḥ ca na grahe kva cit āśritaḥ

original: vihitās te ca saṃskāryāḥ sarveṣām āśrayas tataḥ // BVaky_3,1.61 //
analyzed: vihitāḥ te ca saṃskāryāḥ sarveṣām āśrayaḥ tatas

original: pratyāśrayaṃ samāptāyāṃ jātāv ekena cet kriyā /
analyzed: pratyāśrayam samāptāyām jātau ekena ced kriyā

original: paśunā na prakalpeta tat syād eva prakalpanam // BVaky_3,1.62 //
analyzed: paśunā na prakalpeta tat syāt eva prakalpanam

original: ekena ca prasiddhāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ yadi saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: ekena ca prasiddhāyām kriyāyām yadi saṃbhavāt

original: paśvantaram upādeyam upādānam anarthakam // BVaky_3,1.63 //
analyzed: paśu antaram upādeyam upādānam anarthakam

original: yathaivāhitagarbhāyāṃ garbhādhānām anarthakam /
analyzed: yathā eva āhitagarbhāyām garbha ādhānām anarthakam

original: tathaikena prasiddhāyāṃ paśvantaram anarthakam // BVaky_3,1.64 //
analyzed: tathā ekena prasiddhāyām paśu antaram anarthakam

original: tāvatārthasya siddhatvād ekatvasyāvyatikramam /
analyzed: tāvatā arthasya siddha tvāt ekatvasya a vyatikramam

original: ke cid icchanti na tv atra saṃkhyāṅgatvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,1.65 //
analyzed: ke cit icchanti na tu atra saṃkhyā aṅga tvena gṛhyate

original: dvitīyādi tu yal liṅgam uktanyāyānuvādi tat /
analyzed: dvitīya ādi tu yat liṅgam ukta nyāya anuvādi tat

original: na saṃkhyā sādhanatvena jātivat tena gamyate // BVaky_3,1.66 //
analyzed: na saṃkhyā sādhana tvena jāti vat tena gamyate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ saṃkhyābhyupagame sati /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃkhyā abhyupagame sati

original: yuktaṃ yat sādhanatvaṃ syān na tv anyārthopalakṣaṇaṃ // BVaky_3,1.67 //
analyzed: yuktam yat sādhana tvam syāt na tu anya artha upalakṣaṇam

original: sādhanatve padārthasya sāmarthyaṃ na prahīyate /
analyzed: sādhana tve padārthasya sāmarthyam na prahīyate

original: saṃkhyāvyāpāradharmo 'tas tena liṅgena gamyate // BVaky_3,1.68 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā vyāpāra dharmaḥ taḥ tena liṅgena gamyate

original: apūrvasya vidheyatvāt prādhānyam avasīyate /
analyzed: apūrvasya vidheya tvāt prādhānyam avasīyate

original: vihitasya parārthatvāc cheśabhāvaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.69 //
analyzed: vihitasya para artha tvāt śeśa bhāvaḥ pratīyate

original: saṃmārgasya vidheyatvāt anyatra vihite grahe /
analyzed: saṃmārgasya vidheya tvāt anyatra vihite grahe

original: vidhivākye śrutā saṃkhyā lakṣaṇāyāṃ na bādhyate // BVaky_3,1.70 //
analyzed: vidhi vākye śrutā saṃkhyā lakṣaṇāyām na bādhyate

original: vidhivākyāntare saṃkhyā paśor nāsti virodhinī /
analyzed: vidhi vākya antare saṃkhyā paśoḥ na asti virodhinī

original: tasmāt saguṇa evāsau sahaikatvena gamyate // BVaky_3,1.71 //
analyzed: tasmāt sa guṇaḥ eva asau saha ekatvena gamyate

original: nirjñātadravyasaṃbandhe yaḥ karmaṇy upadiśyate /
analyzed: nirjñāta dravya saṃbandhe yaḥ karmaṇi upadiśyate

original: gunas tenārthitā tasya dravyeṇeva pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.72 //
analyzed: gunaḥ tena arthitā tasya dravyeṇa iva pratīyate

original: kaścid eva guṇo dravye yathā sāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid eva guṇaḥ dravye yathā sāmarthya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: ādhāro 'pi guṇasyaivaṃ prāptaḥ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ // BVaky_3,1.73 //
analyzed: ādhāraḥ pi guṇasya evam prāptaḥ sāmarthya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tayos tu pṛthagarthitve saṃbandho yaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: tayoḥ tu pṛthak arthi tve saṃbandhaḥ yaḥ pratīyate

original: na tasminn upaghāto 'sti kalpyam anyan na cāśrutam // BVaky_3,1.74 //
analyzed: na tasmin upaghātaḥ sti kalpyam anyat na ca a śrutam

original: kriyayā yo 'bhisaṃbandhaḥ sa śrutiprāpitas tayoḥ /
analyzed: kriyayā yaḥ bhisaṃbandhaḥ sa śruti prāpitaḥ tayoḥ

original: āśrayāśrayiṇor vākyān niyamas tv avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,1.75 //
analyzed: āśraya āśrayiṇoḥ vākyāt niyamaḥ tu avatiṣṭhate

original: tatra dravyaguṇābhāve pratyekaṃ syād vikalpanam /
analyzed: tatra dravya guṇa abhāve pratyekam syāt vikalpanam

original: śrutiprāpto hi saṃbandho balavān vākyalakṣaṇāt // BVaky_3,1.76 //
analyzed: śruti prāptaḥ hi saṃbandhaḥ balavān vākya lakṣaṇāt

original: yadā tu jātiḥ śaktir vā kriyāṃ praty upadiśyate /
analyzed: yadā tu jātiḥ śaktiḥ vā kriyām prati upadiśyate

original: sāmarthyāt saṃnidhīyete tatra dravyaguṇau tadā // BVaky_3,1.77 //
analyzed: sāmarthyāt saṃnidhīyete tatra dravya guṇau tadā

original: jātīnāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca tulye 'ṅgatve kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: jātīnām ca guṇānām ca tulye ṅga tve kriyām prati

original: guṇāḥ pratinidhīyante chāgādīnāṃ na jātayaḥ // BVaky_3,1.78 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ pratinidhīyante chāga ādīnām na jātayaḥ

original: vyaktiśakteḥ samāsannā jātayo na tathā guṇāḥ /
analyzed: vyakti śakteḥ samāsannāḥ jātayaḥ na tathā guṇāḥ

original: sākṣād dravyaṃ kriyāyogi guṇas tasmād vikalpate // BVaky_3,1.79 //
analyzed: sākṣāt dravyam kriyā yogi guṇaḥ tasmāt vikalpate

original: sāmyenānyatarābhāve vikalpaḥ kaiścid iṣyate /
analyzed: sāmyena anyatara abhāve vikalpaḥ kaiścid iṣyate

original: atadguṇo 'taś chāgaḥ syān meṣo vā tadguṇo bhavet // BVaky_3,1.80 //
analyzed: chāgaḥ syāt meṣaḥ vā tad guṇaḥ bhavet

original: jāter āśritasaṃkhyāyāḥ pravṛttir upalabhyate /
analyzed: jāteḥ āśrita saṃkhyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate

original: saṃkhyāviśeṣam utsṛjya kvacit saiva pravartate // BVaky_3,1.81 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā viśeṣam utsṛjya kvacid sā eva pravartate

original: parāṅgabhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ yujyate dravyasaṃkhyayā /
analyzed: para aṅga bhūtam sāmānyam yujyate dravya saṃkhyayā

original: svārthaṃ pravartamānaṃ tu na saṃkhyām avalambate // BVaky_3,1.82 //
analyzed: sva artham pravartamānam tu na saṃkhyām avalambate

original: yajeta paśunety atra yajyarthāyāṃ paśuśrutau /
analyzed: yajeta paśunā iti atra yaji arthāyām paśu śrutau

original: kṛtārthaikena paśunā pradhānaṃ bhavati kriyā // BVaky_3,1.83 //
analyzed: kṛtārthā ekena paśunā pradhānam bhavati kriyā

original: yāvatāṃ saṃbhavo yasya sa kuryāt tāvatāṃ yadi /
analyzed: yāvatām saṃbhavaḥ yasya sa kuryāt tāvatām yadi

original: ālambhanaṃ guṇais tena pradhānaṃ syāt prayojitam // BVaky_3,1.84 //
analyzed: ālambhanam guṇaiḥ tena pradhānam syāt prayojitam

original: saṃmṛjyamānatantre tu grahe yatra kriyāśrutiḥ /
analyzed: saṃmṛjyamāna tantre tu grahe yatra kriyā śrutiḥ

original: saṃkhyāviśeṣagrahaṇaṃ naiva tatrādriyāmahe // BVaky_3,1.85 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā viśeṣa grahaṇam na eva tatra ādriyāmahe

original: śiṣyamāṇapare vākye yad ekagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: śiṣyamāṇa pare vākye yat eka grahaṇam kṛtam

original: śeṣe viśiṣṭasaṃkhye 'pi vyaktaṃ tal liṅgadarśanam // BVaky_3,1.86 //
analyzed: śeṣe viśiṣṭa saṃkhye vyaktam tat liṅga darśanam

original: samāsapratyayavidhau yathā nipatitā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: samāsa pratyaya vidhau yathā nipatitā śrutiḥ

original: guṇānāṃ paratantrāṇāṃ nyāyenaivopapadyate // BVaky_3,1.87 //
analyzed: guṇānām paratantrāṇām nyāyena eva upapadyate

original: guṇe 'pi nāṅgīkriyate pradhānāntarasiddhaye /
analyzed: guṇe pi na aṅgīkriyate pradhāna antara siddhaye

original: saṃkhyā kartā tathā karmaṇy aviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.88 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā kartā tathā karmaṇi aviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate

original: yasyānyasya prasaktasya niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: yasya anyasya prasaktasya niyama arthā punar śrutiḥ

original: nivṛttau caritārthatvāt saṃkhyā tatrāvivakṣitā // BVaky_3,1.89 //
analyzed: nivṛttau caritārtha tvāt saṃkhyā tatra avivakṣitā

original: sarūpasamudāyāt tu vibhaktir yā vidhīyate /
analyzed: sarūpa samudāyāt tu vibhaktiḥ yā vidhīyate

original: ekas tatrārthavān siddhaḥ samudāyasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,1.90 //
analyzed: ekaḥ tatra arthavān siddhaḥ samudāyasya vācakaḥ

original: pratyayasya pradhānasya samāsasyāpi vā vidhau /
analyzed: pratyayasya pradhānasya samāsasya api vā vidhau

original: siddhaḥ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyāṃ sarvathānugraho guṇe // BVaky_3,1.91 //
analyzed: siddhaḥ saṃkhyā vivakṣāyām sarvathā anugrahaḥ guṇe

original: abhedarūpaṃ sādṛśyam ātmabhūtāś ca śaktayaḥ /
analyzed: abheda rūpam sādṛśyam ātma bhūtāḥ ca śaktayaḥ

original: jātiparyāyavācitvam eṣām apy upavarṇyate // BVaky_3,1.92 //
analyzed: jāti paryāya vāci tvam eṣām api upavarṇyate

original: daṇḍopāditsayā daṇḍaṃ yady api pratipadyate /
analyzed: daṇḍa upāditsayā daṇḍam yadi api pratipadyate

original: na tasmād eva sāmarthyāt sa daṇḍīti pratīyate // BVaky_3,1.93 //
analyzed: na tasmāt eva sāmarthyāt sa daṇḍī iti pratīyate

original: necchānimittād icchāvān iti jñānam pravartate /
analyzed: na icchā nimittāt icchāvān iti jñānam pravartate

original: tasmāt saty api sāmarthye buddhir arthāntarāśrayā // BVaky_3,1.94 //
analyzed: tasmāt sati api sāmarthye buddhiḥ artha antara āśrayā

original: svabhāvo vyapadeśyo vā sāmarthyaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ vyapadeśyaḥ vā sāmarthyam vā avatiṣṭhate

original: sarvasyānte yatas tasmād vyavahāro na kalpate // BVaky_3,1.95 //
analyzed: sarvasya ante yatas tasmāt vyavahāraḥ na kalpate

original: yadā bhedān parityajya buddhyaika iva gṛhyate /
analyzed: yadā bhedān parityajya buddhyā ekaḥ iva gṛhyate

original: vyaktyātmaiva tadā tatra buddhir ekā pravartate // BVaky_3,1.96 //
analyzed: vyakti ātmā eva tadā tatra buddhiḥ ekā pravartate

original: bhedarūpair anusyūtaṃ yadaikam iva manyate /
analyzed: bheda rūpaiḥ anusyūtam yadā ekam iva manyate

original: samūhāvagrahā buddhir bahubhyo jāyate tadā // BVaky_3,1.97 //
analyzed: samūha avagrahā buddhiḥ bahubhyaḥ jāyate tadā

original: *yadā sahavivakṣāyām ekabuddhinibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yadā saha vivakṣāyām eka buddhi nibandhanaḥ

original: baddhāvayavavicchedaḥ samudāyo 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,1.98 *//
analyzed: baddha avayava vicchedaḥ samudāyaḥ abhidhīyate

original: *pratikriyaṃ samāptatvād eko bhedasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: pratikriyam samāpta tvāt ekaḥ bheda samanvitaḥ

original: dvandve dvitvādibhedena tadāsāv upagamyate // BVaky_3,1.99 *//
analyzed: dvandve dvi tva ādi bhedena tadā asau upagamyate

original: sakṛtpravṛttāv ekatvam āvṛttau sadṛśātmatām /
analyzed: sakṛt pravṛttau eka tvam āvṛttau sadṛśa ātma tām

original: bhinnātmakānāṃ vyaktīnāṃ bhedāpohāt prapadyate // BVaky_3,1.100 //
analyzed: bhinna ātmakānām vyaktīnām bheda apohāt prapadyate

original: anupravṛtteti yathā- bhinnā buddhiḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: anupravṛttā iti yathā bhinnā buddhiḥ pratīyate

original: artho vyāvṛttarūpo 'pi tathā tattvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,1.101 //
analyzed: arthaḥ tathā tattvena gṛhyate

original: sarūpāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ na bhedopanipātinaḥ /
analyzed: sarūpāṇām ca sarveṣām na bheda upanipātinaḥ

original: vidyante vācakāḥ śabdā nāpi bhedo 'vadhāryate // BVaky_3,1.102 //
analyzed: vidyante vācakāḥ śabdāḥ nā api bhedaḥ vadhāryate

original: jñānaśabdārthaviṣayā viśeṣā ye vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: jñāna śabda artha viṣayāḥ viśeṣāḥ ye vyavasthitāḥ

original: teṣāṃ duravadhāratvāj jñānādyekatvadarśanam // BVaky_3,1.103 //
analyzed: teṣām duravadhāra tvāt jñāna ādi ekatva darśanam

original: jñāneṣv api yathārtheṣu tathā sarveṣu jātayaḥ /
analyzed: jñāneṣu api yathā artheṣu tathā sarveṣu jātayaḥ

original: saṃsargadarśane santi tāś cārthasya prasādhikāḥ // BVaky_3,1.104 //
analyzed: saṃsarga darśane santi tāḥ ca arthasya prasādhikāḥ

original: jñeyastham eva sāmānyaṃ jñānānām upakārakam /
analyzed: jñeya stham eva sāmānyam jñānānām upakārakam

original: na jātu jñeyavaj jñānaṃ pararūpeṇa rūpyate // BVaky_3,1.105 //
analyzed: na jātu jñeyavat jñānam para rūpeṇa rūpyate

original: yathā jyotiḥ prakāśena nānyenābhiprakāśyate /
analyzed: yathā jyotiḥ prakāśena na anyena abhiprakāśyate

original: jñānākāras tathānyena na jñānenopagṛhyate // BVaky_3,1.106 //
analyzed: jñāna ākāraḥ tathā anyena na jñānena upagṛhyate

original: *na cātmasamavetasya sāmānyasyāvadhāraṇe /
analyzed: na ca ātma samavetasya sāmānyasya avadhāraṇe

original: jñānaśaktiḥ samarthā syāj jñātasyānyasya vastunaḥ // BVaky_3,1.107 *//
analyzed: jñāna śaktiḥ samarthā syāt jñātasya anyasya vastunaḥ  /

original: *ayaugapadye jñānānām asyety agrahaṇaṃ na ca /
analyzed: ayaugapadye jñānānām asya iti agrahaṇam na ca

original: yathopalabdhi smaraṇam upalabdhe ca jāyate // BVaky_3,1.108 *//
analyzed: yathopalabdhi smaraṇam upalabdhe ca jāyate

original: ghaṭajñānam iti jñānaṃ ghaṭajñānavilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: ghaṭa jñānam iti jñānam ghaṭa jñāna vilakṣaṇam

original: ghaṭa ity api yaj jñānaṃ viṣayopanipāti tat // BVaky_3,1.109 //
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ iti api yat jñānam viṣaya upanipāti tat

original: yato viṣayarūpeṇa jñānarūpaṃ na gṛhyate /
analyzed: yatas viṣaya rūpeṇa jñāna rūpam na gṛhyate

original: artharūpaviviktaṃ ca svarūpaṃ nāvadhāryate // BVaky_3,1.110 //
analyzed: artha rūpa viviktam ca svarūpam na avadhāryate

original: 3,2: Dravyasamuddeśaḥ
analyzed: dravya samuddeśaḥ

original: ātmā vastu svabhāvaś ca śarīraṃ tattvam ity api /
analyzed: ātmā vastu svabhāvaḥ ca śarīram tattvam iti api

original: dravyam ity asya paryāyās tac ca nityam iti smṛtam // BVaky_3,2.1 //
analyzed: dravyam iti asya paryāyāḥ tat ca nityam iti smṛtam

original: satyaṃ vastu tadākārair asatyair avadhāryate /
analyzed: satyam vastu tad ākāraiḥ asatyaiḥ avadhāryate

original: asatyopādhibhiḥ śabdaiḥ satyam evābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,2.2 //
analyzed: asatya upādhibhiḥ śabdaiḥ satyam eva abhidhīyate

original: adhruveṇa nimittena devadattagṛhaṃ yathā /
analyzed: adhruveṇa nimittena devadatta gṛham yathā

original: gṛhītaṃ gṛhaśabdena śuddham evābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,2.3 //
analyzed: gṛhītam gṛha śabdena śuddham eva abhidhīyate

original: suvarṇādi yathā yuktam svair ākārair apāyibhiḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇa ādi yathā yuktam svaiḥ ākāraiḥ apāyibhiḥ

original: rucakādyabhidhānānāṃ śuddham evaiti vācyatām // BVaky_3,2.4 //
analyzed: rucaka ādi abhidhānānām śuddham evā eti vācya tām

original: ākāraiś ca vyavacchedāt sārvārthyam avarudhyate /
analyzed: ākāraiḥ ca vyavacchedāt sārvārthyam avarudhyate

original: yathaiva cakṣurādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ nālikādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,2.5 //
analyzed: yathā eva cakṣuḥ ādīnām sāmarthyam nālikā ādibhiḥ

original: teṣv ākāreṣu yaḥ śabdas tathābhūteṣu vartate /
analyzed: teṣu ākāreṣu yaḥ śabdaḥ tathābhūteṣu vartate

original: tattvātmakatvāt tenāpi nityam evābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,2.6 //
analyzed: tattva ātmaka tvāt tena api nityam evā abhidhīyate

original: na tattvātattvayor bheda iti vṛddhebhya āgamaḥ /
analyzed: na tattva atattvayoḥ bhedaḥ iti vṛddhebhyaḥ āgamaḥ

original: atattvam iti manyante tattvam evāvicāritam // BVaky_3,2.7 //
analyzed: atattvam iti manyante tattvam eva avicāritam

original: vikalparūpaṃ bhajate tattvam evāvikalpitam /
analyzed: vikalpa rūpam bhajate tattvam eva a vikalpitam

original: na cātra kālabhedo 'sti kālabhedaś cagṛhyate // BVaky_3,2.8 //
analyzed: na ca atra kāla bhedaḥ u sti kāla bhedaḥ ca gṛhyate

original: yathā viṣayadharmāṇāṃ jñāne 'tyantam asaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: yathā viṣaya dharmāṇām jñāne tyantam asaṃbhavaḥ

original: tadātmeva ca tat siddham atyantam atadātmakam // BVaky_3,2.9 //
analyzed: tad ātmā iva ca tat siddham atyantam a tad ātmakam

original: tathā vikārarūpāṇāṃ tattve 'tyantam asaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vikāra rūpāṇām tattve tyantam asaṃbhavaḥ

original: tadātmeva ca tat tattvam atyamntam atadātmakam // BVaky_3,2.10 //
analyzed: tad ātmā iva ca tat tattvam a tad ātmakam

original: satyam ākṛtisaṃhāre yad ante vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: satyam ākṛti saṃhāre yat ante vyavatiṣṭhate

original: tan nityaṃ śabdavācyaṃ tac chabdāt tac ca na bhidyate // BVaky_3,2.11 //
analyzed: tat nityam śabda vācyam tat śabdāt tat ca na bhidyate

original: na tad asti na tan nāsti na tad ekaṃ na tat pṛthak /
analyzed: na tat asti na tat na asti na tat ekam na tat pṛthak

original: na saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vibhaktaṃ vā vikṛtaṃ na ca nānyathā // BVaky_3,2.12 //
analyzed: na saṃsṛṣṭam vibhaktam vā vikṛtam na ca na anyathā

original: tan nāsti vidyate tac ca tad ekaṃ tat pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: tat na asti vidyate tat ca tat ekam tat pṛthak pṛthak

original: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ ca vibhaktaṃ ca vikṛtaṃ tat tad anyathā // BVaky_3,2.13 //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭam ca vibhaktam ca vikṛtam tat tat anyathā

original: tasya śabdārthasaṃbandha- rūpam ekasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: tasya śabda artha saṃbandha rūpam ekasya dṛśyate

original: tad dṛśyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā darśane ca prayojanam // BVaky_3,2.14 //
analyzed: tat dṛśyam darśanam draṣṭā darśane ca prayojanam

original: vikārāpagame satyaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍale yathā /
analyzed: vikāra apagame satyam suvarṇam kuṇḍale yathā

original: vikārāpagame satyāṃ tathāhuḥ prakṛtiṃ parām // BVaky_3,2.15 //
analyzed: vikāra apagame satyām tathā āhuḥ prakṛtim parām

original: vācyā sā sarvaśabdānāṃ śabdāś ca na pṛthak tataḥ /
analyzed: vācyā sā sarva śabdānām śabdāḥ ca na pṛthak tatas

original: apṛthaktve ca saṃbandhas tayor nānātmanor iva // BVaky_3,2.16 //
analyzed: apṛthaktve ca saṃbandhaḥ tayoḥ nānā ātmanoḥ iva

original: ātmā paraḥ priyo dveṣyo vaktā vācyaṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: ātmā paraḥ priyaḥ dveṣyaḥ vaktā vācyam prayojanam

original: viruddhāni yathaikasya svapne rūpāṇi cetasaḥ // BVaky_3,2.17 //
analyzed: viruddhāni yathā ekasya svapne rūpāṇi cetasaḥ

original: ajanmani tathā nitye paurvāparyavivarjite /
analyzed: a janmani tathā nitye paurvāparya vivarjite

original: tattve janmādirūpatvaṃ viruddham upalabhyate // BVaky_3,2.18 //
analyzed: tattve janma ādi rūpa tvam viruddham upalabhyate

original: 3.3: Saṃbandhasamuddeśa
analyzed: saṃbandha samuddeśa

original: jñānaṃ prayoktur bāhyo 'rthaḥ svarūpaṃ ca pratīyate /
analyzed: jñānam prayoktuḥ bāhyaḥ rthaḥ svarūpam ca pratīyate

original: śabdair uccaritais teṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ samavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,3.1 //
analyzed: śabdaiḥ uccaritaiḥ teṣām saṃbandhaḥ samavasthitaḥ

original: pratipattur bhavaty arthe jñāne vā saṃśayaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: pratipattuḥ bhavati arthe jñāne vā saṃśayaḥ kvacid

original: svarūpeṣūpalabhyeṣu vyabhicāro na vidyate // BVaky_3,3.2 //
analyzed: sva rūpeṣu upalabhyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ na vidyate

original: asyāyaṃ vācako vācya iti ṣaṣṭhyā pratīyate /
analyzed: asya ayam vācakaḥ vācyaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyā pratīyate

original: yogaḥ śabdārthayos tattvam apy ato vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,3.3 //
analyzed: yogaḥ śabda arthayoḥ tattvam api atas vyapadiśyate

original: nābhidhānaṃ svadharmeṇa saṃbandhasyāsti vācakam /
analyzed: na abhidhānam svadharmeṇa saṃbandhasya asti vācakam

original: atyantaparatantratvād rūpaṃ nāsyāpadiśyate // BVaky_3,3.4 //
analyzed: atyanta paratantra tvāt rūpam na asya apadiśyate

original: upakārāt sa yatrāsti dharmas tatrānugamyate /
analyzed: upakārāt sa yatra asti dharmaḥ tatra anugamyate

original: śaktīnām api sā śaktir guṇānām apy asau guṇaḥ // BVaky_3,3.5 //
analyzed: śaktīnām api sā śaktiḥ guṇānām api asau guṇaḥ

original: taddharmaṇos tu tācchabdyaṃ saṃyogasamavāyayoḥ /
analyzed: tad dharmaṇoḥ tu tācchabdyam saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ

original: tayor apy upakārārthā niyatās tadupādhayaḥ // BVaky_3,3.6 //
analyzed: tayoḥ api upakāra arthāḥ niyatāḥ tad upādhayaḥ

original: kā cid eva hi sāvasthā kāryaprasavasūcitā /
analyzed: kā cit eva hi sā avasthā kārya prasava sūcitā

original: kasya cit kena cid yasyāṃ saṃyoga upajāyate // BVaky_3,3.7 //
analyzed: kasya cit kena cit yasyām saṃyogaḥ upajāyate

original: nirātmakānām utpattau niyamaḥ kvacid eva yaḥ /
analyzed: nirātmakānām utpattau niyamaḥ kvacid eva yaḥ

original: tenaivāvyapavargaś ca prāptabhede sa yatkṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,3.8 //
analyzed: tena eva a vyapavargaḥ ca prāpta bhede sa yat kṛtaḥ

original: ātmāntarasya yenātmā tadātmevāvadhāryate /
analyzed: ātmā antarasya yena ātmā tadā ātmā iva avadhāryate

original: yataś caikatvanānātvaṃ tattvaṃ nādhyavasīyate // BVaky_3,3.9 //
analyzed: yatas ca ekatva nānātvam tattvam na adhyavasīyate

original: tāṃ śaktiṃ samavāyākhyāṃ śaktīnām upakāriṇīm /
analyzed: tām śaktim samavāya ākhyām śaktīnām upakāriṇīm

original: hedābhedāv atikrāntām anyathaiva vyavasthitām // BVaky_3,3.10 //
analyzed: heda abhedau atikrāntām anyathā eva vyavasthitām

original: dharmaṃ sarvapadārthānām atītaḥ sarvalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: dharmam sarva padārthānām atītaḥ sarva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: anugṛhṇāti saṃbandha iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ // BVaky_3,3.11 //
analyzed: anugṛhṇāti saṃbandhaḥ iti pūrvebhyaḥ āgamaḥ

original: padārthīkṛta evānyaiḥ sarvatrābhyupagamyate /
analyzed: padārthīkṛtaḥ eva anyaiḥ sarvatra abhyupagamyate

original: saṃbandhas tena śabdārthaḥ pravibhaktuṃ na śakyate // BVaky_3,3.12 //
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ tena śabda arthaḥ pravibhaktum na śakyate

original: samavāyāt sva ādhāraḥ svā ca jātiḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: samavāyāt svaḥ ādhāraḥ svā ca jātiḥ pratīyate

original: ekārthasamavāyāt tu guṇāḥ svādhāra eva ye // BVaky_3,3.13 //
analyzed: eka artha samavāyāt tu guṇāḥ svādhāre eva ye

original: dravyatvasattāsaṃyogāḥ svānyādhāropabandhanāḥ /
analyzed: dravya tva sattā saṃyogāḥ svāni ādhāra upabandhanāḥ

original: tatpradeśavibhāgāś ca guṇā dvitvādayaś ca ye // BVaky_3,3.14 //
analyzed: tad pradeśa vibhāgāḥ ca guṇāḥ dvi tva ādayaḥ ca ye

original: ke cit svāśrayasaṃyuktāḥ ke cit tatsamavāyinaḥ /
analyzed: ke cit sva āśraya saṃyuktāḥ ke cit tad samavāyinaḥ

original: saṃyuktasamaveteṣu samavetās tathāpare // BVaky_3,3.15 //
analyzed: saṃyukta samaveteṣu samavetāḥ tathā apare

original: svāśrayeṇa tu saṃyuktaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ vibhu gamyate /
analyzed: sva āśrayeṇa tu saṃyuktaiḥ saṃyuktam vibhu gamyate

original: samavāyasya saṃbandho nāparas tatra dṛśyate // BVaky_3,3.16 //
analyzed: samavāyasya saṃbandhaḥ na aparaḥ tatra dṛśyate

original: saṃbandhasyāviśiṣṭatvān na cātra niyamo bhavet /
analyzed: saṃbandhasya a viśiṣṭa tvāt na ca atra niyamaḥ bhavet

original: tasmācchabdārthayor naivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyate // BVaky_3,3.17 //
analyzed: tasmāt śabda arthayoḥ na evam saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyate

original: adṛṣṭavṛttilābhena yathā saṃyoga ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa vṛtti lābhena yathā saṃyogaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: kva cit svasvāmiyogākhyo 'bhede 'nyatrāpi sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,3.18 //
analyzed: kva cit sva svāmi yoga ākhyaḥ bhede nyatra api sa kramaḥ

original: prāptiṃ tu samavāyākhyāṃ vācyadharmātivartinīm /
analyzed: prāptim tu samavāya ākhyām vācya dharma ativartinīm

original: prayoktā pratipattā vā na śabdair anugacchati // BVaky_3,3.19 //
analyzed: prayoktā pratipattā vā na śabdaiḥ anugacchati

original: avācyam iti yad vācyaṃ tad avācyatayā yadā /
analyzed: avācyam iti yat vācyam tat avācya tayā yadā

original: vācyam ityavasīyeta vācyam eva tadā bhavet // BVaky_3,3.20 //
analyzed: vācyam iti avasīyeta vācyam eva tadā bhavet

original: athāpy avācyam ity evaṃ,
analyzed: atha api avācyam iti evam

original: na tad vācyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: na tat vācyam pratīyate

original: vivakṣitāsya yāvasthā saiva nādhyavasīyate // BVaky_3,3.21 //
analyzed: vivakṣitā asya yā avasthā sā eva na adhyavasīyate

original: tathānyathā sarvathā ca yasyāvācyatvam ucyate /
analyzed: tathā anyathā sarvathā ca yasya avācya tvam ucyate

original: tatrāpi naiva sāvasthā taiḥ śabdaiḥ pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,3.22 //
analyzed: tatra api nā eva sā avasthā taiḥ śabdaiḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: na hi saṃśayarūpe 'rthe śeṣatvena vyavasthite /
analyzed: na hi saṃśaya rūpe rthe śeṣa tvena vyavasthite

original: avyudāse svarūpasya saṃśayo 'nyaḥ pravartate // BVaky_3,3.23 //
analyzed: a vyudāse sva rūpasya saṃśayaḥ pravartate

original: yadā ca nirṇayajñāne nirṇayatvena nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: yadā ca nirṇaya jñāne nirṇaya tvena nirṇayaḥ

original: prakramyate tadā jñānaṃ svadharme nāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,3.24 //
analyzed: prakramyate tadā jñānam svadharme na avatiṣṭhate

original: sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti naitad vākyaṃ vivakṣyate /
analyzed: sarvam mithyā bravīmi iti na etat vākyam vivakṣyate

original: tasya mithyābhidhāne hi prakrānto 'rtho na gamyate // BVaky_3,3.25 //
analyzed: tasya mithyā abhidhāne hi prakrāntaḥ rthaḥ na gamyate

original: na ca vācakarūpeṇa pravṛttasyāsti vācyatā /
analyzed: na ca vācaka rūpeṇa pravṛttasya asti vācya tā

original: pratipādyaṃ na tat tatra yenānyat pratipādyate // BVaky_3,3.26 //
analyzed: pratipādyam na tat tatra yena anyat pratipādyate

original: asādhikā pratijñeti neyam evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: asādhikā pratijñā iti na iyam eva abhidhīyate

original: yathā, tathāsya dharmo 'pi nātra kaścit pratīyate // BVaky_3,3.27 //
analyzed: yathā tathā asya na atra kaścid pratīyate

original: vyāpārasyāparo yasmān na vyāpāro 'sti kaścana /
analyzed: vyāpārasya aparaḥ yasmāt na vyāpāraḥ sti kaścana

original: virodham anavasthāṃ vā tasmāt sarvatra nāśrayet // BVaky_3,3.28 //
analyzed: virodham anavasthām vā tasmāt sarvatra nā āśrayet

original: indriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayeṣv anādir yogyatā yathā /
analyzed: indriyāṇām sva viṣayeṣu anādiḥ yogyatā yathā

original: anādir arthaiḥ śabdānāṃ saṃbandho yogyatā tathā // BVaky_3,3.29 //
analyzed: anādiḥ arthaiḥ śabdānām saṃbandhaḥ yogyatā tathā

original: asādhur anumānena vācakaḥ kaiścid iṣyate /
analyzed: asādhuḥ anumānena vācakaḥ kaiścid iṣyate

original: vācakatvāviśeṣe vā niyamaḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ // BVaky_3,3.30 //
analyzed: vācaka tva aviśeṣe vā niyamaḥ puṇya pāpayoḥ

original: saṃbandhaśabde saṃbandho yogyatāñṃ prati yogyatā /
analyzed: saṃbandha śabde saṃbandhaḥ yogyatā añm prati yogyatā

original: samayād yogyatāsaṃvin mātāputrādiyogavat // BVaky_3,3.31 //
śabdaḥ kāraṇam arthasya sa hi tenopajanyate /
analyzed: śabdaḥ kāraṇam arthasya sa hi tena upajanyate

original: tathā ca buddhiviṣayād arthāc chabdaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,3.32 //
analyzed: tathā ca buddhi viṣayāt arthāt śabdaḥ pratīyate

original: bhojanādy api manyante buddhyarthe yad asaṃbhavi /
analyzed: bhojana ādi api manyante buddhi arthe yat asaṃbhavi

original: buddhyarthād eva buddhyarthe jāte tad api dṛśyate // BVaky_3,3.33 //
analyzed: buddhi arthāt eva buddhi arthe jāte tat api dṛśyate

original: anityeṣv api nityatvam abhidheyātmanā sthitam /
analyzed: anityeṣu api nitya tvam abhidheya ātmanā sthitam

original: anityatvaṃ svaśaktir vā sā ca nityān na bhidyate // BVaky_3,3.34 //
analyzed: anitya tvam sva śaktiḥ vā sā ca nityāt na bhidyate

original: śabdenārthasya saṃskāro dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprayojanaḥ /
analyzed: śabdena arthasya saṃskāraḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojanaḥ

original: kriyate so 'bhisaṃbandham antareṇa kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,3.35 //
analyzed: kriyate saḥ u bhisaṃbandham antareṇa katham bhavet

original: nāvaśyam abhidheyeṣu saṃskāraḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: na avaśyam abhidheyeṣu saṃskāraḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ

original: dṛsyate na ca saṃbandhas tathābhūto vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_3,3.36 //
analyzed: na ca saṃbandhaḥ tathābhūtaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: sati pratyayahetutvaṃ saṃbandha upapadyate /
analyzed: sati pratyaya hetu tvam saṃbandhe upapadyate

original: śabdasyārthe yatas tatra saṃbandho 'stīti gamyate // BVaky_3,3.37 //
analyzed: śabdasya arthe yatas tatra saṃbandhaḥ sti iti gamyate

original: nitye 'nitye 'pi vāpy arthe puruṣeṇa kathaṃcana /
analyzed: nitye nitye vā api arthe puruṣeṇa kathaṃcana

original: saṃbandho 'kṛtasaṃbandhaiḥ śabdaiḥ kartuṃ na śakyate // BVaky_3,3.38 //
analyzed: saṃbandho kṛta saṃbandhaiḥ śabdaiḥ kartum na śakyate

original: vyapadeśe padārthānām anyā sattaupacārikī /
analyzed: vyapadeśe padārthānām anyā sattā aupacārikī

original: sarvāvasthāsu sarveṣām ātmarūpasya darśikā // BVaky_3,3.39 //
analyzed: sarva avasthāsu sarveṣām ātma rūpasya darśikā

original: sphaṭikādi yathā dravyaṃ bhinnarūpair upāśrayaiḥ /
analyzed: sphaṭika ādi yathā dravyam bhinna rūpaiḥ upāśrayaiḥ

original: svaśaktiyogāt saṃbandhaṃ tādrūpyeṇeva gacchati // BVaky_3,3.40 //
analyzed: sva śakti yogāt saṃbandham tādrūpyeṇa iva gacchati

original: tadvac chabdo 'pi sattāyām asyāṃ pūrvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: tadvat śabdaḥ u pi sattāyām asyām pūrvam vyavasthitaḥ

original: dharmair upaiti saṃbandham avirodhivirodhibhiḥ // BVaky_3,3.41 //
analyzed: dharmaiḥ upaiti saṃbandham avirodhi virodhibhiḥ

original: evaṃ ca pratiṣedhyeṣu pratiṣedhaprakḷptaye /
analyzed: evam ca pratiṣedhyeṣu pratiṣedha prakḷptaye

original: āśriteṣūpacāreṇa pratiṣedhaḥ pravartate // BVaky_3,3.42 //
analyzed: āśriteṣu upacāreṇa pratiṣedhaḥ pravartate

original: ātmalābhasya janmākhyā satā labhyaṃ ca labhyate /
analyzed: ātma lābhasya janma ākhyā satā labhyam ca labhyate

original: yadi saj jāyate kasmād athāsaj jāyate katham // BVaky_3,3.43 //
analyzed: yadi sat jāyate kasmāt atha asat jāyate katham

original: sato hi gantur gamanaṃ,
analyzed: sataḥ hi gantuḥ gamanam

original: sati gamye pravartate /
analyzed: sati gamye pravartate

original: gantṛvac cen na janmārtho,
analyzed: gantṛ vat ced na

original: na cet tadvan na jāyate // BVaky_3,3.44 //
analyzed: na ced tadvat na jāyate

original: upacarya tu kartāram abhidhānapravṛttaye /
analyzed: upacarya tu kartāram abhidhāna pravṛttaye

original: punaś ca karmabhāvena tāṃ kriyāṃ ca tadāśrayām // BVaky_3,3.45 //
analyzed: punar ca karma bhāvena tām kriyām ca tad āśrayām

original: athopacārasattaivaṃ vidheyas tatra lādayaḥ /
analyzed: atha upacāra sattā evam vidheyaḥ tatra la ādayaḥ

original: janmanā tu virodhitvān mukhyā sattā na vidyate // BVaky_3,3.46 //
analyzed: janmanā tu virodhi tvāt mukhyā sattā na vidyate

original: ātmānam ātmanā bibhrad astīti vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: ātmānam ātmanā bibhrat asti iti vyapadiśyate

original: antarbhāvāc ca tenāsau karmaṇā na sakarmakaḥ // BVaky_3,3.47 //
analyzed: antarbhāvāt ca tena asau karmaṇā na sakarmakaḥ

original: prāk ca sattābhisaṃbandhān mukhyā sattā kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prāk ca sattā abhisaṃbandhāt mukhyā sattā katham bhavet

original: asaṃś ca nāsteḥ kartā syād upacāras tu pūrvavat // BVaky_3,3.48 //
analyzed: asān ca na asteḥ kartā syāt upacāraḥ tu pūrvavat

original: tasmād bhinneṣu dharmeṣu virodhiṣv avirodhinīm /
analyzed: tasmāt bhinneṣu dharmeṣu virodhiṣu avirodhinīm

original: virodhikhyāpanāyaiva śabdais tais tair upāśritām // BVaky_3,3.49 //
analyzed: virodhi khyāpanāya eva śabdaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upāśritām

original: abhinnakālām artheṣu bhinnakāleṣv avasthitām /
analyzed: abhinna kālām artheṣu bhinna kāleṣu avasthitām

original: pravṛttihetuṃ sarveṣāṃ śabdānām aupacārikīm // BVaky_3,3.50 //
analyzed: pravṛtti hetum sarveṣām śabdānām aupacārikīm

original: etāṃ sattāṃ padārtho hi na kaś cid ativartate /
analyzed: etām sattām padārthaḥ hi na kaḥ cit ativartate

original: sā ca saṃpratisattāyāḥ pṛthag bhāśye nidarśitā // BVaky_3,3.51 //
analyzed: sā ca saṃpratisattāyāḥ pṛthak bhāśye nidarśitā

original: pradeśasyaikadeśaṃ vā parato vā nirūpaṇam /
analyzed: pradeśasya eka deśam vā paratas vā nirūpaṇam

original: viparyayam abhāvaṃ vā vyavahāro 'nuvartate // BVaky_3,3.52 //
analyzed: viparyayam abhāvam vā vyavahāraḥ nuvartate

original: yathendriyasya vaiguṇyān mātrādhyāropavān iva /
analyzed: yathā indriyasya vaiguṇyāt mātrā adhyāropavān iva

original: jāyate pratyayo 'rthebhyas tathaivoddeśajā matiḥ // BVaky_3,3.53 //
analyzed: jāyate pratyayaḥ rthebhyaḥ tathā evā uddeśa jā matiḥ

original: akṛtsnaviṣayābhāsaṃ śabdaḥ pratyayam āśritaḥ /
analyzed: akṛtsna viṣaya ābhāsam śabdaḥ pratyayam āśritaḥ

original: artham āhānyarūpeṇa svarūpeṇānirūpitam // BVaky_3,3.54 //
analyzed: artham āha anya rūpeṇa sva rūpeṇa anirūpitam

original: rūpaṇavyapadeśābhyāṃ laukike vartmani sthitau /
analyzed: rūpaṇa vyapadeśābhyām laukike vartmani sthitau

original: jñānaṃ praty abhilāpaṃ ca sadṛśau bālapaṇḍitau // BVaky_3,3.55 //
analyzed: jñānam prati abhilāpam ca sadṛśau bāla paṇḍitau

original: sarvārtharūpatā śuddhir jñānasya nirupāśrayā /
analyzed: sarva artha rūpa tā śuddhiḥ jñānasya nirupāśrayā

original: tato 'py asya parāṃ śuddhim eke prāhur arūpikām // BVaky_3,3.56 //
analyzed: tatas u pi asya parām śuddhim eke prāhuḥ arūpikām

original: upaplavo hi jñānasya bāhyākārānupātitā /
analyzed: upaplavaḥ hi jñānasya bāhya ākāra anupāti tā

original: kāluṣyam iva tat tasya saṃsarge vyatibhedajam // BVaky_3,3.57 //
analyzed: kāluṣyam iva tat tasya saṃsarge vyatibheda jam

original: yathā ca jñānam ālekhād aśuddhau vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: yathā ca jñānam ālekhāt aśuddhau vyavatiṣṭhate

original: tathopāśrayavān arthaḥ svarūpād viprakṛṣyate // BVaky_3,3.58 //
analyzed: tathā upāśrayavān arthaḥ svarūpāt viprakṛṣyate

original: evam arthasya śabdasya jñānasya ca viparyaye /
analyzed: evam arthasya śabdasya jñānasya ca viparyaye

original: bhāvābhāvāv abhedena vyavahārānupātinau // BVaky_3,3.59 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau abhedena vyavahāra anupātinau

original: yathā bhāvam upāśritya tadabhāvo 'nugamyate /
analyzed: yathā bhāvam upāśritya tad abhāvaḥ nugamyate

original: tathābhāvam upāśritya tadbhāvo 'py anugamyate // BVaky_3,3.60 //
analyzed: tathābhāvam upāśritya anugamyate

original: nābhāvo jāyate bhāvo naiti bhāvo 'nupākhyatām /
analyzed: na abhāvaḥ jāyate bhāvaḥ nā eti bhāvaḥ

original: ekasmād ātmano 'nanyau bhāvābhāvau vikalpitau // BVaky_3,3.61 //
analyzed: ekasmāt ātmanaḥ na anyau bhāva abhāvau vikalpitau

original: abhāvasyānupākhyatvāt kāraṇaṃ na prasādhakam /
analyzed: abhāvasya anupākhya tvāt kāraṇam na prasādhakam

original: sopākhyasya tu bhāvasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ kariśyati // BVaky_3,3.62 //
analyzed: sopākhyasya tu bhāvasya kāraṇam kim

original: tasmāt sarvam abhāvo vā bhāvo vā sarvam iṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sarvam abhāvaḥ vā bhāvaḥ vā sarvam iṣyate

original: na tv avasthāntaraṃ kiṃ cid ekasmāt satyataḥ sthitam // BVaky_3,3.63 //
analyzed: na tu avasthā antaram kim cit ekasmāt satyataḥ sthitam

original: tasmān nābhāvam icchanti ye loke bhāvavādinaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na abhāvam icchanti ye loke bhāva vādinaḥ

original: abhāvavādino vāpi na bhāvaṃ tattvalakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,3.64 //
analyzed: abhāva vādinaḥ vā api na bhāvam tattva lakṣaṇam

original: advaye caiva sarvasmin svabhāvād ekalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: advaye ca eva sarvasmin svabhāvāt eka lakṣaṇe

original: parikalpeṣu maryādā vicitraivopalabhyate // BVaky_3,3.65 //
analyzed: parikalpeṣu maryādā vicitrā eva upalabhyate

original: catasro hi yathāvasthā nirupākhye prakalpitāḥ /
analyzed: catasraḥ hi yathā avasthāḥ nirupākhye prakalpitāḥ

original: evaṃ dvaividhyam apy etad bhāvābhāvavyapāśrayam // BVaky_3,3.66 //
analyzed: evam dvaividhyam api etat bhāva abhāva vyapāśrayam

original: avirodhī virodhī vā sann asan vāpi yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: avirodhī virodhī vā san asan vā api yuktitaḥ

original: kramavān akramo vāpi nābhāva upapadyate // BVaky_3,3.67 //
analyzed: kramavān akramaḥ vā api na abhāvaḥ upapadyate

original: avirodhī virodhī vā sann asan vāpi tattvataḥ /
analyzed: avirodhī virodhī vā san asan vā api tattvataḥ

original: kramavān akramo vāpi tena bhāvo na vidyate // BVaky_3,3.68 //
analyzed: kramavān akramaḥ vā api tena bhāvaḥ na vidyate

original: abhāve triṣu kāleṣu na bhedasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: abhāve triṣu kāleṣu na bhedasya asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: tasminn asati bhāve 'pi traikālyaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,3.69 //
analyzed: tasmin asati bhāve pi traikālyam na avatiṣṭhate

original: ātmatattvaparityāgaḥ parato nopapadyate /
analyzed: ātma tattva parityāgaḥ paratas na upapadyate

original: ātmatattvaṃ tu parataḥ svato vā nopakalpate // BVaky_3,3.70 //
analyzed: ātma tattvam tu paratas svatas vā nā upakalpate

original: tattve virodho nānātva upakāro na kaś cana /
analyzed: tattve virodhaḥ nānātve upakāraḥ na kaḥ cana

original: tattvānyatvaparityāge vyavahāro nivartate // BVaky_3,3.71 //
analyzed: tattva anya tva parityāge vyavahāraḥ nivartate

original: yatra draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca darśanaṃ cāvikalpitam /
analyzed: yatra draṣṭā ca dṛśyam ca darśanam ca a vikalpitam

original: tasyaivārthasya satyatvaṃ śritās trayyantavedinaḥ // BVaky_3,3.72 //
analyzed: tasya eva arthasya satya tvam śritāḥ trayī anta vedinaḥ

original: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā yasmād āhur viśeṣavat /
analyzed: sāmānyam vā viśeṣam vā yasmāt āhuḥ viśeṣa vat

original: śabdās tasmād asatyeṣu bhedeṣv eva vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,3.73 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ tasmāt asatyeṣu bhedeṣu eva vyavasthitāḥ

original: na hy abhāvasya sadbhāve bhāvasyātmā prahīyate /
analyzed: na hi abhāvasya sadbhāve bhāvasya ātmā prahīyate

original: na cābhāvasya nāstitve bhāvasyātmā prasūyate // BVaky_3,3.74 //
analyzed: na ca abhāvasya nāstitve bhāvasya ātmā prasūyate

original: na śābaleyasyāstitvaṃ bāhuleyasya bādhakam /
analyzed: na śābaleyasya astitvam bāhuleyasya bādhakam

original: na śābaleyo nāstīti bāhuleyaḥ prakalpate // BVaky_3,3.75 //
analyzed: na śābaleyaḥ na asti iti bāhuleyaḥ prakalpate

original: abhāvo yadi vastu syāt tatreyaṃ syāt vicāraṇā /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ yadi vastu syāt tatra iyam syāt vicāraṇā

original: tataś ca tadabhāve 'pi syād vicāryam idaṃ punaḥ // BVaky_3,3.76 //
analyzed: tatas ca tad abhāve syāt vicāryam idam punar

original: avastu syād atītaṃ yad vyavahārasya gocaram /
analyzed: avastu syāt atītam yat vyavahārasya gocaram

original: tatra vastugato bhedo na nirvacanam arhati // BVaky_3,3.77 //
analyzed: tatra vastu gataḥ bhedaḥ na nirvacanam arhati

original: apade 'rthe padanyāsaḥ kāraṇasya na vidyate /
analyzed: a pade rthe pada nyāsaḥ kāraṇasya na vidyate

original: atha ca prāgasadbhāvaḥ kāraṇe sati dṛṣyate // BVaky_3,3.78 //
analyzed: atha ca prāk asadbhāvaḥ kāraṇe sati dṛṣyate

original: kā tasya prāgavastheti vastvāśritam idaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: kā tasya prāc avasthā iti vastu āśritam idam punar

original: prāg avastheti na hy etad dvayam apy asty avastuni // BVaky_3,3.79 //
analyzed: prāk avasthā iti na hi etat dvayam api asti avastuni

original: na cordhvam asti nāstīti vacanāyānibandhanam /
analyzed: na ca ūrdhvam asti na asti iti vacanāya a nibandhanam

original: alaṃ syād apadasthānam etad vācaḥ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,3.80 //
analyzed: alam syāt a pada sthānam etat vācaḥ pracakṣate

original: atyadbhutā tv iyaṃ vṛttir yad abhāgaṃ yad akramam /
analyzed: ati adbhutā tu iyam vṛttiḥ yat abhāgam yat akramam

original: bhāvānāṃ prāg abhūtānām ātmatattvaṃ prakāśate // BVaky_3,3.81 //
analyzed: bhāvānām prāk abhūtānām ātma tattvam prakāśate

original: vikalpotthāpitenaiva sarvo bhāvena laukikaḥ /
analyzed: vikalpa utthāpitena eva sarvaḥ bhāvena laukikaḥ

original: mukhyeneva padārthena vyavahāro vidhīyate // BVaky_3,3.82 //
analyzed: mukhyena iva padārthena vyavahāraḥ vidhīyate

original: bhāvaśaktim ataś caināṃ manyante nityavādinaḥ /
analyzed: bhāva śaktim atas ca enām manyante nitya vādinaḥ

original: bhāvam eva kramam prāhur na bhāvād aparaḥ kramaḥ // BVaky_3,3.83 //
analyzed: bhāvam eva kramam prāhuḥ na bhāvāt aparaḥ kramaḥ

original: kramān na yaugapadyasya kaś cid bhedo 'sti tattvataḥ /
analyzed: kramāt na yaugapadyasya kaḥ cit bhedaḥ sti tattvataḥ

original: yathaiva bhāvān nābhāvaḥ kaś cid anyo 'vasīyate // BVaky_3,3.84 //
analyzed: yathā eva bhāvāt na abhāvaḥ kaḥ cit anyaḥ vasīyate

original: kālasyāpy aparaṃ kālaṃ nirdiśanty eva laukikāḥ /
analyzed: kālasya api aparam kālam nirdiśanti eva laukikāḥ

original: na ca nirdeśamātreṇa vyatireko 'nugamyate // BVaky_3,3.85 //
analyzed: na ca nirdeśa mātreṇa vyatirekaḥ

original: ādhāraṃ kalpayan buddhyā nābhāve vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: ādhāram kalpayan buddhyā na abhāve vyavatiṣṭhate

original: avastuṣv api notprekṣā kasya cit pratibadhyate // BVaky_3,3.86 //
analyzed: avastuṣu api nā utprekṣā kasya cit pratibadhyate

original: tasmāc chaktivibhāgena nityaḥ sadasadātmakaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śakti vibhāgena nityaḥ sat asat ātmakaḥ

original: eko 'rthaḥ śabdavācyatve bahurūpaḥ prakāśate // BVaky_3,3.87 //
analyzed: ekaḥ rthaḥ śabda vācya tve bahu rūpaḥ prakāśate

original: vyavahāraś ca lokasya padārthaiḥ parikalpitaiḥ /
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ ca lokasya padārthaiḥ parikalpitaiḥ

original: śāstre padārthaḥ kāryārthaṃ laukikaḥ pravibhajyate // BVaky_3,3.88 //
analyzed: śāstre padārthaḥ kārya artham laukikaḥ pravibhajyate

original: 3,4: Bhūyodravyasamuddeśaḥ
saṃsargarūpāt saṃbhūtāḥ saṃvidrūpād apoddhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsarga rūpāt saṃbhūtāḥ saṃvid rūpāt apoddhṛtāḥ

original: śāstre vibhaktā vākyārthāt prakṛtipratyayārthavat // BVaky_3,4.1 //
analyzed: śāstre vibhaktā vākya arthāt prakṛti pratyaya artha vat

original: nimittabhūtāḥ sādhutve śāstrād anumitātmakāḥ /
analyzed: nimitta bhūtāḥ sādhu tve śāstrāt anumita ātmakāḥ

original: ke cit padārthā vakṣyante saṃkśepeṇa yathāgamam // BVaky_3,4.2 //
analyzed: ke cit padārthāḥ vakṣyante saṃkśepeṇa yathāgamam

original: vastūpalakṣaṇaṃ yatra sarvanāma prayujyate /
analyzed: vastu upalakṣaṇam yatra sarvanāma prayujyate

original: dravyam ity ucyate so 'rto bhedyatvena vivakśitaḥ // BVaky_3,4.3 //
analyzed: dravyam iti ucyate saḥ rtaḥ bhedya tvena

original: 3,5: Guṇasamudeśa
analyzed: guṇa samudeśa

original: saṃsargi bhedakaṃ yad yat savyāpāraṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃsargi bhedakam yat yat sa vyāpāram pratīyate

original: guṇatvaṃ paratantratvāt tasya śāstra udāhṛtam // BVaky_3,5.1 //
analyzed: guṇa tvam paratantra tvāt tasya śāstre udāhṛtam

original: dravyasyāvyapadeśasya ya upādīyate guṇaḥ /
analyzed: dravyasya a vyapadeśasya yaḥ upādīyate guṇaḥ

original: bhedako vyapadeśāya tatprakarṣo 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,5.2 //
analyzed: bhedakaḥ vyapadeśāya tad prakarṣaḥ bhidhīyate

original: sarvasyaiva pradhānasya na vinā bhedahetunā /
analyzed: sarvasya eva pradhānasya na vinā bheda hetunā

original: prakarṣo vidyate nāpi 'śabdasyopaiti vācyatām // BVaky_3,5.3 //
analyzed: prakarṣaḥ vidyate nā api śabdasya upaiti vācya tām

original: vidyamānāḥ pradhāneṣu na sarve bhedahetavaḥ /
analyzed: vidyamānāḥ pradhāneṣu na sarve bheda hetavaḥ

original: viśeṣaśabdair ucyante vyāvṛttārthābhidhāyibhiḥ // BVaky_3,5.4 //
analyzed: viśeṣa śabdaiḥ ucyante vyāvṛtta artha abhidhāyibhiḥ

original: vastūpalakṣaṇe tatra viśeṣo vyāpṛto yadi /
analyzed: vastu upalakṣaṇe tatra viśeṣaḥ vyāpṛtaḥ yadi

original: prakarṣo niyamābhāvāt syād avijñātahetukaḥ // BVaky_3,5.5 //
analyzed: prakarṣaḥ niyama abhāvāt syāt a vijñāta hetukaḥ

original: sarvaṃ ca sarvato 'vaśyaṃ niyamena prakṛṣyate /
analyzed: sarvam ca sarvatas vaśyam niyamena prakṛṣyate

original: saṃsargiṇā nimittena nikṛṣṭenādhikena vā // BVaky_3,5.6 //
analyzed: saṃsargiṇā nimittena nikṛṣṭena adhikena vā

original: nāpekṣate nimittaṃ ca prakarṣe vyāpṛtaṃ yadi /
analyzed: na apekṣate nimittam ca prakarṣe vyāpṛtam yadi

original: dravyasya syād upādānaṃ prakarṣaṃ praty anarthakaṃ // BVaky_3,5.7 //
analyzed: dravyasya syāt upādānam prakarṣam prati anarthakam

original: savyāpāro guṇas tasmāt svaprakarṣanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: sa vyāpāraḥ guṇaḥ tasmāt sva prakarṣa nibandhanaḥ

original: dravyātmānaṃ bhinatty eva svaprakarṣaṃ niveśayan // BVaky_3,5.8 //
analyzed: dravya ātmānam bhinatti eva sva prakarṣam niveśayan

original: arūpaṃ pararūpeṇa dravyam ākhyāyate yathā /
analyzed: arūpam para rūpeṇa dravyam ākhyāyate yathā

original: aprakarṣaṃ prakarṣeṇa guṇasyāviśyate tathā // BVaky_3,5.9 //
analyzed: aprakarṣam prakarṣeṇa guṇasya āviśyate tathā

original: 3,6: Diksamuddeśa
analyzed: diś samuddeśa

original: dik sādhanam kriyā kāla iti vastvabhidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: diś sādhanam kriyā kālaḥ iti vastu abhidhāyinaḥ

original: śaktirūpe padārthānām atyantam anavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,6.1 //
