analyzed: śakti rūpe padārthānām atyantam anavasthitāḥ

original: vyatirekasya yo hetur avadhipratipādyayoḥ /
analyzed: vyatirekasya yaḥ hetuḥ avadhi pratipādyayoḥ

original: ṛjv ity evam yato 'nyena vinā buddhiḥ pravartate // BVaky_3,6.2 //
analyzed: ṛju iti evam yatas nyena vinā buddhiḥ pravartate

original: karmano jātibhedānām abhivyaktir yadāśrayā /
analyzed: karmanaḥ jāti bhedānām abhivyaktiḥ yad āśrayā

original: sā svair upādhibhir bhinnā śaktir dig iti kathyate // BVaky_3,6.3 //
analyzed: sā svaiḥ upādhibhiḥ bhinnā śaktiḥ diś iti kathyate

original: parāparatve mūrtināṃ deśabhedanibandhane /
tata eva prakalpete kramarūpe tu kālataḥ // BVaky_3,6.4 //
analyzed: tatas eva prakalpete krama rūpe tu kālataḥ

original: ākāśasya pradeśena bhāgaiś cānyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: ākāśasya pradeśena bhāgaiḥ ca anyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: sā saṃyogavibhāgānām upādhitvāya kalpate // BVaky_3,6.5 //
analyzed: sā saṃyoga vibhāgānām upādhi tvāya kalpate

original: diśo vyavasthā deśānāṃ digvyavasthā na vidyate /
analyzed: diśaḥ vyavasthā deśānām diś vyavasthā na vidyate

original: śaktayaḥ khalu bhāvānām upakāraprabhāvitāḥ // BVaky_3,6.6 //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ khalu bhāvānām upakāra prabhāvitāḥ

original: pratyastarūpā bhāveṣu dik pūrvety abhidhīyate /
analyzed: pratyasta rūpā bhāveṣu diś pūrvā iti abhidhīyate

original: pūrvabuddhir yato dik sā samākhyāmātram anyathā // BVaky_3,6.7 //
analyzed: pūrva buddhiḥ yatas diś sā samākhyā mātram anyathā

original: svāṅgād vyavasthā yā loke na tasyām niyatā diśaḥ /
analyzed: sva aṅgāt vyavasthā yā loke na tasyām niyatāḥ diśaḥ

original: pratyaṅmukhasya yat paścāt tat purastād viparyaye // BVaky_3,6.8 //
analyzed: pratyak mukhasya yat paścāt tat purastāt viparyaye

original: deśavyavasthāniyamo dikṣu na vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: deśa vyavasthā niyamaḥ dikṣu na vyavatiṣṭhate

original: rūḍham apy aparatvena pūrvam ity abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,6.9 //
analyzed: rūḍham api apara tvena pūrvam iti abhidhīyate

original: ato bhāṣitapuṃskatvāt puṃvadbhāvo na sidhyati /
analyzed: atas bhāṣita puṃska tvāt puṃvat bhāvaḥ na sidhyati

original: asminn arthe na śabdena prasavaḥ kva cid ucyate // BVaky_3,6.10 //
analyzed: asmin arthe na śabdena prasavaḥ kva cit ucyate

original: dikśakter abhidhāne tu niyataṃ diśi darśanam /
analyzed: diś śakteḥ abhidhāne tu niyatam diśi darśanam

original: pūrvādināṃ yathā ṣaṣṭer jīvitasyāvadhāraṇe // BVaky_3,6.11 //
analyzed: pūrva ādinām yathā ṣaṣṭeḥ jīvitasya avadhāraṇe

original: chāyābhābhyāṃ nagādīnām bhāgabhedaḥ prakalpate /
analyzed: chāyā ābhābhyām naga ādīnām bhāga bhedaḥ prakalpate

original: ataddharmasu bhāveṣu bhāgabhedo na kalpate // BVaky_3,6.12 //
analyzed: a tad dharmasu bhāveṣu bhāga bhedaḥ na kalpate

original: paramāṇor abhāgasya diśā bhāgo vidhīyate /
analyzed: paramāṇoḥ a bhāgasya diśā bhāgaḥ vidhīyate

original: bhāgaprakalpanāśaktiṃ prathamāṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,6.13 //
analyzed: bhāga prakalpanā śaktim prathamām tām pracakṣate

original: adeśāś cāpy abhāgāś ca niṣkramā nirupāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: a deśāḥ ca api a bhāgāḥ ca niṣkramāḥ nirupāśrayāḥ

original: bhāvāḥ saṃsargirūpāt tu śaktibhedaḥ prakalpate // BVaky_3,6.14 //
analyzed: bhāvāḥ saṃsargi rūpāt tu śakti bhedaḥ prakalpate

original: nirbhāgātmakatā tulyā paramāṇor ghaṭasya ca /
analyzed: nirbhāga ātmaka tā tulyā paramāṇoḥ ghaṭasya ca

original: bhāgaḥ śaktyantaraṃ tatra parimāṇaṃ ca yat tayoḥ // BVaky_3,6.15 //
analyzed: bhāgaḥ śakti antaram tatra parimāṇam ca yat tayoḥ

original: yataḥ prakalpate bhedo bhedas tatrāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: yatas prakalpate bhedaḥ bhedaḥ tatra api dṛśyate

original: adṛṣṭoparatiṃ bhedam ato 'yuktataraṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,6.16 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa uparatim bhedam atas yuktataram viduḥ

original: sarvatra tasya kāryasya darśanād vibhur iṣyate /
analyzed: sarvatra tasya kāryasya darśanāt vibhuḥ iṣyate

original: vibhutvam etad evāhur anyaḥ kāyavatāṃ vidhiḥ // BVaky_3,6.17 //
analyzed: vibhu tvam etat eva āhuḥ anyaḥ kāyavatām vidhiḥ

original: caitanyavat sthitā loke dikkālaparikalpanā /
analyzed: caitanya vat sthitā loke diś kāla parikalpanā

original: prakṛtiṃ prāṇināṃ tāṃ hi ko 'nyathā sthāpayiṣyati // BVaky_3,6.18 //
analyzed: prakṛtim prāṇinām tām hi kaḥ nyathā sthāpayiṣyati

original: saṃkaro vyavahārāṇāṃ prakṛteḥ syād viparyaye /
analyzed: saṃkaraḥ vyavahārāṇām prakṛteḥ syāt viparyaye

original: tasmāt tyajann imān bhāvān punar evāvalambate // BVaky_3,6.19 //
analyzed: tasmāt tyajan imān bhāvān punar eva avalambate

original: tasyās tu śakteḥ pūrvādi- bhedo bhāvāntarāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu śakteḥ pūrva ādi bhedaḥ bhāva antara āśrayaḥ

original: bhinnā dik tena bhedena bhedāyaivopakalpate // BVaky_3,6.20 //
analyzed: bhinnā diś tena bhedena bhedāya eva upakalpate

original: avadhitvena cāpekṣā- yoge diglakṣaṇo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: avadhi tvena ca apekṣā yoge diś lakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ

original: pūrvam asyeti ṣaṣṭhy eva dṛṣṭā dharmāntarāśraye // BVaky_3,6.21 //
analyzed: pūrvam asya iti ṣaṣṭhī eva dṛṣṭā dharma antara āśraye

original: pūrvādināṃ viparyāso 'dṛṣṭaś cāvadhyasaṃkare /
analyzed: pūrva ādinām viparyāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca avadhya saṃkare

original: ṛjv etad asyety etac ca liṅgaṃ na vyatikīryate // BVaky_3,6.22 //
analyzed: ṛju etat asya iti etat ca liṅgam na vyatikīryate

original: antaḥkaraṇadharmo vā bahir evaṃ prakāśate /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa dharmaḥ vā bahis evam prakāśate

original: asyāṃ tv antarbahirbhāvaḥ prakriyāyāṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,6.23 //
analyzed: asyām tu antar bahis bhāvaḥ prakriyāyām na vidyate

original: ekatvam āsāṃ śaktīnāṃ nānātvaṃ veti kalpane /
analyzed: eka tvam āsām śaktīnām nānātvam vā iti kalpane

original: avastupatite jñātvā satyato na parāmṛśet // BVaky_3,6.24 //
analyzed: avastu patite jñātvā satyataḥ na parāmṛśet

original: vikalpātītatattveṣu saṃketopanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: vikalpa atīta tattveṣu saṃketa upanibandhanāḥ

original: bhāveṣu vyavahārā ye lokas tatrānugamyate // BVaky_3,6.25 //
analyzed: bhāveṣu vyavahārāḥ ye lokaḥ tatra anugamyate

original: naikatvam asty anānātvaṃ vinaikatvena netarat /
analyzed: na ekatvam asti anānātvam vinā ekatvena na itarat

original: paramārthe tayor eṣa bhedo 'tyantaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,6.26 //
analyzed: parama arthe tayoḥ eṣa tyantam na vidyate

original: na śaktīnāṃ tathā bhedo yathā śaktimatām sthitiḥ /
analyzed: na śaktīnām tathā bhedaḥ yathā śaktimatām sthitiḥ

original: na ca laukikam ekatvaṃ tāsām ātmasu vidyate // BVaky_3,6.27 //
analyzed: na ca laukikam eka tvam tāsām ātmasu vidyate

original: naikatvaṃ vyavatiṣṭheta nānātvaṃ cen na kalpayet /
analyzed: na ekatvam vyavatiṣṭheta nānātvam ced na kalpayet

original: nānātvaṃ cāvahīyeta yady ekatvaṃ na kalpayet // BVaky_3,6.28 //
analyzed: nānātvam ca avahīyeta yadi ekatvam na kalpayet

original: 3,7: Sādhanasamuddeśa
analyzed: sādhana samuddeśa

original: svāśraye samavetānāṃ tadvad evāśrayāntare /
analyzed: sva āśraye samavetānām tadvat eva āśraya antare

original: kriyāṇām abhiniṣpattau sāmarthyaṃ sādhanaṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,7.1 //
analyzed: kriyāṇām abhiniṣpattau sāmarthyam sādhanam viduḥ

original: śaktimātrāsamūhasya viśvasyānekadharmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: śakti mātrā samūhasya viśvasya aneka dharmaṇaḥ

original: sarvadā sarvathā bhāvāt kva cit kiṃ cid vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,7.2 //
analyzed: sarvadā sarvathā bhāvāt kva cit kim cit vivakṣyate

original: sādhanavyavahāraś ca buddhyavasthānibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: sādhana vyavahāraḥ ca buddhi avasthā nibandhanaḥ

original: sann asan vārtharūpeṣu bhedo buddhyā prakalpyate // BVaky_3,7.3 //
analyzed: san asan vā artha rūpeṣu bhedaḥ buddhyā prakalpyate

original: buddhyā samīhitaikatvān pañcālān kurubhir yadā /
analyzed: buddhyā samīhita eka tvān pañcālān kurubhiḥ yadā

original: punar vibhajate vaktā tadāpāyaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.4 //
analyzed: punar vibhajate vaktā tadā apāyaḥ pratīyate

original: śabdopahitarūpāṃś ca buddher viṣayatāṃ gatān /
analyzed: śabda upahita rūpān ca buddheḥ viṣaya tām gatān

original: pratyakṣam iva kaṃsādīn sādhanatvena manyate // BVaky_3,7.5 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam iva kaṃsa ādīn sādhana tvena manyate

original: buddhipravṛttirūpaṃ ca samāropyābhidhātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: buddhi pravṛtti rūpam ca samāropya abhidhātṛbhiḥ

original: artheṣu śaktibhedānāṃ kriyate parikalpanā // BVaky_3,7.6 //
analyzed: artheṣu śakti bhedānām kriyate parikalpanā

original: vyaktau padārthe śabdāder janyamānasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vyaktau padārthe śabda ādeḥ janyamānasya karmaṇaḥ

original: sādhanatvaṃ tathā siddhaṃ buddhirūpaprakalpitam // BVaky_3,7.7 //
analyzed: sādhana tvam tathā siddham buddhi rūpa prakalpitam

original: svatantraparatantratve kramarūpaṃ ca darśitam /
analyzed: svatantra paratantra tve krama rūpam ca darśitam

original: nirīheṣv api bhāveṣu kalpanopanibandhanam // BVaky_3,7.8 //
analyzed: nirīheṣu api bhāveṣu kalpanā upanibandhanam

original: śaktayaḥ śaktimantaś ca sarve saṃsargavādinām /
analyzed: śaktayaḥ śaktimantaḥ ca sarve saṃsarga vādinām

original: bhāvās teṣv asvaśabdeṣu sādhanatvaṃ nirūpyate // BVaky_3,7.9 //
analyzed: bhāvāḥ teṣu a sva śabdeṣu sādhana tvam nirūpyate

original: ghaṭasya dṛśikarmatve mahattvādīni sādhanam /
rūpasya dṛśikarmatve rūpatvādīni sādhanam // BVaky_3,7.10 //
analyzed: rūpasya dṛśi karma tve rūpa tva ādīni sādhanam

original: svaiḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaiś ca śaktimanto rasādayaḥ /
analyzed: svaiḥ sāmānya viśeṣaiḥ ca śaktimantaḥ rasa ādayaḥ

original: niyatagrahaṇā loke śaktayas tās tathāśrayaiḥ // BVaky_3,7.11 //
analyzed: niyata grahaṇāḥ loke śaktayaḥ tāḥ tathā āśrayaiḥ

original: indriyārthamanaḥkartṛ- saṃbandhaḥ sādhanaṃ kva cit /
analyzed: indriya artha manaḥ kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ sādhanam kva cit

original: yad yadā yadanugrāhi tat tadā tatra sādhanam // BVaky_3,7.12 //
analyzed: yat yadā yad anugrāhi tat tadā tatra sādhanam

original: svaśabdair abhidhāne tu sa dharmo nābhidhīyate /
analyzed: sva śabdaiḥ abhidhāne tu sa dharmaḥ na abhidhīyate

original: vibhaktyādibhir evāsāv upakāraḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.13 //
analyzed: vibhakti ādibhiḥ eva asau upakāraḥ pratīyate

original: nimittabhāvo bhāvānām upakārārtham āśritaḥ /
analyzed: nimitta bhāvaḥ bhāvānām upakāra artham āśritaḥ

original: natir āvarjanety evaṃ siddhaḥ sādhanam iṣyate // BVaky_3,7.14 //
analyzed: natiḥ āvarjanā iti evam siddhaḥ sādhanam iṣyate

original: sa tebhyo vyatirikto vā teṣām ātmaiva vā tathā /
analyzed: sa tebhyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā teṣām ātmā eva vā tathā

original: vyatirekam upāśritya sādhanatvena kalpyate // BVaky_3,7.15 //
analyzed: vyatirekam upāśritya sādhana tvena kalpyate

original: saṃdarśanaṃ prārthanāyāṃ vyavasāye tv anantarā /
analyzed: saṃdarśanam prārthanāyām vyavasāye tu anantarā

original: vyavasāyas tathārambhe sādhanatvāya kalpate // BVaky_3,7.16 //
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ tathā ārambhe sādhana tvāya kalpate

original: pūrvasmin yā kriyā saiva parasmin sādhanaṃ matā /
analyzed: pūrvasmin yā kriyā sā eva parasmin sādhanam matā

original: saṃdarśane tu caitanyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,7.17 //
analyzed: saṃdarśane tu caitanyam viśiṣṭam sādhanam viduḥ

original: niṣpattimātre kartṛtvaṃ sarvatraivāsti kārake /
analyzed: niṣpatti mātre kartṛ tvam sarvatra evā asti kārake

original: vyāpārabhedāpekṣāyāṃ karaṇatvādisaṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,7.18 //
putrasya janmani yathā pitroḥ kartṛtvam ucyate /
analyzed: putrasya janmani yathā pitroḥ kartṛ tvam ucyate

original: ayam asyām iyaṃ tv asmād iti bhedo vivakṣayā // BVaky_3,7.19 //
analyzed: ayam asyām iyam tu asmāt iti bhedaḥ vivakṣayā

original: guṇakriyāṇāṃ kartāraḥ kartrā nyakkṛtaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa kriyāṇām kartāraḥ kartrā nyakkṛta śaktayaḥ

original: nyaktāyām api saṃpūrṇaiḥ svair vyāpāraiḥ samanvitāḥ // BVaky_3,7.20 //
analyzed: nyaktāyām api saṃpūrṇaiḥ svaiḥ vyāpāraiḥ samanvitāḥ

original: karaṇatvādibhir jñātāḥ kriyābhedānupātibhiḥ /
analyzed: karaṇa tva ādibhiḥ jñātāḥ kriyā bheda anupātibhiḥ

original: svātantryam uttaraṃ labdhvā pradhāne yānti kartṛtām // BVaky_3,7.21 //
analyzed: svātantryam uttaram labdhvā pradhāne yānti kartṛ tām

original: yathā rājñā niyukteṣu yoddhṛtvaṃ yoddhṛṣu sthitam /
analyzed: yathā rājñā niyukteṣu yoddhṛ tvam yoddhṛṣu sthitam

original: teṣu vṛttau tu labhate rājā jayaparājayau // BVaky_3,7.22 //
analyzed: teṣu vṛttau tu labhate rājā jaya parājayau

original: tathā kartrā niyukteṣu sarveṣv ekārthakāriṣu /
analyzed: tathā kartrā niyukteṣu sarveṣu eka artha kāriṣu

original: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvāder uttaraṃ na virudhyate // BVaky_3,7.23 //
analyzed: kartṛ tvam karaṇa tva ādeḥ uttaram na virudhyate

original: anāśrite tu vyāpāre nimittaṃ hetur iṣyate /
analyzed: anāśrite tu vyāpāre nimittam hetuḥ iṣyate

original: āśritāvadhibhāvaṃ tu lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,7.24 //
analyzed: āśrita avadhi bhāvam tu lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇam viduḥ

original: dravyādiviṣayo hetuḥ kārakaṃ niyatakriyam /
analyzed: dravya ādi viṣayaḥ hetuḥ kārakam niyata kriyam

original: kartā kartrantarāpekṣaḥ kriyāyāṃ hetur iṣyate // BVaky_3,7.25 //
analyzed: kartā kartṛ antara apekṣaḥ kriyāyām hetuḥ iṣyate

original: kriyāyai karaṇaṃ tasya dṛṣṭaḥ pratinidhis tathā /
analyzed: kriyāyai karaṇam tasya dṛṣṭaḥ pratinidhiḥ tathā

original: hetvarthā tu kriyā tasmān na sa pratinidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.26 //
analyzed: hetu arthā tu kriyā tasmāt na sa pratinidhīyate

original: prātilomyānulomyābhyāṃ hetur arthasya sādhakaḥ /
analyzed: prātilomya ānulomyābhyām hetuḥ arthasya sādhakaḥ

original: tādarthyam ānulomyena hetutvānugataṃ tu tat // BVaky_3,7.27 //
analyzed: tādarthyam ānulomyena hetutva anugatam tu tat

original: sarvatra sahajā śaktir yāvaddravyam avasthitā /
analyzed: sarvatra sahajā śaktiḥ yāvaddravyam avasthitā

original: kriyākāle tv abhivyakter āśrayād upakāriṇī // BVaky_3,7.28 //
analyzed: kriyā kāle tu abhivyakteḥ āśrayāt upakāriṇī

original: kuḍyasyāvaraṇe śaktir asyādīnāṃ vidāraṇe /
analyzed: kuḍyasya āvaraṇe śaktiḥ asya ādīnām vidāraṇe

original: sarvadā sa tu san dharmaḥ kriyākāle nirūpyate // BVaky_3,7.29 //
analyzed: sarvadā sa tu san dharmaḥ kriyā kāle nirūpyate

original: svā“ngasaṃyoginaḥ pāśā daityānāṃ vāruṇā yathā /
analyzed: sva anga saṃyoginaḥ pāśāḥ daityānām vāruṇāḥ yathā

original: vyajyante vijigīṣūṇāṃ dravyāṇāṃ śaktayas tathā // BVaky_3,7.30 //
analyzed: vyajyante vijigīṣūṇām dravyāṇām śaktayaḥ tathā

original: taikṣṇyagauravakāṭhinya- saṃsthānaiḥ svair asir yadā /
analyzed: taikṣṇya gaurava kāṭhinya saṃsthānaiḥ svaiḥ asiḥ yadā

original: chedyaṃ prati vyāpriyate śaktimān gṛhyate tadā // BVaky_3,7.31 //
analyzed: chedyam prati vyāpriyate śaktimān gṛhyate tadā

original: prā“n nimittāntarodbhūtaṃ kriyāyāḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: prāt nimitta antara udbhūtam kriyāyāḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: sādhanaṃ sahajaṃ kaiś cit kriyānyaiḥ pūrvam iṣyate // BVaky_3,7.32 //
analyzed: sādhanam sahajam kaiḥ cit kriyā anyaiḥ pūrvam iṣyate

original: pravṛttir eva prathamaṃ kva cid apy anapāśritā /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ eva prathamam kva cit api anapāśritā

original: śaktīr ekādhikaraṇe srotovad apakarṣati // BVaky_3,7.33 //
analyzed: śaktīḥ eka adhikaraṇe srotaḥ vat apakarṣati

original: apūrvaṃ kālaśaktiṃ vā kriyāṃ vā kālam eva vā /
analyzed: apūrvam kāla śaktim vā kriyām vā kālam eva vā

original: tam evamlaksanam bhāvam ke cid āhuh katham ca na // BVaky_3,7.34 //
analyzed: tam evamlaksanam bhāvam ke cid āhuh katham ca na

original: nityāḥ ṣaṭ śaktayo 'anyeṣāṃ bhedābhedasamanvitāḥ /
analyzed: nityāḥ ṣaḍ śaktayaḥ anyeṣām bheda abheda samanvitāḥ

original: kriyāsaṃsiddhaye 'rtheṣu jātivat samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,7.35 //
analyzed: kriyā saṃsiddhaye rtheṣu jāti vat samavasthitāḥ

original: dravyākārādibhedena tāś cāparimitā iva /
analyzed: dravya ākāra ādi bhedena tāḥ ca aparimitāḥ iva

original: dṛśyante tattvam āsāṃ tu ṣaṭ śaktīr nātivartate // BVaky_3,7.36 //
analyzed: dṛśyante tattvam āsām tu ṣaḍ śaktīḥ na ativartate

original: nimittabhedād ekaiva bhinnā śaktiḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: nimitta bhedāt ekā eva bhinnā śaktiḥ pratīyate

original: ṣoḍhā kartṛtvam evāhus tatpravṛtter nibandhanam // BVaky_3,7.37 //
analyzed: ṣoḍhā kartṛ tvam eva āhuḥ tad pravṛtteḥ nibandhanam

original: tattve vā vyatireke vā vyatiriktaṃ tad ucyate /
analyzed: tattve vā vyatireke vā vyatiriktam tat ucyate

original: śabdapramāṇako lokaḥ sa śāstreṇānugamyate // BVaky_3,7.38 //
analyzed: śabda pramāṇakaḥ lokaḥ sa śāstreṇa anugamyate

original: paramārthe tu naikatvaṃ pṛthaktvād bhinnalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: paramārthe tu nā ekatvam pṛthaktvāt bhinna lakṣaṇam

original: pṛthaktvaikatvarūpeṇa tattvam eva prakāśate // BVaky_3,7.39 //
analyzed: pṛthaktva ekatva rūpeṇa tattvam eva prakāśate

original: yat pṛthaktvam asaṃdigdhaṃ tad ekatvān na bhidyate /
analyzed: yat pṛthaktvam asaṃdigdham tat ekatvāt na bhidyate

original: yad ekatvam asaṃdigdhaṃ tat pṛthaktvān na bhidyate // BVaky_3,7.40 //
analyzed: yat eka tvam asaṃdigdham tat pṛthaktvāt na bhidyate

original: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ādityaḥ sāgarāḥ sarito diśaḥ /
analyzed: dyauḥ kṣamā vāyuḥ ādityaḥ sāgarāḥ saritaḥ diśaḥ

original: antaḥkaraṇatattvasya bhāgā bahir avasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,7.41 //
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa tattvasya bhāgāḥ bahis avasthitāḥ

original: kālavicchedarūpeṇa tad evaikam avasthitam /
analyzed: kāla viccheda rūpeṇa tat eva ekam avasthitam

original: sa hy apūrvāparo bhāvaḥ kramarūpeṇa lakṣyate // BVaky_3,7.42 //
analyzed: sa hi apūrva aparaḥ bhāvaḥ krama rūpeṇa lakṣyate

original: dṛṣṭo hy avyatireke 'pi vyatireko 'nvaye 'sati /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ hi avyatireke vyatirekaḥ nvaye sati

original: vṛkṣādyarthānvayas tasmād vibhaktyartho 'nya iṣyate // BVaky_3,7.43 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa ādi artha anvayaḥ tasmāt vibhakti arthaḥ nyaḥ iṣyate

original: sāmānyaṃ kārakaṃ tasya saptādyā bhedayonayaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyam kārakam tasya sapta ādyāḥ bheda yonayaḥ

original: ṣaṭ karmākhyādibhedena śeṣabhedas tu saptamī // BVaky_3,7.44 //
analyzed: ṣaṭ karma ākhyā ādi bhedena śeṣa bhedaḥ tu saptamī

original: [atha karmādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha karma adhikāraḥ

original: nirvartyaṃ ca vikāryaṃ ca prāpyaṃ ceti tridhā matam /
analyzed: nirvartyam ca vikāryam ca prāpyam ca iti tridhā matam

original: tatrepsitatamaṃ karma caturdhānyat tu kalpitam // BVaky_3,7.45 //
analyzed: tatra īpsitatamam karma caturdhā anyat tu kalpitam

original: audāsīnyena yat prāpyaṃ yac ca kartur anīpsitam /
analyzed: audāsīnyena yat prāpyam yat ca kartuḥ anīpsitam

original: saṃjñāntarair anākhyātaṃ yad yac cāpy anyapūrvakam // BVaky_3,7.46 //
analyzed: saṃjñā antaraiḥ an ākhyātam yat yat ca api anya pūrvakam

original: satī vāvidyamānā vā prakṛtiḥ pariṇāminī /
analyzed: satī vā a vidyamānā vā prakṛtiḥ pariṇāminī

original: yasya nāśriyate tasya nirvartyatvaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.47 //
analyzed: yasya na āśriyate tasya nirvartya tvam pracakṣate

original: prakṛtes tu vivakṣāyāṃ vikāryaṃ kaiś cid anyathā /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ tu vivakṣāyām vikāryam kaiḥ cit anyathā

original: nirvartyaṃ ca vikāryaṃ ca karma śāstre pradarśitam // BVaky_3,7.48 //
analyzed: nirvartyam ca vikāryam ca karma śāstre pradarśitam

original: yad asaj jāyate sad vā janmanā yat prakāśyate /
analyzed: yat asat jāyate sat vā janmanā yat prakāśyate

original: tan nirvartyaṃ vikāryaṃ ca karma dvedhā vyavasthitam // BVaky_3,7.49 //
analyzed: tat nirvartyam vikāryam ca karma dvedhā vyavasthitam

original: prakṛtyucchedasaṃbhūtaṃ kiṃ cit kāṣṭhādibhasmavat /
analyzed: prakṛti uccheda saṃbhūtam kim cit kāṣṭha ādi bhasma vat

original: kiṃ cid guṇāntarotpattyā suvarṇādivikāravat // BVaky_3,7.50 //
analyzed: kim cit guṇa antara utpattyā suvarṇa ādi vikāravat

original: kriyākṛtā viśeṣāṇāṃ siddhir yatra na gamyate /
analyzed: kriyā kṛtā viśeṣāṇām siddhiḥ yatra na gamyate

original: darśanād anumānād vā tat prāpyam iti kathyate // BVaky_3,7.51 //
analyzed: darśanāt anumānāt vā tat prāpyam iti kathyate

original: viśeṣalābhaḥ sarvatra vidyate darśanādibhiḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa lābhaḥ sarvatra vidyate darśana ādibhiḥ

original: keṣāṃ cit tadabhivyakti- siddhir dṛṣṭiviṣādiṣu // BVaky_3,7.52 //
analyzed: keṣām cit tad abhivyakti siddhiḥ dṛṣṭi viṣa ādiṣu

original: ābhāsopagamo vyaktiḥ soḍhatvam iti karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ābhāsa upagamaḥ vyaktiḥ soḍha tvam iti karmaṇaḥ

original: viśeṣāḥ prāpyamāṇasya kriyāsiddhau vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,7.53 //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ prāpyamāṇasya kriyā siddhau vyavasthitāḥ

original: nirvartyādiṣu tat pūrvam anubhūya svatantratām /
analyzed: nirvartya ādiṣu tat pūrvam anubhūya svatantra tām

original: kartrantarāṇāṃ vyāpāre karma saṃpadyate tataḥ // BVaky_3,7.54 //
analyzed: kartṛ antarāṇām vyāpāre karma saṃpadyate tatas

original: tadvyāpāraviveke 'pi svavyāpāre vyavasthitam /
analyzed: tad vyāpāra viveke sva vyāpāre vyavasthitam

original: karmāpadiṣṭāṃllabhate kva cic chāstrāśrayān vidhīn // BVaky_3,7.55 //
analyzed: karma apadiṣṭān labhate kva cit śāstra āśrayān vidhīn

original: nivṛttapreṣaṇaṃ karma svakriyāvayave sthitam /
analyzed: nivṛtta preṣaṇam karma sva kriyā avayave sthitam

original: nivartamāne karmatve sve kartṛtve 'vatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,7.56 //
analyzed: nivartamāne karma tve sve kartṛ tve vatiṣṭhate

original: tāni dhātvantarāṇy eva pacisidhyativad viduḥ /
analyzed: tāni dhātu antarāṇi eva paci sidhyati vat viduḥ

original: bhede 'pi tulyarūpatvād ekatvaparikalpanā // BVaky_3,7.57 //
analyzed: bhede pi tulya rūpa tvāt eka tva parikalpanā

original: ekadeśe samūhe ca vyāpārāṇāṃ pacādayaḥ /
analyzed: eka deśe samūhe ca vyāpārāṇām paca ādayaḥ

original: svabhāvataḥ pravartante tulyarūpasamanvitāḥ // BVaky_3,7.58 //
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ pravartante tulya rūpa samanvitāḥ

original: nyagbhāvanā nyagbhavanaṃ ruhau śuddhe pratīyate /
analyzed: nyagbhāvanā nyagbhavanam ruhau śuddhe pratīyate

original: nyagbhāvanā nyagbhavanaṃ ṇyante 'pi pratipadyate // BVaky_3,7.59 //
analyzed: nyagbhāvanā nyagbhavanam pi pratipadyate

original: avasthāṃ pañcamīm āhur ṇyante tāṃ karmakartari /
analyzed: avasthām pañcamīm āhuḥ ṇi ante tām karma kartari

original: nivṛttapreṣaṇād dhātoḥ prākṛte 'rthe ṇij ucyate // BVaky_3,7.60 //
analyzed: nivṛtta preṣaṇāt dhātoḥ prākṛte rthe ṇic ucyate

original: bravīti pacater arthaṃ sidhyatir na vinā ṇicā /
analyzed: bravīti pacateḥ artham sidhyatiḥ na vinā ṇicā

original: sa ṇyantaḥ pacater arthe prākṛte vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,7.61 //
analyzed: sa ṇi antaḥ pacateḥ arthe prākṛte vyavatiṣṭhate

original: keṣāṃ cid devadattāder vyāpāro yaḥ sakarmake /
analyzed: keṣām cit devadatta ādeḥ vyāpāraḥ yaḥ sakarmake

original: sa vinā devadattādeḥ kaṭādiṣu vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,7.62 //
analyzed: sa vinā devadatta ādeḥ kaṭa ādiṣu vivakṣyate

original: nivṛttapreṣaṇaṃ karma svasya kartuḥ prayojakam /
analyzed: nivṛtta preṣaṇam karma svasya kartuḥ prayojakam

original: preṣaṇāntarasaṃbandhe ṇyante lenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.63 //
analyzed: preṣaṇa antara saṃbandhe ṇi ante lena abhidhīyate

original: sadṛśādiṣu yat karma- kartṛtvaṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: sadṛśa ādiṣu yat karma kartṛ tvam pratipadyate

original: āpattyāpādane tatra viṣayatvaṃ prati kriye // BVaky_3,7.64 //
analyzed: āpatti āpādane tatra viṣaya tvam prati kriye

original: kutaś cid āhṛtya padam evaṃ ca parikalpane /
analyzed: kutas cit āhṛtya padam evam ca parikalpane

original: karmasthabhāvakatvaṃ syād darśanādyabhidhāyinām // BVaky_3,7.65 //
analyzed: karma stha bhāvaka tvam syāt darśana ādi abhidhāyinām

original: viśeṣadarśanaṃ yatra kriyā tatra vyavasthitā /
analyzed: viśeṣa darśanam yatra kriyā tatra vyavasthitā

original: kriyāvyavasthā tv anyeṣāṃ śabdair eva prakāśyate // BVaky_3,7.66 //
analyzed: kriyā vyavasthā tu anyeṣām śabdaiḥ eva prakāśyate

original: kālabhāvādhvadeśānām antarbhūtakriyāntaraiḥ /
analyzed: kāla bhāva adhva deśānām antarbhūta kriyā antaraiḥ

original: sarvair akarmakair yoge karmatvam upajāyate // BVaky_3,7.67 //
analyzed: sarvaiḥ akarmakaiḥ yoge karma tvam upajāyate

original: ādhāratvam iva prāptās te punar dravyakarmasu /
analyzed: ādhāra tvam iva prāptāḥ te punar dravya karmasu

original: kālādayo bhinnakakṣyaṃ yānti karmatvam uttaram // BVaky_3,7.68 //
analyzed: kāla ādayaḥ bhinna kakṣyam yānti karma tvam uttaram

original: atas taiḥ karmabhir dhātur yukto 'dravyair akarmakaḥ /
analyzed: atas taiḥ karmabhiḥ dhātuḥ yuktaḥ dravyaiḥ akarmakaḥ

original: lasya karmaṇi bhāve ca nimittatvāya kalpate // BVaky_3,7.69 //
analyzed: lasya karmaṇi bhāve ca nimitta tvāya kalpate

original: sarvaṃ cākathitaṃ karma bhinnakakṣyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: sarvam ca a kathitam karma bhinna kakṣyam pratīyate

original: dhātvarthoddeśabhedena tan nepsitatamaṃ kila // BVaky_3,7.70 //
analyzed: dhātvartha uddeśa bhedena tat nā īpsitatamam kila

original: pradhānakarma kathitaṃ yat kriyāyāḥ prayojakam /
analyzed: pradhāna karma kathitam yat kriyāyāḥ prayojakam

original: tatsiddhaye kriyāyuktam anyat tv akathitaṃ smṛtam // BVaky_3,7.71 //
analyzed: tad siddhaye kriyā yuktam anyat tu a kathitam smṛtam

original: duhyādivan nayatyādau karmatvam akathāśrayam /
analyzed: duhya ādi vat nayati ādau karma tvam a kathā āśrayam

original: ākhyātānupayoge tu niyamāc cheṣa iṣyate // BVaky_3,7.72 //
analyzed: ākhyāta an upayoge tu niyamāt śeṣaḥ iṣyate

original: antarbhūtaṇijarthānāṃ duhyādīnāṃ ṇijantavat /
analyzed: antarbhūta ṇic arthānām duhi ādīnām ṇic anta vat

original: siddhaṃ pūrveṇa karmatvaṃ ṇijantaniyamas tathā // BVaky_3,7.73 //
analyzed: siddham pūrveṇa karma tvam ṇic anta niyamaḥ tathā

original: karaṇasya svakakṣyāyāṃ na prakarṣāśrayo yathā /
analyzed: karaṇasya sva kakṣyāyām na prakarṣa āśrayaḥ yathā

original: karmaṇo 'pi svakakṣyāyāṃ na syād atiśayas tathā // BVaky_3,7.74 //
analyzed: sva kakṣyāyām na syāt atiśayaḥ tathā

original: karmaṇas tv āptum iṣṭatva āśrite 'tiśayo yataḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ tu āptum iṣṭa tve āśrite tiśayaḥ yatas

original: āśrīyate tato 'tyantaṃ bhedaḥ pūrveṇa karmaṇā // BVaky_3,7.75 //
analyzed: āśrīyate tyantam bhedaḥ pūrveṇa karmaṇā

original: ṇijante ca yathā kartā sakriyaḥ san prayujyate /
analyzed: ṇic ante ca yathā kartā sa kriyaḥ san prayujyate

original: na duhyādau tathā kartā niṣkriyo 'pi prayujyate // BVaky_3,7.76 //
analyzed: na duhya ādau tathā kartā prayujyate

analyzed: bheda vākyam tu yat ṇi ante nī duhi prakṛtau ca yat

original: śabdāntaratvān naivāsti saṃsparśas tasya dhātunā // BVaky_3,7.77 //
analyzed: śabda antara tvāt na eva asti saṃsparśaḥ tasya dhātunā

original: yathaivaikam apādānaṃ śāstre bhedena darśitam /
analyzed: yathā eva ekam apādānam śāstre bhedena darśitam

original: tathaikam eva karmāpi bhedena pratipāditam // BVaky_3,7.78 //
analyzed: tathā ekam eva karma api bhedena pratipāditam

original: nirvartyo vā vikāryo vā prāpyo vā sādhanāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: nirvartyaḥ vā vikāryaḥ vā prāpyaḥ vā sādhana āśrayaḥ

original: kriyāṇām eva sādhyatvāt siddharūpo 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.79 //
analyzed: kriyāṇām eva sādhya tvāt siddha rūpaḥ bhidhīyate

original: ahiteṣu yathā laulyāt kartur icchopajāyate /
analyzed: ahiteṣu yathā laulyāt kartuḥ icchā upajāyate

original: viṣādiṣu bhayādibhyas tathaivāsau pravartate // BVaky_3,7.80 //
analyzed: viṣa ādiṣu bhaya ādibhyaḥ tathā eva asau pravartate

original: pradhānetarayor yatra dravyasya kriyayoḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: pradhāna itarayoḥ yatra dravyasya kriyayoḥ pṛthak

original: śaktir guṇāśrayā tatra pradhānam anurudhyate // BVaky_3,7.81 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ guṇa āśrayā tatra pradhānam anurudhyate

original: pradhānaviṣayā śaktiḥ pratyayenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: pradhāna viṣayā śaktiḥ pratyayena abhidhīyate

analyzed: yadā guṇe tadā tadvat anuktā api prakāśate

analyzed: bhujau śakti antare pi ukte tat tad dharma prakāśate

analyzed: iṣeḥ ca gami saṃsparśāt grāme yaḥ laḥ vidhīyate

original: tatreṣiṇaiva nirbhogaḥ kriyate gamikarmaṇaḥ // BVaky_3,7.84 //
analyzed: tatra iṣiṇā eva nirbhogaḥ kriyate gami karmaṇaḥ

original: paktvā bhujyata ity atra keṣāṃ cin na vyapekṣate /
analyzed: paktvā bhujyate iti atra keṣām cit na vyapekṣate

original: odanaṃ pacatiḥ so 'sāv anumānāt pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.85 //
analyzed: odanam pacatiḥ sā u sau anumānāt pratīyate

analyzed: tathā abhi ni viśau karma yat tin ante bhidhīyate
