analyzed: ktvā ante dhikaraṇa tve pi na tatra icchanti saptamīm

original: yan nirvṛttāśrayaṃ karma prāpter apracitaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: yat nirvṛtta āśrayam karma prāpteḥ a pracitam punar

original: bhakṣyādiviṣayāpattyā bhidyamānaṃ tad īpsitam // BVaky_3,7.87 //
analyzed: bhakṣya ādi viṣaya āpattyā bhidyamānam tat īpsitam

original: dhātor arthāntare vṛtter dhātvarthenopasaṃgrahāt /
analyzed: dhātoḥ artha antare vṛtteḥ dhātvarthena upasaṃgrahāt

original: prasiddher avivakṣātaḥ karmaṇo 'karmikā kriyā // BVaky_3,7.88 //
analyzed: prasiddheḥ avivakṣātaḥ karmaṇaḥ karmikā kriyā

original: bhedā ya ete catvāraḥ sāmānyena pradarśitāḥ /
analyzed: bhedāḥ ye ete catvāraḥ sāmānyena pradarśitāḥ

original: te nimittādibhedena bhidyante bahudhā punaḥ // BVaky_3,7.89 //
analyzed: te nimitta ādi bhedena bhidyante bahudhā punar

original: [iti karmādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti karma adhikāraḥ

original: [atha karaṇādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha karaṇa adhikāraḥ

original: kriyāyāḥ pariniṣpattir yadvyāpārād anantaram /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ pariniṣpattiḥ yat vyāpārāt anantaram

original: vivakṣyate yadā tatra karaṇatvaṃ tadā smṛtam // BVaky_3,7.90 //
analyzed: vivakṣyate yadā tatra karaṇa tvam tadā smṛtam

original: vastutas tad anirdeśyaṃ na hi vastu vyavasthitam /
analyzed: vastutas tat anirdeśyam na hi vastu vyavasthitam

original: sthālyā pacyata ity eṣā vivakṣā dṛśyate yataḥ // BVaky_3,7.91 //
analyzed: sthālyā pacyate iti eṣā vivakṣā dṛśyate yatas

original: karaṇeṣu tu saṃskāram ārabhante punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: karaṇeṣu tu saṃskāram ārabhante punar punar

original: viniyogaviśeṣāṃś ca pradhānasya prasiddhaye // BVaky_3,7.92 //
analyzed: viniyoga viśeṣān ca pradhānasya prasiddhaye

original: svakakṣyāsu prakarṣaś ca karaṇānāṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: sva kakṣyāsu prakarṣaḥ ca karaṇānām na vidyate

original: āśritātiśayatvaṃ tu paratas tatra lakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,7.93 //
analyzed: āśrita atiśaya tvam tu paratas tatra lakṣaṇam

original: svātantrye 'pi prayoktāra ārād evopakurvate /
analyzed: svātantrye pi prayoktāraḥ ārāt eva upakurvate

original: karaṇena hi sarveṣāṃ vyāpāro vyavadhīyate // BVaky_3,7.94 //
analyzed: karaṇena hi sarveṣām vyāpāraḥ vyavadhīyate

original: kriyāsiddhau prakarṣo 'yaṃ nyagbhāvas tv eva kartari /
analyzed: kriyā siddhau prakarṣaḥ yam nyagbhāvaḥ tu eva kartari

original: siddhau satyāṃ hi sāmānyaṃ sādhakatvaṃ prakṛṣyate // BVaky_3,7.95 //
analyzed: siddhau satyām hi sāmānyam sādhaka tvam prakṛṣyate

original: asyādīnāṃ tu kartṛtve taikṣṇyādi karaṇaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: asya ādīnām tu kartṛ tve taikṣṇya ādi karaṇam viduḥ

original: taikṣṇyādīnāṃ svatantratve dvedhātmā vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,7.96 //
analyzed: taikṣṇya ādīnām svatantra tve dvedhā ātmā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: ātmabhede 'pi saty evam eko 'rthaḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ /
analyzed: ātma bhede pi sati evam ekaḥ rthaḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ

original: tadāśrayatvād bhede 'pi kartṛtvaṃ bādhakaṃ tataḥ // BVaky_3,7.97 //
analyzed: tad āśraya tvāt bhede pi kartṛ tvam bādhakam tatas

original: yathā ca saṃnidhānena karaṇatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: yathā ca saṃnidhānena karaṇa tvam pratīyate

original: tathaivāsaṃnidhāne 'pi kriyāsiddheḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.98 //
analyzed: tathā eva asaṃnidhāne pi kriyā siddheḥ pratīyate

original: stokasya vābhinirvṛtter anirvṛtteś ca tasya vā /
analyzed: stokasya vā abhinirvṛtteḥ anirvṛtteḥ ca tasya vā

original: prasiddhiṃ karaṇatvasya stokādīnāṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.99 //
analyzed: prasiddhim karaṇa tvasya stoka ādīnām pracakṣate

original: dharmāṇāṃ tadvatā bhedād abhedāc ca viśiṣyate /
analyzed: dharmāṇām tadvatā bhedāt abhedāt ca viśiṣyate

original: kriyāvadher avaccheda- viśeṣād bhidyate yathā // BVaky_3,7.100 //
analyzed: kriyā avadheḥ avaccheda viśeṣāt bhidyate yathā

original: [iti karaṇādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti karaṇa adhikāraḥ

original: [atha kartradhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha kartṛ adhikāraḥ

original: prāg anyataḥ śaktilābhān nyagbhāvāpādanād api /
analyzed: prāk anyatas śakti lābhāt nyagbhāva āpādanāt api

original: tadadhīnapravṛttitvāt pravṛttānāṃ nivartanāt // BVaky_3,7.101 //
analyzed: tad adhīna pravṛtti tvāt pravṛttānām nivartanāt

original: adṛṣṭatvāt pratinidheḥ praviveke ca darśanāt /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa tvāt pratinidheḥ praviveke ca darśanāt

original: ārād apy upakāritve svātantryaṃ kartur ucyate // BVaky_3,7.102 //
analyzed: ārāt api upakāri tve svātantryam kartuḥ ucyate

original: dharmair abhyuditaiḥ śabde niyamo na tu vastuni /
analyzed: dharmaiḥ abhyuditaiḥ śabde niyamaḥ na tu vastuni

original: kartṛdharmavivakṣāyāṃ śabdāt kartā pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.103 //
analyzed: kartṛ dharma vivakṣāyām śabdāt kartā pratīyate

original: ekasya buddhyavasthābhir bhede ca parikalpite /
analyzed: ekasya buddhi avasthābhiḥ bhede ca parikalpite

original: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca karmatvaṃ copajāyate // BVaky_3,7.104 //
analyzed: kartṛ tvam karaṇa tvam ca karma tvam ca upajāyate

original: utpatteḥ prāg asadbhāvo buddhyavasthānibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: utpatteḥ prāk asadbhāvaḥ buddhi avasthā nibandhanaḥ

original: aviśiṣṭaḥ satānyena kartā bhavati janmanaḥ // BVaky_3,7.10@ //
analyzed: a viśiṣṭaḥ satā anyena kartā bhavati janmanaḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ kāryabhāvena yadā vāvyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: kāraṇam kārya bhāvena yadā

original: kāryaśabdaṃ tadā labdhvā kāryatvenopajāyate // BVaky_3,7.106 //
analyzed: kārya śabdam tadā labdhvā kārya tvena upajāyate

original: yathāheḥ kuṇḍalībhāvo vyagrāṇāṃ vā samagratā /
analyzed: yathā aheḥ kuṇḍalībhāvaḥ vyagrāṇām vā samagra tā

original: tathaiva janmarūpatvaṃ satām eke pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.107 //
analyzed: tathā eva janma rūpa tvam satām eke pracakṣate

original: vibhaktayoni yat kāryaṃ kāraṇebhyaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: vibhakta yoni yat kāryam kāraṇebhyaḥ pravartate

original: svā jātir vyaktirūpeṇa tasyāpi vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,7.108 //
analyzed: svā jātiḥ vyakti rūpeṇa tasya api vyavatiṣṭhate

original: bhāveṣv eva padanyāsaḥ prajñāyā vāca eva vā /
analyzed: bhāveṣu eva pada nyāsaḥ prajñāyāḥ vācaḥ eva vā

original: nāstīty apy apade nāsti na ca sad bhidyate tataḥ // BVaky_3,7.109 //
analyzed: na asti iti api a pade na asti na ca sat bhidyate tatas

original: buddhiśabdau pravartete yathābhūteṣu vastuṣu /
analyzed: buddhi śabdau pravartete yathā bhūteṣu vastuṣu

original: teṣām anyena tattvena vyavahāro na vidyate // BVaky_3,7.110 //
analyzed: teṣām anyena tattvena vyavahāraḥ na vidyate

original: ākāśasya yathā bhedaś chāyāyāś calanaṃ yathā /
analyzed: ākāśasya yathā bhedaḥ chāyāyāḥ calanam yathā

original: janmanāśāv abhede 'pi tathā kaiś cit prakalpitau // BVaky_3,7.111 //
analyzed: janma nāśau abhede tathā kaiḥ cit prakalpitau

original: yathaivākāśanāstitvam asan mūrtinirūpitam /
analyzed: yathā eva ākāśa nāstitvam asat mūrti nirūpitam

original: tathaiva mūrtināstitvam asadākāśaniśrayam // BVaky_3,7.112 //
analyzed: tathā eva mūrti nāstitvam asat ākāśa niśrayam

original: yathā tadarthair vyāpāraiḥ kriyātmā vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: yathā tad arthaiḥ vyāpāraiḥ kriyā ātmā vyapadiśyate

original: abhedagrahaṇād eṣa kāryakāraṇayoḥ kramaḥ // BVaky_3,7.113 //
analyzed: abheda grahaṇāt eṣa kārya kāraṇayoḥ kramaḥ

original: vikāro janmanaḥ kartā prakṛtir veti saṃśaye /
analyzed: vikāraḥ janmanaḥ kartā prakṛtiḥ vā iti saṃśaye

original: bhidyate pratipattṛṇāṃ darśanaṃ li“ngadarśanaiḥ // BVaky_3,7.114 //
analyzed: bhidyate pratipattṛṇām darśanam linga darśanaiḥ

original: kḷpi saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ /
analyzed: saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ

original: suvarṇapiṇḍe prakṛtau vacanaṃ kuṇḍalāśrayam // BVaky_3,7.115 //
analyzed: suvarṇa piṇḍe prakṛtau vacanam kuṇḍala āśrayam

original: vākye saṃpadyateḥ kartā sa“nghaś cvyantasya kathyate /
analyzed: vākye saṃpadyateḥ kartā sanghaḥ cvi antasya kathyate

original: vṛttau saṅghībhavantīti brāhmaṇānāṃ svatantratā // BVaky_3,7.116 //
analyzed: vṛttau saṅghībhavanti iti brāhmaṇānām svatantra tā

original: atvaṃ saṃpadyate yas tvaṃ na tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā /
analyzed: saṃpadyate yaḥ tvam na tasmin yuṣmad āśrayā

original: pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyāsti prākṛtaḥ sa vidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.117 //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ puruṣasya asti prākṛtaḥ sa vidhīyate

original: pūrvāvasthām avijahat saṃspṛśan dharmam uttaram /
analyzed: pūrva avasthām a vijahat saṃspṛśan dharmam uttaram

original: saṃmūrchita ivārthātmā jāyamāno 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.118 //
analyzed: saṃmūrchitaḥ iva artha ātmā jāyamānaḥ bhidhīyate

original: savyāpārataraḥ kaś cit kva cid dharmaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: sa vyāpārataraḥ kaḥ cit kva cit dharmaḥ pratīyate

original: saṃsṛjyante ca bhāvānāṃ bhedavatyo 'pi śaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,7.119 //
analyzed: saṃsṛjyante ca bhāvānām bhedavatyaḥ api śaktayaḥ

original: viparītārthavṛttitvaṃ puruṣasya viparyaye /
analyzed: viparīta artha vṛtti tvam puruṣasya viparyaye

original: gamyeta sādhanaṃ hy atra savyāpāraṃ pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.120 //
analyzed: gamyeta sādhanam hi atra sa vyāpāram pratīyate

original: tvam anyo bhavasīty eṣā tatra syāt parikalpanā /
analyzed: tvam anyaḥ bhavasi iti eṣā tatra syāt parikalpanā

original: rājñi bhṛtyatvamāpanne yathā tadvad gatir bhavet // BVaky_3,7.121 //
analyzed: rājñi bhṛtya tvam āpanne yathā tadvat gatiḥ bhavet

original: saṃbhāvanāt kriyāsiddhau kartṛtvena samāśritaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhāvanāt kriyā siddhau kartṛ tvena samāśritaḥ

original: kriyāyām ātmasādhyāyāṃ sādhanānāṃ prayojakaḥ // BVaky_3,7.122 //
analyzed: kriyāyām ātma sādhyāyām sādhanānām prayojakaḥ

original: prayogamātre nyagbhāvaṃ svātantryād eva niśritaḥ /
analyzed: prayoga mātre nyagbhāvam svātantryāt eva niśritaḥ

original: aviśiṣṭo bhavaty anyaiḥ svatantrair muktasaṃśayaiḥ // BVaky_3,7.123 //
analyzed: a viśiṣṭaḥ bhavati anyaiḥ svatantraiḥ mukta saṃśayaiḥ

original: nimittebhyaḥ pravartante sarva eva svabhūtaye /
analyzed: nimittebhyaḥ pravartante sarve eva sva bhūtaye

original: abhiprāyānurodho 'pi svārthasyaiva prasiddhaye // BVaky_3,7.124 //
analyzed: sva arthasya eva prasiddhaye

original: [iti kartradhikāraḥ][atha hetvadhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti kartṛ adhikāraḥ atha hetu adhikāraḥ

original: preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇe kurvaṃs tatsamarthāni cācaran /
analyzed: preṣaṇa adhyeṣaṇe kurvan tad samarthāni ca ācaran

original: kartaiva vihitāṃ śāstre hetusaṃjñāṃ prapadyate // BVaky_3,7.125 //
analyzed: kartā eva vihitām śāstre hetu saṃjñām prapadyate

original: dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchyāder loḍ vidhīyate /
analyzed: dravya mātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchya ādeḥ loṭ vidhīyate

original: sakriyasya prayogas tu yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ // BVaky_3,7.126 //
analyzed: sa kriyasya prayogaḥ tu yadā sa viṣayaḥ ṇicaḥ

original: guṇakriyāyāṃ svātantryāt preṣaṇe karmatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: guṇa kriyāyām svātantryāt preṣaṇe karma tām gataḥ

original: niyamāt karmasaṃjñāyāḥ svadharmeṇābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.127 //
analyzed: niyamāt karma saṃjñāyāḥ svadharmeṇa abhidhīyate

original: kriyāyāḥ prerakaṃ karma hetuḥ kartuḥ prayojakaḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ prerakam karma hetuḥ kartuḥ prayojakaḥ

original: karmārthā ca kriyotpatti- saṃskārapratipattibhiḥ // BVaky_3,7.128 //
analyzed: karma arthā ca kriyā utpatti saṃskāra pratipattibhiḥ

original: [iti hetvadhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti hetvadhikāraḥ

original: [atha saṃpradānādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha saṃpradāna adhikāraḥ

original: anirākaraṇāt kartus tyāgā“ngaṃ karmaṇepsitam /
analyzed: a nirākaraṇāt kartuḥ tyāga angam karmaṇā īpsitam

original: preraṇānumatibhyāṃ ca labhate saṃpradānatām // BVaky_3,7.129 //
analyzed: preraṇa anumatibhyām ca labhate saṃpradāna tām

original: hetutve karmasaṃjñāyāṃ śeṣatve vāpi kārakam /
analyzed: hetu tve karma saṃjñāyām śeṣa tve vā api kārakam

original: rucyarthādiṣu śāstreṇa saṃpradānākhyam ucyate // BVaky_3,7.130 //
analyzed: ruci artha ādiṣu śāstreṇa saṃpradāna ākhyam ucyate

original: bhedasya ca vivakṣāyāṃ pūrvāṃ pūrvāṃ kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: bhedasya ca vivakṣāyām pūrvām pūrvām kriyām prati

original: parasyā“ngasya karmatvān na kriyāgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam // BVaky_3,7.131 //
analyzed: parasya angasya karma tvāt na kriyā grahaṇam kṛtam

original: kriyāṇāṃ samudāye tu yadaikatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
analyzed: kriyāṇām samudāye tu yadā eka tvam vivakṣitam

original: tadā karma kriyāyogāt svākhyayaivopacaryate // BVaky_3,7.132 //
analyzed: tadā karma kriyā yogāt sva ākhyayā eva upacaryate

original: bhedābhedavivakṣā ca svabhāvena vyavasthitā /
analyzed: bheda abheda vivakṣā ca svabhāvena vyavasthitā

original: tasmād gatyarthakarmatve vyabhicāro na dṛśyate // BVaky_3,7.133 //
analyzed: tasmāt gati artha karma tve vyabhicāraḥ na dṛśyate

original: vikalpenaiva sarvatra saṃjñe syātām ubhe yadi /
analyzed: vikalpena eva sarvatra saṃjñe syātām ubhe yadi

original: ārambheṇa na yogasya pratyākhyānaṃ samaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,7.134 //
analyzed: ārambheṇa na yogasya pratyākhyānam samam bhavet

original: tyāgarūpaṃ prahātavye prāpye saṃsargadarśanam /
analyzed: tyāga rūpam prahātavye prāpye saṃsarga darśanam

original: āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā // BVaky_3,7.135 //
analyzed: āsthitam karma yat tatra dvairūpyam bhajate kriyā

original: [iti saṃpradānādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti saṃpradāna adhikāraḥ

original: [athāpādānādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha apādāna adhikāraḥ

original: nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ kiṃ cid upāttaviṣayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭa viṣayam kim cit upātta viṣayam tathā

original: apekṣitakriyaṃ ceti tridhāpādānam ucyate // BVaky_3,7.136 //
analyzed: apekṣita kriyam ca iti tridhā apādānam ucyate

original: saṃyogabhedād bhinnātmā gamir eva bhramir yathā /
analyzed: saṃyoga bhedāt bhinna ātmā gamiḥ eva bhramiḥ yathā

original: dhruvāvadhir apāyo 'pi samavetas tathādhruve // BVaky_3,7.137 //
analyzed: dhruva avadhiḥ apāyaḥ samavetaḥ tathā adhruve

original: dravyasvabhāvo na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate /
analyzed: dravya svabhāvaḥ na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate

original: apāyaviṣayaṃ dhrauvyaṃ yat tu tāvad vivakṣitam // BVaky_3,7.138 //
analyzed: apāya viṣayam dhrauvyam yat tu tāvat vivakṣitam

original: saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyaṃ pāte tu vājinaḥ /
analyzed: saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyam pāte tu vājinaḥ

original: āviṣṭaṃ yad apāyena tasyādhrauvyaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.139 //
analyzed: āviṣṭam yat apāyena tasya adhrauvyam pracakṣate

original: ubhāv apy adhruvau meṣau yady apy ubhayakarmaje /
analyzed: ubhau api adhruvau meṣau yadi api ubhaya karma je

original: vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite // BVaky_3,7.140 //
analyzed: vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite

original: meṣāntarakriyāpekṣam avadhitvaṃ pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: meṣa antara kriyā apekṣam avadhi tvam pṛthak pṛthak

original: meṣayoḥ svakriyāpekṣaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // BVaky_3,7.141 //
analyzed: meṣayoḥ sva kriyā apekṣam kartṛ tvam ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: abhedena kriyaikā tu dvisādhyā ced vivakṣitā /
analyzed: abhedena kriyā ekā tu dvi sādhyā ced vivakṣitā

original: meṣāv apāye kartārau yady anyo vidyate 'vadhiḥ // BVaky_3,7.142 //
analyzed: meṣau apāye kartārau yadi anyaḥ vidyate vadhiḥ

original: gatir vinā tv avadhinā nāpāya iti gamyate /
analyzed: gatiḥ vinā tu avadhinā na apāyaḥ iti gamyate

original: vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patatīty evaṃ bhāṣye nidarśitam // BVaky_3,7.143 //
analyzed: vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti evam bhāṣye nidarśitam

original: bhedābhedau pṛthagbhāvaḥ sthitiś ceti virodhinaḥ /
analyzed: bheda abhedau pṛthak bhāvaḥ sthitiḥ ca iti virodhinaḥ

original: yugapan na vivakṣyante sarve dharmā balāhake // BVaky_3,7.144 //
analyzed: yugapad na vivakṣyante sarve dharmāḥ balāhake

original: dhanuṣā vidhyatīty atra vināpāyavivakṣayā /
analyzed: dhanuṣā vidhyati iti atra vinā apāya vivakṣayā

original: karaṇatvaṃ yato nāsti tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ saha // BVaky_3,7.145 //
analyzed: karaṇa tvam yatas na asti tasmāt tat ubhayam saha

original: ekaiva vā satī śaktir dvirūpā vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: ekā eva vā satī śaktiḥ dvi rūpā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: nimittaṃ saṃjñayos tatra parayā bādhyate 'parā // BVaky_3,7.146 //
analyzed: nimittam saṃjñayoḥ tatra parayā bādhyate parā

original: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yaḥ bhī trā ādīnām ca yaḥ vidhiḥ

original: upāttāpekṣitāpāyaḥ so 'budhapratipattaye // BVaky_3,7.147 //
analyzed: upātta apekṣita apāyaḥ saḥ budha pratipattaye

original: [ity apādānādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti apādāna adhikāraḥ

original: [athādhikaraṇādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha adhikaraṇa adhikāraḥ

original: kartṛkarmavyavahitām asākṣād dhārayat kriyām /
analyzed: kartṛ karma vyavahitām asākṣāt dhārayat kriyām

original: upakurvat kriyāsiddhau śāstre 'dhikaraṇaṃ smṛtam // BVaky_3,7.148 //
analyzed: upakurvat kriyā siddhau śāstre adhikaraṇam smṛtam

original: upaśleṣasya cābhedas tilākāśakaṭādiṣu /
analyzed: upaśleṣasya ca abhedaḥ tila ākā śakaṭa ādiṣu

original: upakārās tu bhidyante saṃyogisamavāyinām // BVaky_3,7.149 //
analyzed: upakārāḥ tu bhidyante saṃyogi samavāyinām

original: avināśo gurutvasya pratibandhe svatantratā /
analyzed: avināśaḥ guru tvasya pratibandhe svatantra tā

original: digviśeṣād avaccheda ityādyā bhedahetavaḥ // BVaky_3,7.150 //
analyzed: diś viśeṣāt avacchedaḥ iti ādyāḥ bheda hetavaḥ

original: ākāśam eva keṣāṃ cid deśabhedaprakalpanāt /
analyzed: ākāśam eva keṣām cit deśa bheda prakalpanāt

original: ādhāraśaktiḥ prathamā sarvasaṃyogināṃ matā // BVaky_3,7.151 //
analyzed: ādhāra śaktiḥ prathamā sarva saṃyoginām matā

original: idam atreti bhāvānām abhāvān na prakalpate /
analyzed: idam atra iti bhāvānām abhāvāt na prakalpate

original: vyapadeśas tam ākāśa- nimittaṃ saṃpracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.152 //
analyzed: vyapadeśaḥ tam ākāśa nimittam saṃpracakṣate

original: kālāt kriyā vibhajyanta ākāśāt sarvamūrtayaḥ /
analyzed: kālāt kriyāḥ vibhajyante ākāśāt sarva mūrtayaḥ

original: etāvāṃś caiva bhedo 'yam abhedopanibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,7.153 //
analyzed: etāvān ca eva bhedaḥ yam abheda upanibandhanaḥ

original: yady apy upavasir deśa- viśeṣam anurudhyate /
analyzed: yadi api upavasiḥ deśa viśeṣam anurudhyate

original: śabdapravṛttidharmāt tu kālam evāvalambate // BVaky_3,7.154 //
analyzed: śabda pravṛtti dharmāt tu kālam eva avalambate

original: vasatāv aprayukte 'pi deśo 'dhikaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: vasatau a prayukte deśaḥ dhi karaṇam tatas

original: aprayuktaṃ trirātrādi karma copavasau smṛtam // BVaky_3,7.155 //
analyzed: a prayuktam tri rātra ādi karma ca upavasau smṛtam

original: [ity adhikaraṇādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti adhikaraṇa adhikāraḥ

original: [atha śeṣādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: atha śeṣa adhikāraḥ

original: saṃbandhaḥ kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ kriyākārakapūrvakaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ kārakebhyaḥ nyaḥ kriyā kāraka pūrvakaḥ

original: śrutāyām aśrutāyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ so 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.156 //
analyzed: śrutāyām a śrutāyām vā kriyāyām saḥ abhidhīyate

original: dviṣṭho 'py asau parārthatvād guṇeṣu vyatiricyate /
analyzed: dviṣṭhaḥ u pi asau parārtha tvāt guṇeṣu vyatiricyate

original: tatrābhidhīyamānaḥ san pradhāne 'py upayujyate // BVaky_3,7.157 //
analyzed: tatra abhidhīyamānaḥ san pradhāne pi upayujyate

original: nimittaniyamaḥ śabdāt saṃbandhasya na gṛhyate /
analyzed: nimitta niyamaḥ śabdāt saṃbandhasya na gṛhyate

original: karmapravacanīyais tu sa viśeṣo 'varudhyate // BVaky_3,7.158 //
analyzed: karmapravacanīyaiḥ tu sa viśeṣaḥ varudhyate

original: sādhanair vyapadiṣṭe ca śrūyamāṇakriye punaḥ /
analyzed: sādhanaiḥ vyapadiṣṭe ca śrūyamāṇa kriye punar

original: proktā pratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samāsasya nivṛttaye // BVaky_3,7.159 //
analyzed: proktā pratipadam ṣaṣṭhī samāsasya nivṛttaye

original: niṣṭhāyāṃ karmaviṣayā ṣaṣthī ca pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: niṣṭhāyām karma viṣayā ṣaṣthī ca pratiṣidhyate

original: śeṣalakṣaṇayā ṣaṣṭhyā samāsastatra neṣyate // BVaky_3,7.160 //
analyzed: śeṣa lakṣaṇayā ṣaṣṭhyā samāsaḥ tatra na iṣyate

original: anyena vyapadiṣṭasya yasyānyatropajāyate /
analyzed: anyena vyapadiṣṭasya yasya anyatra upajāyate

original: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣayāntare // BVaky_3,7.161 //
analyzed: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣaya antare

original: prādhānyaṃ svaguṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣatām /
analyzed: prādhānyam sva guṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣa tām

original: sahayoge svayoge 'taḥ pradhānatvaṃ na hīyate // BVaky_3,7.162 //
analyzed: sahayoge sva yoge pradhāna tvam na hīyate

original: [iti śeṣādhikāraḥ]
analyzed: iti śeṣa adhikāraḥ

original: siddhasyābhimukhībhāva- mātraṃ saṃbodhanaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: siddhasya abhimukhībhāva mātram saṃbodhanam viduḥ

original: prāptābhimukhyo hy arthātmā kriyāsu viniyujyate // BVaky_3,7.163 //
analyzed: prāpta ābhimukhyaḥ hi artha ātmā kriyāsu viniyujyate

original: saṃbodhanaṃ na vākyārtha iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbodhanam na vākya arthe iti pūrvebhyaḥ āgamaḥ

original: uddeśena vibhaktyarthā vākyārthāt samapoddhṛtāḥ // BVaky_3,7.164 //
analyzed: uddeśena vibhakti arthāḥ vākya arthāt samapoddhṛtāḥ

original: vibhaktyarthe 'vyayībhāva- vacanād avasīyatām /
analyzed: vibhakti arthe vyayībhāva vacanāt avasīyatām

original: anyo dravyād vibhaktyarthaḥ so 'vyayenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.165 //
analyzed: anyaḥ dravyāt vibhakti arthaḥ saḥ vyayena abhidhīyate

original: dravyaṃ tu yad yathābhūtaṃ tad atyantaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: dravyam tu yat yathābhūtam tat atyantam tathā bhavet

original: kriyāyoge 'pi tasyāsau dravyātmā nāpahīyate // BVaky_3,7.166 //
analyzed: kriyā yoge pi tasya asau dravya ātmā na apahīyate

original: tasmād yat karaṇaṃ dravyaṃ tat karma na punar bhavet /
analyzed: tasmāt yat karaṇam dravyam tat karma na punar bhavet

original: sarvasya vānyathābhāvas tasya dravyātmano bhavet // BVaky_3,7.167 //
analyzed: sarvasya vā anyathābhāvaḥ tasya dravya ātmanaḥ bhavet

original: 3,8: Kriyāsamuddeśa
analyzed: kriyā samuddeśa

original: yāvat siddham asiddhaṃ vā sādhyatvenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: yāvat siddham asiddham vā sādhya tvena abhidhīyate

original: āśritakramarūpatvāt tat kriyeti pratiyate // BVaky_3,8.1 //
analyzed: āśrita krama rūpa tvāt tat kriyā iti pratiyate

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvena dhvanatīty āśritakramaḥ /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvena dhvanati iti āśrita kramaḥ

original: dhvaniḥ kramanivṛttau tu dhvanir ity eva kathyate // BVaky_3,8.2 //
analyzed: dhvaniḥ krama nivṛttau tu dhvaniḥ iti eva kathyate

original: śvete śvetata ity etac chvetatvena prakāśate /
analyzed: śvete śvetatas iti etat śveta tvena prakāśate

original: āśritakramarūpatvād abhidhānaṃ pravartate // BVaky_3,8.3 //
analyzed: āśrita krama rūpa tvāt abhidhānam pravartate

original: guṇabhūtair avayavaiḥ samūhaḥ kramajanmanām /
analyzed: guṇa bhūtaiḥ avayavaiḥ samūhaḥ krama janmanām

original: buddhyā prakalpitābhedaḥ kriyeti vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,8.4 //
analyzed: buddhyā prakalpita abhedaḥ kriyā iti vyapadiśyate

original: samūhaḥ sa tatbābhūtaḥ pratibhedam samūhisu /
analyzed: samūhaḥ sa pratibhedam samūhisu

original: samāpyate tato bhede kālabhedasya saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,8.5 //
analyzed: samāpyate tatas bhede kāla bhedasya saṃbhavaḥ

original: kramāt sadasatāṃ teṣām ātmāno na samūhinām /
analyzed: kramāt sat asatām teṣām ātmānaḥ na samūhinām

original: sadvastuviṣayair yānti saṃbandhaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,8.6 //
analyzed: sat vastu viṣayaiḥ yānti saṃbandham cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ

original: yathā gaur iti samghātaḥ sarvo nendriyagocaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā gauḥ iti samghātaḥ sarvaḥ na indriya gocaraḥ

original: bhāgaśas tūpalabdhasya buddhau rūpaṃ nirūpyate // BVaky_3,8.7 //
analyzed: bhāgaśas tu upalabdhasya buddhau rūpam nirūpyate

original: indriyair anyathāprāptau bhedāmśopanipātibhiḥ /
analyzed: indriyaiḥ anyathā prāptau bheda āmśa upanipātibhiḥ

original: alātacakravad rūpaṃ kriyāṇāṃ parikalpyate // BVaky_3,8.8 //
analyzed: alāta cakra vat rūpam kriyāṇām parikalpyate

original: yathā ca bhāgāḥ pacater udakāsecanādayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca bhāgāḥ pacateḥ udaka āsecana ādayaḥ

original: udakāsecanādināṃ jñeyā bhāgās tathāpare // BVaky_3,8.9 //
analyzed: udaka āsecana ādinām jñeyāḥ bhāgāḥ tathā apare

original: yaś cāpakarṣaparyantam anuprāptaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca apakarṣa paryantam anuprāptaḥ pratīyate

original: tatraikasmin kriyāśabdaḥ kevale na prayujyate // BVaky_3,8.10 //
analyzed: tatra ekasmin kriyā śabdaḥ kevale na prayujyate

original: pūrvottarais tathā bhāgaiḥ samavasthāpitakramaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva uttaraiḥ tathā bhāgaiḥ samavasthāpita kramaḥ

original: ekaḥ so 'py asadadhyāsād ākhyātair abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.11 //
analyzed: ekaḥ saḥ u pi asat adhyāsāt ākhyātaiḥ abhidhīyate

original: kālānupāti yad rūpaṃ tad astīty anugamyate /
analyzed: kāla anupāti yat rūpam tat asti iti anugamyate

original: paritas tu paricchinnaṃ bhāva ity eva kathyate // BVaky_3,8.12 //
analyzed: paritas tu paricchinnam bhāvaḥ iti eva kathyate

original: vyavahārasya siddhatvān na ceyaṃ guṇakalpanā /
analyzed: vyavahārasya siddha tvāt na ca iyam guṇa kalpanā

original: upacāro hi mukhyasya saṃbhavād avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,8.13 //
analyzed: upacāraḥ hi mukhyasya saṃbhavāt avatiṣṭhate

original: āhitottaraśaktitvāt pratyekaṃ vā samūhinaḥ /
analyzed: āhita uttara śakti tvāt pratyekam vā samūhinaḥ

original: anekarūpā lakṣyante kramavanta ivākramāḥ // BVaky_3,8.14 //
analyzed: aneka rūpāḥ lakṣyante kramavantaḥ iva akramāḥ

original: anantaraṃ phalaṃ yasyāḥ kalpate tām kriyām viduḥ /
analyzed: anantaram phalam yasyāḥ kalpate tām kriyām viduḥ

original: pradhānabhūtāṃ tādarthyād anyāsāṃ tu tadākhyatā // BVaky_3,8.15 //
analyzed: pradhāna bhūtām tādarthyāt anyāsām tu tad ākhya tā

original: *kriyāpravṛttau yo hetus tadarthaṃ yad viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: kriyā pravṛttau yaḥ hetuḥ tad artham yat viceṣṭitam

original: anapekṣya prayuñjīta gacchatīty avadhārayan // BVaky_3,8.16 *//
analyzed: an apekṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avadhārayan

original: satsu pratyayarūpo 'sau bhāvo yāvan na jāyate /
analyzed: satsu bhāvaḥ yāvat na jāyate

original: tāvat pareṣāṃ rūpeṇa sādhyaḥ sann abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.17 //
analyzed: tāvat pareṣām rūpeṇa sādhyaḥ san abhidhīyate

original: siddhe tu sādhanākāṅkṣā kṛtārthatvān nivartate /
analyzed: siddhe tu sādhana ākāṅkṣā kṛtārtha tvāt nivartate

original: na kriyāvācināṃ tasmāt prayogas tatra vidyate // BVaky_3,8.18 //
analyzed: na kriyā vācinām tasmāt prayogaḥ tatra vidyate

original: sa cāpūrvāparibhūta ekatvād akramātmakaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca apūrva aparibhūtaḥ ekatvāt akrama ātmakaḥ

original: pūrvāparāṇāṃ dharmeṇa tadarthenānugamyate // BVaky_3,8.19 //
analyzed: pūrva aparāṇām dharmeṇa tad arthena anugamyate

original: asan nivartate tasmād yat sat tad upalabhyate /
analyzed: asat nivartate tasmāt yat sat tat upalabhyate

original: tayoḥ sadasatoś cāsāv ātmaika iva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,8.20 //
analyzed: tayoḥ sat asatoḥ ca asau ātmā ekaḥ iva gṛhyate

original: jātim anye kriyām āhur anekavyaktivartinīm /
analyzed: jātim anye kriyām āhuḥ aneka vyakti vartinīm

original: asādhyā vyaktirūpeṇa sā sādhyevopalabhyate // BVaky_3,8.21 //
analyzed: asādhyā vyakti rūpeṇa sā sādhyā iva upalabhyate

original: ante yā vā kriyābhāge jātiḥ saiva kriyā smṛtā /
analyzed: ante yā vā kriyā bhāge jātiḥ sā eva kriyā smṛtā

original: sā vyakter anuniṣpāde jāyamāneva gamyate // BVaky_3,8.22 //
analyzed: sā vyakteḥ anuniṣpāde jāyamānā iva gamyate

original: svavyāpāraviśiṣṭānām sattā vā,
analyzed: sva vyāpāra viśiṣṭānām sattā vā

original: kartṛkarmanām /
analyzed: kartṛ karmanām

original: kriyā vyāpārabhedeṣu sattā vā samavāyinī // BVaky_3,8.23 //
analyzed: kriyā vyāpāra bhedeṣu sattā vā samavāyinī

original: antye vātmani yā sattā sā kriyā kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: antye vā ātmani yā sattā sā kriyā kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: bhāva eva hi dhātvartha ity avicchinna āgamaḥ // BVaky_3,8.24 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ eva hi dhātvarthaḥ iti avicchinnaḥ āgamaḥ

original: buddhiṃ tajjātim anye tu buddhisattām athāpare /
analyzed: buddhim tad jātim anye tu buddhi sattām atha apare

original: pratyastarūpāṃ bhāveṣu kriyeti pratijānate // BVaky_3,8.25 //
analyzed: pratyasta rūpām bhāveṣu kriyā iti pratijānate

original: āvirbhāvatirobhāvau janmanāśau tathāparaiḥ /
analyzed: āvirbhāva tirobhāvau janma nāśau tathā aparaiḥ

original: ṣaṭsu bhāvavikāreṣu kalpitau vyāvahārikau // BVaky_3,8.26 //
analyzed: ṣaṭsu bhāva vikāreṣu kalpitau vyāvahārikau

original: tābhyāṃ sarvapravṛttīnām abhedenopasamgrahaḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām sarva pravṛttīnām abhedena upasamgrahaḥ

original: janmaivāśritasārūpyaṃ sthitir ity abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.27 //
*jāyamānān na janrnānyad vināśe 'py apadārthatā /
analyzed: jāyamānāt na vināśe pi apadārtha tā

original: ato bhāvavikāreṣu sattaikā vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,8.28 *//
analyzed: atas bhāva vikāreṣu sattā ekā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: *pūrvabhāgas tu yaj jātāt taj janmety apadiśyate /
analyzed: pūrva bhāgaḥ tu yat jātāt tat janma iti apadiśyate

original: āśritakramarūpeṇa nimittatve vivakṣite // BVaky_3,8.29 //
analyzed: āśrita krama rūpeṇa nimitta tve vivakṣite

original: ākhyātaśabdair artho 'sāv evaṃbhūto 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: ākhyāta śabdaiḥ saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ bhidhīyate

original: nāmaśabdāḥ pravartante saṃharanta iva kramam // BVaky_3,8.30 //
analyzed: nāma śabdāḥ pravartante saṃharantaḥ iva kramam

original: phalaṃ phalāpadeśo vā vastu vā tadvirodhi yat /
analyzed: phalam phala apadeśaḥ vā vastu vā tad virodhi yat

original: tad anyad eva pūrveṣāṃ nāga ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,8.31 //
analyzed: tat anyat eva pūrveṣām nāgaḥ iti apadiśyate

original: naivāsti naiva nāstīti vastuno grahanād vinā /
analyzed: na eva asti na eva na asti iti vastunaḥ grahanāt vinā

original: kalpate pararūpeṇa vastv anyad anugamyate // BVaky_3,8.32 //
analyzed: kalpate para rūpeṇa vastu anyat anugamyate

original: bhāvābhāvau ghaṭādinām aspṛśann api pāṇinā /
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau ghaṭa ādinām a spṛśan api pāṇinā

original: kaś cid vedāprakāśe 'pi prakāśe tata eva vā // BVaky_3,8.33 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit veda aprakāśe prakāśe tatas eva vā

original: vyāpi saukṣmyaṃ kva cid yāti kva cit saṃhanyate punaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpi saukṣmyam kva cit yāti kva cit saṃhanyate punar

original: akurvāṇo 'tha vā kiṃ cit svaśaktyaivaṃ prakāśate // BVaky_3,8.34 //
analyzed: vā kim cit sva śaktyā evam prakāśate

original: sarvarūpasya tattvasya yat krameṇeva darśanam /
analyzed: sarva rūpasya tattvasya yat krameṇa iva darśanam

original: bhāgair iva prakḷptiś ca tāṃ kriyām apare viduḥ // BVaky_3,8.35 //
analyzed: bhāgaiḥ iva prakḷptiḥ ca tām kriyām apare viduḥ

original: sattā svaśaktiyogena sarvarūpā vyavasthitā /
analyzed: sattā sva śakti yogena sarva rūpā vyavasthitā

original: sādhyā ca sādhanaṃ caiva phalaṃ bhoktā phalasya ca // BVaky_3,8.36 //
analyzed: sādhyā ca sādhanam ca eva phalam bhoktā phalasya ca

original: kriyām anye tu manyante kva cid apy anapāśritām /
analyzed: kriyām anye tu manyante kva cit api anapāśritām

original: sādhanaikārthakāritve pravṛttim anapāyinīm // BVaky_3,8.37 //
analyzed: sādhana eka artha kāri tve pravṛttim anapāyinīm

original: sāmānyabhūtā sā pūrvaṃ bhāgaśaḥ pravibhajyate /
analyzed: sāmānya bhūtā sā pūrvam bhāgaśas pravibhajyate

original: tato vyāpārarūpeṇa sādhyeva vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,8.38 //
analyzed: tatas vyāpāra rūpeṇa sādhyā iva vyavatiṣṭhate

original: prakṛtiḥ sādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac ca kārakam /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ sādhanānām sā prathamam tat ca kārakam

original: vyāpārāṇāṃ tato 'nyatvam aparair upavarṇyate // BVaky_3,8.39 //
analyzed: vyāpārāṇām tatas aparaiḥ upavarṇyate

original: bahūnāṃ saṃbhave 'rthānāṃ ke cid evopakārinaḥ /
analyzed: bahūnām saṃbhave rthānām ke cid eva upakārinaḥ

original: saṃsarge kaś cid esāṃ tu prādhānyena pratīyate // BVaky_3,8.40 //
analyzed: saṃsarge kaḥ cit ā isām tu prādhānyena pratīyate

original: sādhyatvāt tatra cākhyātair vyāpārāḥ siddhasādhanāḥ /
analyzed: sādhya tvāt tatra ca ākhyātaiḥ vyāpārāḥ siddha sādhanāḥ

original: prādhānyenābhidhīyante phalenāpi pravartitāḥ // BVaky_3,8.41 //
analyzed: prādhānyena abhidhīyante phalena api pravartitāḥ

original: ekatvāvṛttibhāvābhyāṃ bhedābhedasamanvaye /
analyzed: eka tva avṛtti bhāvābhyām bheda abheda samanvaye

original: saṃkhyās tatropalabhyante saṃkhyeyāvayavakriyāḥ // BVaky_3,8.42 //
analyzed: saṃkhyāḥ tatra upalabhyante saṃkhyeya avayava kriyāḥ

original: siddhasyārthasya pākādeḥ kathaṃ sādhanayogitā /
analyzed: siddhasya arthasya pāka ādeḥ katham sādhana yogi tā

original: sādhyatve vā tiṅantena kṛtāṃ bhedo na kaś cana // BVaky_3,8.43 //
analyzed: sādhya tve vā tiṅ antena kṛtām bhedaḥ na kaḥ cana

original: tatra kārakayogāyā yady ākhyātaṃ nibandhanam /
analyzed: tatra kāraka yogāyāḥ yadi ākhyātam nibandhanam

original: ṣaṣṭhvāḥ sā lena saṃbandhe vyudastā kartṛkarmanoḥ // BVaky_3,8.44 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhvāḥ sā lena saṃbandhe vyudastā kartṛ karmanoḥ

original: ekābhidhāna eko 'rtho yugapac ca dvidharmabhāk /
analyzed: eka abhidhānaḥ ekaḥ rthaḥ yugapad ca dvi dharma bhāj

original: na saṃbhavati siddhatve sa sādhyaḥ syāt kathaṃ punaḥ // BVaky_3,8.45 //
analyzed: na saṃbhavati siddha tve sa sādhyaḥ syāt katham punar

original: etāvat sādhanaṃ sādhyam etāvad iti kalpanā /
analyzed: etāvat sādhanam sādhyam etāvat iti kalpanā

original: śāstra eva na vākye 'sti vibhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ // BVaky_3,8.46 //
analyzed: śāstre eva na vākye sti vibhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ

original: ākhyātaśabde bhāgābhyāṃ sādhyasādhanavartitā /
analyzed: ākhyāta śabde bhāgābhyām sādhya sādhana varti tā

original: prakalpitā yathā śāstre sa ghañādisv api kramaḥ // BVaky_3,8.47 //
analyzed: prakalpitāḥ yathā śāstre sa ghañ ādisu api kramaḥ

original: sādhyatvena kriyā tatra dhāturūpanibandhanā /
analyzed: sādhya tvena kriyā tatra dhātu rūpa nibandhanā

original: sattvabhāvas tu yas tasyāḥ sa ghañādinibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,8.48 //
analyzed: sattva bhāvaḥ tu yaḥ tasyāḥ sa ghaña ādi nibandhanaḥ

original: bandhutābhedarūpeṇa bandhuśabde vyavasthitā /
analyzed: bandhu tā bheda rūpeṇa bandhu śabde vyavasthitā

original: samūho bandhvavasthā tu pratyayenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.49 //
analyzed: samūhaḥ bandhu avasthā tu pratyayena abhidhīyate

original: tatra yam prati sādhyatvam asiddhā taṃ prati kriyā /
analyzed: tatra yam prati sādhya tvam asiddhā tam prati kriyā

original: siddhā tu yasmin sādhyatvaṃ na tam eva punaḥ prati // BVaky_3,8.50 //
analyzed: siddhā tu yasmin sādhya tvam na tam eva punar prati

original: rājñaḥ putrasya napteti na rājñi vyatiricyate /
analyzed: rājñaḥ putrasya naptā iti na rājñi vyatiricyate

original: putrasyārthaḥ pradhānatvaṃ na cāsya vinivartate // BVaky_3,8.51 //
analyzed: putrasya arthaḥ pradhāna tvam na ca asya vinivartate

original: mṛgo dhāvati paśyeti sādhyasādhanarūpatā /
analyzed: mṛgaḥ dhāvati paśya iti sādhya sādhana rūpa tā

original: tathā viṣayabhedena saraṇasyopapadyate // BVaky_3,8.52 //
analyzed: tathā viṣaya bhedena saraṇasya upapadyate

original: lakṛtyaktakhalarthānāṃ tathāvyayakṛtām api /
analyzed: lakṛtya kta khal arthānām tathā avyaya kṛtām api

original: rūḍhiniṣṭhāghañādinām dhātuḥ sādhyasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,8.53 //
analyzed: rūḍhi niṣṭhā ghañ ādinām dhātuḥ sādhyasya vācakaḥ

original: sādhyasyāpariniṣpatteḥ so 'yam ity anupagrahaḥ /
analyzed: sādhyasya apariniṣpatteḥ saḥ yam iti anupagrahaḥ

original: tiṅantair antareṇevam upamānaṃ tato na taiḥ // BVaky_3,8.54 //
analyzed: tiṅ antaiḥ antareṇa ivam upamānam tatas na taiḥ

original: sādhanatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca tiṅkṣu saṃbandhināṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: sādhana tvam prasiddham ca tiṅkṣu saṃbandhinām yatas

original: tenādhyāropa eva syād upamā tu na vidyate // BVaky_3,8.55 //
analyzed: tena adhyāropaḥ eva syāt upamā tu na vidyate

original: nyūneṣu ca samāptārtham upamānaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: nyūneṣu ca samāpta artham upamānam vidhīyate

original: kriyā caivāśraye sarvā tatra tatra samāpyate // BVaky_3,8.56 //
analyzed: kriyā ca eva āśraye sarvā tatra tatra samāpyate

original: yenaiva hetunā haṃsaḥ patatīty abhidhīyate /
analyzed: yena eva hetunā haṃsaḥ patati iti abhidhīyate

original: ātau tasya samāptatvād upamārtho na vidyate // BVaky_3,8.57 //
analyzed: ātau tasya samāpta tvāt upamā arthaḥ na vidyate

original: kriyāṇāṃ jātibhinnānāṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāvadhāryate /
analyzed: kriyāṇām jāti bhinnānām sādṛśyam na avadhāryate

original: siddheś ca prakrame sādhyam upamātum na śakyate // BVaky_3,8.58 //
analyzed: siddheḥ ca prakrame sādhyam upamātum na śakyate

original: vanam vṛkṣā iti yathā bhedābhedavyapāśrayāt /
analyzed: vanam vṛkṣāḥ iti yathā bheda abheda vyapāśrayāt

original: arthātmā bhidyate bhāve sa bāhyābhyantare kramaḥ // BVaky_3,8.59 //
analyzed: artha ātmā bhidyate bhāve sa bāhya abhyantare kramaḥ

original: sāmānye bhāva ity atra yal liṅgam upalabhyate /
analyzed: sāmānye bhāvaḥ iti atra yat liṅgam upalabhyate

original: bhedānāṃ anumeyatvān na tat teṣu vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,8.60 //
analyzed: bhedānām anumeya tvāt na tat teṣu vivakṣyate

original: nirdeśe caritārthatvāl liṅgaṃ bhāve 'vivaksitam /
analyzed: nirdeśe caritārtha tvāt liṅgam bhāve vivaksitam

original: upamānavidhitvāc ca bhāvād anyat pacādisu // BVaky_3,8.61 //
analyzed: upamāna vidhi tvāt ca bhāvāt anyat paca ādisu

original: bhavatau yat pacādināṃ tāvad atropadiśyate /
analyzed: bhavatau yat paca ādinām tāvat atra upadiśyate

original: na ca liṅgam pacādināṃ bhavatau samavasthitam // BVaky_3,8.62 //
analyzed: na ca liṅgam paca ādinām bhavatau samavasthitam

original: ekaś ca so 'rthaḥ sattākhyaḥ katham cit kaiś cid ucyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ ca saḥ rthaḥ sattā ākhyaḥ katham cit kaiḥ cit ucyate

original: liṅgāni cāsya bhidyante pacirūpādibhedavat // BVaky_3,8.63 //
analyzed: liṅgāni ca asya bhidyante paci rūpa ādi bheda vat

original: ācāryo mātulaś ceti yathaiko vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ mātulaḥ ca iti yathā ekaḥ vyapadiśyate

original: sambandhibhedād arthātmā sa vidhiḥ paktibhāvayoḥ // BVaky_3,8.64 //
analyzed: sambandhi bhedāt artha ātmā sa vidhiḥ pakti bhāvayoḥ

original: 3,9: Kālasamuddeśaḥ
analyzed: kāla samuddeśaḥ

original: vyāpāravyatirekeṇa kālam eke pracakṣate /
analyzed: vyāpāra vyatirekeṇa kālam eke pracakṣate

original: nityam ekaṃ vibhu dravyaṃ parimāṇaṃ kriyāvatām // BVaky_3,9.1 //
analyzed: nityam ekam vibhu dravyam parimāṇam kriyāvatām

original: diṣṭiprasthasuvarṇādi mūrtibhedāya kalpate /
analyzed: diṣṭi prastha suvarṇa ādi mūrti bhedāya kalpate

original: kriyābhedāya kālas tu saṃkhyā sarvasya bhedikā // BVaky_3,9.2 //
analyzed: kriyā bhedāya kālaḥ tu saṃkhyā sarvasya bhedikā

original: utpattau ca sthitau caiva vināśe cāpi tadvatām /
analyzed: utpattau ca sthitau ca eva vināśe ca api tadvatām

original: nimittaṃ kālam evāhur vibhaktenātmanā sthitam // BVaky_3,9.3 //
analyzed: nimittam kālam eva āhuḥ vibhaktena ātmanā sthitam

original: tam asya lokayantrasya sūtradhāraṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: tam asya loka yantrasya sūtradhāram pracakṣate

original: pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ tena viśvaṃ vibhajyate // BVaky_3,9.4 //
analyzed: pratibandha abhyanujñābhyām tena viśvam vibhajyate

original: yadi na pratibadhnīyāt pratibandhaṃ ca notsṛjet /
analyzed: yadi na pratibadhnīyāt pratibandham ca na utsṛjet

original: avasthā vyatikīryeran paurvāparyavinākṛtāḥ // BVaky_3,9.5 //
analyzed: avasthāḥ vyatikīryeran paurvāparya vinākṛtāḥ

original: tasyātmā bahudhā bhinno bhedair dharmāntarāśrayaiḥ /
analyzed: tasya ātmā bahudhā bhinnaḥ bhedaiḥ dharma antara āśrayaiḥ

original: na hi bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā vastu kiṃ cana vidyate // BVaky_3,9.6 //
analyzed: na hi bhinnam abhinnam vā vastu kim cana vidyate

original: naiko na cāpy aneko 'sti na śuklo nāpi cāsitaḥ /
analyzed: na ekaḥ na ca api anekaḥ sti na śuklaḥ nā api ca asitaḥ

original: dravyātmā sa tu saṃsargād evaṃrūpaḥ prakāśate // BVaky_3,9.7 //
analyzed: dravya ātmā sa tu saṃsargāt evaṃrūpaḥ prakāśate

original: saṃsargināṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣās tasya te matāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsarginām tu ye bhedāḥ viśeṣāḥ tasya te matāḥ

original: sa bhinnas tair vyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate // BVaky_3,9.8 //
analyzed: sa bhinnaḥ taiḥ vyavasthānām kālaḥ bhedāya kalpate

original: viśiṣṭakālasaṃbandhād vṛttilābhaḥ prakalpate /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa kāla saṃbandhāt vṛttilābhaḥ prakalpate

original: śaktīnāṃ saṃprayogasya hetutvenāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,9.9 //
analyzed: śaktīnām saṃprayogasya hetu tvena avatiṣṭhate

original: janmābhivyaktiniyamāḥ prayogopanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: janma abhivyakti niyamāḥ prayoga upanibandhanāḥ

original: nityādhīnasthititvāc ca sthitir niyamapūrvikā // BVaky_3,9.10 //
analyzed: nitya adhīna sthiti tvāt ca sthitiḥ niyama pūrvikā

original: sthitasyānugrahas tais tair dharmaiḥ saṃsargibhis tataḥ /
analyzed: sthitasya anugrahaḥ taiḥ taiḥ dharmaiḥ saṃsargibhiḥ tatas

original: pratibandhas tirobhāvaḥ prahāṇam iti cātmanaḥ // BVaky_3,9.11 //
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ tirobhāvaḥ prahāṇam iti ca ātmanaḥ

original: pratyavasthaṃ tu kālasya vyāpāro 'tra vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: pratyavastham tu kālasya vyāpāraḥ tra vyavasthitaḥ

original: kāla eva hi viśvātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate // BVaky_3,9.12 //
analyzed: kālaḥ eva hi viśvātmā vyāpāraḥ iti kathyate

original: mūrtīnāṃ tena bhinnānām ācayāpacayāḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: mūrtīnām tena bhinnānām ācaya apacayāḥ pṛthak

original: lakṣyante pariṇāmena sarvāsāṃ bhedayoginā // BVaky_3,9.13 //
analyzed: lakṣyante pariṇāmena sarvāsām bheda yoginā

original: jalayantrabhramāveśa- sadṛśībhiḥ pravṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: jalayantra bhrama āveśa sadṛśībhiḥ pravṛttibhiḥ

original: sa kalāḥ kalayan sarvāḥ kālākhyāṃ labhate vibhuḥ // BVaky_3,9.14 //
analyzed: sa kalāḥ kalayan sarvāḥ kāla ākhyām labhate vibhuḥ

original: pratibhaddhāś ca yās tena citrā viśvasya vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: pratibhaddhāḥ ca yāḥ tena citrāḥ viśvasya vṛttayaḥ

original: tāḥ sa evānujānāti yathā tantuḥ śakuntikāḥ // BVaky_3,9.15 //
analyzed: tāḥ saḥ eva anujānāti yathā tantuḥ śakuntikāḥ

original: viśiṣṭakālasaṃbandhāl labdhapākāsu śaktiṣu /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa kāla saṃbandhāt labdha pākāsu śaktiṣu

original: kriyābhivyajyate nityā prayogākhyena karmaṇā // BVaky_3,9.16 //
analyzed: kriyā abhivyajyate nityā prayoga ākhyena karmaṇā

original: jātiprayuktā tasyāṃ tu phalavyaktiḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: jāti prayuktā tasyām tu phala vyaktiḥ prajāyate

original: kuto 'py adbhutayā vṛttyā śaktibhiḥ sā niyamyate // BVaky_3,9.17 //
analyzed: kutas u pi adbhutayā vṛttyā śaktibhiḥ sā niyamyate

original: tatas tu samavāyākhyā śaktir bhedasya bādhikā /
analyzed: tatas tu samavāya ākhyā śaktiḥ bhedasya bādhikā

original: ekatvam iva tā vyaktīr āpādayati kāraṇaiḥ // BVaky_3,9.18 //
analyzed: eka tvam iva tāḥ vyaktīḥ āpādayati kāraṇaiḥ

original: athāsmān niyamād ūrdhvaṃ jātayo yāḥ prayojikāḥ /
analyzed: atha asmāt niyamāt ūrdhvam jātayaḥ yāḥ prayojikāḥ

original: tāḥ sarvā vyaktim āyānti svacche chāyā ivāmbhasi // BVaky_3,9.19 //
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāḥ vyaktim āyānti svacche chāyāḥ iva ambhasi

original: kāraṇānuvidhāyitvād atha kāraṇa pūrvakāḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa anuvidhāyi tvāt atha kāraṇa pūrvakāḥ

original: guṇās tatropajāyante svajātivyaktihetavaḥ // BVaky_3,9.20 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ tatra upajāyante sva jāti vyakti hetavaḥ

original: āśrayāṇāṃ ca nityatvam āśritānāṃ ca nityatā /
analyzed: āśrayāṇām ca nitya tvam āśritānām ca nitya tā

original: tā vyaktīr anugṛhṇāti sthitis tena prakalpate // BVaky_3,9.21 //
analyzed: tāḥ vyaktīḥ anugṛhṇāti sthitiḥ tena prakalpate

original: anityasya yathotpāde pāratantryaṃ tathā sthitau /
analyzed: anityasya yathā utpāde pāratantryam tathā sthitau

original: vināśāyaiva tat śṛṣṭam asvādhīnasthitiṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,9.22 //
analyzed: vināśāya eva tat śṛṣṭam asvādhīna sthitim viduḥ

original: sthitaḥ saṃsargibhir bhāvaiḥ svakriyāsv anugṛhyate /
analyzed: sthitaḥ saṃsargibhiḥ bhāvaiḥ sva kriyāsu anugṛhyate

original: naiṣāṃ sattām anudgṛhya vṛttir janmavatāṃ smṛtā // BVaky_3,9.23 //
analyzed: na eṣām sattām an udgṛhya vṛttiḥ janmavatām smṛtā

original: jarākhyā kālaśaktir yā śaktyantaravirodhinī /
analyzed: jarā ākhyā kālaśaktiḥ yā śakti antara virodhinī

original: sā śaktīḥ pratibadhnāti jāyante ca virodhinaḥ // BVaky_3,9.24 //
analyzed: sā śaktīḥ pratibadhnāti jāyante ca virodhinaḥ

original: prayojakās tu ye bhāvāḥ sthitibhāgasya hetavaḥ /
analyzed: prayojakāḥ tu ye bhāvāḥ sthiti bhāgasya hetavaḥ

original: tirobhavanti te sarve yata ātmā prahīyate // BVaky_3,9.25 //
analyzed: tirobhavanti te sarve yatas ātmā prahīyate

original: yathaivādbutayā vṛttyā niṣkramaṃ nirnibandhanam /
analyzed: yathā eva adbutayā vṛttyā niṣkramam nirnibandhanam

original: apadaṃ jāyate sarvaṃ tathāsyātmā prahīyate // BVaky_3,9.26 //
analyzed: a padam jāyate sarvam tathā asya ātmā prahīyate

original: kriyayor apavargiṇyor nānārthasamavetayoḥ /
analyzed: kriyayoḥ apavargiṇyoḥ nānā artha samavetayoḥ

original: saṃbandhinā vinaikena paricchedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,9.27 //
analyzed: saṃbandhinā vinā ekena paricchedaḥ katham bhavet

original: yathā tulāyāṃ haste vā nānādravyavyavasthitam /
analyzed: yathā tulāyām haste vā nānā dravya vyavasthitam

original: gurutvaṃ parimīyeta kālād evaṃ kriyāgatiḥ // BVaky_3,9.28 //
analyzed: guru tvam parimīyeta kālāt evam kriyā gatiḥ

original: jahāti sahavṛttāś ca kriyāḥ sa samavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: jahāti sahavṛttāḥ ca kriyāḥ sa samavasthitāḥ

original: vrīhir yathodakaṃ tena hāyanākhyāṃ prapadyate // BVaky_3,9.29 //
analyzed: vrīhiḥ yathā udakam tena hāyana ākhyām prapadyate

original: pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ vṛttir yā tasya śāsvatī /
analyzed: pratibandha abhyanujñābhyām vṛttiḥ yā tasya śāsvatī

original: tayā vibhajyamāno 'sau bhajate kramarūpatāṃ // BVaky_3,9.30 //
analyzed: tayā vibhajyamānaḥ sau bhajate krama rūpa tām

original: kartṛbhedāt tadartheṣu pracayāpacayau gataḥ /
analyzed: kartṛ bhedāt tad artheṣu pracaya apacayau gataḥ

original: samatvaṃ viṣamatvaṃ vā sa ekaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,9.31 //
analyzed: sama tvam viṣama tvam vā saḥ ekaḥ pratipadyate

original: kriyābhedād yathaikasmiṃs takṣādyākhyā pravartate /
analyzed: kriyā bhedāt yathā ekasmin takṣa ādi ākhyā pravartate

original: kriyābhedāt tathaikasminn ṛtvādyākhyopajāyate // BVaky_3,9.32 //
analyzed: kriyā bhedāt tathā ekasmin ṛtu ādi ākhyā upajāyate

original: ārambhaś ca kriyā caiva niṣṭhā cety abhidhīyate /
analyzed: ārambhaḥ ca kriyā ca eva niṣṭhā ca iti abhidhīyate

original: dharmāntarāṇām adhyāsa- bhedāt sadasadātmanaḥ // BVaky_3,9.33 //
analyzed: dharma antarāṇām adhyāsa bhedāt sat asat ātmanaḥ

original: yāvāṃś ca dvyaṇukādīnāṃ tāvān himavato 'py asau /
analyzed: yāvān ca dvi aṇuka ādīnām tāvān himavataḥ api asau

original: na hy ātmā kasya cid bhettuṃ pracetuṃ vāpi śakyate // BVaky_3,9.34 //
analyzed: na hi ātmā kasya cit bhettum pracetum vā api śakyate

original: anyais tu bhāvair anyeṣāṃ pracayaḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: anyaiḥ tu bhāvaiḥ anyeṣām pracayaḥ parikalpyate

original: śanair idam idaṃ kṣipram iti tena pratīyate // BVaky_3,9.35 //
analyzed: śanais idam idam kṣipram iti tena pratīyate

original: asataś ca kramo nāsti sa hi bhettuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: asataḥ ca kramaḥ nā asti sa hi bhettum na śakyate

original: sato 'pi cātmatattvaṃ yat tat tathaivāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,9.36 //
analyzed: ca ātma tattvam yat tat tathā eva avatiṣṭhate

original: kriyopādhiś ca san bhūta- bhaviṣyadvartamānatāḥ /
analyzed: kriyā upādhiḥ ca san bhūta bhaviṣyat vartamāna tāḥ

original: ekādaśābhir ākārair vibhaktāḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,9.37 //
analyzed: ekādaśa ābhiḥ ākāraiḥ vibhaktāḥ pratipadyate

original: bhūtaḥ pañcavidhas tatra bhaviṣyaṃś ca caturvidhaḥ /
analyzed: bhūtaḥ pañcavidhaḥ tatra bhaviṣyan ca caturvidhaḥ

original: vartamāno dvidhākhyāta ity ekādaśa kalpanāḥ // BVaky_3,9.38 //
analyzed: vartamānaḥ dvidhā ākhyātaḥ iti ekādaśa kalpanāḥ

original: kāle nidhāya svaṃ rūpaṃ prajñayā yan nigṛhyate /
analyzed: kāle nidhāya svam rūpam prajñayā yat nigṛhyate

original: bhāvās tato nivartante tatra saṃkrāntaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,9.39 //
analyzed: bhāvāḥ tatas nivartante tatra saṃkrānta śaktayaḥ

original: bhāvināṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ tasya ca pratibimbakam /
analyzed: bhāvinām ca eva yat rūpam tasya ca pratibimbakam

original: sunirmṛṣṭa ivādarśe kāla evopapadyate // BVaky_3,9.40 //
analyzed: su nirmṛṣṭe iva ādarśe kālaḥ eva upapadyate

original: tṛṇaparṇalatādīni yathā sroto 'nukarṣati /
analyzed: tṛṇa parṇa latā ādīni yathā srotaḥ nu karṣati

original: pravartayati kālo 'pi mātrā mātrāvatāṃ tathā // BVaky_3,9.41 //
analyzed: pravartayati kālaḥ u pi mātrāḥ mātrāvatām tathā

original: āviśyevānusaṃdhatte yathā gatimatāṃ gatīḥ /
analyzed: āviśya iva anusaṃdhatte yathā gatimatām gatīḥ

original: vāyus tatraiva kālātmā vidhatte kramarūpatām // BVaky_3,9.42 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ tatra eva kāla ātmā vidhatte krama rūpa tām

original: ayanapravibhāgaś ca gatīś ca jyotiṣāṃ dhruvā /
analyzed: ayana pravibhāgaḥ ca gatīḥ ca jyotiṣām dhruvā

original: nivṛttiprabhavāś caiva bhūtānāṃ tannibandhanāḥ // BVaky_3,9.43 //
analyzed: nivṛtti prabhavāḥ ca eva bhūtānām tad nibandhanāḥ

original: mātrāṇāṃ pariṇāmā ye kālavṛttyanupātinaḥ /
analyzed: mātrāṇām pariṇāmāḥ ye kāla vṛtti anupātinaḥ

original: nakṣatrākhyā pṛthak teṣu cihnamātraṃ tu tārakāḥ // BVaky_3,9.44 //
analyzed: nakṣatra ākhyā pṛthak teṣu cihna mātram tu tārakāḥ

original: rutair mṛgaśakuntānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca vṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: rutaiḥ mṛga śakuntānām sthāvarāṇām ca vṛttibhiḥ

original: chāyādipariṇāmaiś ca ṛtudhāmā nirūpyate // BVaky_3,9.45 //
analyzed: chāyā ādi pariṇāmaiḥ ca ṛtudhāmā nirūpyate

original: nirbhāsopagamo yo 'yaṃ kramavān iva dṛśyate /
analyzed: nirbhāsa upagamaḥ yaḥ yam kramavān iva dṛśyate

original: akramasyāpi viśvasya tat kālasya viceṣṭitam // BVaky_3,9.46 //
analyzed: akramasya api viśvasya tat kālasya viceṣṭitam

original: dūrāntikavyavasthānam adhvādhikaraṇaṃ yathā /
analyzed: dūra antika vyavasthānam adhva adhikaraṇam yathā

original: cirakṣipravyavasthānaṃ kālādhikaraṇaṃ tathā // BVaky_3,9.47 //
analyzed: cira kṣipra vyavasthānam kāla adhikaraṇam tathā

original: tasyābhinnasya kālasya vyavahāre kriyākṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tasya abhinnasya kālasya vyavahāre kriyā kṛtāḥ

original: bhedā iva trayaḥ siddhā yāṃl loko nātivartate // BVaky_3,9.48 //
analyzed: bhedāḥ iva trayaḥ siddhāḥ yān lokaḥ na ativartate

original: ekasya śaktayas tisraḥ kālasya samavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: ekasya śaktayaḥ tisraḥ kālasya samavasthitāḥ

original: yatsaṃbandhena bhāvānāṃ darśanādarśane satām // BVaky_3,9.49 //
analyzed: yad saṃbandhena bhāvānām darśana adarśane satām

original: dvābhyāṃ sa kila śaktibhyāṃ bhāvānāṃ varaṇātmakaḥ /
analyzed: dvābhyām sa kila śaktibhyām bhāvānām varaṇa ātmakaḥ

original: śaktis tu vartamānākhyā bhāvarūpaprakāśinī // BVaky_3,9.50 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ tu vartamāna ākhyā bhāva rūpa prakāśinī

original: anāgatā janmaśakteḥ śaktir apratibandhikā /
analyzed: anāgatā janma śakteḥ śaktiḥ apratibandhikā

original: atītākhyā tu yā śaktis tayā janma virudhyate // BVaky_3,9.51 //
analyzed: atīta ākhyā tu yā śaktiḥ tayā janma virudhyate

original: tamaḥprakāśavat tv ete trayo 'dhvāno vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ prakāśa vat tu ete trayaḥ dhvānaḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: akramās teṣu bhāvānāṃ kramaḥ samupalabhyate // BVaky_3,9.52 //
analyzed: akramāḥ teṣu bhāvānām kramaḥ samupalabhyate

original: dvau tu tatra tamorūpāv ekasyālokavat sthitiḥ /
analyzed: dvau tu tatra tamaḥ rūpau ekasya āloka vat sthitiḥ

original: atītam api keṣāṃ cit punar viparivartate // BVaky_3,9.53 //
analyzed: atītam api keṣām cit punar viparivartate

original: yugapad vartamānatvaṃ taddharmā pratipadyate /
analyzed: yugapad vartamāna tvam tad dharmā pratipadyate

original: keṣāṃ cid vartamānatvāc caiti tadvad atītatām // BVaky_3,9.54 //
analyzed: keṣām cit vartamāna tvāt ca eti tadvat atīta tām

original: hetupakārād ākṣipto vartamānatvam āgataḥ /
analyzed: hetu pakārāt ākṣiptaḥ vartamāna tvam āgataḥ

original: śāntahetūpakāraḥ san punar nopaiti darśanam // BVaky_3,9.55 //
analyzed: śānta hetu upakāraḥ san punar na upaiti darśanam

original: dve eva kālasya vibhoḥ keṣāṃ cic chaktivartmanī /
analyzed: dve eva kālasya vibhoḥ keṣām cit śakti vartmanī

original: karoti yābhyāṃ bhāvānām unmīlananimīlane // BVaky_3,9.56 //
analyzed: karoti yābhyām bhāvānām unmīlana nimīlane

original: kalābhiḥ pṛthagarthābhiḥ pravibhaktaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: kalābhiḥ pṛthak arthābhiḥ pravibhaktam svabhāvataḥ

original: ke cid buddhyanusaṃhāra- lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,9.57 //
analyzed: ke cit buddhi anusaṃhāra lakṣaṇam tam pracakṣate

original: jñānānugataśaktiṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā satyataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: jñāna anugata śaktim vā bāhyam vā satyataḥ sthitam

original: kālātmānam anāśritya vyavahartuṃ na śakyate // BVaky_3,9.58 //
analyzed: kāla ātmānam an āśritya vyavahartum na śakyate

original: tisro bhāvasya bhāvasya keṣāṃ cid bhāvaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ bhāvasya bhāvasya keṣām cit bhāva śaktayaḥ

original: tābhiḥ svaśaktibhiḥ sarvaṃ sadaivāsti ca nāsti ca // BVaky_3,9.59 //
analyzed: tābhiḥ sva śaktibhiḥ sarvam sadā eva asti ca na asti ca

original: sattvād avyatirekeṇa tās tisro 'pi vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: sattvāt a vyatirekeṇa tāḥ tisraḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: kramas tās tadabhedāc ca sadasattvaṃ na bhidyate // BVaky_3,9.60 //
analyzed: kramaḥ tāḥ tad abhedāt ca sat asat tvam na bhidyate

original: darśanādarśanenaikaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṃ tad eva tu /
analyzed: darśana adarśanena ekam dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭam tat eva tu

original: adhvanām ekatā nāsti na ca kiṃ cin nivartate // BVaky_3,9.61 //
analyzed: adhvanām eka tā nā asti na ca kim cit nivartate

original: śaktyātmadevatāpakṣair bhinnaṃ kālasya darśanam /
analyzed: śakti ātma devatā pakṣaiḥ bhinnam kālasya darśanam

original: prathamaṃ tad avidyāyāṃ yad vidyāyāṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,9.62 //
analyzed: prathamam tat avidyāyām yat vidyāyām na vidyate

original: abhede yadi kālasya hrasvadīrghaplutādiṣu /
analyzed: abhede yadi kālasya hrasva dīrgha pluta ādiṣu

original: dṛśyate bhedanirbhāsaḥ sa cirakṣiprabuddhivat // BVaky_3,9.63 //
analyzed: dṛśyate bheda nirbhāsaḥ sa cira kṣipra buddhi vat

original: hrasvadīrghaplutāvṛttyā nālikāsalilādiṣu /
analyzed: hrasva dīrgha pluta āvṛttyā nālikā salila ādiṣu

original: kathaṃ pracayayogaḥ syāt kalpanāmātrahetukaḥ // BVaky_3,9.64 //
analyzed: katham pracaya yogaḥ syāt kalpanā mātra hetukaḥ

original: abhivyaktinimittasya pracayena pracīyate /
analyzed: abhivyakti nimittasya pracayena pracīyate

original: abhinnam api śabdasya tattvam apracayātmakam // BVaky_3,9.65 //
analyzed: abhinnam api śabdasya tattvam a pracaya ātmakam

original: evaṃ mātrāturīyasya bhedo dāśatayasya vā /
analyzed: evam mātrāturīyasya bhedaḥ dāśatayasya vā

analyzed: parimāṇa vikalpena śabda ātmani na vidyate

original: anuniṣpādikalpena ye 'ntarāla iva sthitāḥ /
analyzed: anuniṣpādi kalpena ye ntarāle iva sthitāḥ

original: śabdās te pratipattṝṇām upāyāḥ pratipattaye // BVaky_3,9.67 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ te pratipattṝṇām upāyāḥ pratipattaye

original: viśiṣṭam avadhiṃ taṃ tam upādāya prakalpate /
analyzed: viśiṣṭam avadhim tam tam upādāya prakalpate

original: kālaḥ kālavatām ekaḥ kṣaṇamāsartubhedabhāk // BVaky_3,9.68 //
analyzed: kālaḥ kālavatām ekaḥ kṣaṇa māsa ṛtu bheda bhāj

original: buddhyavagrahabhedāc ca vyavahārātmani sthitaḥ /
analyzed: buddhi avagraha bhedāt ca vyavahāra ātmani sthitaḥ

original: tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kālo yugamanvantarāṇi vā // BVaky_3,9.69 //
analyzed: tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kālaḥ yuga manvantarāṇi vā

original: pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ nālikāvivarāśrite /
analyzed: pratibandha abhyanujñābhyām nālikā vivara āśrite

original: yad ambhasi prakṣaraṇaṃ tat kālasyaiva ceṣṭitam // BVaky_3,9.70 //
analyzed: yat ambhasi prakṣaraṇam tat kālasya eva ceṣṭitam

original: alpe mahati vā chidre tatsaṃbandhe na bhidyate /
analyzed: alpe mahati vā chidre tad saṃbandhe na bhidyate

original: kālasya vṛttir ātmāpi tam evāsyānuvartate // BVaky_3,9.71 //
analyzed: kālasya vṛttiḥ ātmā api tam eva asya anuvartate

original: ākrīḍa iva kālasya dṛśyate yaḥ svaśaktibhiḥ /
analyzed: ākrīḍaḥ iva kālasya dṛśyate yaḥ sva śaktibhiḥ

original: bahurūpasya bhāveṣu bahudhā tena bhidyate // BVaky_3,9.72 //
analyzed: bahu rūpasya bhāveṣu bahudhā tena bhidyate

original: tvacisārasya vā vṛddhiṃ tṛṇarājasya vā dadhat /
analyzed: tvacisārasya vā vṛddhim tṛṇarājasya vā dadhat

original: tāvat tadvṛddhiyogena kālatattvaṃ vikalpate // BVaky_3,9.73 //
analyzed: tāvat tad vṛddhi yogena kāla tattvam vikalpate

original: vyatikrame 'pi mātrāṇāṃ tasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ /
analyzed: vyatikrame pi mātrāṇām tasya na asti vyatikramaḥ

original: na gantṛgatibhedena mārgabhedo 'sti kaś cana // BVaky_3,9.74 //
analyzed: na gantṛ gati bhedena mārga bhedaḥ sti kaḥ cana

original: udayāstamayāvṛttyā jyotiṣāṃ lokasiddhayā /
analyzed: udaya astamaya āvṛttyā jyotiṣām loka siddhayā

original: kālasyāvyatipāte 'pi tāddharmyam iva lakṣyate // BVaky_3,9.75 //
analyzed: kālasya avyatipāte pi tāddharmyam iva lakṣyate

original: ādityagrahanakṣatra- parispandam athāpare /
analyzed: āditya graha nakṣatra parispandam atha apare

original: bhinnam āvṛttibhedena kālaṃ kālavido viduḥ // BVaky_3,9.76 //
analyzed: bhinnam āvṛtti bhedena kālam kāla vidaḥ viduḥ

original: kriyāntarapariccheda- pravṛttā yā kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: kriyā antara pariccheda pravṛttā yā kriyām prati

original: nirjñātaparimāṇā sā kāla ity abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,9.77 //
analyzed: nirjñāta parimāṇā sā kālaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: jñāne rūpasya saṃkrāntir jñānenaivānusaṃhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: jñāne rūpasya saṃkrāntiḥ jñānena eva anusaṃhṛtiḥ

original: ataḥ kriyāntarābhāve sā kriyā kāla iṣyate // BVaky_3,9.78 //
analyzed: atas kriyā antara abhāve sā kriyā kālaḥ iṣyate

original: bhūto ghaṭa itīyaṃ ca sattāyā eva bhūtatā /
analyzed: bhūtaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti iyam ca sattāyāḥ eva bhūta tā

original: bhūtā satteti sattāyāḥ sattā bhūtābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,9.79 //
analyzed: bhūtā sattā iti sattāyāḥ sattā bhūtā abhidhīyate

original: parato bhidyate sarvam ātmā tu na vikalpyate /
analyzed: paratas bhidyate sarvam ātmā tu na vikalpyate

original: parvatādisthitis tasmāt pararūpeṇa bhidyate // BVaky_3,9.80 //
analyzed: parvata ādi sthitiḥ tasmāt para rūpeṇa bhidyate

original: prasiddhabhedā vyāpārā virūpāvayavakriyāḥ /
analyzed: prasiddha bhedāḥ vyāpārāḥ virūpa avayava kriyāḥ

original: sāhacaryeṇa bhidyante sarūpāvayavakriyāḥ // BVaky_3,9.81 //
analyzed: sāhacaryeṇa bhidyante sarūpa avayava kriyāḥ

original: *vyavadhānam ivopaiti nivṛtta iva dṛśyate /
analyzed: vyavadhānam iva upaiti nivṛttaḥ iva dṛśyate

*na ca vicchinnarūpo 'pi so 'virāmān nivartate /
analyzed: na ca vicchinna rūpaḥ pi saḥ virāmāt nivartate

original: sarvaiva hi kriyānyena samkīrṇevopalabhyate // BVaky_3,9.83 *//
analyzed: sarvā eva hi kriyā anyena samkīrṇā iva upalabhyate

original: *tadantarāladṛṣṭā vā sarvaivāvayavakriyā */
analyzed: tad antarāla dṛṣṭā vā sarvā eva avayava kriyā

original: sādṛśyāt sati bhede tu tadaṅgatvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,9.84 //
analyzed: sādṛśyāt sati bhede tu tat aṅga tvena gṛhyate

original: sad asad vāpi vastu syāt tṛtīyaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana /
analyzed: sat asat vā api vastu syāt tṛtīyam na asti kim cana

original: tena bhūtabhaviṣyantau muktvā madhyaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,9.85 //
analyzed: tena bhūta bhaviṣyantau muktvā madhyam na vidyate

analyzed: nirvṛtti rūpam ekasya bheda abhāvāt na kalpate

original: sad asad vāpi tenaikaṃ kramarūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,9.86 //
analyzed: sat asat vā api tena ekam krama rūpam katham bhavet

original: bahūnāṃ cānavasthānād ekam evopalabhyate /
analyzed: bahūnām ca anavasthānāt ekam eva upalabhyate

analyzed: yathopalabdhi smaraṇam tatra ca api upapadyate

analyzed: sat asat rūpam ekam syāt sarvasya eka tva kalpane

analyzed: nirvṛtti rūpam nirvṛtteḥ sāmānyam atha vā bhavet

original: kāryotpattau samarthaṃ vā svena dharmeṇa tat tathā /
analyzed: kārya utpattau samartham vā svena dharmeṇa tat tathā

original: ātmatattvena gṛhyeta sā cāsmin vartamānatā // BVaky_3,9.89 //
analyzed: ātma tattvena gṛhyeta sā ca asmin vartamāna tā

original: kriyāprabandharūpaṃ yad adhyātmaṃ vinigṛhyate /
analyzed: kriyā prabandha rūpam yat adhyātmam vinigṛhyate

original: saṃkrāntarūpam ekatra tām āhur vartamānatām // BVaky_3,9.90 //
analyzed: saṃkrānta rūpam ekatra tām āhuḥ vartamānatām

original: kriyātipattir atyantaṃ kriyānutpattilakṣaṇā /
analyzed: kriyā atipattiḥ atyantam kriyā anutpatti lakṣaṇā

original: na ca bhūtam anutpannaṃ na bhaviṣyat tathāvidham // BVaky_3,9.91 //
analyzed: na ca bhūtam anutpannam na bhaviṣyat tathāvidham

original: prāg viruddhakriyotpādān nirvṛtte vā virodhini /

analyzed: vyāpāre vadhi bhedena viṣayaḥ tatra bhidyate

analyzed: vyabhicāre nimittasya sādhu tvam na prakalpate

original: bhāvy āsīd iti sūtreṇa tat kāle 'nyatra śiṣyate // BVaky_3,9.93 //
analyzed: bhāvi āsīt iti sūtreṇa tat kāle nyatra śiṣyate

analyzed: sva kāle eva sādhu tve kāla bhede gatiḥ katham

original: vākyārthād atadartheṣu viśiṣṭatvaṃ na sidhyati // BVaky_3,9.94 //
analyzed: vākya arthāt a tad artheṣu viśiṣṭa tvam na sidhyati

original: tadarthaś ced avayavo bhāvino bhūtatāgatiḥ /

original: na syād atyantabhūtatvam evaikaṃ tatra saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,9.95 //
analyzed: na syāt atyanta bhūta tvam evā ekam tatra saṃbhavet

analyzed: viśiṣṭa kāla tā pūrvam tathā api tu viśeṣaṇe

original: āśrayāt so 'ntaraṅgatvāt tatra sādhur bhaviṣyati // BVaky_3,9.96 //
analyzed: āśrayāt saḥ antaraṅga tvāt tatra sādhuḥ bhaviṣyati

original: āmiśra eva prakrāntaḥ sa padārthas tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: āmiśraḥ eva prakrāntaḥ sa padārthaḥ tathāvidhaḥ

original: kevalasya vimiśratvaṃ nitye 'rthe nopapadyate // BVaky_3,9.97 //
analyzed: kevalasya vimiśra tvam nitye rthe na upapadyate

analyzed: śuddhe ca kāle vyākhyātam āmiśre na prasidhyati

original: sādhutvam ayathākālaṃ tat sūtreṇopadiśyate // BVaky_3,9.98 //
analyzed: sādhu tvam ayathākālam tat sūtreṇa upadiśyate

original: ākhyātapadavācye 'rthe nirvartyatvāt pradhānatā /
analyzed: ākhyāta pada vācye rthe nirvartya tvāt pradhāna tā

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ tadākṣepāt tatkāle vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,9.99 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam tad ākṣepāt tad kāle vyavatiṣṭhate

original: saṃpratyayānukāro vā śabdavyāpāra eva vā /
analyzed: saṃpratyaya anukāraḥ vā śabda vyāpāraḥ eva vā

original: adhyasyate viruddhe 'rthe na ca tena virudhyate // BVaky_3,9.100 //
analyzed: adhyasyate viruddhe rthe na ca tena virudhyate

original: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ity etau pratyayau vartamānatām /
analyzed: bhūtam bhaviṣyat iti etau pratyayau vartamāna tām

original: atyajantau prapadyete viruddhāśrayarūpatām // BVaky_3,9.101 //
analyzed: a tyajantau prapadyete viruddha āśraya rūpa tām

original: adhvano vartamānasya viṣayeṇa bhaviṣyatā /
analyzed: adhvanaḥ vartamānasya viṣayeṇa bhaviṣyatā

original: bhāṣye bhaviṣyatkāleti kāryārthaṃ vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,9.103 //
analyzed: bhāṣye bhaviṣyat kāla iti kārya artham vyapadiśyate

original: icchā cikīrśatīty atra svakālam anurudhyate /
