original: bhaviṣyati prakṛtyarthe tatkālaṃ nānurudhyate // BVaky_3,9.104 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati prakṛti arthe tad kālam na anurudhyate

original: āśāsyamānatantratvād āśaṃsāyāṃ viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: āśāsyamāna tantra tvāt āśaṃsāyām viparyayaḥ

original: prayoktṛdharmaḥ śabdārthe śabdair evānuśajyate // BVaky_3,9.105 //
analyzed: prayoktṛ dharmaḥ śabda arthe śabdaiḥ eva anuśajyate

original: apchālibījasaṃyoge vartate niṣpadir yadā /
analyzed: ap śāli bīja saṃyoge vartate niṣpadiḥ yadā

original: tatrāvayavavṛttitvād bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhanam // BVaky_3,9.106 //
analyzed: tatra avayava vṛtti tvāt bhaviṣyat pratiṣedhanam

original: phalaprasavarūpe tu niṣpadau bhūtakālatā /
analyzed: phala prasava rūpe tu niṣpadau bhūta kāla tā

original: dharmāntareṣu tad rūpam adhyasya parikalpyate // BVaky_3,9.107 //
analyzed: dharma antareṣu tat rūpam adhyasya parikalpyate

original: upayukte nimittānāṃ vyāpāre phalasiddhaye /
analyzed: upayukte nimittānām vyāpāre phala siddhaye

original: tatra rūpaṃ yad adhyastaṃ tatkālaṃ tat pratīyate // BVaky_3,9.108 //
analyzed: tatra rūpam yat adhyastam tad kālam tat pratīyate

original: niṣpattāv avadhiḥ kaś cit kaś cit prativivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: niṣpattau avadhiḥ kaḥ cit kaḥ cit prativivakṣitaḥ

original: hetujanmavyapekṣātaḥ phalajanmeti cocyate // BVaky_3,9.109 //
analyzed: hetu janma vyapekṣātaḥ phala janma iti ca ucyate

original: abahiḥsādhanādhīnā siddhir yatra vivakṣitā /
tat sādhanāntarābhāvāt siddham ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,9.110 //
analyzed: tat sādhana antara abhāvāt siddham iti apadiśyate

original: tasmād avadhibhedena siddhā mukhyaiva bhūtatā /
analyzed: tasmāt avadhi bhedena siddhā mukhyā eva bhūta tā

original: anāgatatvam astitvaṃ hetudharmavyapekṣaṇe // BVaky_3,9.111 //
analyzed: anāgata tvam astitvam hetu dharma vyapekṣaṇe

original: satām indriyasaṃbandhāt saiva sattā viśiṣyate /
analyzed: satām indriya saṃbandhāt sā eva sattā viśiṣyate

original: bhedena vyavahāro hi vastvantaranibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,9.112 //
analyzed: bhedena vyavahāraḥ hi vastu antara nibandhanaḥ

original: astitvaṃ vastumātrasya buddhyā tu parigṛhyate /
analyzed: astitvam vastu mātrasya buddhyā tu parigṛhyate

original: yaḥ samāsādanād bhedaḥ sa tatra na vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_3,9.113 //
analyzed: yaḥ samāsādanāt bhedaḥ sa tatra na vivakṣitaḥ

original: yogād vā strītvapuṃstvābhyāṃ na kiṃ cid avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: yogāt vā strītva puṃstvābhyām na kim cit avatiṣṭhate

original: svasminn ātmani tatrānyad bhūtaṃ bhāvi ca kathyate // BVaky_3,9.114 //
analyzed: svasmin ātmani tatra anyat bhūtam bhāvi ca kathyate

original: 3,10: Puruṣasamuddeśa
analyzed: puruṣa samuddeśa

original: pratyaktā parabhāvaś cāpy upādhī kartṛkarmanoḥ /
analyzed: pratyak tā para bhāvaḥ ca api upādhī kartṛ karmanoḥ

original: tayoḥ śrutiviśeṣeṇa vācakau madhyamottamau // BVaky_3,10.1 //
analyzed: tayoḥ śruti viśeṣeṇa vācakau madhyama uttamau

original: sad asad vāpi caitanyam etābhyām avagamyate /
analyzed: sat asat vā api caitanyam etābhyām avagamyate

original: caitanyabhāge prathamaḥ puruṣo na tu vartate // BVaky_3,10.2 //
analyzed: caitanya bhāge prathamaḥ puruṣaḥ na tu vartate

original: budhijānāticitibhiḥ prathame puruṣe sati /
analyzed: budhi jānāti citibhiḥ prathame puruṣe sati

original: samjñānārthair na caitanya- syopayogaḥ prakāśyate // BVaky_3,10.3 //
analyzed: samjñāna arthaiḥ na caitanya prakāśyate

original: saṃbodhanārthaḥ sarvatra madhyame kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: saṃbodhana arthaḥ sarvatra madhyame kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: tathā saṃbodhane sarvāṃ prathamāṃ yuṣmado viduḥ // BVaky_3,10.4 //
analyzed: tathā saṃbodhane sarvām prathamām yuṣmadaḥ viduḥ

original: saṃbodhanaṃ na loke 'sti vidhātavyena vastunā /
analyzed: saṃbodhanam na loke sti vidhātavyena vastunā

original: svāhendraśatrur vardhasva yathā rājā bhaveti ca // BVaky_3,10.5 //
analyzed: svāhā indra śatruḥ vardhasva yathā rājā bhava iti ca

original: yuṣmadarthasya siddhatvān niyatā cādyudāttatā /
analyzed: yuṣmad arthasya siddha tvāt niyatā ca ādi udātta tā

original: yuṣmadaḥ prathamāntasya paraś cen na padād asau // BVaky_3,10.6 //
analyzed: yuṣmadaḥ prathamā antasya paraḥ ced na padāt asau

original: guṇapradhānatābhedaḥ puruśādiviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa pradhāna tā bhedaḥ puruśa ādi viparyayaḥ

original: nirdeśaś cānyathā śāstre nityatvān na virudhyate // BVaky_3,10.7 //
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ ca anyathā śāstre nitya tvāt na virudhyate

original: yathānirdeśam arthāḥ syur yesāṃ śāstraṃ vidhāyakam /
analyzed: yathānirdeśam arthāḥ syuḥ śāstram vidhāyakam

original: kim cit sāmānyam āśritya sthite tu pratipādanam // BVaky_3,10.8 //
analyzed: kim cit sāmānyam āśritya sthite tu pratipādanam

original: yo 'śve yaḥ pīṭha ity atra bhūtayor aśvapīṭhayoḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ śve yaḥ pīṭhe iti atra bhūtayoḥ aśva pīṭhayoḥ

original: yathopalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ tathārtheṣv anuśāsanam // BVaky_3,10.9 //
analyzed: yathā upalakṣaṇa artha tvam tathā artheṣu anuśāsanam

original: 3,11: Saṃkhyāsamuddeśa
analyzed: saṃkhyā samuddeśa

original: saṃkhyāvān sattvabhūto 'rthaḥ sarva evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: saṃkhyāvān sattva bhūtaḥ rthaḥ sarvaḥ eva abhidhīyate

original: bhedābhedavibhāgo hi loke saṃkhyānibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,11.1 //
analyzed: bheda abheda vibhāgaḥ hi loke saṃkhyā nibandhanaḥ

original: sa dharmo vyatirikto vā teṣāṃ ātmaiva vā tathā /
analyzed: sa dharmaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā teṣām ātmā eva vā tathā

original: bhedahetutvam āśritya saṃkhyeti vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,11.2 //
analyzed: bheda hetu tvam āśritya saṃkhyā iti vyapadiśyate

original: samavetā paricchedye kva cid anyatra sā sthitā /
analyzed: samavetā paricchedye kva cit anyatra sā sthitā

original: prakalpayati bhāvānāṃ saṃkhyā bhedaṃ tathātmanaḥ // BVaky_3,11.3 //
analyzed: prakalpayati bhāvānām saṃkhyā bhedam tathā ātmanaḥ

original: paratve cāparatve ca bhede tulyā śrutir yathā /
analyzed: paratve ca aparatve ca bhede tulyā śrutiḥ yathā

original: saṃkhyāśabdābhidheyatvaṃ bhedahetos tathā guṇe // BVaky_3,11.4 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā śabda abhidheya tvam bheda hetoḥ tathā guṇe

original: asvatantre svatantratvaṃ paradharmo yathā guṇe /
analyzed: asvatantre svatantra tvam para dharmaḥ yathā guṇe

original: abhedye bhedyabhāvo 'pi dravyadharmas tathā guṇe // BVaky_3,11.5 //
analyzed: abhedye bhedya bhāvaḥ dravya dharmaḥ tathā guṇe

original: svabuddhyā tam apoddhṛtya loko 'py āgamam āśritaḥ /
analyzed: sva buddhyā tam apoddhṛtya āgamam āśritaḥ

original: svadharmād anyadharmeṇa vyācaṣṭe pratipattaye // BVaky_3,11.6 //
analyzed: svadharmāt anya dharmeṇa vyācaṣṭe pratipattaye

original: paropakāratattvānāṃ svātantryenābhidhāyakaḥ /
śabdaḥ sarvapadārthānā svadharmad viprakṛṣyate // BVaky_3,11.7 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ sarva padārthānām viprakṛṣyate

original: yathaivāviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na kiṃ cid avabhāsate /
analyzed: yathā eva aviṣayam jñānam na kim cit avabhāsate

original: tathā bhāvo 'py asaṃsṛṣṭo na kaś cid upalabhyate // BVaky_3,11.8 //
analyzed: tathā bhāvaḥ pi asaṃsṛṣṭaḥ na kaḥ cit upalabhyate

original: bhedena tu samākhyātaṃ yal loko 'py anuvartate /
analyzed: bhedena tu samākhyātam yat anuvartate

original: āgamāc chāstrasadṛśo vyavahāraḥ sa varṇyate // BVaky_3,11.9 //
analyzed: āgamāt śāstra sadṛśaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa varṇyate

original: buddhau sthiteṣu teṣv evam adhyāropo na durlabhaḥ /
analyzed: buddhau sthiteṣu teṣu evam adhyāropaḥ na durlabhaḥ

original: paradharmasya na hy atra sadasattvaṃ prayojakam // BVaky_3,11.10 //
analyzed: para dharmasya na hi atra sat asat tvam prayojakam

original: sāmānyeṣv api sāmānyaṃ viśeṣeṣu viśiṣṭatā /
analyzed: sāmānyeṣu api sāmānyam viśeṣeṣu viśiṣṭa tā

original: saṃkhyāsu saṃkhyā liṅgeṣu liṅgam evaṃ prakalpate // BVaky_3,11.11 //
analyzed: saṃkhyāsu saṃkhyā liṅgeṣu liṅgam evam prakalpate

original: ato dravyāśritāṃ saṃkhyām āhuḥ saṃsargavādinaḥ /
analyzed: atas dravya āśritām saṃkhyām āhuḥ saṃsarga vādinaḥ

original: bhedābhedavyatīteṣu bhedābhedavidhāyinīm // BVaky_3,11.12 //
analyzed: bheda abheda vyatīteṣu bheda abheda vidhāyinīm

original: ātmāntarānāṃ yenātmā tadrūpa iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: ātma antarānām yena ātmā tad rūpaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: atadrūpeṇa saṃsargāt sā nimittasarūpatā // BVaky_3,11.13 //
analyzed: a tad rūpeṇa saṃsargāt sā nimitta sarūpa tā

original: saṃsṛṣṭeṣv api nirbhāge bhūteṣv arthakriyā yathā /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu api nirbhāge bhūteṣu arthakriyā yathā

original: sattvādiṣu ca mātrāsu sarvāsv evaṃ pratīyate // BVaky_3,11.14 //
analyzed: sattva ādiṣu ca mātrāsu sarvāsu evam pratīyate

original: dvitvādiyonir ekatvaṃ bhedās tatpūrvakā yataḥ /
analyzed: dvi tva ādi yoniḥ eka tvam bhedāḥ tad pūrvakāḥ yatas

original: vinā tena na saṃkhyānām anyāsām asti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,11.15 //
analyzed: vinā tena na saṃkhyānām anyāsām asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: ekatve buddhisahite nimittaṃ dvitvajanmani /
analyzed: eka tve buddhi sahite nimittam dvi tva janmani

original: ekatvābhyāṃ samutpannam evaṃ vā tat pratīyate // BVaky_3,11.16 //
analyzed: eka tvābhyām samutpannam evam vā tat pratīyate

original: ekatvasamudāyo vā sāpekṣe vā pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: eka tva samudāyaḥ vā sāpekṣe vā pṛthak pṛthak

original: ekatve dvitvam ity evaṃ tayor dvivacanaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,11.17 //
analyzed: eka tve dvi tvam iti evam tayoḥ dvivacanam bhavet

original: eko 'pi guṇabhedena saṅgho bhedaṃ prakalpayet /
analyzed: ekaḥ pi guṇa bhedena saṅghaḥ bhedam prakalpayet

original: āśrayāśrayibhedo hi tadāśrayanibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,11.18 //
analyzed: āśraya āśrayi bhedaḥ hi tad āśraya nibandhanaḥ

original: saṃkhyeyasaṅghasaṃkhyāna- saṅghaḥ saṃkhyeti kathyate /
analyzed: saṃkhyeya saṅgha saṃkhyāna saṅghaḥ saṃkhyā iti kathyate

original: vimśatyādisu sānyasva dravyasaṅghasya bhedikā // BVaky_3,11.19 //
analyzed: dravya saṅghasya bhedikā

original: ekaviṃśatisaṃkhvāvāṃ saṃkhyāntarasarūpayoḥ /
analyzed: saṃkhyā antara sarūpayoḥ

original: ekasyāṃ buddhyanāvṛttyā,
analyzed: ekasyām buddhi anāvṛttyā

original: bhāgayor iva kalpanā // BVaky_3,11.20 //
analyzed: bhāgayoḥ iva kalpanā

original: asaṃkhyāsamudāyatvāt saṃkhyākāryaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: a saṃkhyā samudāya tvāt saṃkhyā kāryam vidhīyate

original: samūhatve tu tan na syāt svāṅgādisamudāyavat // BVaky_3,11.21 //
analyzed: samūha tve tu tat na syāt sva aṅga ādi samudāyavat

original: saṃkhyeyāntaratantrāsu yā saṃkhyāsu pravartate /
analyzed: saṃkhyeyā antaratantrāsu yā saṃkhyāsu pravartate

original: āvṛttivargasaṃkhyeyā tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,11.22 //
analyzed: āvṛtti varga saṃkhyeyā tām saṃkhyām tādṛśīm viduḥ

original: na saṃkhyāyāṃ na saṃkhyeye dvau daśety asti saṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na saṃkhyāyām na saṃkhyeye dvau daśa iti asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: bhedābhāvān na saṃkhyāyāṃ virodhān na tadāśraye // BVaky_3,11.23 //
analyzed: bheda abhāvāt na saṃkhyāyām virodhāt na tad āśraye

original: saṃkhyāyete daśadvargau dvidaśā iti saṃkhyayā /
analyzed: saṃkhyāyete daśa dvargau dvidaśāḥ iti saṃkhyayā

original: tadrūpe vāpi saṃkhyeya āvṛttiḥ parigaṇyate // BVaky_3,11.24 //
analyzed: tad rūpe vā api saṃkhyeye āvṛttiḥ parigaṇyate

original: saṃkhyā nāma na saṃkhyāsti saṃjñaiṣeti yathocyate /
analyzed: saṃkhyā nāma na saṃkhyā asti saṃjñā eṣā iti yathā ucyate

original: rūpaṃ na rūpam apy evaṃ samjñā sā hi sitādiṣu // BVaky_3,11.25 //
analyzed: rūpam na rūpam api evam samjñā sā hi sita ādiṣu

original: saṃkhyānajātiyogāt tu saṃkhyā saṃkhyeti kathyate /
analyzed: saṃkhyāna jāti yogāt tu saṃkhyā saṃkhyā iti kathyate

original: rūpatvajātiyogāc ca rūpe rūpam iti smṛtam // BVaky_3,11.26 //
analyzed: rūpa tva jāti yogāt ca rūpe rūpam iti smṛtam

original: nimittam ekam ity atra vibhaktyā nābhidhīyate /
analyzed: nimittam ekam iti atra vibhaktyā na abhidhīyate

original: tadvatas tu yad ekatvaṃ vibhaktis tatra vartate // BVaky_3,11.27 //
analyzed: tadvataḥ tu yat eka tvam vibhaktiḥ tatra vartate

original: ekasya pracayo dṛṣṭaḥ samūhaś ca dvayos tathā /
analyzed: ekasya pracayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ samūhaḥ ca dvayoḥ tathā

original: nimittavyatirekeṇa saṃkhyānyā bhedikā tataḥ // BVaky_3,11.28 //
analyzed: nimitta vyatirekeṇa saṃkhyā anyā bhedikā tatas

original: tad ekam api caikatvaṃ vibhaktiśravaṇād ṛte /
analyzed: tat ekam api ca eka tvam vibhakti śravaṇāt ṛte

original: nocyate tena śabdena vibhaktyā tu sahocyate // BVaky_3,11.29 //
analyzed: na ucyate tena śabdena vibhaktyā tu saha ucyate

original: anvayavyatirekau ca yadi syād vacanāntaram /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca yadi syāt vacana antaram

original: syātām asati tasmimś ca prakṛtyartho na kalpyate // BVaky_3,11.30 //
analyzed: syātām asati ca prakṛti arthaḥ na kalpyate

original: ekatvam eka ity atra śuddhadravyaviśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: eka tvam ekaḥ iti atra śuddha dravya viśeṣaṇam

original: saguṇas tu prakṛtyartho vibhaktyarthena bhidyate // BVaky_3,11.31 //
analyzed: sa guṇaḥ tu prakṛti arthaḥ vibhakti arthena bhidyate

original: dvyekayor iti nirdeśāt saṃkhyāmātre 'pi saṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: dvi ekayoḥ iti nirdeśāt saṃkhyā mātre saṃbhavaḥ

original: ekādīnāṃ prasiddhyā tu saṃkhyeyārthatvam ucyate // BVaky_3,11.32 //
analyzed: eka ādīnām prasiddhyā tu saṃkhyeya artha tvam ucyate

original: 3,12: Upagrahasamuddeśa
analyzed: upagraha samuddeśa

original: ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ kva cid arthasya gamyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmanepadāt bhedaḥ kva cit arthasya gamyate

original: anyataś cāpi lādeśān manyante tam upagraham // BVaky_3,12.1 //
analyzed: anyatas ca api lā deśāt manyante tam upagraham

original: kva cit sādhanam evāsau kva cit tasya viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: kva cit sādhanam eva asau kva cit tasya viśeṣaṇam

original: sādhanaṃ tatra karmādi vyaktavāco viśeṣaṇam // BVaky_3,12.2 //
analyzed: sādhanam tatra karma ādi vyakta vācaḥ viśeṣaṇam

original: kriyā viṣayabhedena jīvikādiṣu bhidyate /
analyzed: kriyā viṣaya bhedena jīvikā ādiṣu bhidyate

original: lādeśaiḥ sa kriyābhedo vākyeṣv api niyamyate // BVaky_3,12.3 //
analyzed: lā deśaiḥ sa kriyā bhedaḥ vākyeṣu api niyamyate

original: dhātvarthas tadviśeṣaś cāpy uktaḥ kva cid upagrahaḥ /
analyzed: dhātvarthaḥ tad viśeṣaḥ ca api uktaḥ kva cit upagrahaḥ

original: dhātvartho gandhanādiḥ syād vyatihāro viśeṣaṇam // BVaky_3,12.4 //
analyzed: dhātvarthaḥ gandhana ādiḥ syāt vyatihāraḥ viśeṣaṇam

original: kriyāpravṛttāv ākhyātā kaiś cit svārthaparārthatā /
analyzed: kriyā pravṛttau ākhyātā kaiḥ cit sva artha para artha tā

original: asati vā sati vāpi vivakṣitanibandhanā // BVaky_3,12.5 //
analyzed: asati vā sati vā api vivakṣita nibandhanā

original: kesāṃ cit kartrabhiprāye ṇicā saha vikalpate /
analyzed: kesām cit kartṛ abhiprāye ṇicā saha vikalpate

original: ātmanepadam anyesāṃ tadarthā prakṛtir yathā // BVaky_3,12.6 //
analyzed: ātmanepadam tad arthā prakṛtiḥ yathā

original: krīṇīṣva vapate dhatte cinoti cinute 'pi ca /
analyzed: krīṇīṣva vapate dhatte cinoti cinute pi ca

original: āptaprayogā dṛśyante yeṣu ṇyartho 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,12.7 //
analyzed: āpta prayogāḥ dṛśyante yeṣu

original: saṃvidhānaṃ pacādināṃ kva cid arthaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃvidhānam paca ādinām kva cit arthaḥ pratīyate

original: tannimittā yathānyāpi kriyādhiśrayaṇādikā // BVaky_3,12.8 //
analyzed: tad nimittā yathā anyā api kriyā adhiśrayaṇa ādikā

original: kartrabhiprāyatā sūtre kriyābhedopalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kartṛ abhiprāya tā sūtre kriyā bheda upalakṣaṇam

original: tathābhūtā kriyā yā hi tatkartā phalabhāg yataḥ // BVaky_3,12.9 //
analyzed: tathābhūtā kriyā yā hi tad kartā phala bhāj yatas

original: yathopalakṣyate kālas tārakādarśanādibhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā upalakṣyate kālaḥ tārakā darśana ādibhiḥ

original: tathā phalaviśeṣeṇa kriyābhedo nidarśyate // BVaky_3,12.10 //
analyzed: tathā phala viśeṣeṇa kriyā bhedaḥ nidarśyate

original: kriyāviśeṣavacane sāmarthyam uparudhyate /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa vacane sāmarthyam uparudhyate

original: kesāṃ cid anye tu kṛtāḥ svariteto ñitas tathā // BVaky_3,12.11 //
analyzed: kesām cit anye tu kṛtāḥ svarita itaḥ ñ itaḥ tathā

original: anubandhaś ca siddhe 'rthe smṛtyartham anuṣajyate /
analyzed: anubandhaḥ ca siddhe rthe smṛti artham anuṣajyate

original: tulyārtheṣv api cāvaśyaṃ na sarveṣv ekadharmatā // BVaky_3,12.12 //
analyzed: tulya artheṣu api ca avaśyam na sarveṣu eka dharma tā

original: dṛśīkṣyoḥ sadṛśe 'py arthe nābhedaḥ pratipūrvayoḥ /
analyzed: dṛśi īkṣyoḥ sadṛśe pi arthe na abhedaḥ prati pūrvayoḥ

original: ṇyarthopādāyinas tasmān na tulyārthāḥ pacādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,12.13 //
analyzed: ṇi artha upādāyinaḥ tasmāt na tulya arthāḥ paca ādibhiḥ

original: umbhyarthe vartamānasya karoter bhinnadharmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: umbhi arthe vartamānasya karoteḥ bhinna dharmaṇaḥ

original: ṇyarthopādāyitā tasmān niyatāḥ śabdaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,12.14 //
analyzed: tasmāt niyatāḥ śabda śaktayaḥ

original: tathā hy anuprayogasya karoter ātmanepade /
analyzed: tathā hi anuprayogasya karoteḥ ātmanepade

original: pūrvavadgrahaṇaṃ prāpte svaritaṃ samupasthitam // BVaky_3,12.15 //
analyzed: pūrvavat grahaṇam prāpte svaritam samupasthitam

original: ekatve 'pi kriyākhyāte sādhanāśrayasaṃkhyayā /
analyzed: eka tve pi kriyā ākhyāte sādhana āśraya saṃkhyayā

original: bhidyate na tu liṅgākhyo bhedas tatra tadāśritaḥ // BVaky_3,12.16 //
analyzed: bhidyate na tu liṅga ākhyaḥ bhedaḥ tatra tad āśritaḥ

original: tasmād avasthite 'py arthe kasya cit pratibadhyate /
analyzed: tasmāt avasthite pi arthe kasya cit pratibadhyate

original: śabdasya śaktiḥ sa tv eṣa śāstre 'nvākhyāyate vidhiḥ // BVaky_3,12.17 //
analyzed: śabdasya śaktiḥ sa tu eṣa śāstre nu ākhyāyate vidhiḥ

original: yasyārthasya prasiddhyartham ārabhyante pacādayaḥ /
analyzed: yasya arthasya prasiddhi artham ārabhyante paca ādayaḥ

original: tat pradhānaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ na lābhādi prayojanam // BVaky_3,12.18 //
analyzed: tat pradhānam phalam teṣām na lābha ādi prayojanam

original: yatrobhau svāmidāsau tu prārabhete saha kriyām /
analyzed: yatra ubhau svāmi dāsau tu prārabhete saha kriyām

original: yugapad dharmabhedena dhātus tatra na vartate // BVaky_3,12.19 //
analyzed: yugapad dharma bhedena dhātuḥ tatra na vartate

original: yatra pratividhānārthaḥ pacis tatrātmanepadam /
analyzed: yatra pratividhāna arthaḥ paciḥ tatra ātmanepadam

original: parasmaipadam anyatra saṃskārādyabhidhāyini // BVaky_3,12.20 //
analyzed: parasmaipadam anyatra saṃskāra ādi abhidhāyini

original: saṃvidhātuś ca sāṃnidhyād dāse dharmo 'nusajyate /
analyzed: saṃvidhātuḥ ca sāṃnidhyāt dāse dharmaḥ nusajyate

original: plakṣaśabdasya sāṃnidhyān nyagrodhe plakṣatā yathā // BVaky_3,12.21 //
analyzed: plakṣa śabdasya sāṃnidhyāt nyagrodhe plakṣa tā yathā

original: puroḍāśābhidhānaṃ ca dhānādiṣu yathā sthitam /
analyzed: puroḍāśa abhidhānam ca dhānā ādiṣu yathā sthitam

original: chattriṇā cābhisaṃbandhāc chattriśabdābhidheyatā // BVaky_3,12.22 //
analyzed: chattriṇā ca abhisaṃbandhāt chattri śabda abhidheya tā

original: arthāt pratītam anyonyaṃ pārārthyam avivakṣitam /
analyzed: arthāt pratītam anyonyam pārārthyam avivakṣitam

original: ity ayaṃ śeṣaviṣayaḥ kaiś cid atrānuvarṇyate // BVaky_3,12.23 //
analyzed: iti ayam śeṣa viṣayaḥ kaiḥ cit atra anuvarṇyate

original: atha pratividhātā yo halaiḥ kṛṣati pañcabhiḥ /
analyzed: atha pratividhātā yaḥ halaiḥ kṛṣati pañcabhiḥ

original: bhāṣye nodāhṛtaṃ kasmāt prāptaṃ tatrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.24 //
analyzed: bhāṣye na udāhṛtam kasmāt prāptam tatra ātmanepadam

original: pratītatvāt tadarthasya śeṣatvaṃ yadi kalpyate /
analyzed: pratīta tvāt tad arthasya śeṣa tvam yadi kalpyate

original: na syāt prāptavibhāṣāsau svaritetāṃ nivartikā // BVaky_3,12.25 //
analyzed: na syāt prāpta vibhāṣā asau svaritā itām nivartikā

original: śuddhe tu saṃvidhānārthe kaiś cid atreṣyate kṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: śuddhe tu saṃvidhāna arthe kaiḥ cit atrā iṣyate kṛṣiḥ

original: taddharmā yajir ity evaṃ na syāt tatrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.26 //
analyzed: tad dharmā yajiḥ iti evam na syāt tatra ātmanepadam

original: atra tūpapadenāyam arthabhedaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: atra tu upapadena ayam artha bhedaḥ pratīyate

original: prāpte vibhāṣā kriyate tasmān nātrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.27 //
analyzed: prāpte vibhāṣā kriyate tasmāt na atra ātmanepadam

original: 3,13: Liṅgasamuddeśa
analyzed: liṅga samuddeśa

original: stanakeśādisaṃbandho viśiṣṭā vā stanādayaḥ /
analyzed: stana keśa ādi saṃbandhaḥ viśiṣṭāḥ vā stana ādayaḥ

original: tadupavyañjanā jātir guṇāvasthā guṇās tathā // BVaky_3,13.1 //
analyzed: tad upavyañjanā jātiḥ guṇa avasthāḥ guṇāḥ tathā

original: śabdopajanito 'rthātmā śabdasaṃskāra ity api /
analyzed: śabda upajanitaḥ rtha ātmā śabda saṃskāraḥ iti api

analyzed: liṅgānām liṅga tattva jñaiḥ vikalpāḥ sapta darśitāḥ

analyzed: upādāna vikalpāḥ ca liṅgānām sapta varṇitāḥ

analyzed: vikalpa saṃniyogābhyām ye śabdeṣu vyavasthitāḥ

analyzed: a viruddhāḥ viruddhābhiḥ go mahiṣī ādi jātibhiḥ

analyzed: hastinyām vaḍavāyām ca strī iti buddheḥ samanvayaḥ

original: atas tāṃ jātim icchanti dravyādisamavāyinīm // BVaky_3,13.5 //
analyzed: atas tām jātim icchanti dravya ādi samavāyinīm

original: paratantrasya yal liṅgam apoddhāre vivakṣite /
analyzed: paratantrasya yat liṅgam apoddhāre vivakṣite

analyzed: tatra asau śabda saṃskāraḥ śabdaiḥ eva vyapāśritaḥ

original: buddhyā kalpitarūpeṣu liṅgeṣv api ca saṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: buddhyā kalpita rūpeṣu liṅgeṣu api ca saṃbhavaḥ

original: strītvādīnāṃ vyavasthā hi sā liṅgair vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,13.7 //
analyzed: strī tva ādīnām vyavasthā hi sā liṅgaiḥ vyapadiśyate

original: yathā salilanirbhāsā mṛgatṛṣṇāsu jāyate /
analyzed: yathā salila nirbhāsā mṛgatṛṣṇāsu jāyate

original: jalopalabdhyanuguṇād bījād buddhir jale 'sati // BVaky_3,13.8 //
analyzed: jala upalabdhi anuguṇāt bījāt buddhiḥ jale sati

original: tathaivāvyapadeśyebhyo hetubhyas tārakādiṣu /
analyzed: tathā eva avyapadeśyebhyaḥ hetubhyaḥ tārakā ādiṣu

original: mukhyebhya iva liṅgebhyo bhedā loke vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.9 //
analyzed: mukhyebhyaḥ iva liṅgebhyaḥ bhedāḥ loke vyavasthitāḥ

original: vyakteṣu vyaktarūpāṇāṃ stanādīnāṃ tu darśanāt /
analyzed: vyakteṣu vyakta rūpāṇām stana ādīnām tu darśanāt

original: avyaktavyañjanāvyakter jātir na parikalpyate // BVaky_3,13.10 //
analyzed: avyakta vyañjana avyakteḥ jātiḥ na parikalpyate

analyzed: astitvam ca pratijñāya sadā adarśanam icchataḥ

original: atyantādarśane na syād asattvaṃ prati niścayaḥ // BVaky_3,13.11 //
analyzed: atyanta adarśane na syāt asattvam prati niścayaḥ

original: na cālam anumānāya śabdo 'darśanapūrvakaḥ /
analyzed: na ca alam anumānāya śabdaḥ darśana pūrvakaḥ

analyzed: āvirbhāvaḥ tirobhāvaḥ sthitiḥ ca iti anapāyinaḥ

original: dharmā mūrtiṣu sarvāsu liṅgatvenānudarśitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.13 //
analyzed: dharmāḥ mūrtiṣu sarvāsu liṅga tvena anudarśitāḥ

original: sarvamūrtyātmabhūtānāṃ śabdādināṃ guṇe guṇe /
analyzed: sarva mūrti ātma bhūtānām śabda ādinām guṇe guṇe

analyzed: trayaḥ sattva ādi dharmāḥ te sarvatra samavasthitāḥ

original: rūpasya cātmamātrānāṃ śuklādināṃ pratikṣaṇam /
analyzed: rūpasya ca ātma mātrānām śukla ādinām pratikṣaṇam

original: kā cit pralīyate kā cit kathaṃ cid abhivardhate // BVaky_3,13.15 //
analyzed: kā cit pralīyate kā cit katham cit abhivardhate

original: avirbhāvatirobhāva- pravṛttyā vāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,13.17 //
analyzed: avirbhāva tirobhāva pravṛttyā vā avatiṣṭhate

analyzed: guṇāḥ iti eva buddheḥ vā nimitta tvam sthitiḥ matā

analyzed: sthiteḥ ca sarva liṅgānām sarvanāma tvam ucyate

analyzed: sthiteṣu sarva liṅgeṣu vivakṣā niyama āśrayaḥ

original: kasya cic chabdasaṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kva cid iṣyate // BVaky_3,13.19 //
analyzed: kasya cit śabda saṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kva cit iṣyate

original: saṃnidhāne nimittānāṃ kiṃ cid eva pravartakam /
analyzed: saṃnidhāne nimittānām kim cit eva pravartakam

original: yathā takṣādiśabdānāṃ lingeṣu niyamas tathā // BVaky_3,13.20 //
analyzed: yathā takṣa ādi śabdānām lingeṣu niyamaḥ tathā

analyzed: bhāva tattva dṛśaḥ śiṣṭāḥ śabda artheṣu vyavasthitāḥ

analyzed: yat yat dharme ṅga tām eti liṅgam tat tat pracakṣate

analyzed: svara bhedāt yathā śabdāḥ sādhavaḥ viṣaya antare

original: liṅgabhedāt tathā siddhāt sādhutvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,13.22 //

analyzed: prayogaḥ viprayogaḥ ca loke yatra upalabhyate

analyzed: śāstram ārabhyate tatra na prayoga aviparyaye

analyzed: nimitta bhāvaḥ sādhu tve vivakṣā ca vyavasthitā

analyzed: hrasva upādhi viśiṣṭāyāḥ kuṭyāḥ prasava yogi tā

analyzed: śabda antarānām bhinne rthe upāyāḥ pratipattaye

original: ātmarūpaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ sthitir ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,13.27 //
analyzed: ātma rūpam tu bhāvānām sthitiḥ iti apadiśyate

analyzed: dṛṣṭam nimittam cit jāti ādi vat avasthitam

analyzed: dṛṣṭa vat śabda saṃskāra mātram tu parikalpitam

analyzed: yathā prasiddhe pi ekatve nānātva abhiniveśinaḥ

analyzed: nānātvam janayanti iva śabdāḥ liṅge pi sa kramaḥ

analyzed: nimitta darśanāt arthe kaiḥ cit sarvatra varṇyate

analyzed: indriya ādi yathādṛṣṭam bheda hetuḥ tat iṣyate

analyzed: vṛtti samuddeśa

original: kutsāpraśaṃsātiśayaiḥ samāptārthaṃ tu yujyate /
analyzed: kutsā praśaṃsā atiśayaiḥ samāpta artham tu yujyate

analyzed: padam svārtha ādayaḥ sarve yasmāt kutsā ādi hetavaḥ

analyzed: sva śabda abhihite kena viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ pratīyate

analyzed: na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā bheda abhāvāt pratīyate

analyzed: pūjyate kutsita tvena praśasta tvena kutsyate

analyzed: na prātipadika arthaḥ ca tatra eva vyatiricyate

analyzed: viśeṣyam syāt anirjñātam nirjñātaḥ rthaḥ viśeṣaṇam

original: parārthatvena śeṣatvaṃ sarveṣām upakāriṇām // BVaky_3,14.7 //
analyzed: parārtha tvena śeṣa tvam sarveṣām upakāriṇām

original: vibhaktibhedo niyamād guṇaguṇyabhidhāyinoḥ /
analyzed: vibhakti bhedaḥ niyamāt guṇa guṇi abhidhāyinoḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyasya prasiddhir dravyaśabdayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.8 //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyasya prasiddhiḥ dravya śabdayoḥ

original: dravye 'nirjñātajātīye kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: dravye nirjñāta jātīye kṛṣṇa śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: anirjñātaguṇe caivaṃ tilaśabdaḥ pravartate // BVaky_3,14.9 //
analyzed: a nirjñāta guṇe ca evam tila śabdaḥ pravartate

original: sāmānyānām asaṃbandhāt tau viśeṣe vyavasthitau /
analyzed: sāmānyānām asaṃbandhāt tau viśeṣe vyavasthitau

analyzed: rūpa abhedāt viśeṣam tam abhivyaṅktum na śaknutaḥ

original: tāv eva saṃnipatitau bhedena pratipādane /
analyzed: tau eva saṃnipatitau bhedena pratipādane

original: avacchedam ivādhāya saṃśayaṃ vyapakarṣataḥ // BVaky_3,14.11 //
analyzed: avacchedam iva ādhāya saṃśayam vyapakarṣataḥ

original: dravyātmā guṇasaṃsarga- bhedād āśrīyate pṛthak /
analyzed: dravya ātmā guṇa saṃsarga bhedāt āśrīyate pṛthak

original: jātisaṃbandhabhedāc ca dvitīya iva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.12 //
analyzed: jāti saṃbandha bhedāt ca dvitīyaḥ iva gṛhyate

original: nimittair abhisaṃbandhād yā nimittasarūpatā /
analyzed: nimittaiḥ abhisaṃbandhāt yā nimitta sarūpa tā

original: tayaikasyāpi nānātvaṃ rūpabhedāt prakalpate // BVaky_3,14.13 //
analyzed: tayā ekasya api nānātvam rūpa bhedāt prakalpate

original: dravyāvasthā tṛtīyā tu yasyāṃ saṃsṛjyate dvayam /
analyzed: dravya avasthā tṛtīyā tu yasyām saṃsṛjyate dvayam

original: tayor avasthayor bhedād āśrayatve niyujyate // BVaky_3,14.14 //
analyzed: tayoḥ avasthayoḥ bhedāt āśraya tve niyujyate

original: buddhyaikaṃ bhidyate bhinnam ekatvaṃ copagacchati /
analyzed: buddhyā ekam bhidyate bhinnam eka tvam ca upagacchati

original: buddhyāvasthā vibhajyante sā hy arthasya vidhāyikā // BVaky_3,14.15 //
analyzed: buddhyā avasthāḥ vibhajyante sā hi arthasya vidhāyikā

original: vyapadeśivad ekasmin buddhyā nānātvakalpanā /
analyzed: vyapadeśi vat ekasmin buddhyā nānātva kalpanā

original: tayā kalpitabhedaḥ sann arthātmā vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.16 //
analyzed: tayā kalpita bhedaḥ san artha ātmā vyapadiśyate

original: kriyābhedena dṛṣṭānām aśmādīnāṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā bhedena dṛṣṭānām aśma ādīnām punar punar

original: kiṃ cid darśanam anyena darśanenāpadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.17 //
analyzed: kim cit darśanam anyena darśanena apadiśyate

original: prayogabhedād dhātūnāṃ prakalpya bahurūpatām /
analyzed: prayoga bhedāt dhātūnām prakalpya bahu rūpa tām

original: bhedābhedāv upādāya kva cid ekāctvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.18 //
analyzed: bheda abhedau upādāya kva cit eka a c tvam ucyate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyām arthavān parikalpitaḥ /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām arthavān parikalpitaḥ

original: eko dhātvarthavigamād varṇatvenopacaryate // BVaky_3,14.19 //
analyzed: ekaḥ dhātvartha vigamāt varṇa tvena upacaryate

original: dravyātmānas trayas tasmād buddhau nānā vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: dravya ātmānaḥ trayaḥ tasmāt buddhau nānā vyavasthitāḥ

original: āśrayāśrayidharmeṇety ayaṃ pūrvebhya āgamaḥ // BVaky_3,14.20 //
analyzed: āśraya āśrayi dharmeṇa iti ayam pūrvebhyaḥ āgamaḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca śabdayoḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca śabdayoḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñitvam eva ca // BVaky_3,14.21 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam saṃjñā saṃjñi tvam eva ca

original: keṣāṃ cij jātiguṇayor ekārthasamavetayoḥ /
analyzed: keṣām cit jāti guṇayoḥ eka artha samavetayoḥ

original: vṛttiḥ kṛṣṇatileṣv iṣṭā śabde dravyābhidhāyini // BVaky_3,14.22 //
analyzed: vṛttiḥ kṛṣṇa tileṣu iṣṭā śabde dravya abhidhāyini

original: saṃs tu rūparasādinām āśrayo nābhidhīyate /
analyzed: san tu rūpa rasa ādinām āśrayaḥ na abhidhīyate

original: dravyābhidhānena vinā tatas te dvandvabhāvinaḥ // BVaky_3,14.23 //
analyzed: dravya abhidhānena vinā tatas te dvandva bhāvinaḥ

original: dravyābhidhāyī kṛṣṇādir ākāṅkṣāvān pravartate /
analyzed: dravya abhidhāyī kṛṣṇa ādiḥ ākāṅkṣāvān pravartate

original: nimittānuvidhāyitvāt tat tilādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.24 //
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāyi tvāt tat tila ādau na vidyate

original: evaṃ jātimati dravye pratyāsanne kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: evam jātimati dravye pratyāsanne kriyām prati

original: guṇadharma guṇāviṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ bhedāya kalpate // BVaky_3,14.25 //
analyzed: guṇa dharma guṇa āviṣṭam dravyam bhedāya kalpate

original: guṇamātrābhidhāyitvaṃ ke cid icchanti vṛttiṣu /
analyzed: guṇa mātra abhidhāyi tvam ke cid icchanti vṛttiṣu

analyzed: aja aśva ādiṣu saṃbandhāt rūḍhīnām iva rūḍhibhiḥ

analyzed: tile pūrvam upātte vā tatra eva matup iṣyate

analyzed: sa ca dharmaḥ samāseṣu guṇaḥ tasmāt viśeṣaṇam

original: bhinnam atrādhikaraṇaṃ prāg vṛttes tac ca gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.28 *//
analyzed: bhinnam atra adhikaraṇam prāk vṛtteḥ tat ca gṛhyate  /

original: anusyūteva bhedābhyām ekā prakhyopajāyate /

analyzed: yadā saha vivakṣām tām āhuḥ dvandva ekaśeṣayoḥ

analyzed: vyāpāra samudāyasya yathā adhiśrayaṇa ādiṣu

analyzed: pratyekam jāti vat vṛttiḥ tathā dvandva padeṣu api

analyzed: śauṇḍa ardharca puroḍāśa chattriṇaḥ nidarśanam

analyzed: vibhāgena samākhyāne tatas tat dvi artham ucyate

analyzed: te tu abhedena sāmarthya mātre eva upavarṇitāḥ

analyzed: upamāna samāsa ādau śyāma ādīnām udāhṛtā

analyzed: vṛttiḥ anya padārthe yā tasyāḥ vākyeṣu asaṃbhavaḥ

analyzed: ca arthe dvandva padānām ca bhede vṛttiḥ na vidyate

analyzed: prāk vṛtteḥ jāti vāci tvam na ca gaura khara ādiṣu

analyzed: krīḍāyāḥ jīvikāyāḥ ca vākyena avacanāt tathā

analyzed: na nitya grahaṇam yuktam kauṭilye yaṅ vidhau yathā

analyzed: nirdhāraṇa ādi viṣaye vyapekṣā eva yatas sthitā

analyzed: samāsa pratiṣedhānām tatas na asti prayojanam

analyzed: kṛtam dvandva eka vat bhāve saṅgha vṛtti upadeśa vat

original: ekārthībhāva evātaḥ samāsākhyā vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.45 //

original: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca sāmānye kaiś cid iṣyate /

analyzed: tathā vākyam vyapekṣāyām samāsaḥ nyatra śiṣyate

analyzed: vṛttau viśeṣaṇa ākāṅkṣā gamaka tvāt nivartate

analyzed: saṃbandhi śabdaḥ sāpekṣaḥ nityam sarvaḥ prayujyate

original: svārthavat sā vyapekṣāsya vṛttāv api na hīyate // BVaky_3,14.48 //
analyzed: svārtha vat sā vyapekṣā asya vṛttau api na hīyate

analyzed: samudāyena saṃbandhaḥ yesām guru kula ādinā

original: saṃspṛśyāvayavāṃs te 'pi yujyante tadvatā saha // BVaky_3,14.49 //
analyzed: saṃspṛśya avayavān te pi yujyante tadvatā saha

original: abudhān praty upāyāś ca vicitrāḥ pratipattaye /

original: śabdāntaratvād atyanta- bhedo vākyasamāsayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.50 //
analyzed: śabda antara tvāt atyanta bhedaḥ vākya samāsayoḥ

original: asamāse samāse ca gorathādiṣv adarśanāt /

original: yuktādināṃ na śāstreṇa nivṛttyanugamaḥ kṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.51 //
analyzed: yukta ādinām na śāstreṇa nivṛtti anugamaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: praparṇaprapalāśādau gataśabdaś ca vṛttiṣu // BVaky_3,14.52 //
analyzed: praparṇa prapalāśa ādau gata śabdaḥ ca vṛttiṣu

original: padaṃ yathaiva vṛkṣādi viśiṣṭe 'rthe vyavasthitam /

analyzed: bhedena pratyayaḥ loke tulya rūpa a samanvayāt

analyzed: rūḍhi arūḍhi vibhāgaḥ pi kriyate pratipattaye

analyzed: yā sāmānya āśrayā saṃjñā viśeṣa viṣayā ca yā

original: bahulagrahaṇān nāsti pravṛttir ubhayos tayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.57 //
analyzed: bahula grahaṇāt na asti pravṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ tayoḥ

analyzed: syāt syāt tatra antaraṅga tvāt bādhakaḥ vayava svaraḥ

analyzed: bhedaḥ eva vibhāṣāyāḥ niyataḥ viṣayaḥ yatas

analyzed: yatas ca aviṣayaḥ saḥ syāḥ tasmāt na asti akṛtārtha tā

analyzed: abheda prakrame tyantam bhedānām apasāraṇāt

analyzed: vṛttau avayavasya ā t tvam yasmāt na pratiṣidhyate

original: yasmāt tatrāntaraṅgatvād bādhako 'vayavasvaraḥ // BVaky_3,14.62 //
analyzed: yasmāt tatra antaraṅga tvāt bādhakaḥ vayava svaraḥ

analyzed: dvipade tena ya ga pad tritayam na samasyate

analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam api teṣām na kalpate

original: śabdāntaratvād vākye tu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.65 //
analyzed: śabda antara tvāt vākye tu vṛttau nityam na vidyate

analyzed: viśeṣa nirapekṣaḥ kṛta śabdaḥ pravartate

analyzed: tatas kriyāvatā kartrā yogaḥ bhavati karmaṇām

analyzed: saṃbadhyate kriyā tadvat kṛta pūrvī ādiṣu sthitā

original: muṇḍisūtrvādayo 'sadbhir bhāgair anugatā iva /

analyzed: vibhaktāḥ kalpita ātmānaḥ dhātavaḥ kuṭṭi carci vat

analyzed: na putraḥ sti viśeṣa icchā tu tādṛśī

original: vinaiva putrānugamād yā putre vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.70 //
analyzed: vinā eva putra anugamāt yā putre vyavatiṣṭhate

original: prāṇair vinā yathā dhārir jīvatau prāṇakarmakaḥ /

original: na cātra dhārir na prāṇā jīvatis tu kriyāntaram // BVaky_3,14.71 //
analyzed: na ca atra dhāriḥ na prāṇāḥ jīvatiḥ tu kriyā antaram

analyzed: tathā vinā iṣi putrābhyām putrīyāyām kriyā antaram

original: anvākhyānāya bhedās tu sadṛśāḥ pratipādakāḥ // BVaky_3,14.72 //
analyzed: anvākhyānāya bhedāḥ tu sadṛśāḥ pratipādakāḥ

original: ākṣepāc ca prayoge.na viṣayāntaravartinā /
analyzed: ākṣepāt ca prayogena viṣaya antara vartinā

original: sad apīcchākyacaḥ karma vākya eva prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.73 //
analyzed: sat api id śākyacaḥ karma vākye eva prayujyate
