analyzed: prasiddhena hṛtaḥ śabdaḥ bhāva garhā abhidhāyinā

original: abhyāse tulyarūpatvān na yaṅantaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.74 //
analyzed: abhyāse tulya rūpa tvāt na yaṅ antaḥ prayujyate

original: śabdā yathā vibhajyante bhāgair iva vikalpitaiḥ /
analyzed: śabdāḥ yathā vibhajyante bhāgaiḥ iva vikalpitaiḥ

original: anvākhyeyās tathā śāstram atidūre vyavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.75 //
analyzed: anvākhyeyāḥ tathā śāstram ati dūre vyavasthitam

original: arthasyānugamaṃ kaṃ cid dṛṣṭvaiva parikalpitam /
analyzed: arthasya anugamam kam cit dṛṣṭvā eva parikalpitam

original: padaṃ vākye pade dhātur dhātau bhāgaś ca muṇḍivat // BVaky_3,14.76 //
analyzed: padam vākye pade dhātuḥ dhātau bhāgaḥ ca muṇḍi vat

original: aviprayogaḥ sādhutve vyutpattir anavasthitā /
upāyān pratipattīnāṃ nābhimanyeta satyataḥ // BVaky_3,14.77 //
analyzed: upāyān pratipattīnām na abhimanyeta satyataḥ

original: yathaiva ḍitthe davatiḥ pācake pacatis tathā /
analyzed: yathā eva ḍitthe davatiḥ pācake pacatiḥ tathā

original: ḍayatiś ca paciś caiva dvāv apy etāv alaukikau // BVaky_3,14.78 //
analyzed: ḍayatiḥ ca paciḥ ca eva dvau api etau alaukikau

original: prakṛtipratyayāv ūhyau padāt tābhyāṃ padaṃ tathā /
analyzed: prakṛti pratyayau ūhyau padāt tābhyām padam tathā

original: anubandhasvarādibhyaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śāstraṃ na tān prati // BVaky_3,14.79 //
analyzed: anubandha svara ādibhyaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śāstram na tān prati

original: śāstradṛṣṭis tu śāstrasya prāptimātre 'py aniścite /
analyzed: śāstra dṛṣṭiḥ tu śāstrasya prāpti mātre pi aniścite

original: yujyate pratyavāyena śāstraṃ cakṣur apaśyatām // BVaky_3,14.80 //
analyzed: yujyate pratyavāyena śāstram cakṣuḥ apaśyatām

original: arthāntarābhidhānāc ca paurvāparyaṃ na bhidyate /
analyzed: artha antara abhidhānāt ca paurvāparyam na bhidyate

original: rājadantāhitāgnyādi- rājāśvādiṣu sarvathā // BVaky_3,14.81 //
analyzed: rāja danta āhitāgni ādi rāja aśva ādiṣu sarvathā

original: vinaiva pratyayair vṛttau ye bhinnārthābhidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: vinā eva pratyayaiḥ vṛttau ye bhinna artha abhidhāyinaḥ

original: gargādayo lukā teṣāṃ sādhutvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,14.82 //
analyzed: garga ādayaḥ teṣām sādhu tvam anugamyate

original: [so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhāt pratyayena vinā yadi /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt pratyayena vinā yadi

original: bhṛgvādayaḥ prayujyeran nāpatye niyamo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.83 *//
analyzed: bhṛgu ādayaḥ prayujyeran na apatye niyamaḥ bhavet  /

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhe liṅgopavyañjanād ṛte /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhe liṅga upavyañjanāt ṛte

original: praṣṭhādiṣu na jāyaiva niyamena pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.84 //
analyzed: praṣṭhā ādiṣu na jāyā eva niyamena pratīyate

original: mānameyābhisaṃbandha- viśeṣe 'ṅgīkṛte tathā /
analyzed: māna meya abhisaṃbandha viśeṣe ṅgīkṛte tathā

original: prasthādīnām asādhutvaṃ taddhitena vinā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.85 //
analyzed: prastha ādīnām asādhu tvam taddhitena vinā bhavet

original: taddhito yogabhedena vākyaṃ vā syād vibhāṣitam /
analyzed: taddhitaḥ yoga bhedena vākyam vā syāt vibhāṣitam

original: parimāṇādhike tatra prathamā śiṣyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.86 //
analyzed: parimāṇa adhike tatra prathamā śiṣyate punar

original: vyatiriktasya sādhutve tad eva ca nidarśanam /
analyzed: vyatiriktasya sādhu tve tat eva ca nidarśanam

original: yujyate 'ṅgīkṛtādhikyaṃ tat sarvābhir vibhaktibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.87 //
analyzed: yujyate ṅgīkṛta ādhikyam tat sarvābhiḥ vibhaktibhiḥ

original: śuklādiṣu matublopo vyatirekasya darśanāt /
analyzed: śukla ādiṣu matup lopaḥ vyatirekasya darśanāt

original: asādhutvanivṛttyarthaṃ sādhavas te bidādivat // BVaky_3,14.88 //
analyzed: asādhu tva nivṛtti artham sādhavaḥ te bida ādi vat

original: viśeṣaṇād viśeṣye 'rthe tadbhāvābhyuccaye sati /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣye rthe tad bhāva abhyuccaye sati

original: punaś ca pratisaṃhāre vṛttim eke pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.89 //
analyzed: punar ca pratisaṃhāre vṛttim eke pracakṣate

original: nimitte pratyayaḥ pūrvo nānuprāpto nimittinā /
analyzed: nimitte pratyayaḥ pūrvaḥ na anuprāptaḥ nimittinā

original: nimittavati buddheś ca na nimittasarūpatā // BVaky_3,14.90 //
analyzed: nimittavati buddheḥ ca na nimitta sarūpa tā

original: saṃskārasahitāj jñānān nopaślesaḥ smṛter api /
analyzed: saṃskāra sahitāt jñānāt na upaślesaḥ smṛteḥ api

original: vyāpāre tannimittānāṃ na grāhyaṃ syāt tathā sthitam // BVaky_3,14.91 //
analyzed: vyāpāre tad nimittānām na grāhyam syāt tathā sthitam

original: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau ca vyarthā bāhyārthakalpanā /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau ca vyarthā bāhya artha kalpanā

original: tasmād anupakāre vā grāhyaṃ vā na tathā sthitam // BVaky_3,14.92 //
analyzed: tasmāt anupakāre vā grāhyam vā na tathā sthitam

original: anusyūteva saṃsṛṣṭair arthe buddhiḥ pravartate /
analyzed: anusyūtā iva saṃsṛṣṭaiḥ arthe buddhiḥ pravartate

original: vyākhyātāro vibhajyārthāṃs tān bhedena pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.93 //
analyzed: vyākhyātāraḥ vibhajya arthān tān bhedena pracakṣate

original: tadātmany avibhakte ca buddhyantaram upāśritāḥ /
analyzed: tad ātmani avibhakte ca buddhi antaram upāśritāḥ

original: vibhāgam iva manyante viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.94 //
analyzed: vibhāgam iva manyante viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ

original: abudhān prati vṛttiṃ ca vartayantaḥ prakalpitām /
analyzed: abudhān prati vṛttim ca vartayantaḥ prakalpitām

original: āhuḥ parārthavacane tyāgābhyuccayadharmatām // BVaky_3,14.95 //
analyzed: āhuḥ parārtha vacane tyāga abhyuccaya dharmatām

original: anvayād gamyate so 'rtho virodhī vā nivartate /
analyzed: anvayāt gamyate saḥ rthaḥ virodhī vā nivartate

original: dvyartham arthāntare vāpi tatrāhur upasarjanam // BVaky_3,14.96 //
analyzed: dvi artham artha antare vā api tatra āhuḥ upasarjanam

original: upāyamātraṃ nānātvaṃ samūhas tv eka eva saḥ /
analyzed: upāya mātram nānātvam samūhaḥ tu ekaḥ eva saḥ

original: vikalpābhyuccayābhyāṃ vā bhedasaṃsargakalpanā // BVaky_3,14.97 //
analyzed: vikalpa abhyuccayābhyām vā bheda saṃsarga kalpanā

original: vṛttiṃ vartayatām evam abudhapratipattaye /
analyzed: vṛttim vartayatām evam abudha pratipattaye

original: bhinnāḥ saṃbodhanopāyāḥ puruṣeṣv anavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,14.98 //
analyzed: bhinnāḥ saṃbodhana upāyāḥ puruṣeṣu anavasthitāḥ

original: vācikā dyotikā vāpi saṃkhyānāṃ vā vibhaktayaḥ /
analyzed: vācikāḥ dyotikāḥ vā api saṃkhyānām vā vibhaktayaḥ

original: tadrūpe 'vayave vṛttau saṃkhyābhedo nivartate // BVaky_3,14.99 //
analyzed: tad rūpe vayave vṛttau saṃkhyā bhedaḥ nivartate

original: abhedaikatvasaṃkhyā vā tatrānyaivopajāyate /
analyzed: abheda eka tva saṃkhyā vā tatra anyā evā upajāyate

original: saṃsargarupaṃ saiṃkhyānām avibhaktaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_3,14.100 //
analyzed: saṃsarga rupam saiṃkhyānām avibhaktam tat ucyate

original: yathauṣadhirasāḥ sarve madhuny āhitaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā oṣadhi rasāḥ sarve madhuni āhita śaktayaḥ

original: avibhāgena vartante tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,14.101 //
analyzed: avibhāgena vartante tām saṃkhyām tādṛśīm viduḥ

original: bhedānāṃ vā parityāgāt saṃkhyātmā sa tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: bhedānām vā parityāgāt saṃkhyā ātmā sa tathāvidhaḥ

original: vyāpārāj jātibhāgasya bhedāpohena vartate // BVaky_3,14.102 //
analyzed: vyāpārāt jāti bhāgasya bheda apohena vartate

original: agṛhītaviśeṣeṇa yathā rūpeṇa rūpavān /
analyzed: agṛhīta viśeṣeṇa yathā rūpeṇa rūpavān

original: prakhyāyate na śuklādi- bhedarūpas tu gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.103 //
analyzed: prakhyāyate na śukla ādi bheda rūpaḥ tu gṛhyate

original: bhedarūpasamāveśe tathā saty avivakṣite /
analyzed: bheda rūpa samāveśe tathā sati avivakṣite

original: bhāgaḥ prakāśitaḥ kaś cic chāstre 'ṅgatvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.104 //
analyzed: bhāgaḥ prakāśitaḥ kaḥ cit śāstre ṅga tvena gṛhyate

original: saṃkḥyāsāmānyarūpeṇa tadā so 'mśaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃkḥyā sāmānya rūpeṇa tadā saḥ mśaḥ pratīyate

original: arthasyānekaśaktitve śabdair niyataśaktibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.105 //
analyzed: arthasya aneka śakti tve śabdaiḥ niyata śaktibhiḥ

original: avyayānāṃ ca yo dharmo yaś ca bhedavatāṃ kramaḥ /
analyzed: avyayānām ca yaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ ca bhedavatām kramaḥ

original: abhinnavyapadeśārham antarālaṃ tad etayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.106 //
analyzed: abhinna vyapadeśa arham antarālam tat etayoḥ

original: alukaś caikavadbhāvas tasmin sati na śiṣyate /
analyzed: alukaḥ ca ekavat bhāvaḥ tasmin sati na śiṣyate

original: sa ca goṣucarādīnāṃ dharmo 'sti vacanāntare // BVaky_3,14.107 //
analyzed: sa ca goṣucara ādīnām dharmaḥ sti vacana antare

original: jātau dvivacanābhāvāt tad vṛttiṣu na vidyate /
analyzed: jātau dvivacana abhāvāt tat vṛttiṣu na vidyate

original: pratyākhyāne tu yogasya dravye goṣucarādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.108 //
analyzed: pratyākhyāne tu yogasya dravye goṣucara ādayaḥ

original: āśrayād bhedavattāyāḥ sarvabhedasamanvayaḥ /
analyzed: āśrayāt bhedavat tāyāḥ sarva bheda samanvayaḥ

original: dravyābhidhānapakṣo 'pi jātyākhyāyāṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.109 //
analyzed: dravya abhidhāna pakṣaḥ pi jāti ākhyāyām na vidyate

original: sarvadravyagatiś caivam ekaśeṣaś ca nocyate /
analyzed: sarva dravya gatiḥ ca evam ekaśeṣaḥ ca nā ucyate

original: pratyākhyāte 'nyathā sūtre bhinnadravyagatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.110 //
analyzed: pratyākhyāte nyathā sūtre bhinna dravya gatiḥ bhavet

original: vṛttau yo yuktavadbhāvo varaṇādiṣu śiṣyate /
analyzed: vṛttau yaḥ yuktavat bhāvaḥ varaṇa ādiṣu śiṣyate

original: abhedaikatvasaṃkhyāyāṃ godau tatra na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.111 //
analyzed: abheda eka tva saṃkhyāyām go dau tatra na sidhyati

original: prāg vṛtter yuktavadbhāve ṣaṣṭhī bhedāśrayā bhavet /
analyzed: prāk vṛtteḥ yuktavat bhāve ṣaṣṭhī bheda āśrayā bhavet

original: vṛttau saṃkhyāviśeṣāṇāṃ tyāgād bhedo nivartate // BVaky_3,14.112 //
analyzed: vṛttau saṃkhyā viśeṣāṇām tyāgāt bhedaḥ nivartate

original: vidyamānāsu saṃkhyāsu ke cit saṃkhyāntaraṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: vidyamānāsu saṃkhyāsu ke cid saṃkhyā antaram viduḥ

original: abhedākhyam upagrāhi vṛttau tac copajāyate // BVaky_3,14.113 //
analyzed: abheda ākhyam upagrāhi vṛttau tat ca upajāyate

original: vyāpāraṃ yāti bhedākhyais tat svair avayavaiḥ kva cit /
analyzed: vyāpāram yāti bheda ākhyaiḥ tat svaiḥ avayavaiḥ kva cit

original: ātmā bhedānapekṣo 'sya kva cid eti nimittatām // BVaky_3,14.114 //
analyzed: ātmā bheda anapekṣaḥ sya kva cit eti nimitta tām

original: dāsyāḥ patir iti vyakto godāv iti ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: dāsyāḥ patiḥ iti vyaktaḥ go dau iti ca dṛśyate

original: vyāpārabhedaḥ saṃkhyāyās tasmād eva vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.115 //
analyzed: vyāpāra bhedaḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ tasmāt eva vyavasthitaḥ

original: dvyādināṃ ca dviputrādau bāhyo bhedo nivartate /
analyzed: dvi ādinām ca dvi putra ādau bāhyaḥ bhedaḥ nivartate

original: vibhaktivācyaḥ svārthatvān nimittaṃ tv avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.116 //
analyzed: vibhakti vācyaḥ sva artha tvāt nimittam tu avatiṣṭhate

original: dvitvopasarjane saṅghe dviśabdas tatra vartate /
analyzed: dvi tva upasarjane saṅghe dvi śabdaḥ tatra vartate

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād ubhaśabde na tat tathā // BVaky_3,14.117 //
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt ubha śabde na tat tathā

original: ubhayas tatra tulyārtho vṛttau nityaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: ubhayaḥ tatra tulya arthaḥ vṛttau nityam prayujyate

original: sūtre 'pi nityagrahaṇaṃ tadartham abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.118 //
analyzed: sūtre nitya grahaṇam tad artham abhidhīyate

original: āpi ke cāparārthatvān nābheda upajāyate /
analyzed: ā api ke ca apara artha tvāt na abhedaḥ upajāyate

original: ubhe iti tataḥ svārthe bhede vṛttiḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.119 //
analyzed: ubhe iti tatas svārthe bhede vṛttiḥ prayujyate

original: strītvābhidhānapakṣe 'pi guṇabhāvaviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: strī tva abhidhāna pakṣe pi guṇa bhāva viparyayaḥ

original: svabhāvād aparārthatvāt tatra bhedo na hīyate // BVaky_3,14.120 //
analyzed: svabhāvāt apara artha tvāt tatra bhedaḥ na hīyate

original: tasmād dvivacanāṭ ṭāpaś cobhayo 'nyatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: tasmāt dvivacanāt ṭāpaḥ ca ubhayaḥ nyatra dṛśyate

original: pratyayaṃ tayapaṃ hitvā nāsty uttarapade punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.121 //
analyzed: pratyayam tayapam hitvā na asti uttara pade punar

original: prāptiḥ pragṛhyasaṃjñāyā na syāt pratyayalakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: prāptiḥ pragṛhya saṃjñāyāḥ na syāt pratyaya lakṣaṇāt

original: kumāryagāre na hy asti samāso vacanāntare // BVaky_3,14.122 //
analyzed: kumārī agāre na hi asti samāsaḥ vacana antare

original: ekadvayor yañādināṃ vibhāṣā luṅ na kalpate /
analyzed: eka dvayoḥ yañ ādinām vibhāṣā luṅ na kalpate

original: yauṣmākas tāvakaś ceti bhedābhāvān na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.123 //
analyzed: yauṣmākaḥ tāvakaḥ ca iti bheda abhāvāt na sidhyati

original: dṛṣṭo gārgyatare bhedas tathā gargatarā iti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ gārgyatare bhedaḥ tathā gargatare iti

original: yuṣmatpitā tvatpiteti tathādeśau vyavasthitau // BVaky_3,14.124 //
analyzed: yuṣmad pitā tvad pitā iti tathā ādeśau vyavasthitau

original: upādhibhūtā yā saṃkhyā prakṛtau samavasthitā /
analyzed: upādhi bhūtā yā saṃkhyā prakṛtau samavasthitā

original: ādeśaiḥ samjnayā vāpi vibhaktyā vyajyate vinā // BVaky_3,14.125 //
analyzed: ādeśaiḥ vā api vibhaktyā vyajyate vinā

original: śaurpike māsajāte ca parimāṇaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: śaurpike māsa jāte ca parimāṇam svabhāvataḥ

original: upādhibhūtām āśritya saṃkhyāṃ bhedena vartate // BVaky_3,14.1.26 //
analyzed: upādhi bhūtām āśritya saṃkhyām bhedena vartate

original: vayasvini paricchedaḥ krīte cāpi na gamyate /
analyzed: vayasvini paricchedaḥ krīte ca api na gamyate

original: iṣṭo 'bhedād ṛte tatra patimāṇam anarthakam // BVaky_3,14.127 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ bhedāt ṛte tatra patimāṇam anarthakam

original: bhinnasyābhedavacanāt prasthādibhyaḥ śaso vidhiḥ /
analyzed: bhinnasya a bheda vacanāt prastha ādibhyaḥ śasaḥ vidhiḥ

original: taddharmatvād abhedāt tu ghaṭādibhyo na dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.128 //
analyzed: tad dharma tvāt abhedāt tu ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ na dṛśyate

original: śrūyate vacanaṃ yatra bhāvas tatra viśiṣyate /
analyzed: śrūyate vacanam yatra bhāvaḥ tatra viśiṣyate

original: nivartate yad vacanaṃ tasya bhāvo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.129 //
analyzed: nivartate yat vacanam tasya bhāvaḥ na vidyate

original: kāryaṃ sattāśrayaṃ śāstrād apravṛttir adarśanam /
analyzed: kāryam sattā āśrayam śāstrāt apravṛttiḥ adarśanam

original: vākye dṛṣṭaṃ yad atyantam abhāvas tasya vṛttiṣu // BVaky_3,14.130 //
analyzed: vākye dṛṣṭam yat atyantam abhāvaḥ tasya vṛttiṣu

original: samjñāviṣayabhedārthaṃ prasaktādarśanaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: samjñā viṣaya bheda artham prasakta adarśanam smṛtam

original: śrūyamānaṃ tu vacanaṃ viśiṣṭam upalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.131 //
analyzed: śrūyamānam tu vacanam viśiṣṭam upalabhyate

original: abhāvo vā luko yatra rūpavān vā vidhīyate /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ vā lukaḥ yatra rūpavān vā vidhīyate

original: vyabhicārān nimittasya tatrāsādhuḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.132 //
analyzed: vyabhicārāt nimittasya tatra asādhuḥ prasajyate

original: bhedaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣo vā vyākhyāto vṛttivākyayoḥ /
analyzed: bhedaḥ saṃkhyā viśeṣaḥ vā vyākhyātaḥ vṛtti vākyayoḥ

original: sarvatraiva viśeṣas tu nāvaśyaṃ tādṛśo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.133 //
analyzed: sarvatra eva viśeṣaḥ tu na avaśyam tādṛśaḥ bhavet

original: āteś ca bhedahetutvān na liṅgena viśeṣyate /
analyzed: āteḥ ca bheda hetu tvāt na liṅgena viśeṣyate

original: pradhānaṃ mṛgadugdhādau gārgīputre na sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.134 //
analyzed: pradhānam mṛgadugdha ādau gārgīputre na sa kramaḥ

original: abhede liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogāc chuklaṃ paṭā iti /
analyzed: abhede liṅga saṃkhyābhyām yogāt śuklam paṭāḥ iti

original: prasakte śāstram ārabdhaṃ siddhaye liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.135 //
analyzed: prasakte śāstram ārabdham siddhaye liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: parārthaṃ śeṣabhāvaṃ yo vṛttiṣu pratipadyate /
analyzed: para artham śeṣa bhāvam yaḥ vṛttiṣu pratipadyate

original: guṇo viśeṣaṇatvena sa sūtre vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.136 //
analyzed: guṇaḥ viśeṣaṇa tvena sa sūtre vyapadiśyate

original: śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ /
analyzed: śabda antara tvāt vākyeṣu viśeṣāḥ yadi api śrutāḥ

original: vṛtter abhinnarūpatvāt teṣu vṛttir na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.137 //
analyzed: vṛtteḥ abhinna rūpa tvāt teṣu vṛttiḥ na vidyate

original: rūpāc ca śabdasaṃskāraḥ sāmānyaviṣayo yataḥ /
analyzed: rūpāt ca śabda saṃskāraḥ sāmānya viṣayaḥ yatas

original: tasmāt tadāśrayaṃ liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.138 //
analyzed: tasmāt tad āśrayam liṅgam vacanam ca prasajyate

original: saliṅgaṃ ca sasaṃkhyaṃ ca tato dravyābhidhāyinā /
analyzed: sa liṅgam ca sa saṃkhyam ca tatas dravya abhidhāyinā

original: saṃbadhyate padaṃ tatra tayor bhinnā śrutir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.139 //
analyzed: saṃbadhyate padam tatra tayoḥ bhinnā śrutiḥ bhavet

original: bhāvino bahiraṅgasya vacanād āśrayasya ye /
analyzed: bhāvinaḥ bahis aṅgasya vacanāt āśrayasya ye

original: liṅgasaṃkhye guṇānāṃ te sūtreṇa pratipādite // BVaky_3,14.140 //
analyzed: liṅga saṃkhye guṇānām te sūtreṇa pratipādite

original: viśeṣavṛtter api ca rūpābhedād alakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa vṛtteḥ api ca rūpa abhedāt alakṣitaḥ

original: yasmād viśeṣas tenātra bhedakāryaṃ na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.141 //
analyzed: yasmāt viśeṣaḥ tena atra bheda kāryam na kalpate

original: viśeṣa eva sāmānyaṃ viśesād bhidyate yataḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ eva sāmānyam viśesāt bhidyate yatas

original: abhedo hi viśeṣāṇām āśrito vinivartakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.142 //
analyzed: abhedaḥ hi viśeṣāṇām āśritaḥ vinivartakaḥ

original: yad yad āśrīyate tat tad anyasya vinivartakam /
analyzed: yat yat āśrīyate tat tat anyasya vinivartakam

original: bhedābhedavibhāgas tu sāmānye na nirūpyate // BVaky_3,14.143 //
analyzed: bheda abheda vibhāgaḥ tu sāmānye na nirūpyate

original: apoddhāraś ca sāmānyam iti tasyopakārinaḥ /
analyzed: apoddhāraḥ ca sāmānyam iti tasya upakārinaḥ

original: nimittāvastham evātas tat svadharmeṇa gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.144 //
analyzed: nimitta avastham eva atas tat svadharmeṇa gṛhyate

original: anirdhāritadharmatvād bhedā eva vikalpitāḥ /
analyzed: anirdhārita dharma tvāt bhedāḥ eva vikalpitāḥ

original: nimittair vyapadiśyante sāmānyākhyāviśesitāḥ // BVaky_3,14.145 //
analyzed: nimittaiḥ vyapadiśyante sāmānya ākhyā viśesitāḥ

original: yadā tu vyapadiśyete liṅgasaṃkhye svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu vyapadiśyete liṅga saṃkhye svabhāvataḥ

original: prayogeṣv eva sādhutvaṃ vākye prakramyate tadā // BVaky_3,14.146 //
analyzed: prayogeṣu eva sādhu tvam vākye prakramyate tadā

original: tatra prayogo 'niyato guṇānām āśrayaiḥ saha /
analyzed: tatra prayogaḥ niyataḥ guṇānām āśrayaiḥ saha

original: sāmānyaṃ yat tad atyantaṃ tatraiva samavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.147 //
analyzed: sāmānyam yat tat atyantam tatra eva samavasthitam

original: na gotvaṃ śābaleyasya gaur iti vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: na go tvam śābaleyasya gauḥ iti vyapadiśyate

original: śuklatvaṃ bāhuleyasya śukla ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.148 //
analyzed: śukla tvam bāhuleyasya śuklaḥ iti apadiśyate

original: vyatireke ca saty evaṃ matupaḥ śravanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vyatireke ca sati evam matupaḥ śravanam bhavet

original: lug anvākhyāyate tasmād rasādibhyaś ca nāsti saḥ // BVaky_3,14.149 //
analyzed: luk anvākhyāyate tasmāt rasa ādibhyaḥ ca na asti saḥ

original: yat so 'yam iti saṃbandhād rūpābhedena vartate /
analyzed: yat saḥ yam iti saṃbandhāt rūpa abhedena vartate

original: śuklādivat tato lopas tad rasādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.150 //
analyzed: śukla ādi vat tatas lopaḥ tat rasa ādau na vidyate

original: āveśo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ kva cin mañcādivat sthitah /
analyzed: āveśaḥ liṅga saṃkhyābhyām kva cit mañca ādi vat

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhe sa prasthādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.151 //
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhe sa prastha ādau na vidyate

original: liṅgam liṅgaparityāge sūtraṃ pratyayaśāsanam /
analyzed: liṅgam liṅga parityāge sūtram pratyaya śāsanam

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhāt puṃśabde stryabhidhāyini // BVaky_3,14.152 //
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt pum śabde strī abhidhāyini

original: āśraye liṅgasaṃkhyābhyām āśritaṃ vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: āśraye liṅga saṃkhyābhyām āśritam vyapadiśyate

original: viśeṣaṇānāṃ cājāter iti śāstravyavasthayā // BVaky_3,14.153 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇānām ca ajāteḥ iti śāstra vyavasthayā

original: nimittānuvidhāyitvād ye dharmā bhedahetuṣu /
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāyi tvāt ye dharmāḥ bheda hetuṣu

original: ta āśraye 'pi vidyanta iti buddhir nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.154 //
analyzed: te āśraye vidyante iti buddhiḥ nivartyate

original: ākhyāyate ca śāstreṇa lokarūḍhā svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: ākhyāyate ca śāstreṇa loka rūḍhā svabhāvataḥ

original: nimittatulyā godādau pravṛttir liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.155 //
analyzed: nimitta tulyā goda ādau pravṛttiḥ liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: haritakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ saṃkhyā khalatikādiṣu /
analyzed: haritakī ādiṣu vyaktiḥ saṃkhyā khalatika ādiṣu

original: manuṣyalubviśeṣāṇām abhidheyāśrayaṃ dvayam // BVaky_3,14.156 //
analyzed: manuṣya lup viśeṣāṇām abhidheya āśrayam dvayam

original: jātiprayoge jātyā cet saṃbandham upagacchati /
analyzed: jāti prayoge jātyā ced saṃbandham upagacchati

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ tato dharmāñ jātes tat pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.157 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam tatas jāteḥ tat pratipadyate

original: lubante saṃnipatitaṃ jāter anyad viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: lup ante saṃnipatitam jāteḥ anyat viśeṣaṇam

original: lubantasya pradhānatvāt taddharmair vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.158 //
analyzed: lup antasya pradhāna tvāt tad dharmaiḥ vyapadiśyate

original: nañsamāsabahuvrīhi- dvandvastryatiśayeṣu ye /
analyzed: nañ samāsa bahuvrīhi dvandva strī atiśayeṣu ye

original: bhedā bhāṣyānusāreṇa vācyās te liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.159 //
analyzed: bhedāḥ bhāṣya anusāreṇa vācyāḥ te liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: yadi ṣaṣṭhīdvitīyāntān nikṛṣṭāt tamabādayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyā antāt nikṛṣṭāt tamap ādayaḥ

original: nyakkāriṇi syur utkṛṣṭe prakṛteḥ syād viliṅgatā // BVaky_3,14.160 //
analyzed: nyakkāriṇi syuḥ utkṛṣṭe prakṛteḥ syāt viliṅga tā

original: kālyāṃ kālād dvitīyāntāt kāle kālyās tarab bhavet /
analyzed: kālyām kālāt dvitīya antāt kāle kālyāḥ tarap bhavet

original: nyakkāriṇi tathā gārgye gargebhyaḥ pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.161 //
analyzed: nyakkāriṇi tathā gārgye gargebhyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: nyakkartṛṣu ca gargeṣu gārgyāt syāt tac ca neṣyate /
analyzed: nyakkartṛṣu ca gargeṣu gārgyāt syāt tat ca na iṣyate

original: kumāryāḥ svārthike ṅīp syāt prakṛtyartho hi nādhikaḥ // BVaky_3,14.162 //
analyzed: kumāryāḥ svārthike ṅīp syāt prakṛti arthaḥ hi na adhikaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhyantād adhike tasmād guṇe svāśrayavartini /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī antāt adhike tasmāt guṇe sva āśraya vartini

original: utkṛṣṭasamavetāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ vā vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.163 //
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa samavetāyām kriyāyām vā vidhīyate

original: upāttaṃ ca prakṛtyartho dravyam evāśrayas tayoḥ /
analyzed: upāttam ca prakṛti arthaḥ dravyam eva āśrayaḥ tayoḥ

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād abhedena pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.164 //
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt abhedena pratīyate

original: rūpābhedāc ca tad dravyam ākāṅkṣāvat pratīyate /
analyzed: rūpa abhedāt ca tat dravyam ākāṅkṣāvat pratīyate

original: viśeṣair bhinnarūpais tad āśrayair iva yujyate // BVaky_3,14.165 //
analyzed: viśeṣaiḥ bhinna rūpaiḥ tat āśrayaiḥ iva yujyate

original: bhinnarūpesu yal liṅgaṃ viśeṣesu vyavasthitam /
analyzed: bhinna rūpesu yat liṅgam viśeṣesu vyavasthitam

original: saṃkhyā ca tābhyām dravyātmā so 'bhinno vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.166 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā ca tābhyām dravya ātmā saḥ bhinnaḥ vyapadiśyate

original: āśrayaḥ samavāyi ca nimittaṃ liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ samavāyi ca nimittam liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ śetir ato bhāṣya udāhṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.167 //
analyzed: kartṛ stha bhāvakaḥ śetiḥ atas bhāṣye udāhṛtaḥ

original: nimittam āśrayatvena gṛhyeta yadi sādhanam /
analyzed: nimittam āśraya tvena gṛhyeta yadi sādhanam

original: karmāpadiṣṭayoḥ prāptis tatra syāl liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.168 //
analyzed: karma apadiṣṭayoḥ prāptiḥ tatra syāt liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: śāstre nimittabhāvena samudāyād apoddhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śāstre nimitta bhāvena samudāyāt apoddhṛtaḥ

original: stryarthas tasyecchayā yogaḥ prakṛtyā pratyayena vā // BVaky_3,14.169 //
analyzed: strī arthaḥ tasya icchayā yogaḥ prakṛtyā pratyayena vā

original: strīśabdo guṇaśabdatvāt tulyadharmā sitādibhiḥ /
analyzed: strī śabdaḥ guṇa śabda tvāt tulya dharmā sita ādibhiḥ

original: guṇamātre prayujyeta saṃstyānavati vāśraye // BVaky_3,14.170 //
analyzed: guṇa mātre prayujyeta saṃstyānavati vā āśraye

original: stryarthaḥ saṃstyānavad dravyaṃ prakṛtyarthaś ca yady asau /
analyzed: strī arthaḥ saṃstyānavat dravyam prakṛti arthaḥ ca yadi asau

original: dravyopalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ saṃstyānasya tathā sati // BVaky_3,14.171 //
analyzed: dravya upalakṣaṇa artha tvam saṃstyānasya tathā sati

original: saṃstyānena kva cid dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yady upalakṣitam /
analyzed: saṃstyānena kva cit dravyam dṛṣṭam yadi upalakṣitam

original: anaṅgīkṛtasaṃstyānāt tadvṛtteḥ pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.172 //
analyzed: an aṅgīkṛta saṃstyānāt tad vṛtteḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: bhūtādayaḥ ṣaḍākhyāś ca saṃstyānenopalakṣite /
analyzed: bhūta ādayaḥ ṣaṣ ākhyāḥ ca saṃstyānena upalakṣite

original: brāhmaṇyādau yadā vṛttās tebhyaḥ syuḥ pratyayās tadā // BVaky_3,14.173 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇī ādau yadā vṛttāḥ tebhyaḥ syuḥ pratyayāḥ tadā

original: tadvanto hi pradhānatvāt pratyayāṇām prayojakāḥ /
analyzed: tadvantaḥ hi pradhāna tvāt pratyayāṇām prayojakāḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraiṇye 'pi tasmāṭ ṭābādisaṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.174 //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraiṇye pi tasmāt ṭāp ādi saṃbhavaḥ

original: guṇamātrābhidhāyitvaṃ strīśabde varṇyate yadā /
analyzed: guṇa mātra abhidhāyi tvam strī śabde varṇyate yadā

original: prakṛtyarthaś ca saṃstyānaṃ svārthikāḥ pratyayās tadā // BVaky_3,14.175 //
analyzed: prakṛti arthaḥ ca saṃstyānam svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ tadā

original: saṃstyāne kevale vṛttiḥ prakṛtīnām na vidyate /
analyzed: saṃstyāne kevale vṛttiḥ prakṛtīnām na vidyate

original: tadāviṣṭe tato dravye gṛhyante samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,14.176 //
analyzed: tad āviṣṭe tatas dravye gṛhyante samavasthitāḥ

original: upakāri ca saṃstyānaṃ yeṣu śabdeṣv apekṣitam /
analyzed: upakāri ca saṃstyānam yeṣu śabdeṣu apekṣitam

original: tebhyaṣ ṭābādayas tac ca bhūtādiṣv avivakṣitam // BVaky_3,14.177 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ṭāp ādayaḥ tat ca bhūta ādiṣu avivakṣitam

original: saṃstyānaṃ pratyayasyārthaḥ śuddham āśrīyate yadā /
analyzed: saṃstyānam pratyayasya arthaḥ śuddham āśrīyate yadā

original: tadā dvivacanāneka- pratyayatvaṃ na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.178 //
analyzed: tadā dvivacana aneka pratyaya tvam na sidhyati

original: jātiś cet strītvam evāsau bhedo 'nyatrāvivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: jātiḥ ced strī tvam evā asau bhedaḥ nyatra avivakṣitaḥ

original: yasmād bhinnair api dravyais tad ekaṃ sad viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.179 //
analyzed: yasmāt bhinnaiḥ api dravyaiḥ tat ekam sat viśiṣyate

original: mātrāṇām hi tirobhāve parimāṇam na vidyate /
analyzed: mātrāṇām hi tirobhāve parimāṇam na vidyate

original: kumārya iti tena syāt kumāryāṃ bhedasaṃbhavāt // BVaky_3,14.180 //
analyzed: kumāryaḥ iti tena syāt kumāryām bheda saṃbhavāt

original: jātisaṃkhyāsamāhārair yathaiva sahacāriṇi /
analyzed: jāti saṃkhyā samāhāraiḥ yathā eva sahacāriṇi

original: dravye kriyāḥ pravartanta ekātmatve vyapekṣite // BVaky_3,14.181 //
analyzed: dravye kriyāḥ pravartante eka ātma tve vyapekṣite

original: mūrtibhyo mūrtidharmāṇām tathābhedasya darśanāt /
analyzed: mūrtibhyaḥ mūrti dharmāṇām tathā abhedasya darśanāt

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca kriyāyogaś ca kalpate // BVaky_3,14.182 //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca kriyā yogaḥ ca kalpate

original: sāmānādhikaraṇye tu matublopād apekṣite /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇye tu matup lopāt apekṣite

original: luk taddhitalukīti syāl luk tatrāpy upalakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,14.183 //
analyzed: luk taddhita luki iti syāt luk tatra api upalakṣaṇam

original: kesāṃ cit tyaktabhedeṣu dravyeṣv eva vidhīyate /
analyzed: kesām cit tyakta bhedeṣu dravyeṣu eva vidhīyate

original: saṃstyānavatsu ṭābādir abhedena samanvayāt // BVaky_3,14.184 //
analyzed: saṃstyānavatsu ṭāp ādiḥ abhedena samanvayāt

original: sāmānyabhūto dravyātmā paricchinnaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya bhūtaḥ dravya ātmā paricchinna parigrahaḥ

original: kriyābhir yujyate bhedair bhāgaśaś cāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.185 //
analyzed: kriyābhiḥ yujyate bhedaiḥ bhāgaśas ca avatiṣṭhate

original: śuklādiṣv āśrayadravyaṃ prādhānyenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: śukla ādiṣu āśraya dravyam prādhānyena abhidhīyate

original: strītvaṃ tu pratyayārthatvād abhidhāviṣayo yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.186 //
analyzed: strī tvam tu pratyaya artha tvāt abhidhā viṣayaḥ yatas

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād āśrayaṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt āśrayam pratipadyate

original: strītvaṃ svabhāvasiddho vā guṇabhāvaviparyayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.187 //
analyzed: strī tvam svabhāva siddhaḥ vā guṇa bhāva viparyayaḥ

original: sākāṅkṣatvād guṇatvena sāmānyaṃ vopadiśyate /
analyzed: sākāṅkṣa tvāt guṇa tvena sāmānyam vā upadiśyate

original: vyaktīnām ātmadharmo 'sāv ekaprakhyānibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,14.188 //
analyzed: vyaktīnām ātma dharmaḥ sau eka prakhyā nibandhanaḥ

original: evambhūtā ca sāvasthā bhāgabhedaparigrahe /
analyzed: evambhūtā ca sā avasthā bhāga bheda parigrahe

original: kṛte buddhyaiva bhedānām āśrayatve ca kalpite // BVaky_3,14.189 //
analyzed: kṛte buddhyā eva bhedānām āśraya tve ca kalpite

original: niskṛṣṭeṣv api bhedeṣu vyaktirūpāśraye tataḥ /
analyzed: niskṛṣṭeṣu api bhedeṣu vyakti rūpa āśraye tatas

original: liṅgapratyavamarśena liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate // BVaky_3,14.190 //
analyzed: liṅga pratyavamarśena liṅga saṃkhye prapadyate

original: antarena caśabdasya prayogaṃ dvandvabhāvinām /
analyzed: antarena caśabdasya prayogam dvandva bhāvinām

original: aviśiṣṭārthavṛttitvaṃ rūpābhedāt pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.191 //
vikalpavati vā vṛttir nivartye 'tha samuccite /
analyzed: vikalpavati vā vṛttiḥ nivartye samuccite

original: teṣām ajñātaśaktīnāṃ dyotakena niyamyate // BVaky_3,14.192 //
analyzed: teṣām ajñāta śaktīnām dyotakena niyamyate

original: vṛttau viśiṣṭarūpatvāc caśabdo vinivartate /
analyzed: vṛttau viśiṣṭa rūpa tvāt caśabdaḥ vinivartate

original: arthabhede 'pi sārūpyāt tac cārthenāpadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.193 //
analyzed: artha bhede pi sārūpyāt tat ca arthena apadiśyate

original: casya cāsattvabhūto 'rthaḥ sa evāśriyate yadi /
analyzed: casya ca asattva bhūtaḥ rthaḥ saḥ eva āśriyate yadi

original: taddharmatvaṃ tato dvandve cādiṣv arthakṛtaṃ hi tat // BVaky_3,14.194 //
analyzed: tad dharma tvam tatas dvandve ca ādiṣu artha kṛtam hi tat

original: cārthaḥ śabde kva cid bhedāt kathaṃ cit samavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: ca arthaḥ śabde kva cit bhedāt katham cit samavasthitaḥ

original: dyotakāś cādayas tasya vaktā dvandvas tu tadvatām // BVaky_3,14.195 //
analyzed: dyotakāḥ ca ādayaḥ tasya vaktā dvandvaḥ tu tadvatām

original: vikalpādyabhidheyasya cārthasyānyapadārthatā /
analyzed: vikalpa ādi abhidheyasya ca arthasya anya padārtha tā

original: dyotakatvān na kalpeta tasmāt sad upalakṣyate // BVaky_3,14.196 //
analyzed: dyotaka tvāt na kalpeta tasmāt sat upalakṣyate

original: tatra svābhāvikaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdadharme vyapekṣite /
analyzed: tatra svābhāvikam liṅgam śabda dharme vyapekṣite

original: śabdaḥ kaś cit tam evārthaṃ kathaṃ cit pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.197 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ kaḥ cit tam eva artham katham cit pratipadyate

original: śabdād arthāḥ pratāyante sa bhedānāṃ vidhāyakaḥ /
analyzed: śabdāt arthāḥ pratāyante sa bhedānām vidhāyakaḥ

original: anumānaṃ vivakṣāyāḥ śabdād anyan na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.198 //
analyzed: anumānam vivakṣāyāḥ śabdāt anyat na vidyate

original: samuccitaḥ syād dvandvārtho guṇabhūtasamuccayaḥ /
analyzed: samuccitaḥ syāt dvandva arthaḥ guṇa bhūta samuccayaḥ

original: samuccayo vāpi bhaved guṇabhūtasamuccitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.199 //
analyzed: samuccayaḥ vā api bhavet guṇa bhūta samuccitaḥ

original: samuccitasya prādhānye liṅgasaṃkhye svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: samuccitasya prādhānye liṅga saṃkhye svabhāvataḥ

original: samuccayasya prādhānye śāstraṃ syāt pratipādakam // BVaky_3,14.200 //
analyzed: samuccayasya prādhānye śāstram syāt pratipādakam

original: samuccayavato 'rthasya prādhānye 'py apare viduḥ /
analyzed: samuccayavataḥ rthasya prādhānye pi apare viduḥ

original: nimittānuvidhāyitvād asiddhim liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.201 //
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāyi tvāt asiddhim liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: samuccayo nimittaṃ cet syān nimittānuvartanam /
analyzed: samuccayaḥ nimittam ced syāt nimitta anuvartanam

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cārtho dvandvanibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,14.202 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca arthaḥ dvandva nibandhanaḥ

original: samuccitanimittatve cārthasyāpagame 'pi vā /
analyzed: samuccita nimitta tve ca arthasya apagame vā

original: svabhāvasiddhe dvandvasya liṅgasaṃkhye vyavasthite // BVaky_3,14.203 //
analyzed: svabhāva siddhe dvandvasya liṅga saṃkhye vyavasthite

original: padāntarasthasyārthasya dyotakatvān na yujyate /
analyzed: pada antara sthasya arthasya dyotaka tvāt na yujyate

original: nipāto liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ dvandvas tv arthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.204 //
analyzed: nipātaḥ liṅga saṃkhyābhyām dvandvaḥ tu arthasya vācakaḥ

original: nimittānuvidhāne ca dravyadharmānapekṣaṇāt /
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāne ca dravya dharma anapekṣaṇāt

original: guṇapradhānabhāvena kriyāyogo na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.205 //
analyzed: guṇa pradhāna bhāvena kriyā yogaḥ na kalpate

original: yasya nāsti kriyāyogaḥ svatantro 'sau na vidyate /
analyzed: yasya na asti kriyā yogaḥ svatantraḥ sau na vidyate

original: artho dvandvasya tatra syād upādānam anarthakam // BVaky_3,14.206 //
analyzed: arthaḥ dvandvasya tatra syāt upādānam anarthakam

original: samuccayavato 'rthasya vācako nānuvartate /
analyzed: samuccayavataḥ rthasya vācakaḥ na anuvartate

original: nimittam api cāsyārthaḥ svadharmair yujyate tataḥ // BVaky_3,14.207 //
analyzed: nimittam api ca asya arthaḥ svadharmaiḥ yujyate tatas

original: bāhyo nāsty āśrayo dvandve viśeṣau tatra hi śrutau /
analyzed: bāhyaḥ nā asti āśrayaḥ dvandve viśeṣau tatra hi śrutau

original: samuccayas tadādhāras taddharmair vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.208 //
analyzed: samuccayaḥ tad ādhāraḥ tad dharmaiḥ vyapadiśyate

original: yo vāvayavabhedābhyāṃ bhedavadbhyām ivānvitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vā avayava bhedābhyām bhedavadbhyām iva anvitaḥ

original: ekaḥ samūho dharmān sa bhāgayoḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.209 //
analyzed: ekaḥ samūhaḥ dharmān sa bhāgayoḥ pratipadyate

original: ekaś ca dvyātmako 'rtho 'sau bhedābhedasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ ca dvi ātmakaḥ bheda abheda samanvitaḥ

original: yau bhedāv āśritas tatsthe liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate // BVaky_3,14.210 //
analyzed: yau bhedau āśritaḥ tad sthe liṅga saṃkhye prapadyate

original: yathā svaśabdābhihite caitrārthe na prayujyate /
analyzed: yathā sva śabda abhihite caitra arthe na prayujyate

original: caitraśabdo bahuvrihāv aprayogas tathā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.211 //
analyzed: caitra śabdaḥ bahuvrihau aprayogaḥ tathā bhavet

original: yathā gaur iti śuklāder abhidhānaṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: yathā gauḥ iti śukla ādeḥ abhidhānam na vidyate

original: evaṃ yasyābhisaṃbandho gobhis tāvat pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.212 //
analyzed: evam yasya abhisaṃbandhaḥ gobhiḥ tāvat pratīyate

original: saṃbandhī niyato rūḍhaś citrāṇāṃ na ca vidyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhī niyataḥ rūḍhaḥ citrāṇām na ca vidyate

original: gavāṃ yathā vajrapāṇis tryakṣe vā 'pi vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.213 //
analyzed: gavām yathā vajrapāṇiḥ tri akṣe vā vyavasthitaḥ

original: śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ /
analyzed: śabda antara tvāt vākyeṣu viśeṣāḥ yadi api śrutāḥ

original: vṛttiśabdo 'nya evāyaṃ sāmānyasyābhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.214 //
analyzed: vṛtti śabdaḥ nyaḥ eva ayam sāmānyasya abhidhāyakaḥ

original: agor acitragoś caiva rūpabhedān nivartakaḥ /
analyzed: agoḥ acitragoḥ ca eva rūpa bhedāt nivartakaḥ

original: na citragur viśeṣāṇāṃ rūpābhedāt tu vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.215 //
analyzed: na citraguḥ viśeṣāṇām rūpa abhedāt tu vācakaḥ

original: yathā citragur ity etat prayukte na prayujyate /
analyzed: yathā citraguḥ iti etat prayukte na prayujyate

original: evaṃ yadi syāt sāmānyaṃ tasya na syāt pratiśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.216 //
analyzed: evam yadi syāt sāmānyam tasya na syāt pratiśrutiḥ

original: sarvādayo viśeṣās tu pradeśānāṃ nivartakāḥ /
analyzed: sarva ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ tu pradeśānām nivartakāḥ

original: yathā pradeśāḥ sāmānya- pradeśāntarabādhakāḥ // BVaky_3,14.217 //
analyzed: yathā pradeśāḥ sāmānya pradeśa antara bādhakāḥ

original: vibhaktyarthābhidhānād vā ṣaṣṭhī nānuprayujyate /
analyzed: vibhakti artha abhidhānāt vā ṣaṣṭhī na anuprayujyate

original: dravyasyānabhidhānāt tu tacchabdo 'nuprayujyate // BVaky_3,14.218 //
analyzed: dravyasya anabhidhānāt tu tad śabdaḥ nuprayujyate

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ cen matublopāt prakalpate /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ced matup lopāt prakalpate

original: matupo 'pi tadarthatvād anavasthā prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.219 //
analyzed: matupaḥ pi tad artha tvāt anavasthā prasajyate

original: saṃbandhasya ca saṃbandī saṃbandho 'nyaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhasya ca saṃbandī saṃbandhaḥ nyaḥ prasajyate

original: vibhaktyarthapradhāne ca kriyāyogo na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.220 //
analyzed: vibhakti artha pradhāne ca kriyā yogaḥ na kalpate

original: vibhaktyarthapradhānatvāt tatas tatreti na kriyā /
analyzed: vibhakti artha pradhāna tvāt tatas tatra iti na kriyā

original: dṛśyādiḥ karmakartrādi- nimittatvāya kalpate // BVaky_3,14.221 //
analyzed: dṛśya ādiḥ karma kartṛ ādi nimitta tvāya kalpate

original: antarbhavec ca saṃbandhaḥ prādhānyābhihitaḥ katham /
analyzed: antarbhavet ca saṃbandhaḥ prādhānya abhihitaḥ katham

original: sa prātipadikārthaś ca tathābhūtaḥ kathaṃ bhatvet // BVaky_3,14.222 //
analyzed: sa prātipadika arthaḥ ca tathābhūtaḥ katham

original: asaṃbhavāt tu saṃbandhe saṃbandhasahacāriṇi /
analyzed: asaṃbhavāt tu saṃbandhe saṃbandha sahacāriṇi

original: jātisaṃkhyāsamāhāra- kāryāṇām iva saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.223 //
analyzed: jāti saṃkhyā samāhāra kāryāṇām iva saṃbhavaḥ

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād viśiṣṭāśrayavācinām /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt viśiṣṭa āśraya vācinām

original: śuklādival liṅgasaṃkhye śāstrārambhād bhaviṣyataḥ // BVaky_3,14.224 //
analyzed: śukla ādi vat liṅga saṃkhye śāstra ārambhāt bhaviṣyataḥ

original: bhedena tu vivakṣāyāṃ sāmānye vā vivakṣite /
analyzed: bhedena tu vivakṣāyām sāmānye vā vivakṣite

original: saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya padārthasyāgatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.225 //
analyzed: sa liṅgasya sa saṃkhyasya padārthasya agatiḥ bhavet

original: sādhutvaṃ na vibhaktyartha- mātre vṛttasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: sādhu tvam na vibhakti artha mātre vṛttasya dṛśyate

original: kṛtsnārthavṛtteḥ sādhutvam ity arthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam // BVaky_3,14.226 //
analyzed: kṛtsna artha vṛtteḥ sādhu tvam iti artha grahaṇam kṛtam

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād dravyavṛttir ayaṃ yadā /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt dravya vṛttiḥ ayam yadā

original: saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya tadā sādhutvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.227 //
analyzed: saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya tadā sādhu tvam ucyate

original: antarbhūtavibhaktyarthe ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyate yathā /
analyzed: antarbhūta vibhakti arthe ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyate yathā

original: tathāśrutiḥ prasajyeta liṅgasaṃkhyābhidhāyinām // BVaky_3,14.228 //
analyzed: tathā śrutiḥ prasajyeta liṅga saṃkhyā abhidhāyinām

original: sādharmyam avyayena syād bahuvrīhes tathā sati /
analyzed: sādharmyam avyayena syāt bahuvrīheḥ tathā sati

original: liṅgasaṃkhyānimittasya saṃskārasyāpavartanāt // BVaky_3,14.229 //
analyzed: liṅga saṃkhyā nimittasya saṃskārasya apavartanāt

original: prayuktena ca saṃbandhāc caitrādiśravanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prayuktena ca saṃbandhāt caitra ādi śravanam bhavet

original: vinā vibhaktyā saṃbandho vibhaktyā vidyate vinā // BVaky_3,14.230 //
analyzed: vinā vibhaktyā saṃbandhaḥ vibhaktyā vidyate vinā

original: abhidhāne 'pi saṃkhyāyāḥ saṃkhyātvaṃ na nivartate /
analyzed: abhidhāne pi saṃkhyāyāḥ saṃkhyā tvam na nivartate

original: ṣaṣṭhyarthasyābhidhāne tu syāt prātipadikārthatā // BVaky_3,14.231 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī arthasya abhidhāne tu syāt prātipadika artha tā

original: anuprayogasiddhyarthaṃ na vibhaktyarthakalpanā /
analyzed: anuprayoga siddhi artham na vibhakti artha kalpanā

original: vastvantaram upakṣiptam iti ke cit pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.232 //
analyzed: vastu antaram upakṣiptam iti ke cit pracakṣate

original: saṃbandibhir viśiṣṭānām saṃbandhānāṃ nimittatā /
analyzed: saṃbandibhiḥ viśiṣṭānām saṃbandhānām nimitta tā

original: saṃbandhair vā viśiṣṭānāṃ tadvatāṃ syān nimittatā // BVaky_3,14.233 //
analyzed: saṃbandhaiḥ vā viśiṣṭānām tadvatām syāt nimitta tā

original: ke cit saṃyogino daṇḍād viṣāṇāt samavāyinaḥ /
analyzed: ke cit saṃyoginaḥ daṇḍāt viṣāṇāt samavāyinaḥ

original: tadvati pratyayān āhur bahuvrīhiṃ tathaiva ca // BVaky_3,14.234 //
analyzed: tadvati pratyayān āhuḥ bahuvrīhim tathā eva ca

original: bhinnaṃ saṃbandhibhedena saṃbandham apare viduḥ /
analyzed: bhinnam saṃbandhi bhedena saṃbandham apare viduḥ

original: nimittaṃ sa vibhaktyarthaḥ samāsenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.235 //
analyzed: nimittam sa vibhakti arthaḥ samāsena abhidhīyate

original: pradhānam anyārthatayā bhinnaṃ svair upasarjanaiḥ /
analyzed: pradhānam anya artha tayā bhinnam svaiḥ upasarjanaiḥ

original: nimittam abbidheyaṃ vā sarvapaścād apekṣyate // BVaky_3,14.236 //
analyzed: nimittam ap bidheyam vā sarva paścāt apekṣyate

original: svāmini vyatirekaś ca vākye yady api dṛśyate /
analyzed: svāmini vyatirekaḥ ca vākye yadi api dṛśyate

original: prādhānya eva tasyeṣṭo bahuvrīhir vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.237 //
analyzed: prādhānye eva tasya iṣṭaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ vivakṣite

original: gavāṃ viśeṣaṇatvena yadā tadvān pravartate /
analyzed: gavām viśeṣaṇa tvena yadā tadvān pravartate

original: asyaitā iti tatrārthe bahuvrīhir na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.238 //
analyzed: asya etāḥ iti tatra arthe bahuvrīhiḥ na vidyate

original: yadā pratyavamarśas tu tāsāṃ svāmī gavām iti /
analyzed: yadā pratyavamarśaḥ tu tāsām svāmī gavām iti

original: gobhis tadābhisaṃbandho nimittatvāya kalpate // BVaky_3,14.239 //
analyzed: gobhiḥ tadā abhisaṃbandhaḥ nimitta tvāya kalpate

original: apekṣamānaḥ saṃbandhaṃ rūḍhitvasya nivṛttaye /
analyzed: apekṣamānaḥ saṃbandham rūḍhi tvasya nivṛttaye

original: nimittānuvidhāyitvāt taddharmārthaḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.240 //
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāyi tvāt tad dharma arthaḥ prasajyate

original: nānā citrā iti yathā nimittam anurudhyate /
analyzed: nānā citrā iti yathā nimittam anurudhyate

original: nānābhūte 'pi vṛttaḥ san bahuvrīhis tathā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.241 //
analyzed: nānābhūte vṛttaḥ san bahuvrīhiḥ tathā bhavet

original: saṃbandhini nimitte tu dravyadharmo na hīyate /
analyzed: saṃbandhini nimitte tu dravya dharmaḥ na hīyate

original: liṅgābhāvo hi liṅgasya virodhitvena vartate // BVaky_3,14.242 //
analyzed: liṅga abhāvaḥ hi liṅgasya virodhi tvena vartate

original: saṃkhvāvāṃl liṅgavāmś cārtho 'bhinnadharmā,
analyzed: ca arthaḥ bhinna dharmā

original: nimittataḥ /
analyzed: nimittataḥ

original: āsanna eva dravyatvāt taddharmair na virudhyate // BVaky_3,14.243 //
analyzed: āsannaḥ eva dravya tvāt tad dharmaiḥ na virudhyate

original: vibhaktyarthena cāviṣṭaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvidhā sthitam /
analyzed: vibhakti arthena ca āviṣṭam śuddham ca iti dvidhā sthitam

original: dravyaṃ śuddhasya yo dharmaḥ sa na syād anyadharmaṇaḥ // BVaky_3,14.244 //
analyzed: dravyam śuddhasya yaḥ dharmaḥ sa na syāt anya dharmaṇaḥ

original: dravyamātrasya nirdeśe bhedo 'yam avivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: dravya mātrasya nirdeśe bhedaḥ yam a vivakṣitaḥ

original: granthe pūrvatra bhedas tu dvitīye 'nupradarśitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.245 //
analyzed: granthe pūrvatra bhedaḥ tu dvitīye

original: dravyasya grahaṇaṃ cātra liṅgasaṃkhyāviśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: dravyasya grahaṇam ca atra liṅga saṃkhyā viśeṣaṇam

original: dravyāśritatvaṃ hi tayos tato 'nyasya na sidhyataḥ // BVaky_3,14.246 //
analyzed: dravya āśrita tvam hi tayoḥ tatas nyasya na sidhyataḥ

original: saṃbandhibhinnasaṃbandha- parichinne pravartate /
analyzed: saṃbandhi bhinna saṃbandha parichinne pravartate

original: samāso dravyasāmānye viśiṣṭārthānupātini // BVaky_3,14.247 //
analyzed: samāsaḥ dravya sāmānye viśiṣṭa artha anupātini

original: dravyadharmānatikrānto bhedadharmeṣv avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: dravya dharma an atikrāntaḥ bheda dharmeṣu avasthitaḥ

original: bhaviṣyadāśrayāpekṣe liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate // BVaky_3,14.248 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyat āśraya apekṣe liṅga saṃkhye prapadyate

original: śāstrapravṛttibhede 'pi laukiko 'rtho na bhidyate /
analyzed: śāstra pravṛtti bhede pi laukikaḥ rthaḥ na bhidyate

original: nañsamase yatas tatra trayaḥ pakṣā vicāritāḥ // BVaky_3,14.249 //
analyzed: nañ samase yatas tatra trayaḥ pakṣāḥ vicāritāḥ

original: śabdāntare 'pi caikatvam āśrityaivaṃ vicāraṇā /
analyzed: śabda antare ca eka tvam āśritya evam vicāraṇā

original: abrahmaṇādiṣu nañaḥ prayogo na hi vidyate // BVaky_3,14.250 //
analyzed: a brahmaṇa ādiṣu nañaḥ prayogaḥ na hi vidyate

original: prāk samāsāt padārthānāṃ nivṛttir dyotyate nañā /
analyzed: prāk samāsāt padārthānām nivṛttiḥ dyotyate nañā

original: svabhāvato nivṛttānāṃ rūpābhedād alakṣitā // BVaky_3,14.251 //
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ nivṛttānām rūpa abhedāt alakṣi tā

original: brāhmaṇādisthayā vākyeṣv ākhyātapadavācyayā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādi sthayā vākyeṣu ākhyāta pada vācyayā

original: kriyayā yasya saṃbandho vṛttis tasya na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.252 //
analyzed: kriyayā yasya saṃbandhaḥ vṛttiḥ tasya na vidyate

original: pācakādipadasthā cen nañā saṃbadhyate kriyā /
analyzed: pācaka ādi pada sthā ced nañā saṃbadhyate kriyā

original: tatra sattānupādānāt tripakṣī nopapadyate // BVaky_3,14.253 //
analyzed: tatra sattā anupādānāt tripakṣī na upapadyate

original: sattayaivābhisaṃbandho yadi sarvatra kalpyate /
analyzed: sattayā eva abhisaṃbandhaḥ yadi sarvatra kalpyate

original: asann iti samāse 'smin sattānyā parikalpyatām // BVaky_3,14.254 //
analyzed: asan iti samāse smin sattā anyā parikalpyatām

original: ktvānte ca tumunante ca nañsamāse na dṛśyate /
analyzed: ktvā ante ca tumun ante ca nañ samāse na dṛśyate

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ nañāsattābhidhāyinā // BVaky_3,14.255 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam nañā asattā abhidhāyinā

original: kriyāyāḥ sādhanādhāra- sāmānye nañ vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ sādhana ādhāra sāmānye naṃ vyavasthitaḥ

original: tato viśiṣṭair ādhārair yujyate brāhmaṇādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.256 //
analyzed: tatas viśiṣṭaiḥ ādhāraiḥ yujyate brāhmaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: vṛttau yathā gatādyartham upādāya nirādayaḥ /
analyzed: vṛttau yathā gata ādi artham upādāya nirādayaḥ

original: yujyante sādhanādhārair nañsamāse 'pi sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.257 //
analyzed: yujyante sādhana ādhāraiḥ nañ samāse pi sa kramaḥ

original: tatrāsati naño vṛtter brāhmaṇakṣatriyādibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra asati nañaḥ vṛtteḥ brāhmaṇa kṣatriya ādibhiḥ

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ kalpyate kubjakhañjavat // BVaky_3,14.258 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam kalpyate kubja khañja vat

original: kāmacāre ca saty evam asataḥ syāt pradhānatā, /
analyzed: kāmacāre ca sati evam asataḥ syāt pradhāna tā

original: guṇatvam itareṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ vā syāt pradhānatā // BVaky_3,14.259 //
analyzed: guṇa tvam itareṣām ca teṣām vā syāt pradhāna tā

original: prādhānyenāśritāḥ pūrvaṃ śruteḥ sāmānyavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: prādhānyena āśritāḥ pūrvam śruteḥ sāmānya vṛttayaḥ

original: viśeṣa eva prakrāntā brāhmaṇakṣatrivādavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.260 //
analyzed: viśeṣe eva prakrāntāḥ brāhmaṇa kṣatri vādavaḥ

original: yathā gaurādibhis teṣām avacchedo vidhīyate /
analyzed: yathā gaura ādibhiḥ teṣām avacchedaḥ vidhīyate

original: asatāpy anabhivyaktaṃ tādātmyaṃ vyajyate tathā // BVaky_3,14.261 //
analyzed: asatā api anabhivyaktam tādātmyam vyajyate tathā

original: yathā sattābhidhānāya sann arthaḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: yathā sattā abhidhānāya san arthaḥ parikalpyate

original: tathāsattābhidhānāya nirupākhyo 'pi kalpate // BVaky_3,14.262 //
analyzed: tathā asatta abhidhānāya nirupākhyaḥ pi kalpate

original: kṣatriyādau padaṃ kṛtvā buddhiḥ sattāntarāśrayā /
analyzed: kṣatriya ādau padam kṛtvā buddhiḥ sattā antara āśrayā

original: jātyā bhinnāṃ tataḥ sattāṃ prasaktām apakarṣati // BVaky_3,14.263 //
analyzed: jātyā bhinnām tatas sattām prasaktām apakarṣati

original: abhāva iti bhāvasya pratiṣedhe vivakṣite /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ iti bhāvasya pratiṣedhe vivakṣite

original: sopākhyatvam anāśritya pratiṣedho na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.264 //
analyzed: sopākhya tvam an āśritya pratiṣedhaḥ na kalpate

original: anekadharmavacanāḥ śabdāḥ saṅghābhidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: aneka dharma vacanāḥ śabdāḥ saṅgha abhidhāyinaḥ

original: ekadeśeṣu vartante tulyarūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ // BVaky_3,14.265 //
analyzed: eka deśeṣu vartante tulya rūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: yathaikadeśakaraṇāt kṛta itv abhidhīyate /
analyzed: yathā eka deśa karaṇāt kṛtaḥ itu abhidhīyate

original: akṛtaś ceti saṃghātaḥ sa evābrāhmaṇe kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.266 //
analyzed: a kṛtaḥ ca iti saṃghātaḥ saḥ eva a brāhmaṇe kramaḥ

original: brāhmaṇo 'brāhmaṇas tasmād upanyāsāt prasajyate /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāt upanyāsāt prasajyate

original: akṛte vā kṛtāsaṅgād aviśiṣṭaṃ kṛtākṛtāt // BVaky_3,14.267 //
analyzed: a kṛte vā kṛta āsaṅgāt a viśiṣṭam kṛta akṛtāt

original: amukhyasaṃbhave tatra mukhyasya vinivṛttaye /
analyzed: amukhya saṃbhave tatra mukhyasya vinivṛttaye

original: śāstrānvākhyānasamaye nañ prayukto viśeṣakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.268 //
analyzed: śāstra anvākhyāna samaye na prayuktaḥ viśeṣakaḥ

original: padārthānupaghātena dṛśyate 'nyaviśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: padārtha anupaghātena dṛśyate

original: atha jātimato 'rthasya kaś cid dharmo nivartitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.269 //
analyzed: atha jātimataḥ rthasya kaḥ cit dharmaḥ nivartitaḥ

original: avaśyaṃ brāhmaṇe kaś cit kva cid dharmo na vidyate /
analyzed: avaśyam brāhmaṇe kaḥ cit kva cit dharmaḥ na vidyate

original: viśeṣāvacanāt tatra nañaḥ śrutir anarthikā // BVaky_3,14.270 //
analyzed: viśeṣa avacanāt tatra nañaḥ śrutiḥ anarthikā

original: aviśiṣṭasya paryāyo nañviśiṣṭaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: a viśiṣṭasya paryāyaḥ nañ viśiṣṭaḥ prasajyate

original: anvākhyānād dhi sādhutvam evaṃbhūte pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.271 //
analyzed: anvākhyānāt hi sādhu tvam evaṃbhūte pratīyate

original: padārthānupaghātena yady apy atra viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: padārtha anupaghātena yadi api atra viśeṣaṇam

original: upacārasato 'rthasya sāvasthā dyotyate nañā // BVaky_3,14.272 //
analyzed: upacāra sataḥ rthasya sā avasthā dyotyate nañā

original: viśeṣyeṣu yathābhūtaḥ padārthaḥ samavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣyeṣu yathā bhūtaḥ padārthaḥ samavasthitaḥ

original: tathābhūte tathābhāvo gamyate bhedahetubhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.273 //
analyzed: tathābhūte tathābhāvaḥ gamyate bheda hetubhiḥ

original: nivṛtte 'vayavas tasmin padārthe vartate katham /
analyzed: nivṛtte vayavaḥ tasmin padārthe vartate katham

analyzed: na animittā hi śabdasya pravṛttiḥ upapadyate

analyzed: ārāt śabda vat ekasya viruddhe rthe svabhāvataḥ

analyzed: śabdasya vṛttiḥ yadi asti nañaḥ śrutiḥ anarthikā

original: atha svabhāvo vacanād anvākhyeyatvam arhati /
analyzed: atha svabhāvaḥ vacanāt anvākhyeya tvam arhati

original: tad vācyam aprasiddhatvān nañārtho vinivartyate // BVaky_3,14.276 //
analyzed: tat vācyam aprasiddha tvāt nañā arthaḥ vinivartyate

original: yady apy ubhayavṛttitvaṃ pradhānaṃ tu pratīyate /
analyzed: yadi api ubhaya vṛtti tvam pradhānam tu pratīyate

original: prasthānaṃ gamyate śuddhe tadarthe 'pi na tiṣṭhatau // BVaky_3,14.277 //
analyzed: prasthānam gamyate śuddhe tad arthe na tiṣṭhatau

original: kimartham atathābhūte 'sati mukhyārthasaṃbhave /
analyzed: kimartham a tathābhūte sati mukhya artha saṃbhave

original: bhede brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttir abhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.278 //
analyzed: bhede brāhmaṇa śabdasya vṛttiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: ayaṃ padārtha etasmin kṣatriyādau na vidyate /
analyzed: ayam padārthaḥ etasmin kṣatriya ādau na vidyate

analyzed: iti tad vacanaḥ śabdaḥ pratyayāya prayujyate

analyzed: buddheḥ viṣaya tām prāpte śabdāt arthe pratīyate

original: pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā grutyā hy artho 'nusajyate // BVaky_3,14.280 //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ vā nivṛttiḥ vā grutyāḥ hi arthaḥ nusajyate

original: asamyagupadeśād vā nimittāt saṃśayasya vā /
analyzed: asamyak upadeśāt vā nimittāt saṃśayasya vā

original: śabdapravṛttir na tv asti loṣṭādiṣu viparyayāt // BVaky_3,14.281 //
analyzed: śabda pravṛttiḥ na tu asti loṣṭa ādiṣu viparyayāt

original: anekasmād asa iti prādhānye sati sidhyati /
analyzed: anekasmāt asaḥ iti prādhānye sati sidhyati

original: sāpekṣatvaṃ pradhānānām evaṃ yuktaṃ tvatalvidhau // BVaky_3,14.282 //
analyzed: sāpekṣa tvam pradhānānām evam yuktam tva tal vidhau

original: ekasya ca pradhānatvāt tadviśeṣaṇasaṃnidhau /
analyzed: ekasya ca pradhāna tvāt tad viśeṣaṇa saṃnidhau

original: pradhānadharmāvyāvṛttir ato na vacanāntaram // BVaky_3,14.283 //
analyzed: pradhāna dharma avyāvṛttiḥ atas na vacana antaram

original: pradhānam atra bhedyatvād ekārtho vikṛto nañā /
analyzed: pradhānam atra bhedya tvāt ekārthaḥ vikṛtaḥ nañā

original: hitvā svadharmān vartante dvyādayo 'py ekatāṃ gatāḥ // BVaky_3,14.284 //
analyzed: hitvā svadharmān vartante dvi ādayaḥ pi eka tām gatāḥ

original: brāhmaṇatvaṃ yathāpannā nañyuktāḥ kṣatriyādayaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa tvam yathā āpannāḥ nañ yuktāḥ kṣatriya ādayaḥ

original: dvitvādiṣu tathaikatvaṃ nañyogād upacaryate // BVaky_3,14.285 //
analyzed: dvi tva ādiṣu tathā eka tvam nañ yogāt upacaryate

original: ekatvayogam āsādya sa dharmaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: eka tva yogam āsādya sa dharmaḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: dvyādibhyas teṣu tacchabdo vartate brāhmaṇādivat // BVaky_3,14.286 //
analyzed: dvi ādibhyaḥ teṣu tad śabdaḥ vartate brāhmaṇa ādi vat

original: āviṣṭasaṃkhyo vākye 'sau yathā dvyādau prayujyate /
analyzed: āviṣṭa saṃkhyaḥ vākye sau yathā dvi ādau prayujyate

original: vṛttau tasya pradhānatvāt sā saṃkhyā na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.287 //
analyzed: vṛttau tasya pradhāna tvāt sā saṃkhyā na nivartate

original: pratiṣedhyo yathābhūtas tathābhūto 'nuṣajyate /
analyzed: pratiṣedhyaḥ yathābhūtaḥ tathābhūtaḥ nuṣajyate

original: vacanāntarayoge hi na so 'rthaḥ pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,14.288 //
analyzed: vacana antara yoge hi na saḥ ṛthaḥ pratiṣidhyate

original: aśukla iti kṛṣṇādir yathārthaḥ saṃpratīyate /
analyzed: aśuklaḥ iti kṛṣṇa ādiḥ yathā arthaḥ saṃpratīyate

original: saṃkhyāntaraṃ tathāneka ity atrāpy abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.289 //
analyzed: saṃkhyā antaram tathā anekaḥ iti atra api abhidhīyate

original: kriyāprasaṅgāt sarveṣu karmasv aṅgīkṛteṣu ca /
analyzed: kriyā prasaṅgāt sarveṣu karmasu aṅgīkṛteṣu ca

original: ekasmin pratiṣiddhe 'pi prāptam anyat pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.290 //
analyzed: ekasmin pratiṣiddhe pi prāptam anyat pratīyate

original: kriyāśrutiś ca prakrānte prasajyapratiṣedhane /
analyzed: kriyā śrutiḥ ca prakrānte prasajya pratiṣedhane

original: paryudāse tu niyataṃ saṃkhyeyāntaram ucyate // BVaky_3,14.291 //
analyzed: paryudāse tu niyatam saṃkhyeya antaram ucyate

original: dhātvarthaḥ karmaviṣayo vyapadiṣṭaḥ svasādhanaiḥ /
analyzed: dhātvarthaḥ karma viṣayaḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ sva sādhanaiḥ

original: arthāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi prāg ākṣipyāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.292 //
analyzed: arthāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi prāk ākṣipya avatiṣṭhate

original: nirjñātasādhanādhāre yatrākhyāte prayujyate /
analyzed: nirjñāta sādhana ādhāre yatra ākhyāte prayujyate

original: aneka iti paścāc ca tiṣṭhatīty anuṣajyate // BVaky_3,14.293 //
analyzed: anekaḥ iti paścāt ca tiṣṭhati iti anuṣajyate

original: sādhyatvāt tatra siddhena kriyā dravyeṇa lakṣyate /
analyzed: sādhya tvāt tatra siddhena kriyā dravyeṇa lakṣyate

original: prāg evāṅgīkṛtaṃ dravyam ataḥ pūrveṇa bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.294 //
analyzed: prāk eva aṅgīkṛtam dravyam atas pūrveṇa bhidyate

original: saṃkhyaiva pratiṣedhena saṃkhyāntaram apekṣate /
analyzed: saṃkhyā eva pratiṣedhena saṃkhyā antaram apekṣate

original: vākye 'pi tena naikatva- mātram eva nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.295 //
analyzed: vākye pi tena na ekatva mātram eva nivartyate

analyzed: sneha antarāt avacchedaḥ tathā āsatteḥ pratīyate

analyzed: tailena bhojane prāpte na tu anyat upasecanam

analyzed: eka arthe vartamānābhyām asatā brāhmaṇena ca

original: yadā jātyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ kṣatriyādy apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.297 //
analyzed: yadā jāti antaram bāhyam kṣatriya ādi apadiśyate

original: śyāmeva śastrī kanyeti yathānyad vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: śyāmā iva śa strī kanyā iti yathā anyat vyapadiśyate

analyzed: asan brāhmaṇaḥ iti ābhyām tathā anye kṣatriya ādayaḥ

original: asāsno gaur iti yathā,
analyzed: asāsnaḥ gauḥ iti yathā

original: gavayo vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: gavayaḥ vyapadiśyate

original: jātyantaraṃ na gor eva sasnābhāvaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.299 //
analyzed: jāti antaram na goḥ eva sasnā bhāvaḥ pratīyate

original: tulyarūpaṃ yathākhyātaṃ kaṇṭakair bhedahetubhiḥ /
analyzed: tulya rūpam yathā ākhyātam kaṇṭakaiḥ bheda hetubhiḥ

original: khadiraṃ jātibhedena kharjūrāt pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.300 //
analyzed: khadiram jāti bhedena kharjūrāt pratipadyate

original: aṅgīkṛtopamānena tathānyo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.301 //
analyzed: aṅgīkṛta upamānena tathā anyaḥ rthaḥ bhidhīyate

original: avṛṣṭayo yathā varsā nīhārābhrasamāvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: avṛṣṭayaḥ yathā varsāḥ nīhāra abhra samāvṛtāḥ

analyzed: tad rūpa tvāt sa hemantaḥ iti abhinnaḥ pratīyate

analyzed: dravyasya anya padārtha tve nañā yogam pracakṣate

original: na caivaṃviṣayaḥ kaś cid bahuvrīhiḥ prakalpate /
