original: agur aśva iti vyāptir nañsamāsena yasya na // BVaky_3,14.304 //
analyzed: aguḥ aśvaḥ iti vyāptiḥ nañ samāsena yasya na

original: dvandvaikadeśinor uktā paravalliṅgatā yataḥ /
analyzed: dvandva ekadeśinoḥ uktā para vat liṅga tā yatas

original: avarṣāsu tato 'siddhir iṣṭayor liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.305 //
analyzed: avarṣāsu siddhiḥ iṣṭayoḥ liṅga saṃkhyayoḥ

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ brāhmaṇādi kriyāsaṃbandhino 'sataḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam brāhmaṇa ādi sataḥ

original: yadā viṣayabhinnaṃ tat tadāsattvam pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.306 //
brāhmaṇatvena cāsattvād ucyate sat tad anyathā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa tvena ca asattvāt ucyate sat tat anyathā

original: asad ity api sattvena sataḥ sattā nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.307 //
analyzed: asat iti api sattvena sataḥ sattā nivartyate

original: samanyadravyavṛttitvān nimittānuvidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: samanya dravya vṛtti tvāt nimitta anuvidhāyinaḥ

original: ayogo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ syād vā sāmānyadharmatā // BVaky_3,14.308 //
analyzed: ayogaḥ liṅga saṃkhyābhyām syāt vā sāmānya dharma tā

original: prāg asattvābhidhāyitvaṃ samāse dravyavācitā /
analyzed: prāk a sattva abhidhāyi tvam samāse dravya vāci tā

original: nimittānuvidhānaṃ ca na sarvatra svabhāvataḥ // BVaky_3,14.309 //
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhānam ca na sarvatra svabhāvataḥ

original: nimittānuvidhāne ca kriyāyogo na kalpate /
analyzed: nimitta anuvidhāne ca kriyā yogaḥ na kalpate

original: tathā cāvyapadeśyatvād upādānam anarthakam // BVaky_3,14.310 //
analyzed: tathā ca avyapadeśya tvāt upādānam anarthakam

original: asatsāmānyavṛttir vā viśeṣaiḥ kṣatriyādibhiḥ /
analyzed: asat sāmānya vṛttiḥ vā viśeṣaiḥ kṣatriya ādibhiḥ

original: prayuktair āśrayair bhinno yāti talliṅgasaṃkhyatām // BVaky_3,14.311 //
analyzed: prayuktaiḥ āśrayaiḥ bhinnaḥ yāti tad liṅga saṃkhya tām

original: prāg āśrayo hi bhedāya pradhāne 'bhyantarīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: prāk āśrayaḥ hi bhedāya pradhāne bhyantarīkṛtaḥ

original: punaḥ pratyavamarśena vibhakta iva dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.312 //
analyzed: punar pratyavamarśena vibhaktaḥ iva dṛśyate

original: samāse śrūyate svārtho yena tadvāṃs tadāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: samāse śrūyate sva arthaḥ yena tadvān tad āśrayaḥ

original: dravyaṃ tu liṅgasaṃkhyāvad asatābhyantarīkṛtam // BVaky_3,14.313 //
analyzed: dravyam tu liṅga saṃkhyāvat asatā abhyantarīkṛtam

original: ekārthaviṣayau śabdau tasminn anyārthavartinau /
analyzed: eka artha viṣayau śabdau tasmin anya artha vartinau

original: asataiva tu bhedānāṃ sarveṣām upasaṃgrahaḥ // BVaky_3,14.314 //
analyzed: asatā eva tu bhedānām sarveṣām upasaṃgrahaḥ

original: te kṣatriyādibhir vācyā vācyā vā sarvanāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: te kṣatriya ādibhiḥ vācyāḥ vācyāḥ vā sarvanāmabhiḥ

original: yāntīvānyapadārthatvaṃ naño rūpāvikalpanāt // BVaky_3,14.315 //
analyzed: yānti iva anya padārtha tvam nañaḥ rūpa avikalpanāt

original: viśeṣasyāprayoge tu liṅgasaṃkhye na sidhyataḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣasya a prayoge tu liṅga saṃkhye na sidhyataḥ

original: avarṣādiṣu dosaś ca hemanto 'nyāśrayo yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.316 //
analyzed: a varṣā ādiṣu dosaḥ ca hemantaḥ nyāśrayaḥ yatas

original: ākṛtiḥ sarvaśabdānāṃ yadā vācyā pratīyate /
analyzed: ākṛtiḥ sarva śabdānām yadā vācyā pratīyate

original: ekatvād ekaśabdatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ tasyāś ca varṇyate // BVaky_3,14.317 //
analyzed: eka tvāt eka śabda tvam nyāyyam tasyāḥ ca varṇyate

original: āviṣṭaliṅgatā tasyāṃ syād grāmyapagusaṅghavat /
analyzed: āviṣṭa liṅga tā tasyām syāt grāmya pagu saṅgha vat

original: dravyabhede 'pi caikatvāt tatraikavacanaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,14.318 //
analyzed: dravya bhede ca eka tvāt tatra eka vacanam bhavet

original: āśrayāṇāṃ hi liṅgaiḥ sā niyatair eva yujyate /
analyzed: āśrayāṇām hi liṅgaiḥ sā niyataiḥ eva yujyate

original: tathā ca yuktavadbhāve pratiṣedho nirarthakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.319 //
analyzed: tathā ca yuktavat bhāve pratiṣedhaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: sarvatrāviṣṭaliṅgatvaṃ lokaliṅgaparigrahe /
analyzed: sarvatra āviṣṭa liṅga tvam loka liṅga parigrahe

original: virodhitvāt prasajyeta nāśritaṃ tac ca laukikam // BVaky_3,14.320 //
analyzed: virodhi tvāt prasajyeta na āśritam tat ca laukikam

original: sāmānyam ākṛtir bhāvo jātir ity atra laukikam /
analyzed: sāmānyam ākṛtiḥ bhāvaḥ jātiḥ iti atra laukikam

original: liṅgaṃ na saṃbhavaty eva tenānyat parigṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.321 //
analyzed: liṅgam na saṃbhavati eva tena anyat parigṛhyate

original: pravṛttir iti sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya kathyate /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ iti sāmānyam lakṣaṇam tasya kathyate

original: āvirbhāvas tirobhāvaḥ sthitiś cety atha bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.322 //
analyzed: āvirbhāvaḥ tirobhāvaḥ sthitiḥ ca iti atha bhidyate

original: pravṛttimantaḥ sarve 'rthās tisṛbhiś ca pravṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: pravṛttimantaḥ sarve rthāḥ tisṛbhiḥ ca pravṛttibhiḥ

original: satataṃ na viyujyante vācaś caivātra saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.323 //
analyzed: satatam na viyujyante vācaḥ ca eva atra saṃbhavaḥ

original: yaś cāpravṛttidharmārthaś citirūpeṇa gṛhyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca apravṛtti dharma arthaḥ citi rūpeṇa gṛhyate

original: anuyātīva so 'nyeṣāṃ pravṛttīr viśvagāśrayāḥ // BVaky_3,14.324 //
analyzed: anuyāti iva saḥ nyeṣām pravṛttīḥ viśvak āśrayāḥ

original: tenāsya citirūpaṃ ca citikālaś ca bhidyate /
analyzed: tena asya citi rūpam ca citi kālaḥ ca bhidyate

original: tasya svarūpabhedas tu na kaś cid api vidyate // BVaky_3,14.325 //
analyzed: tasya sva rūpa bhedaḥ tu na kaḥ cit api vidyate

original: acetaneṣu caitanyaṃ saṃkrāntam iva dṛśyate /
analyzed: acetaneṣu caitanyam saṃkrāntam iva dṛśyate

original: pratibimbakadharmeṇa yat tac chabdanibandhanam // BVaky_3,14.326 //
analyzed: pratibimbaka dharmeṇa yat tat śabda nibandhanam

original: avasthā tādṛśī nāsti yā liṅgena na yujyate /
analyzed: avasthā tādṛśī nā asti yā liṅgena na yujyate

original: kva cit tu śabdasaṃskāro liṅgasyānāśraye sati // BVaky_3,14.327 //
analyzed: kva cit tu śabda saṃskāraḥ liṅgasya anāśraye sati

original: kṛttaddhitābhidheyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na virudhyate /
analyzed: kṛt taddhita abhidheyānām bhāvānām na virudhyate

original: śāstre liṅgaṃ guṇāvasthā tathā cākṛtir iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.328 //
analyzed: śāstre liṅgam guṇa avasthā tathā ca ākṛtiḥ iṣyate

original: liṅgaṃ prati na bhedo 'sti dravyapakṣe 'pi kaś cana /
analyzed: liṅgam prati na bhedaḥ sti dravya pakṣe kaḥ cana

original: tasmāt sapta vikalpā ye saivātrāviṣṭaliṅgatā // BVaky_3,14.329 //
analyzed: tasmāt sapta vikalpāḥ ye sā eva atra āviṣṭa liṅga tā

original: vacane niyamaḥ śāstrād dravyasyābhyupagamyate /
analyzed: vacane niyamaḥ śāstrāt dravyasya abhyupagamyate

original: yatas tad ākṛtau śāstram anyathaiva samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.330 //
analyzed: yatas tat ākṛtau śāstram anyathā eva samarthyate

original: vartate yo bahuṣv artho 'bhede tasya vivakṣite /
analyzed: vartate yaḥ bahuṣu arthaḥ bhede tasya vivakṣite

original: svāśrayair vyapadiṣṭasya śāstre vacanam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.331 //
analyzed: sva āśrayaiḥ vyapadiṣṭasya śāstre vacanam ucyate

original: yadā tv āśrayabhedena bheda eva pratīyate /
analyzed: yadā tu āśraya bhedena bhedaḥ eva pratīyate

original: ākṛter dravyapakṣena tadā bhedo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.332 //
analyzed: ākṛteḥ dravya pakṣena tadā bhedaḥ na vidyate

original: abhede tv ekaśabdatvāc chāstrāc ca vacane sati /
analyzed: abhede tu eka śabda tvāt śāstrāt ca vacane sati

original: ekaśeṣo na vaktavyo vacanānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.333 //
analyzed: eka śeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ vacanānām ca saṃbhavaḥ

original: nanu cānabhidheyatve dravyasya tadapāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca anabhidheya tve dravyasya tad apāśrayaḥ

original: ākṛter upakāro 'yaṃ dravyābhāvān na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.334 //
analyzed: ākṛteḥ upakāraḥ yam dravya abhāvāt na kalpate

original: vyapadeśo 'bhidheyena na śāstre kaś cid āśritaḥ /
analyzed: vyapadeśaḥ bhidheyena na śāstre kaḥ cit āśritaḥ

original: dravyaṃ nāma padārtho yo na ca sa pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,14.335 //
analyzed: dravyam nāma padārthaḥ yaḥ na ca sa pratiṣidhyate

original: guṇabhāvo 'bhidheyatvaṃ prati dravyasya nāśritaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa bhāvaḥ bhidheya tvam prati dravyasya na āśritaḥ

original: upakāri guṇaḥ śeṣaḥ parārtha iti kalpanā // BVaky_3,14.336 //
analyzed: upakāri guṇaḥ śeṣaḥ parārtha iti kalpanā

original: dravye na guṇabhāvo 'sti vinādravyābhidhāyitām /
analyzed: dravye na guṇa bhāvaḥ sti vinā a dravya abhidhāyi tām

original: ākṛtau vā pradhānatvam ata evaṃ samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.337 //
analyzed: ākṛtau vā pradhāna tvam atas evam samarthyate

original: kaiś cid guṇapradhānatvaṃ nāmākhyātavad iṣyate /
analyzed: kaiḥ cit guṇa pradhāna tvam nāma ākhyāta vat iṣyate

original: na vṛttivat parārthasya guṇabhāvas tu varṇyate // BVaky_3,14.338 //
analyzed: na vṛtti vat para arthasya guṇa bhāvaḥ tu varṇyate

original: guṇabhūtasya nānātvād ākṛter ekaśabdatā /
analyzed: guṇa bhūtasya nānātvāt ākṛteḥ eka śabda tā

original: siddho vacanabhedaś ca dravyabhedasamanvayāt // BVaky_3,14.339 //
analyzed: siddhaḥ vacana bhedaḥ ca dravya bheda samanvayāt

original: sādhanaṃ guṇabhāvena kriyāyā bhedakaṃ yathā /
analyzed: sādhanam guṇa bhāvena kriyāyāḥ bhedakam yathā

original: ākhyāteṣv ekaśabdāyā jāter dravyaṃ tathocyate // BVaky_3,14.340 //
analyzed: ākhyāteṣu eka śabdāyāḥ jāteḥ dravyam tathā ucyate

original: ekatve tulyarūpatvāc chabdānāṃ pratipādane /
analyzed: eka tve tulya rūpa tvāt śabdānām pratipādane

original: nimittāt tadvato 'rthasya viśiṣṭagrahaṇe sati // BVaky_3,14.341 //
analyzed: nimittāt tadvataḥ rthasya viśiṣṭa grahaṇe sati

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād āśrayair ākṛteḥ saha /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt āśrayaiḥ ākṛteḥ saha

original: pravṛttau bhinnaśabdāyāṃ liṅgasaṃkhye prasidhyataḥ // BVaky_3,14.342 //
analyzed: pravṛttau bhinna śabdāyām liṅga saṃkhye prasidhyataḥ

original: prāk ca jātyabhisaṃbandhāt sarvanāmābhidheyatā /
analyzed: prāk ca jāti abhisaṃbandhāt sarvanāma abhidheya tā

original: vastūpalakṣaṇaṃ sattve prayujyante tyadādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.343 //
analyzed: vastu upalakṣaṇam sattve prayujyante tyad ādayaḥ

original: pākau pākā iti yathā bhedakaḥ kaiś cid āśrayaḥ /
analyzed: pākau pākāḥ iti yathā bhedakaḥ kaiḥ cit āśrayaḥ

original: iṣyate cānupādāno dharmo 'sau guṇavācinām // BVaky_3,14.344 //
analyzed: iṣyate ca anupādānaḥ guṇa vācinām

original: āśrayasyānupādāne kevalaṃ labhate yadi /
analyzed: āśrayasya an upādāne kevalam labhate yadi

original: ādhāradharmān sāmānyaṃ purastāt tad vicāritam // BVaky_3,14.345 //
analyzed: ādhāra dharmān sāmānyam purastāt tat vicāritam

original: jātau pūrvaṃ pravṛttānāṃ śabdānāṃ jātivācinām /
analyzed: jātau pūrvam pravṛttānām śabdānām jāti vācinām

original: aśabdavācyāt saṃbandhād vyaktir apy upajāyate // BVaky_3,14.346 //
analyzed: a śabda vācyāt saṃbandhāt vyaktiḥ api upajāyate

original: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhāj jātidharmopacaryate /
analyzed: saḥ yam iti abhisaṃbandhāt jāti dharmā upacaryate

original: dravyaṃ tadāśrayo bhedo jāteś cābhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.347 //
analyzed: dravyam tad āśrayaḥ bhedaḥ jāteḥ ca abhyupagamyate

original: mañcaśabdo yathādheyaṃ mañceṣv eva vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: mañca śabdaḥ yathādheyam mañceṣu eva vyavasthitaḥ

original: tattvenāha tathā jāti- śabdo dravyeṣu vartate // BVaky_3,14.348 //
analyzed: tattvena āha tathā śabdaḥ dravyeṣu vartate

original: tatra jātipadārthatvaṃ tathaivābhyupagamyate /
analyzed: tatra jāti padārtha tvam tathā eva abhyupagamyate

original: jātir utsṛṣṭasaṃkhyā tu dravyātmany anuṣajyate // BVaky_3,14.349 //
analyzed: jātiḥ utsṛṣṭa saṃkhyā tu dravya ātmani anuṣajyate

original: asyedam iti vā yatra so 'yam ity api vā śrutiḥ /
analyzed: asya idam iti vā yatra saḥ yam iti api vā śrutiḥ

original: vartate paradharmeṇa tad anyad abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.350 //
analyzed: vartate para dharmeṇa tat anyat abhidhīyate

original: yat pradhānaṃ na tasyāsti svarūpam anirūpanāt /
analyzed: yat pradhānam na tasya asti svarūpam a nirūpanāt

original: guṇasya cātmanā dravyaṃ tadbhāvenopalakṣyate // BVaky_3,14.351 //
analyzed: guṇasya ca ātmanā dravyam tad bhāvena upalakṣyate

original: guṇasya bhedakāle tu prādhānyam upajāyate /
analyzed: guṇasya bheda kāle tu prādhānyam upajāyate

original: saṃsargaśrutir artheṣu sākṣād eva na vartate // BVaky_3,14.352 //
analyzed: saṃsarga śrutiḥ artheṣu sākṣāt eva na vartate

original: jātau vṛtto yadā dravye sa śabdo vartate punaḥ /
analyzed: jātau vṛttaḥ yadā dravye sa śabdaḥ vartate punar

original: jāter eva padārthatvaṃ na tadābhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.353 //
analyzed: jāteḥ eva padārtha tvam na tadā abhyupagamyate

original: pravṛttānāṃ punar vṛttir ekatvenopavarṇyate /
analyzed: pravṛttānām punar vṛttiḥ eka tvena upavarṇyate

original: pratipatter upāyeṣu na tattvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,14.354 //
analyzed: pratipatteḥ upāyeṣu na tattvam anugamyate

original: apṛthakśabdavācyasya jātir āśrīyate yadā /
analyzed: apṛthak śabda vācyasya jātiḥ āśrīyate yadā

original: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe tadā jātipadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.355 //
analyzed: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe tadā jāti padārtha tā

original: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe dravyam āśrīyate yadā /
analyzed: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe dravyam āśrīyate yadā

original: vācyaṃ tenaiva śabdena tadā dravyapadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.356 //
analyzed: vācyam tena eva śabdena tadā dravya padārtha tā

original: apṛthakśabdavācyāpi bhedamātre pravartate /
analyzed: apṛthak śabda vācyā api bheda mātre pravartate

original: yadā saṃbandhavaj jātiḥ sāpi dravyapadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.357 //
analyzed: yadā saṃbandha vat jātiḥ sā api dravya padārtha tā

original: atyantabhinnayor eva jātidravyābhidhāyinoḥ /
analyzed: atyanta bhinnayoḥ eva jāti dravya abhidhāyinoḥ

original: avācyasyopakāritva āśrite tūbhayārthatā // BVaky_3,14.358 //
analyzed: avācyasya upakāri tve āśrite tu ubhaya artha tā

original: āśrite tv āśrayakṛtaṃ bhedam abhyupagacchatā /
analyzed: āśrite tu āśraya kṛtam bhedam abhyupagacchatā

original: punaś cāpy ekaśabdatvaṃ jātiśabde 'nuvarṇitam // BVaky_3,14.359 //
analyzed: punar ca api eka śabda tvam jāti śabde

original: anirjātasya nirjñānaṃ yena tan mānam ucyate /
analyzed: a nirjātasya nirjñānam yena tat mānam ucyate

original: prasthādi tena meyātmā sākalyenāvadhāryate // BVaky_3,14.360 //
analyzed: prastha ādi tena meya ātmā sākalyena avadhāryate

original: anirjñātaṃ prasiddhena yena taddharma gamyate /
analyzed: a nirjñātam prasiddhena yena tad dharma gamyate

original: sākalyenāparijñānād upamānaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_3,14.361 //
analyzed: sākalyena aparijñānāt upamānam tat ucyate

original: dvayoḥ samānayor dharma upamānopameyayoḥ /
analyzed: dvayoḥ samānayoḥ dharmaḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: samāsa upamānānāṃ śabdais tadabhidhāyibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.362 //
analyzed: samāse upamānānām śabdaiḥ tad abhidhāyibhiḥ

original: ādhārabhedād bhedo yaḥ śyāmatve so 'vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ādhāra bhedāt bhedaḥ yaḥ śyāma tve saḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: guṇo 'sāv āśritaikatvo bhinnādhāraḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.363 //
analyzed: guṇaḥ saḥ āśrita eka tvaḥ bhinna ādhāraḥ pratīyate

original: guṇayor niyato bhedo guṇajātes tathaikatā /
analyzed: guṇayoḥ niyataḥ bhedaḥ guṇa jāteḥ tathā eka tā

original: ekatve 'tyantabhede vā,
analyzed: eka tve tyanta bhede vā

original: nopamānasya saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.364 //
analyzed: na upamānasya saṃbhavaḥ

original: jātimātravyapekṣāyām upamārtho na kaś cana /
analyzed: jāti mātra vyapekṣāyām upamā arthaḥ na kaḥ cana

original: śyāmatvam ekaṃ guṇayor ubhayor api vartate // BVaky_3,14.365 //
analyzed: śyāma tvam ekam guṇayoḥ ubhayoḥ api vartate

original: yenaiva hetunā śyāmā śastrī tatra pratīyate /
analyzed: yena eva hetunā śyāmā śastrī tatra pratīyate

original: sa hetur devadattāyāḥ pratyaye na viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.366 //
analyzed: sa hetuḥ devadattāyāḥ pratyaye na viśiṣyate

original: āśrayād yo guṇe bhedo jāter yā cāviśiṣṭatā /
analyzed: āśrayāt yaḥ guṇe bhedaḥ jāteḥ yā ca a viśiṣṭa tā

original: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ dravyātmā savyāpāraḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.367 //
analyzed: tābhyām ubhābhyām dravya ātmā sa vyāpāraḥ pratīyate

original: so 'yam ekatvanānātve vyavahāraḥ samāśritaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam eka tva nānātve vyavahāraḥ samāśritaḥ

original: bhedābhedavimarśena vyatikīrṇena vartate // BVaky_3,14.368 //
analyzed: bheda abheda vimarśena vyatikīrṇena vartate

original: śyāmety evābhidhiyeta jātimātre vivakṣite /
analyzed: śyāmā iti jāti mātre vivakṣite

original: śastryādinām upādāne tatra nāsti prayojanam // BVaky_3,14.369 //
analyzed: śastrī ādinām upādāne tatra na asti prayojanam

original: aśabdavācyo yo bhedaḥ śyāmamātre na vartate /
analyzed: a śabda vācyaḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ śyāma mātre na vartate

original: śyāmeṣu keṣu cid vṛttir yasya so 'tra vyapekṣyate // BVaky_3,14.370 //
analyzed: śyāmeṣu keṣu cit vṛttiḥ yasya vyapekṣyate

original: śyāmeṣu keṣu cit kiṃ cit kiṃ cit sarvatra vartate /
analyzed: śyāmeṣu keṣu cit kim cit kim cit sarvatra vartate

original: sāmānyaṃ kaś cid ekasmiñ chyāme bhedo vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.371 //
analyzed: sāmānyam kaḥ cit ekasmin chyāme bhedaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: tathā hi sati saurabhye bhedo jātyutpalādiṣu /
analyzed: tathā hi sati saurabhye bhedaḥ jāti utpala ādiṣu

original: gandhānāṃ sati bhede tu sādṛśyam upalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.372 //
analyzed: gandhānām sati bhede tu sādṛśyam upalabhyate

original: guṇānām āśrayād bhedaḥ svato vāpy anugamyate /
analyzed: guṇānām āśrayāt bhedaḥ svatas vā api anugamyate

original: anirdeśyād viśeṣād vā saṃkarād vā guṇāntaraiḥ // BVaky_3,14.373 //
analyzed: anirdeśyāt viśeṣāt vā saṃkarāt vā guṇa antaraiḥ

original: upamānaṃ prasiddhatvāt sarvatra vyatiricyate /
analyzed: upamānam prasiddha tvāt sarvatra vyatiricyate

original: upameyatvam ādhikye sāmye vā na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.374 //
analyzed: upameya tvam ādhikye sāmye vā na nivartate

original: anyais tu mānaṃ jātyādi bhedyasyārthasya varṇyate /
analyzed: anyaiḥ tu mānam jāti ādi bhedyasya arthasya varṇyate

original: anirjñātasvarūpo hi jñeyo 'rthas tena mīyate // BVaky_3,14.375 //
analyzed: a nirjñāta sva rūpaḥ hi jñeyaḥ rthaḥ tena mīyate

original: mitas tu svena mānena prasiddho yo guṇāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: mitaḥ tu svena mānena prasiddhaḥ yaḥ guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: āśrayāntaramānāya svadharmeṇa pravartate // BVaky_3,14.376 //
analyzed: āśraya antara mānāya svadharmeṇa pravartate

original: rūpāntareṇa saṃsparśo rūpāntaravatāṃ satām /
analyzed: rūpa antareṇa saṃsparśaḥ rūpa antaravatām satām

original: bhinnena yasya bhedyānām upamānaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_3,14.377 //
analyzed: bhinnena yasya bhedyānām upamānam tat ucyate

original: dharmaḥ samānaḥ śyāmādir upamānopameyayoḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ samānaḥ śyāma ādiḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: āśriyamānaprādhānyo dharmeṇānyena bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.378 //
analyzed: āśriyamāna prādhānyaḥ dharmeṇa anyena bhidyate

original: śastrīkumāryoḥ sadṛśaḥ śyāma ity evam āśrite /
analyzed: śa strī kumāryoḥ sadṛśaḥ śyāmaḥ iti evam āśrite

original: vyapadeśyam aneneti nimittaṃ guṇayoḥ sthitam // BVaky_3,14.379 //
analyzed: vyapadeśyam anena iti nimittam guṇayoḥ sthitam

original: yadā nimittais tadvanto gacchantīva tadātmatām /
analyzed: yadā nimittaiḥ tadvantaḥ gacchanti iva tad ātma tām

original: bhedāśrayaṃ tadākhyānam upamānopameyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.380 //
analyzed: bheda āśrayam tat ākhyānam upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: tattvāsaṅgavivakṣāyāṃ yeṣu bhedo nivartate /
analyzed: tattva asaṅga vivakṣāyām yeṣu bhedaḥ nivartate

original: luptopamāni tāny āhus taddharmeṇa samāśrayāt // BVaky_3,14.381 //
analyzed: lupta upamāni tāni āhuḥ tad dharmeṇa samāśrayāt

original: śastryāṃ prasiddhaṃ śyāmatvaṃ mānaṃ sā tena mīyate /
analyzed: śastryām prasiddham śyāma tvam mānam sā tena mīyate

original: anyā śyāmā tu tadrūpā tenātyantaṃ na mīyate // BVaky_3,14.382 //
analyzed: anyā śyāmā tu tad rūpā tena atyantam na mīyate

original: śastriṃ svena guṇenāto mimānām āśrayāntaram /
analyzed: śastrim svena guṇena atas mimānām āśraya antaram

original: asamāptaguṇaṃ siddher upamānaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.383 //
analyzed: asamāpta guṇam siddheḥ upamānam pracakṣate

original: upameye sthito dharmaḥ śruto 'nyatrānumīyate /
analyzed: upameye sthitaḥ dharmaḥ śrutaḥ nyatra anumīyate

original: śruto 'tha vopamānastha upameye 'numiyate // BVaky_3,14.384 //
analyzed: śrutaḥ tha vā upamāna sthaḥ upameye numiyate

original: adhīyate brāhmaṇavat kṣatriyā iti dṛśyate /
analyzed: adhīyate brāhmaṇa vat kṣatriyāḥ iti dṛśyate

original: upameyasya bhinnatvād vacanaṃ kṣatriyāśrayam // BVaky_3,14.385 //
analyzed: upameyasya bhinna tvāt vacanam kṣatriya āśrayam

original: sādhāraṇaṃ bruvan dharma kva cid eva vyavasthitam /
analyzed: sādhāraṇam bruvan dharma kva cit eva vyavasthitam

original: sāmānyavacanaḥ śabda iti sūtre 'padiśyate // BVaky_3,14.386 //
analyzed: sāmānya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ iti sūtre padiśyate

original: nābhedena na bhedena guṇo dviṣṭho 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: na abhedena na bhedena guṇaḥ dviṣṭhaḥ bhidhīyate

original: bhinnayor dharmayor ekaḥ śrūyate 'nyaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.387 //
analyzed: bhinnayoḥ dharmayoḥ ekaḥ śrūyate nyaḥ pratīyate

original: nātyantāya mimīte yat sāmānye samavasthitam /
analyzed: na atyantāya mimīte yat sāmānye samavasthitam

original: sādṛśyād upameyārtha- samīpe parikalpyate // BVaky_3,14.388 //
analyzed: sādṛśyāt upameya artha samīpe parikalpyate

original: mānaṃ prati samīpaṃ vā sādṛśyena pratīyate /
analyzed: mānam prati samīpam vā sādṛśyena pratīyate

original: paricchedād dhi sādṛśyam iha mānopamānayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.389 //
analyzed: paricchedāt hi sādṛśyam iha māna upamānayoḥ

original: ekajātivyapekṣāyāṃ tad evety avasīyate /
analyzed: eka jāti vyapekṣāyām tat eva iti avasīyate

original: bhedasyaiva vyapekṣāyām anyad eveti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.390 //
analyzed: bhedasya eva vyapekṣāyām anyat eva iti gamyate

original: karmatvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca bhedenaivāśritaṃ yataḥ /
analyzed: karma tvam karaṇa tvam ca bhedena eva āśritam yatas

original: atyantaikatvaviṣayo na syāt tenātra samśayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.391 //
analyzed: atyanta eka tva viṣayaḥ na syāt tena atra samśayaḥ

original: bhede 'pi tulyarūpatvāc chālīmṃ tān iti dṛśyate /
analyzed: bhede pi tulya rūpa tvāt tān iti dṛśyate

original: jātyabhedāt sa evāyam iti bhinno 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.392 //
analyzed: jāti abhedāt saḥ eva ayam iti bhinnaḥ bhidhīyate

original: kathaṃ hy avayavo 'nyasya syād anya iti cocyate /
analyzed: katham hi avayavaḥ nyasya syāt anyaḥ iti ca ucyate

original: atyantabhede nānātvaṃ yatra tattvaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.393 //
analyzed: atyanta bhede nānātvam yatra tattvam na vidyate

original: abhedasya vivakṣāyām ekatvaṃ saṅghasaṅghinoḥ /
analyzed: abhedasya vivakṣāyām eka tvam saṅgha saṅghinoḥ

original: saṅghinor na tv abhedo 'sti tathānyatvam udāhṛtam // BVaky_3,14.394 //
analyzed: saṅghinoḥ na tu tathā anya tvam udāhṛtam

original: tatrābhinnavyapekṣāyām upamārtho na vidyate /
analyzed: tatra abhinna vyapekṣāyām upamā arthaḥ na vidyate

original: yo hi gaur iti vijñāne hetuḥ so 'sti gavāntare // BVaky_3,14.395 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi gauḥ iti vijñāne hetuḥ saḥ sti gava antare

original: vyāvṛttānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ vyāpāre tu vivakṣite /
analyzed: vyāvṛttānām viśeṣāṇām vyāpāre tu vivakṣite

original: na kaś cid upakāro 'sti buddher buddhyantaraṃ prati // BVaky_3,14.396 //
analyzed: na kaḥ cit upakāraḥ sti buddheḥ buddhi antaram prati

original: kiṃ cid yatrāsti sāmānyaṃ yadi bhedāś ca ke cana /
analyzed: kim cit yatra asti sāmānyam yadi bhedāḥ ca ke cana

original: gotvaṃ goṣv asti sāmānyaṃ bhedāś ca śabalādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.397 //
analyzed: go tvam goṣu asti sāmānyam bhedāḥ ca śabala ādayaḥ

original: sāmānyaṃ śyāmatānyaiva tad dhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyam śyāmatā anyā eva tat hi sādhāraṇam dvayoḥ

original: tad eva siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ bheda ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.398 //
analyzed: tat eva siddhi asiddhibhyām bhedaḥ iti apadiśyate

original: śyāmatvam eva sāmānyam anyeṣām ubhayoḥ sthitam /
analyzed: śyāma tvam eva sāmānyam anyeṣām ubhayoḥ sthitam

original: saṃpūrnatvāt tad anyasmād viśeṣa iti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.399 //
analyzed: saṃpūrna tvāt tat anyasmāt viśeṣaḥ iti gamyate

original: ākṛtau vāpi sāmānye kva cid eva vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: ākṛtau vā api sāmānye kva cit eva vyavasthitāḥ

original: śyāmādau ye 'vasīyante viśeṣās ta ihāśritāḥ // BVaky_3,14.400 //
analyzed: śyāma ādau ye vasīyante viśeṣāḥ te iha āśritāḥ

original: jāter abhede bhede vā sādṛśyaṃ tat pracakṣate /
analyzed: jāteḥ abhede bhede vā sādṛśyam tat pracakṣate

original: kaś cit kadā cit arthātmā tathābhūto 'padiśyate // BVaky_3,14.401 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit kadā cit artha ātmā upadiśyate

original: yatrārthe pratyayābhedo na kadā cid vikalpate /
analyzed: yatra arthe pratyaya abhedaḥ na kadā cit vikalpate

original: avidyamānabhedatvāt sa eka iti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.402 //
analyzed: a vidyamāna bheda tvāt saḥ ekaḥ iti gamyate

original: yo 'rtha āśritanānātvaḥ sa evety apadiśyate /
analyzed: yaḥ rthaḥ āśrita nānātvaḥ saḥ eva iti apadiśyate

original: vyāpāraṃ jātibhāgasya tatrāpi pratijānate // BVaky_3,14.403 //
analyzed: vyāpāram jāti bhāgasya tatra api pratijānate

original: jātibhāgāśrayā prakhyā tatrābhinnā pravartate /
analyzed: jāti bhāga āśrayā prakhyā tatra abhinnā pravartate

original: vyaktibhāgāśrayā buddhis tatra bhedena jāyate // BVaky_3,14.404 //
analyzed: vyakti bhāga āśrayā buddhiḥ tatra bhedena jāyate

original: anyatra vartamānaṃ sad bhedābhedasamanvitam /
analyzed: anyatra vartamānam sat bheda abheda samanvitam

original: nimittaṃ punar anyatra nānātveneva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.405 //
analyzed: nimittam punar anyatra nānātvena iva gṛhyate

original: ādhāreṣu padanyāsaṃ kṛtvopaiti tadāśrayam /
analyzed: ādhāreṣu pada nyāsam kṛtvā upaiti tad āśrayam

original: sa sādṛśyasya viṣaya ity anyair apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.406 //
analyzed: sa sādṛśyasya viṣayaḥ iti anyaiḥ apadiśyate

original: parāpekṣe yathā bhāve kāraṇākhyā pravartate /
analyzed: para apekṣe yathā bhāve kāraṇa ākhyā pravartate

original: tathānyādhigamāpekṣam upamānaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.407 //
analyzed: tathā anya adhigama apekṣam upamānam pracakṣate

original: gurugiśyapitāputra- kriyākālādayo yathā /
analyzed: kriyā kāla ādayaḥ yathā

original: vyavahārās tathaupamyam apy apekṣānibandhanam // BVaky_3,14.408 //
analyzed: vyavahārāḥ tathā aupamyam api apekṣā nibandhanam

original: śyāmatvam upamāne ced vṛttaṃ vṛttau prayujyate /
analyzed: śyāma tvam upamāne ced vṛttam vṛttau prayujyate

original: upameyaṃ samāsena bāhyaṃ tatrābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.409 //
analyzed: upameyam samāsena bāhyam tatra abhidhīyate

original: ṭābanta eva caitrādau śyāmāśabdas tathā bhavet /
analyzed: ṭāp antaḥ eva caitra ādau śyāmā śabdaḥ tathā bhavet

original: sūtre ca prathamābhāvān na śyāmādyupasarjanam // BVaky_3,14.410 //
analyzed: sūtre ca prathamā abhāvāt na śyāma ādi upasarjanam

original: atha tv ekavibhaktitvād guṇatvād vopasarjanam /
analyzed: atha tu eka vibhakti tvāt guṇa tvāt vā upasarjanam

original: naivaṃ tittirikalmāṣyām iṣṭaḥ strīpratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.411 //
analyzed: na evam tittirikalmāṣyām iṣṭaḥ strī pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: satiśiṣṭabalīyastvād bāhye ṅiṣi ca saty api /
analyzed: sati śiṣṭa balīyaḥ tvāt bāhye ṅiṣi ca sati api

original: upamānasvaro na syāt tasmāt stryantaḥ samasyate // BVaky_3,14.412 //
analyzed: upamāna svaraḥ na syāt tasmāt strī antaḥ samasyate

original: guṇe na copamānasthe sāpekṣatvaṃ prakalpate /
analyzed: guṇe na ca upamāna sthe sāpekṣa tvam prakalpate

original: pradhānasya tathā na syād vyāghrādau liṅgadarśanam // BVaky_3,14.413 //
analyzed: pradhānasya tathā na syāt vyāghra ādau liṅga darśanam

original: tasmāt sati guṇatve 'pi prādhānyaṃ vigrahāntare /
analyzed: tasmāt sati guṇa tve pi prādhānyam vigraha antare

original: naivaṃjātīyakaṃ śāstre saṃbhavaty upasarjanam // BVaky_3,14.414 //
analyzed: na evaṃjātīyakam śāstre saṃbhavati upasarjanam

original: upameyātmani śyāmo vartamāno 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: upameya ātmani śyāmaḥ vartamānaḥ abhidhīyate

original: upamāneṣv anirdiṣṭaḥ sāmarthyāt sa pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.415 //
analyzed: upamāneṣu a nirdiṣṭaḥ sāmarthyāt sa pratīyate

original: dravyamātre 'pi nirdiṣṭe candravaktre 'nugamyate /
analyzed: dravya mātre nirdiṣṭe

original: viśiṣṭa eva candrastho guṇo nopaplavādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.416 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ eva candra sthaḥ guṇaḥ na upaplava ādayaḥ

original: bhedabhāvanayaitac ca samāse 'py upavarṇyate /
analyzed: bheda bhāvanayā etat ca samāse pi upavarṇyate

original: viśiṣṭaguṇabhinne 'rthe padam anyat prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.417 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa guṇa bhinne rthe padam anyat prayujyate

original: yadi bhinnādhikaraṇo vacanād anugamyate /
analyzed: yadi bhinna adhikaraṇaḥ vacanāt anugamyate

original: mṛgīva capalety atra puṃvadbhāvo na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.418 //
analyzed: mṛgī iva capalā iti atra puṃvat bhāvaḥ na sidhyati

original: astrīpūrvapadatvāt tu puṃvadbhāvo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: a strī pūrva pada tvāt tu puṃvat bhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yathaiva mṛgadugdhādau na cet stryartho vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,14.419 //
analyzed: yathā eva mṛga dugdha ādau na ced strī arthaḥ vivakṣyate

original: śastrīva śastrīśyāmeti devadattaiva kathyate /
analyzed: śastrī iva śastrī śyāmā iti devadattā eva kathyate

original: tasyām evobhayaṃ tasmād ucyate śāstravigrahe // BVaky_3,14.420 //
analyzed: tasyām eva ubhayam tasmāt ucyate śāstra vigrahe

original: puṃvadbhāvasya siddhyarthaṃ pakṣe strīpratyayasya ca /
analyzed: puṃvat bhāvasya siddhi artham pakṣe strī pratyayasya ca

original: bahv apekṣyam atas tasyām ubhayapratipādanam // BVaky_3,14.421 //
analyzed: bahu apekṣyam atas tasyām ubhaya pratipādanam

original: śyāmā śastrī yathā śyāmā śastrīkalpeti cocyate /
analyzed: śyāmā śastrī yathā śyāmā śastrī kalpā iti ca ucyate

original: tatropamānetarayoḥ śyāmety etad apekṣyate // BVaky_3,14.422 //
analyzed: tatra upamāna itarayoḥ śyāmā iti etat apekṣyate

original: atha śyāmeva śastrīyaṃ śyāmety evaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: atha śyāmā iva śastrīyam śyāmā iti evam prayujyate

original: śastrī yatheyam śyāmeti tāvad eva pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.423 //
analyzed: śastrī yathā iyam śyāmā iti tāvat eva pratīyate

original: upalakṣaṇamātrārthā guṇasyāsya yadi śrutiḥ /
analyzed: upalakṣaṇa mātra arthā guṇasya asya yadi śrutiḥ

original: pṛthag dvayoḥ śruto 'py eṣa neṣṭasvārthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.424 //
analyzed: pṛthak dvayoḥ eṣa na iṣṭa sva arthasya vācakaḥ

original: upameyaṃ tu yad vācyaṃ tasya cet pratipādane /
analyzed: upameyam tu yat vācyam tasya ced pratipādane

original: savyāpārā guṇās tatra sarvasyoktiḥ sakṛcchrutau // BVaky_3,14.425 //
analyzed: sa vyāpārāḥ guṇāḥ tatra sarvasya uktiḥ sakṛt śrutau

original: prakārādhārabhedena viśeṣe samavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: prakāra ādhāra bhedena viśeṣe samavasthitaḥ

original: śabdāntarābhisaṃbandhe sāmānyavacanaḥ katham // BVaky_3,14.426 //
analyzed: śabda antara abhisaṃbandhe sāmānya vacanaḥ katham

original: sādṛśyamātraṃ sāmānyaṃ dviṣṭhaṃ kaiś cit pratīyate /
analyzed: sādṛśya mātram sāmānyam dviṣṭham kaiḥ cit pratīyate

original: guṇo bhede 'py abhedena dvivṛttir vā vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.427 //
analyzed: guṇaḥ bhede pi abhedena dvi vṛttiḥ vā vivakṣitaḥ

original: vyāpāro jātibhāgasya dravyayor vābhidhitsitaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ jāti bhāgasya dravyayoḥ vā abhidhitsitaḥ

original: rūpāt sāmānyavācitvaṃ prāg vā vṛtter udāhṛtam // BVaky_3,14.428 //
analyzed: rūpāt sāmānya vāci tvam prāk vā vṛtteḥ udāhṛtam

original: vyāghraśabdo yadā śauryāt puruṣārthe 'vatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: vyāghra śabdaḥ yadā śauryāt puruṣa arthe vatiṣṭhate

original: tadādhikaraṇābhedāt samāsasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.429 //
analyzed: tadā adhikaraṇa abhedāt samāsasya asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: śūraśabdaprayoge tu vyāghraśabdo mṛge sthitaḥ /
analyzed: śūra śabda prayoge tu vyāghra śabdaḥ mṛge sthitaḥ

original: bhinne 'dhikaraṇe vṛttes tatra naivāsti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.430 //
analyzed: bhinne dhikaraṇe vṛtteḥ tatra na eva asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇye 'pi guṇabhedasya saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇye pi guṇa bhedasya saṃbhavāt

original: prayogaḥ śūraśabdasya samāse 'py anuṣajyate // BVaky_3,14.431 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ śūra śabdasya samāse pi anuṣajyate

original: pūjopādhiś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ kutsanopādhayaś ca ye /
analyzed: pūjā upādhiḥ ca yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kutsana upādhayaḥ ca ye

original: teṣāṃ bhinnanimittatvān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.432 //
analyzed: teṣām bhinna nimitta tvāt niyama arthā punar śrutiḥ

original: asaṃbhave 'pi vā vṛtteḥ syād etal liṅgadarśanam /
analyzed: asaṃbhave vā vṛtteḥ syāt etat liṅga darśanam

original: acver iti yathā liṅgam abhāve 'pi bhṛśādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.433 //
analyzed: a cveḥ iti yathā liṅgam abhāve bhṛśa ādiṣu

original: vatyantāvayave vākye yad aupamyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: vati anta avayave vākye yat aupamyam pratīyate

original: tatpratyayavidhau sūtre nirdeśo 'yaṃ vicāryate // BVaky_3,14.434 //
analyzed: tad pratyaya vidhau sūtre nirdeśaḥ yam vicāryate

original: kriyety upādhiḥ prāthamyāt prakṛtyarthasya yady api /
analyzed: kriyā iti upādhiḥ prāthamyāt prakṛti arthasya yadi api

original: na prātipadikaṃ tatra kriyāvācy upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.435 //
analyzed: na prātipadikam tatra kriyā vāci upapadyate

original: sattvavṛttasya śeṣe vā tṛtīyā sādhane 'pi vā /
analyzed: sattva vṛttasya śeṣe vā tṛtīyā sādhane vā

original: tiṅām asattvavācitvād ubhayaṃ tan na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.436 //
analyzed: tiṅām asattva vāci tvāt ubhayam tat na vidyate

original: pākādayas tṛtīyāntāḥ sattvadharmasamanvayāt /
analyzed: pāka ādayaḥ tṛtīya antāḥ sattva dharma samanvayāt

original: na kriyety apadiśyante kṛtvo 'rthapratyaye yathā // BVaky_3,14.437 //
analyzed: na kriyā iti apadiśyante kṛtvas rtha pratyaye yathā

original: ye cāvyayakṛtaḥ ke cit kriyādharmasamanvitāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca avyaya kṛtaḥ ke cid kriyā dharma samanvitāḥ

original: teṣām asattvavācitvaṃ tiṅantair na viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.438 //
analyzed: teṣām asattva vāci tvam tiṅ antaiḥ na viśiṣyate

original: kṛtvasujviṣayā yāpi śayitavyādiṣu kriyā /
analyzed: yā api śayitavya ādiṣu kriyā

original: upamānopameyatvaṃ tatrātyantam asaṃbhavi // BVaky_3,14.439 //
analyzed: upamāna upameya tvam tatra atyantam asaṃbhavi

original: na kevalau dravyaguṇau tadvān vāpy upamīyate /
analyzed: na kevalau dravya guṇau tadvān vā api upamīyate

original: śayitavyādibhis teṣu nopamārtho 'sti kaś cana // BVaky_3,14.440 //
analyzed: śayitavya ādibhiḥ teṣu na upamā arthaḥ sti kaḥ cana

original: upamānopameyatve dravye cānuktadharmiṇi /
analyzed: upamāna upameya tve dravye ca anukta dharmiṇi

original: nimittatvena gamyante rūḍhayogāḥ kriyāguṇāḥ // BVaky_3,14.441 //
analyzed: nimitta tvena gamyante rūḍha yogāḥ kriyā guṇāḥ

original: hotavyasadṛśo hotety atrāpy artho na vidyate /
analyzed: hotavya sadṛśaḥ hotā iti atra api arthaḥ na vidyate

original: virodhāt kriyayā tasmāt kriyāvān nopamīyate // BVaky_3,14.442 //
analyzed: virodhāt kriyayā tasmāt kriyāvān na upamīyate

original: kriyā samānajātiyā tadbhāvān nopamīyate /
analyzed: kriyā tad bhāvāt na upamīyate

original: jātibhede 'pi pākena bhinnāḥ pākādayaḥ kriyāḥ // BVaky_3,14.443 //
analyzed: jāti bhede pi pākena bhinnāḥ pāka ādayaḥ kriyāḥ

original: ādhārabhedād bhinnāyām upamānasya saṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: ādhāra bhedāt bhinnāyām upamānasya saṃbhavaḥ

original: adhyetavyena viprāṇāṃ tulyam adhyayanaṃ viśām // BVaky_3,14.444 //
analyzed: adhyetavyena viprāṇām tulyam adhyayanam viśām

original: arthāt prakaraṇād vāpi yatrāpekṣyaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: arthāt prakaraṇāt vā api yatra apekṣyam pratīyate

original: sāmarthyād anapekṣasya tasya vṛttiḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.445 //
analyzed: sāmarthyāt anapekṣasya tasya vṛttiḥ prasajyate

original: tailapākena tulye ca ghṛtapāke vivakṣite /
analyzed: taila pākena tulye ca ghṛta pāke vivakṣite

original: kriyāvad api kāryāṇāṃ darśanāt pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.446 //
analyzed: kriyā vat api kāryāṇām darśanāt pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: atiṅgrahaṇam evaṃ tu samāsasya nivartakam /
analyzed: a tiṅ grahaṇam evam tu samāsasya nivartakam

original: gamanaṃ kārakasyeti ṇvuly anyasmin na saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,14.447 //
analyzed: gamanam kārakasya iti anyasmin na saṃbhavet

original: sarvasya parihārārthaṃ samudāyatvam āśritam /
analyzed: sarvasya parihāra artham samudāya tvam āśritam

original: śuddhāyāḥ saṃbhavān na syāt kriyāyā brāhmaṇādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.448 //
analyzed: śuddhāyāḥ saṃbhavāt na syāt kriyāyāḥ brāhmaṇa ādiṣu

original: upamānavivakṣāyāṃ svadharmaś ca nivartate /
analyzed: upamāna vivakṣāyām svadharmaḥ ca nivartate

original: kriyāyā na śrutād yasmād upamānaṃ samāpyate // BVaky_3,14.449 //
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ na śrutāt yasmāt upamānam samāpyate

original: tṛtīyo 'py āśrito bhedo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇo dvayoḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ pi āśritaḥ bhedaḥ dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dvayoḥ

original: vyāpāravān na kṛtsnasya sāmyaṃ kṛtsnena vidyate // BVaky_3,14.450 //
analyzed: vyāpāravān na kṛtsnasya sāmyam kṛtsnena vidyate

original: dravye vāpi kriyāyāṃ vā nimittāt tat prakalpate /
analyzed: dravye vā api kriyāyām vā nimittāt tat prakalpate

original: kriyāṇāṃ vidyamānatvād vṛttir na syād gavādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.451 //
analyzed: kriyāṇām vidyamāna tvāt vṛttiḥ na syāt go ādiṣu

original: abhāvāt kevalāyās tu tadvān arthaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: abhāvāt kevalāyāḥ tu tadvān arthaḥ pratīyate

original: pradhānāsaṃbhave yuktā lakṣaṇārthā kriyāśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.452 //
analyzed: pradhāna asaṃbhave yuktā lakṣaṇa arthā kriyā śrutiḥ

original: kriyāntareṣu sāpekṣāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ kriyāntare /
analyzed: kriyā antareṣu sāpekṣāḥ kriyā śabdāḥ kriyā antare

original: upakārāya gṛhyante yathaiva brāhmaṇādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.453 //
analyzed: upakārāya gṛhyante yathā eva brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ

original: yathā prakarṣaḥ sarvatra nimittāntarahetukaḥ /
analyzed: yathā prakarṣaḥ sarvatra nimitta antara hetukaḥ

original: dravyavad guṇaśabde 'pi sa nimittam apekṣate // BVaky_3,14.454 //
analyzed: dravya vat guṇa śabde pi sa nimittam apekṣate

original: yo ya uccāryate śabdaḥ sa svarūpanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ uccāryate śabdaḥ sa svarūpa nibandhanaḥ

original: yathā tathopamāneṣu vyapekṣa na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.455 //
analyzed: yathā tathā upamāneṣu vyapekṣa na nivartate

original: kriyāvṛttes tṛtīyāntasy- aivaṃ cāsaṃbhave sati /
analyzed: kriyā vṛtteḥ tṛtīyā antasya ā evam ca asaṃbhave sati

original: prasiddhanyāyakaraṇo bhāṣye yujir udāhṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.456 //
analyzed: prasiddha nyāya karaṇaḥ bhāṣye yujiḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: antarbhūte tu karaṇe prayogo na punar bhavet /
analyzed: antarbhūte tu karaṇe prayogaḥ na punar bhavet

original: nyāyenāyuktam ity atra jīvatau prāṇakarmavat // BVaky_3,14.457 //
analyzed: nyāyena ayuktam iti atra jīvatau prāṇa karma vat

original: śāstrābhyāsāc ca bhedo 'yam ayuktam iti varṇyate /
analyzed: śāstra abhyāsāt ca bhedaḥ yam ayuktam iti varṇyate

original: aśobhanam asaṃbaddham iti rūḍhir vyavasthitā // BVaky_3,14.458 //
analyzed: aśobhanam asaṃbaddham iti rūḍhiḥ vyavasthitā

original: vivibhaktiḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ praty upādhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vi vibhaktiḥ prakṛti artham prati upādhiḥ katham bhavet

original: vibhaktipariṇāme ca prakalpyaṃ viṣayāntaram // BVaky_3,14.459 //
analyzed: vibhakti pariṇāme ca prakalpyam viṣaya antaram

original: vibhaktyantarayogo hi yasya tad viṣayāntare /
analyzed: vibhakti antara yogaḥ hi yasya tat viṣaya antare

original: vibhaktyantarasaṃbandhaḥ sāmarthyād anumīyate // BVaky_3,14.460 //
analyzed: vibhakti antara saṃbandhaḥ sāmarthyāt anumīyate

original: sārūpyāt tu tad evedam iti tatropacaryate /
analyzed: sārūpyāt tu tat eva idam iti tatra upacaryate

original: śabdāntaraṃ vibhaktyā tu yuktaṃ śāstre tad aśrutam // BVaky_3,14.461 //
analyzed: śabda antaram vibhaktyā tu yuktam śāstre tat aśrutam

original: prakṛtiś cet tṛtīyāntā tenety asmāt pratīyate /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ ced tṛtīyā antā tena iti asmāt pratīyate

original: kriyeti prathamāntā sā kathaṃ bhavitum arhati // BVaky_3,14.462 //
analyzed: kriyā iti prathama antā sā katham bhavitum arhati

original: kriyayeti tṛtīyā ca prayoge kasya kalpyatām /
analyzed: kriyayā iti tṛtīyā ca prayoge kasya kalpyatām

original: tenety asya hi saṃbandhaḥ sūtrasthena na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.463 //
analyzed: tena iti asya hi saṃbandhaḥ sūtrasthena na vidyate

original: sopaskāreṣu sūtreṣu vākyaśeṣaḥ samarthyate /
analyzed: sa upaskāreṣu sūtreṣu vākyaśeṣaḥ samarthyate

original: tena yat tat tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyā cet seti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.464 //
analyzed: tena yat tat tṛtīyā antam kriyā ced sā iti gamyate

original: upādheḥ kasya cid vākye prayoga upalabhyate /
analyzed: upādheḥ kasya cit vākye prayogaḥ upalabhyate

original: pratīyamānadharmānyo na kadā cit prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.465 //
analyzed: pratīyamāna dharma anyaḥ na kadā cit prayujyate

original: nīlam utpalam ity atra na viśeṣye na bhedake /
analyzed: nīlam utpalam iti atra na viśeṣye na bhedake

original: kaś cit taddharmavacano vākye śabdaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.466 //
analyzed: kaḥ cit tad dharma vacanaḥ vākye śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: atyantānugamāt tatra na sūtre na ca vigrahe /
analyzed: atyanta anugamāt tatra na sūtre na ca vigrahe

original: vibhaktipariṇāmena kiṃ cid asti prayojanam // BVaky_3,14.467 //
analyzed: vibhakti pariṇāmena kim cit asti prayojanam

original: tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyety etad vigrahe na prayujyate /
analyzed: tṛtīyā antam kriyā iti etat vigrahe na prayujyate

original: yathā daṇḍaḥ praharaṇaṃ krīḍāyām iti dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.468 //
analyzed: yathā daṇḍaḥ praharaṇam krīḍāyām iti dṛśyate

original: ghavidhau yac ca saṃjñāyām iti sūtra udāhṛtam /
analyzed: gha vidhau yat ca saṃjñāyām iti sūtre udāhṛtam

original: upādānaṃ prayogeṣu tasyātyantaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.469 //
analyzed: upādānam prayogeṣu tasya atyantam na vidyate

original: yair aprayuktaiḥ saṃskāraḥ pradhāneṣu pratīyate /
analyzed: yaiḥ a prayuktaiḥ saṃskāraḥ pradhāneṣu pratīyate

original: te bhede 'pi vibhaktīnāṃ nirdiśyanta upādhayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.470 //
analyzed: te bhede vibhaktīnām nirdiśyante upādhayaḥ

original: samudāyeṣu vartante bhāvānāṃ sahacāriṇām /
analyzed: samudāyeṣu vartante bhāvānām sahacāriṇām

original: śabdās tat tv avivakṣāyāṃ samuccayavikalpayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.471 //
analyzed: śabdāḥ tat tu avivakṣāyām samuccaya vikalpayoḥ

original: samuccayas tu kriyate yeṣu pratyarthavṛttiṣu /
analyzed: samuccayaḥ tu kriyate yeṣu prati artha vṛttiṣu

original: bhedādhiṣṭhānayā yogas tesāṃ bhavati saṃkhyayā // BVaky_3,14.472 //
analyzed: bheda adhiṣṭhānayā yogaḥ tesām bhavati saṃkhyayā

original: sarvair viśiṣṭās tair arthair janyante sahacāribhiḥ /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ viśiṣṭāḥ taiḥ arthaiḥ janyante sahacāribhiḥ

original: buddhayaḥ pratipattṝṇāṃ śabdārthāṃs tān ato viduḥ // BVaky_3,14.473 //
analyzed: buddhayaḥ pratipattṝṇām śabda arthān tān atas viduḥ

original: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ pratyayeṣv arthāḥ sarva evopakārinaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ pratyayeṣu arthāḥ sarve eva upakārinaḥ

original: teṣāṃ pratyayarūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ śabdavācyatā // BVaky_3,14.474 //
analyzed: teṣām pratyaya rūpeṇa sarveṣām śabda vācya tā

original: kevalānāṃ tu bhāvānāṃ na rūpam avadhāryate /
analyzed: kevalānām tu bhāvānām na rūpam avadhāryate

original: anirūpitarūpeṣu teṣu śabdo na vartate // BVaky_3,14.475 //
analyzed: anirūpita rūpeṣu teṣu śabdaḥ na vartate

original: pūrvaśabdaprayogāc ca samūhān na nivartate /
analyzed: pūrva śabda prayogāt ca samūhāt na nivartate

original: vartate 'vayave nāpi nopāttaṃ tyajate kva cit // BVaky_3,14.476 //
analyzed: vartate vayave na api na upāttam tyajate kva cit

original: samudāyābhidhāyi ca yadi bhedaṃ viśeṣayet /
analyzed: samudāya abhidhāyi ca yadi bhedam viśeṣayet

original: tatrātulyavibhaktitvaṃ pūrvakāyādivad bhavet // BVaky_3,14.477 //
analyzed: tatra atulya vibhakti tvam pūrva kāya ādi vat bhavet

original: samūhe ca pradeśe ca pañcālā iti dṛśyate /
analyzed: samūhe ca pradeśe ca pañcālāḥ iti dṛśyate

original: tathā viśeṣaṇaṃ sarva ity etad upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.478 //
analyzed: tathā viśeṣaṇam sarve iti etat upapadyate

original: tathārdhapippalīty atra jātyantaranivṛttaye /
analyzed: tathā ardhapippalī iti atra jāti antara nivṛttaye

original: ardhaṃ ca pippalī ceti khande śabdaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.479 //
analyzed: ardham ca pippalī ca iti khande śabdaḥ pratīyate

original: pañcālānāṃ pradeśo 'pi bhinno janapadāntarāt /
analyzed: pañcālānām pradeśaḥ pi bhinnaḥ janapada antarāt

original: tatrānyasya nivṛttyarthe śabde bhedo na gamyate // BVaky_3,14.480 //
analyzed: tatra anyasya nivṛtti arthe śabde bhedaḥ na gamyate

original: prasiddhās tu viśeṣeṇa samudāye vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhāḥ tu viśeṣeṇa samudāye vyavasthitāḥ

original: pradeśe darśanaṃ teṣām arthaprakaraṇādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.481 //
analyzed: pradeśe darśanam teṣām artha prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: yad upavyañjanaṃ jāteḥ sahacāri ca karmasu /
analyzed: yat upavyañjanam jāteḥ sahacāri ca karmasu

original: tatra vā rūḍhasaṃbandhaṃ yat prāyeṇopalakṣitam // BVaky_3,14.482 //
analyzed: tatra vā rūḍha saṃbandham yat prāyeṇa upalakṣitam

original: samudāyaḥ pradeśo vety evaṃ tasminn anāśrite /
analyzed: samudāyaḥ pradeśaḥ vā iti evam tasmin anāśrite

original: arthātmany aviśeṣeṇa vartante brāhmaṇādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.483 //
analyzed: artha ātmani aviśeṣeṇa vartante brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ

original: yaś ca tulyaśrutir dṛṣṭaḥ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca tulya śrutiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ

original: tenopacaritaikatvaṃ pradeśe 'py upalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.484 //
analyzed: tena upacarita eka tvam pradeśe pi upalabhyate

original: saṃskārād upaghātād vā vṛtto 'ktaparimāṇake /
analyzed: saṃskārāt upaghātāt vā vṛttaḥ kta parimāṇake

original: tailādau jātiśabdo 'tra sāmarthyād avasīyate // BVaky_3,14.485 //
analyzed: taila ādau jāti śabdaḥ tra sāmarthyāt avasīyate

original: na jātiguṇaśabdeṣu mūrtibhedo vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: na jāti guṇa śabdeṣu mūrti bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: te jātiguṇasaṃbandha- bhedamātranibandhanāḥ // BVaky_3,14.486 //
analyzed: te jāti guṇa saṃbandha bheda mātra nibandhanāḥ

original: kṛṣṇādivyapadeśaś ca sarvāvayavavṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ādi vyapadeśaḥ ca sarva avayava vṛttibhiḥ

original: guṇais te 'py ekadeśasthāḥ paṭādīnāṃ viśeṣakāḥ // BVaky_3,14.487 //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ te pi eka deśa sthāḥ paṭa ādīnām viśeṣakāḥ

original: paṭāvayavavṛttās tu yadā tatra paṭādayaḥ /
analyzed: paṭa avayava vṛttāḥ tu yadā tatra paṭa ādayaḥ

original: tadā tailādivat teṣāṃ jātiśabdatvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.488 //
analyzed: tadā taila ādi vat teṣām jāti śabda tvam ucyate

original: nivṛttyarthā śrutir yeṣāṃ bhedas teṣv anapekṣitaḥ /
analyzed: nivṛtti arthā śrutiḥ yeṣām bhedaḥ teṣu an apekṣitaḥ

original: pradeśe samudāye vā guṇo 'nyeṣāṃ nivartakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.489 //
analyzed: pradeśe samudāye vā guṇaḥ nyeṣām nivartakaḥ

original: brāhmaṇādhyayane tatra vartate brāhmaṇaśrutiḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa adhyayane tatra vartate brāhmaṇa śrutiḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ hi kṣatriyādhyayanādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.490 //
analyzed: sādṛśyam tatra dṛṣṭam hi kṣatriya adhyayana ādibhiḥ

original: brāhmaṇādhyayane vṛttir yadi syād brāhmaṇaśruteḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa adhyayane vṛttiḥ yadi syāt brāhmaṇa śruteḥ

original: vaktavyaṃ kena dharmeṇa tulyatvaṃ kriyayor iti // BVaky_3,14.491 //
analyzed: vaktavyam kena dharmeṇa tulya tvam kriyayoḥ iti

original: adhyetari yadā vṛttir ucyate brāhmaṇaśruteḥ /
analyzed: adhyetari yadā vṛttiḥ ucyate brāhmaṇa śruteḥ

original: nimittatvaṃ tadopaiti kriyaivādhyetari sthitā // BVaky_3,14.492 //
analyzed: nimitta tvam tadā upaiti kriyā eva adhyetari sthitā

original: simhaśabdena saṃbandhe gauryamātrābhidhāyinā /
analyzed: simha śabdena saṃbandhe gaurya mātra abhidhāyinā

original: caitrāt ṣaṣṭhī prasajyeta yoge śattryādibhir yathā // BVaky_3,14.493 //
analyzed: caitrāt ṣaṣṭhī prasajyeta yoge śattri ādibhiḥ yathā

original: brāhmaṇāyeva dātavyaṃ vaiśyāyety evamādiṣu /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāya iva dātavyam vaiśyāya iti evamādiṣu

original: saṃpradānādiyogaś ca kriyāmātre na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.494 //
analyzed: saṃpradāna ādi yogaḥ ca kriyā mātre na kalpate

original: kriyāmātrābhidhāyitvād avyayeṣu vater na ca /
analyzed: kriyā mātra abhidhāyi tvāt avyayeṣu vateḥ na ca

original: pāṭhaḥ kadā cit kartavyas tulyau pakṣāv ubhau yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.495 //
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ kadā cit kartavyaḥ tulyau pakṣau ubhau yatas

original: jahāti jātiṃ dravyaṃ vā tasmān nāvayave sthitaḥ /
analyzed: jahāti jātim dravyam vā tasmāt na avayave sthitaḥ

original: kriyāyās tu śrutir yasmāt tadvaty arthe 'vatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.496 //
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ tu śrutiḥ yasmāt tadvati arthe vatiṣṭhate

original: akriyāṇāṃ nivṛttyarthā,
analyzed: akriyāṇām nivṛtti arthā

original: yataś cātra kriyāśrutiḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca atra kriyā śrutiḥ

original: kriyopalakṣite tasmāt kriyāśabdaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.497 //
analyzed: kriyā upalakṣite tasmāt kriyā śabdaḥ pratīyate

original: hotavyādiṣu yasmāc ca kriyānyā brāhmaṇādivat /
analyzed: hotavya ādiṣu yasmāt ca kriyā anyā brāhmaṇa ādi vat

original: apekṣaṇīyā śuddhe 'rthe tasmād vṛttir na kasya cit // BVaky_3,14.498 //
analyzed: apekṣaṇīyā śuddhe rthe tasmāt vṛttiḥ na kasya cit

original: sarvaṃ vāpy ekadeśo vā yasminn āśriyate kva cit /
analyzed: sarvam vā api eka deśaḥ vā yasmin āśriyate kva cit

original: viśeṣavṛttiṃ taṃ sarvam āhur bhede vyavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.499 //
analyzed: viśeṣa vṛttim tam sarvam āhuḥ bhede vyavasthitam

original: samuccayo vikalpo vā prakārāḥ sarva eva vā /
analyzed: samuccayaḥ vikalpaḥ vā prakārāḥ sarve eva vā

original: viśeṣā iti varṇyante sāmānyaṃ vāvikalpitam // BVaky_3,14.500 //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ iti varṇyante sāmānyam vā avikalpitam

original: na hi brāhmaṇa ity atra bhedaḥ kaś cid apāśritaḥ /
analyzed: na hi brāhmaṇaḥ iti atra bhedaḥ kaḥ cit apāśritaḥ

original: apākṛto vā tenāyaṃ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.501 //
analyzed: apākṛtaḥ vā tena ayam samudāye vyavasthitaḥ

original: kriyā tv āśrīyate yasmin sa bhedo 'dhyavasīyate /
analyzed: kriyā tu āśrīyate yasmin sa bhedaḥ dhī avasīyate

original: tathānyathā sarvathā cety aprayoge na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.502 //
analyzed: tathā anyathā sarvathā ca iti a prayoge na vidyate

original: upamāne kriyāvṛttim upameye kriyāśrutiḥ /
analyzed: upamāne kriyā vṛttim upameye kriyā śrutiḥ

original: pratyāyayantī bhedasya karotīva padārthatām // BVaky_3,14.503 //
analyzed: pratyāyayantī bhedasya karoti iva padārtha tām

original: vyāpāreṇaiva sādṛśye vyāpārasya vivakṣite /
analyzed: vyāpāreṇa eva sādṛśye vyāpārasya vivakṣite

original: kriyāvadvacanāc chabdāt pratyayaḥ pratipādyate // BVaky_3,14.504 //
analyzed: kriyāvat vacanāt śabdāt pratyayaḥ pratipādyate

original: kriyāvato 'pi sādṛśye vaktum iṣṭe kriyāvatā /
analyzed: sādṛśye vaktum iṣṭe kriyāvatā

original: adhyetā brāhmaṇa iva pratyayo na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.505 //
analyzed: adhyetā brāhmaṇaḥ iva pratyayaḥ na nivartate

original: adhīte tulya ity evaṃ puṃlliṅgena viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: adhīte tulyaḥ iti evam puṃlliṅgena viśeṣaṇam

original: kriyāvati kriyāyāṃ tu tulyaśabde napuṃsakam // BVaky_3,14.506 //
analyzed: kriyāvati kriyāyām tu tulya śabde napuṃsakam

original: prakṛtyarthe viśiṣṭe 'pi pratyayārthāviśeṣaṇāt /
analyzed: prakṛti arthe viśiṣṭe pi pratyaya artha a viśeṣaṇāt

original: putreṇa tulyaḥ kapila iti vṛttiḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.507 //
analyzed: putreṇa tulyaḥ kapilaḥ iti vṛttiḥ prasajyate

original: yāḥ putre rūḍhasaṃbandhāḥ kriyā loke vivakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ putre rūḍha saṃbandhāḥ kriyāḥ loke vivakṣitāḥ

original: tābhiḥ kriyāvataḥ putrād guṇatulye vatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.508 //
analyzed: tābhiḥ kriyāvataḥ putrāt guṇa tulye vatiḥ bhavet

original: antarbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ ca rūḍhiśabdeṣu yady api /
analyzed: antarbhūtam nimittam ca rūḍhi śabdeṣu yadi api

original: kriyās tu sahacāriṇyo rūḍhāḥ santi padārthavat // BVaky_3,14.509 //
analyzed: kriyāḥ tu sahacāriṇyaḥ rūḍhāḥ santi padārtha vat

original: kramaṃ tu yadi bādhitvā pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: kramam tu yadi bādhitvā pratyaya artha viśeṣaṇam

original: pradhānānugrahāt sāmyād vibhakteś cāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.510 //
analyzed: pradhāna anugrahāt sāmyāt vibhakteḥ ca avatiṣṭhate

original: prakṛter aviśiṣṭatvāt kriyātulye prasajyate /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ aviśiṣṭa tvāt kriyā tulye prasajyate

original: putrādau guṇaśabdebhyaḥ pūrvoktasya viparyaye // BVaky_3,14.511 //
analyzed: putra ādau guṇa śabdebhyaḥ pūrva uktasya viparyaye

original: sthūlena tulyo yātīti bahiraṅgā kriyāśrutiḥ /
analyzed: sthūlena tulyaḥ yāti iti bahis aṅgā kriyā śrutiḥ

original: animittaṃ vates tulyaṃ yātīty atreṣyate vatiḥ // BVaky_3,14.512 //
analyzed: animittam vateḥ tulyam yāti iti atra iṣyate vatiḥ

original: dvayaṃ viśeṣyate tena yad ekatra viśeṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: dvayam viśeṣyate tena yat ekatra viśeṣaṇam

original: tulyaśabdo hi taṃ dharmam ubhayastham apekṣate // BVaky_3,14.513 //
analyzed: tulya śabdaḥ hi tam dharmam ubhayastham apekṣate

original: ekaḥ samāno dharmaś ced upamānopameyayoḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ samānaḥ dharmaḥ ced upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: tulayā saṃmitaṃ tulyam iti tatropapadyate // BVaky_3,14.514 //
analyzed: tulayā saṃmitam tulyam iti tatra upapadyate

original: sūtre śrutaś ca dviṣṭho 'sāv abhedena pratīyate /
analyzed: sūtre śrutaḥ ca saḥ abhedena pratīyate

original: na ca sāmānyaśabdatvād aśrutā gamyate kriyā // BVaky_3,14.515 //
analyzed: na ca sāmānya śabda tvāt aśrutā gamyate kriyā

original: aśrutāś ca pratīyante nideśasthāyitādayaḥ /
analyzed: aśrutāḥ ca pratīyante nideśa sthāyi tā ādayaḥ

original: ye dharmā niyatās teṣāṃ putrādiṣu na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.516 //
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ niyatāḥ teṣām putra ādiṣu na vidyate

original: anāśritakriyas tasmān na tulyo 'sti kriyāvatā /
analyzed: anāśrita kriyaḥ tasmāt na tulyaḥ sti kriyāvatā

original: kriyāyāḥ śravaṇe sāpi kriyāvattā pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.517 //
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ śravaṇe sā api kriyāvat tā pratīyate

original: dvayoḥ pratividhānāc ca jyāyastvam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: dvayoḥ pratividhānāt ca jyāyaḥ tvam abhidhīyate

original: nityāsattvābhidhāyitvāt pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe // BVaky_3,14.518 //
analyzed: nitya asattva abhidhāyi tvāt pratyaya artha viśeṣaṇe

original: asattvabhūto vyāpāraḥ kevalaḥ pratyaye yataḥ /
analyzed: asattva bhūtaḥ vyāpāraḥ kevalaḥ pratyaye yatas

original: vidyate lakṣaṇārthatvaṃ nāsti tena kriyāśruteḥ // BVaky_3,14.519 //
analyzed: vidyate lakṣaṇa artha tvam na asti tena kriyā śruteḥ

original: kriyāvatas tu grahaṇāt prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇe /
analyzed: kriyāvataḥ tu grahaṇāt prakṛti artha viśeṣaṇe

original: kriyāmātrena tulyatve siddhāsattvābhidhāyitā // BVaky_3,14.520 //
analyzed: kriyā mātrena tulya tve siddhāsattva abhidhāyi tā

original: yadā kriyānimittaṃ tu sādṛśyaṃ syāt kriyāvatoḥ /
analyzed: yadā kriyā nimittam tu sādṛśyam syāt kriyāvatoḥ

original: kriyāvato 'bhidheyatvāt tadā dravyābhidhāyitā // BVaky_3,14.521 //
analyzed: kriyāvataḥ bhidheya tvāt tadā dravya abhidhāyi tā

original: avyayeṣu vateḥ pāṭhaḥ kāryas tatra svarādivat /
analyzed: avyayeṣu vateḥ pāṭhaḥ kāryaḥ tatra svara ādi vat

original: brāhmaṇena samo 'dhyetety atra ca pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.522 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇena samaḥ dhyeta iti atra ca pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca vatyarthenāpadiśyate /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca vati arthena apadiśyate

original: tulyam ity anyathā kalpyo vākyaśeṣo 'śruto bhavet // BVaky_3,14.523 //
analyzed: tulyam iti anyathā kalpyaḥ vākyaśeṣaḥ śrutaḥ bhavet

original: kriyāvatoś ca sādṛśye pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe /
analyzed: kriyāvatoḥ ca sādṛśye pratyaya artha viśeṣaṇe

original: adhyetrā sadṛśo 'dhyetety atra nāsti vater vidhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.524 //
analyzed: adhyetrā sadṛśaḥ dhyetā iti atra na asti vateḥ vidhiḥ

original: tulyārthair iti yā tasyās tṛtīyāyā na bhidyate /
analyzed: tulya arthaiḥ iti yā tasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ na bhidyate

original: artho bhede 'pi sarvābhir itarābhir vibhaktibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.525 //
analyzed: arthaḥ bhede pi sarvābhiḥ itarābhiḥ vibhaktibhiḥ

original: bhojyate brāhmaṇa iva tulyaṃ bhuktaṃ dvijātinā /
analyzed: bhojyate brāhmaṇaḥ iva tulyam bhuktam dvijātinā

original: paśyati brāhmaṇam iva tulyaṃ vipreṇa paśyati // BVaky_3,14.526 //
analyzed: paśyati brāhmaṇam iva tulyam vipreṇa paśyati

original: brāhmaṇeneva vijñātaṃ tulyaṃ jñātaṃ dvijātinā /
analyzed: brāhmaṇena iva vijñātam tulyam jñātam dvijātinā

original: dīyatāṃ brāhmaṇāyeva tulyaṃ vipreṇa dīyatām // BVaky_3,14.527 //
analyzed: dīyatām brāhmaṇāya iva tulyam vipreṇa dīyatām

original: brāhmaṇād iva vaiśyāt tvam adhīṣvādhyayanaṃ bahu /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāt iva vaiśyāt tvam adhīṣva adhyayanam bahu

original: ity evamādibhir bhedas tṛtīyāyā na kaś cana // BVaky_3,14.528 //
analyzed: iti evamādibhiḥ bhedaḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ na kaḥ cana

original: tulyaṃ madhurayādhīye mātrā tulyaṃ smarāmi tām /
analyzed: tulyam madhurayā adhīye mātrā tulyam smarāmi tām

original: madhurāyāś ca mātuś ca kathaṃ sādṛśyakalpanā // BVaky_3,14.529 //
analyzed: madhurāyāḥ ca mātuḥ ca katham sādṛśya kalpanā

original: madhurāviṣayaḥ pāṭhaḥ smaraṇaṃ mātṛkarmakam /
madhurāmātṛśabdābhyām abhedenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.530 //
analyzed: madhurā mātṛ śabdābhyām abhedena abhidhīyate

original: uṣṭrāvayavatulyeṣu mukheṣūṣṭraśrutir yathā /
analyzed: uṣṭra avayava tulyeṣu mukheṣu uṣṭra śrutiḥ yathā

original: vartate gṛhatulye ca prāsāde madhurāśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.531 //
analyzed: vartate gṛha tulye ca prāsāde madhura aśrutiḥ

original: yathādhyayanayoḥ sāmyam adhyetror apadiśyate /
analyzed: yathā adhyayanayoḥ sāmyam adhyetroḥ apadiśyate

original: tathā kriyāgatair dharmair ucyante sādhanāśrayāḥ // BVaky_3,14.532 //
analyzed: tathā kriyā gataiḥ dharmaiḥ ucyante sādhana āśrayāḥ

original: ivārthe yac ca vacanaṃ pūrvasūtre ca yo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: iva arthe yat ca vacanam pūrva sūtre ca yaḥ vidhiḥ

original: kriyāśabdaśrutau bhedo na kaś cid vidyate tayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.533 //
analyzed: kriyā śabda śrutau bhedaḥ na kaḥ cit vidyate tayoḥ

original: yady apy upādhir anyatra niyato na prayujyate /
analyzed: yadi api upādhiḥ anyatra niyataḥ na prayujyate

original: rūpābhedāt tv anirjñātā kriyātra śrūyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.534 //
analyzed: rūpa abhedāt tu anirjñātā kriyā atra śrūyate punar

original: yathā vyutparayaḥ pucchau kyaṅante sudurādayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vyut parayaḥ pucchau kyaṅ ante su dura ādayaḥ

original: saty api pratyayārthatve bhedābhāvād udāhṛtāḥ // BVaky_3,14.535 //
analyzed: sati api pratyaya artha tve bheda abhāvāt udāhṛtāḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati pūrveṇa siddho 'trāpi vater vidhiḥ /
analyzed: evam ca sati pūrveṇa siddhaḥ vateḥ vidhiḥ

original: niyame vābhidhāne vā bhidyate na kriyāśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.536 //
analyzed: niyame vā abhidhāne vā bhidyate na kriyā śrutiḥ

original: ive dravyādiviṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ punar ucyate /
analyzed: iveḥ dravya ādi viṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ punar ucyate

original: kriyāṇām eva sadṛśve pūrvasūtre vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.537 //
analyzed: kriyāṇām eva sadṛśve pūrva sūtre vidhīyate

original: madhurāyām iva gṛhā brāhmaṇasyeva pāṇḍurāḥ /
analyzed: madhurāyām iva gṛhāḥ brāhmaṇasya iva pāṇḍurāḥ

original: ity atra dravyaguṇayoḥ pūrveṇa na vatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.538 //
analyzed: iti atra dravya guṇayoḥ pūrveṇa na vatiḥ bhavet

original: ārambhasyākriyārthatve nārtho yogena vidyate /
analyzed: ārambhasya a kriyā artha tve na arthaḥ yogena vidyate

original: ṛte kriyāyā grahaṇāt pūrvayogena sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.539 //
analyzed: ṛte kriyāyāḥ grahaṇāt pūrva yogena sidhyati

original: madhurāvayave vṛttir vvākhyātā madhurāśruteḥ /
analyzed: madhura avayave vṛttiḥ vvā ākhyātā madhura āśruteḥ

original: brāhmaṇāvayavān dantān vakṣyati brāhmaṇaśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.540 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa avayavān dantān vakṣyati brāhmaṇa śrutiḥ

original: na kā cid ivayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino /
analyzed: na kā cit iva yoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhinaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate tatra pūrveṇa pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.541 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate tatra pūrveṇa pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: ādhikyaṃ tulyaśabdena saṃbandha upajāyate /
analyzed: ādhikyam tulya śabdena saṃbandhaḥ upajāyate

analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī tṛtīye tatra staḥ tulya śabdaḥ hi vācakaḥ

original: ivaśabdaprayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino vinā /
analyzed: iva śabda prayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhinaḥ vinā

original: nādhikyam upamāne 'sti dyotakaḥ sa prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.543 //
analyzed: na ādhikyam upamāne sti dyotakaḥ sa prayujyate

original: ive yo vyatireko 'tra sa prāsādādihetukaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sa prāsāda ādi hetukaḥ

original: tulye tadviṣayāpekṣam ādhikyam upajāyate // BVaky_3,14.544 //
analyzed: tulye tad viṣaya apekṣam ādhikyam upajāyate

original: gavayena samo 'nadvān iti vṛttis tathā bhavet /
analyzed: gavayena samaḥ nadvān iti vṛttiḥ tathā bhavet

original: na tv asti gaur ivety atra vyatireka ivāśrayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.545 //
analyzed: na tu asti gauḥ iva iti atra vyatirekaḥ iva āśrayaḥ

original: upameyena saṃbandhāt prāk prāsādādihetuke /
analyzed: upameyena saṃbandhāt prāk prāsāda ādi hetuke
