analyzed: vyatireke vateḥ bhāvaḥ na tulya ārtha tva hetuke

original: ivaśabdena saṃbandhe na tṛtīyā vidhīyate /
analyzed: iva śabdena saṃbandhe na tṛtīyā vidhīyate

original: prakṛtāṃ tām atas tyaktvā vibhaktyantaraṃ āśritam // BVaky_3,14.547 //
analyzed: prakṛtām tām atas tyaktvā vibhakti antaram āśritam

original: saptamy api na tatrāsti jñāpakārthā tu sā kṛtā /
analyzed: saptamī api na tatra asti jñāpaka arthā tu sā kṛtā

original: iṣṭā sā śeṣaviṣaye niyatāsu vibhaktiṣu // BVaky_3,14.548 //
analyzed: iṣṭā sā śeṣa viṣaye niyatāsu vibhaktiṣu

original: yadi tu vyatirekeṇa viṣaye 'smin vibhaktayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu vyatirekeṇa viṣaye smin vibhaktayaḥ

original: pravarteraṃs tṛtīyaiva vyabhicāraṃ pradarśayet // BVaky_3,14.549 //
analyzed: pravarteran tṛtīyā eva vyabhicāram pradarśayet

original: vyabhicāre tathā siddhe saptamīgrahaṇād vinā /
analyzed: vyabhicāre tathā siddhe saptamī grahaṇāt vinā

original: saptamy evocyate sarvā na santy anyā vibhaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.550 //
analyzed: saptamī eva ucyate sarvāḥ na santi anyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ

original: atyantam atra viṣaye saptamyā jñāpakārthayā /
analyzed: atyantam atra viṣaye saptamyā jñāpaka arthayā

original: bādhitā vinivarteta ṣaṣṭhī sā gṛhyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.551 //
analyzed: bādhitā vinivarteta ṣaṣṭhī sā gṛhyate punar

original: pūrvābhyām eva yogābhyāṃ vigrahāntarakalpanāt /
analyzed: pūrvābhyām eva yogābhyām vigraha antara kalpanāt

original: arhārthe 'pi vatiḥ siddhaḥ sa tv ekena nidarśyate // BVaky_3,14.552 //
analyzed: arha arthe pi vatiḥ siddhaḥ sa tu ekena nidarśyate

original: tena tulyam iti prāpte kriyopādhiḥ prasidhyati /
analyzed: tena tulyam iti prāpte kriyā upādhiḥ prasidhyati

original: rājavad vartate rājety atra bhede vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.553 //
analyzed: rāja vat vartate rājā iti atra bhede vivakṣite

original: rājatvena prasiddhā ye pṛthuprabhṛtayo nṛpāḥ /
analyzed: rāja tvena prasiddhāḥ ye pṛthu prabhṛtayaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhirāntās te 'nyeṣām upamānaṃ mahīkṣitām // BVaky_3,14.554 //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira antāḥ te ni eṣām upamānam mahīkṣitām

original: siddhyasiddhikṛto bheda upamānopameyayoḥ /
analyzed: siddhi asiddhi kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: sarvatraiva yato 'siddhaṃ prasiddhenopamīyate // BVaky_3,14.555 //
analyzed: sarvatra eva yatas siddham prasiddhena upamīyate

original: rājavad rūpam asyeti rājany eva vivakṣite /
analyzed: rājavat rūpam asya iti rājani eva vivakṣite

original: akriyārthena yogena dvitīyena bhaviṣyati // BVaky_3,14.556 //
analyzed: akriyā arthena yogena dvitīyena bhaviṣyati

original: upamānāvivakṣāyāṃ niyamārtho 'yam ucyate /
analyzed: upamāna avivakṣāyām niyama arthaḥ yam ucyate

original: dharmo 'rhatikriyākartā tadarthaṃ vacanaṃ punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.557 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ rhati kriyā kartā tad artham vacanam punar

original: kṛtahastavad ity etat prasiddheṣv eva dṛśyate /
analyzed: kṛtahasta vat iti etat prasiddheṣu eva dṛśyate

original: rājatvena prasiddhe ca rājñi rājavad ity api // BVaky_3,14.558 //
analyzed: rāja tvena prasiddhe ca rājñi rāja vat iti api

original: arājñi yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭo 'tyantam asaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: a rājñi yeṣām dharmāṇām dṛṣṭaḥ utyantam asaṃbhavaḥ

original: te rājani niyamyante tyajyante vyabhicāriṇaḥ // BVaky_3,14.559 //
analyzed: te rājani niyamyante tyajyante vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: arhateś ca kriyā kartrī yā tasyāṃ vatir iṣyate /
analyzed: arhateḥ ca kriyā kartrī yā tasyām vatiḥ iṣyate

original: rājānam arhati cchattram iti na tv evamādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.560 //
analyzed: rājānam arhati chattram iti na tu evamādiṣu

original: prayuktānāṃ hi śabdānāṃ śāstreṇānugamaḥ satām /
analyzed: prayuktānām hi śabdānām śāstreṇa anugamaḥ satām

original: chattrādyarthe tu vacane pratyākhyānaṃ na saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,14.561 //
analyzed: chattra ādi arthe tu vacane pratyākhyānam na saṃbhavet

original: tadarham iti nārabdhaṃ sūtraṃ vyākaraṇāntare /
analyzed: tad arham iti na ārabdham sūtram vyākaraṇa antare

original: saṃbhavaty upamātrāpi bhedasya parikalpanāt // BVaky_3,14.562 //
analyzed: saṃbhavati upamātrā api bhedasya parikalpanāt

original: ekasya kāryanirjñānāt siddhasya viṣayāntare /
analyzed: ekasya kārya nirjñānāt siddhasya viṣaya antare

original: taddharmatvavivakṣāyāṃ buddhyā bhedaḥ prakalpyate // BVaky_3,14.563 //
analyzed: tad dharma tva vivakṣāyām buddhyāḥ bhedaḥ prakalpyate

original: sūtrārambhān na caitasmād ivaśabdasya vidyate /
analyzed: sūtra ārambhāt na ca etasmāt ivaśabdasya vidyate

original: prayogaḥ so 'pi caitasya viṣaye vidyate vateḥ // BVaky_3,14.564 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ saḥ u pi ca etasya viṣaye vidyate vateḥ

original: dasyuhendra ivety etad aindramantre prayujyate /
analyzed: dasyu hā indraḥ iva iti etat aindra mantre prayujyate

original: anyatra dṛṣṭakarmendro yathety asmin vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.565 //
analyzed: anyatra dṛṣṭa karmā indraḥ yathā iti asmin vivakṣite

original: pūrvām avasthām āśritya yāvasthā vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: pūrvām avasthām āśritya yā avasthā vyapadiśyate

original: sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti tatraivam abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.566 //
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ tvam tava eva iti tatra evam abhidhīyate

original: prasiddhabhedaṃ yatrānyad upamānaṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: prasiddha bhedam yatra anyat upamānam na vidyate

original: upameyasya tatrātmā svabuddhyā pravibhajyate // BVaky_3,14.567 //
analyzed: upameyasya tatra ātmā sva buddhyā pravibhajyate

original: yo 'pi svābhāviko bhedaḥ so 'pi buddhinibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pi svābhāvikaḥ bhedaḥ saḥ pi buddhi nibandhanaḥ

original: tenāsmin viṣaye bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.568 //
analyzed: tena asmin viṣaye bhinnam abhinnam vā na vidyate

original: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī ceti darśayan bhedahetubhiḥ /
analyzed: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī ca iti darśayan bheda hetubhiḥ

original: caitram īdṛśam ity āha buddhyavasthāparigrahāt // BVaky_3,14.569 //
analyzed: caitram īdṛśam iti āha buddhi avasthā parigrahāt

original: etaiḥ śabdair yathābhūtaḥ pratyayātmopajāyate /
analyzed: etaiḥ śabdaiḥ yathā bhūtaḥ pratyaya ātmā upajāyate

original: tatpratyayānukāreṇa viṣayo 'py upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.570 //
analyzed: tad pratyaya anukāreṇa viṣayaḥ pi upapadyate

original: buddhyavasthāvibhāgena bhedakāryaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: buddhi avasthā vibhāgena bheda kāryam pratīyate

original: janyanta iva śabdānām arthāḥ sarve vivakṣayā // BVaky_3,14.571 //
analyzed: janyante iva śabdānām arthāḥ sarve vivakṣayā

original: tathāvidhe 'pi bāhye 'rthe bhidyante yatra buddhayaḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidhe pi bāhye rthe bhidyante yatra buddhayaḥ

original: na tatra kaś cit sādṛśyaṃ sad api pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.572 //
analyzed: na tatra kaḥ cit sādṛśyam sat api pratipadyate

original: atyantaṃ viṣaye bhinne yāvat prakhyā na bhidyate /
analyzed: atyantam viṣaye bhinne yāvat prakhyā na bhidyate

original: na tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ kasya cid vinivartate // BVaky_3,14.573 //
analyzed: na tāvat pratyabhijñānam kasya cit vinivartate

original: ayam eva tu sūtreṇa bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva tu sūtreṇa bhedaḥ bhedena darśitaḥ

original: prasiddham api durjñānam abudhaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.574 //
analyzed: prasiddham api durjñānam abudhaḥ pratipadyate

original: vaiyākaraṇavad brūte na vaiyākaraṇaḥ sadā /
analyzed: vaiyākaraṇa vat brūte na vaiyākaraṇaḥ sadā

original: vaiyākaraṇavad brūṣvety ataḥ so 'py abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.575 //
analyzed: vaiyākaraṇa vat brūṣva iti atas saḥ u pi abhidhīyate

original: ke cit pumāṃso bhāṣante strīvat puṃvac ca yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ke cit pumāṃsaḥ bhāṣante strī vat pum vat ca yoṣitaḥ

original: vyabhicāre svadharmo 'pi punas tenopadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.576 //
analyzed: vyabhicāre svadharmaḥ punar tena upadiśyate

original: sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti loke yad abhidhīyate /
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ tvam tava eva iti loke yat abhidhīyate

original: upamānāntaraṃ tatra prasaktaṃ vinivartate // BVaky_3,14.577 //
analyzed: upamāna antaram tatra prasaktam vinivartate

original: yuktam aupayikaṃ rājña ity arthasya nidarśane /
analyzed: yuktam aupayikam rājñaḥ iti arthasya nidarśane

original: upamānāvivakṣāyāṃ tadarham iti paṭhyate // BVaky_3,14.578 //
analyzed: upamāna avivakṣāyām tad arham iti paṭhyate

original: prasaktānuprasaktas tu vatiśeṣo 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: prasakta anuprasaktaḥ tu vati śeṣaḥ abhidhīyate

original: upamānābhisaṃbandhād asmin vatir udāhṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.579 //
analyzed: upamāna abhisaṃbandhāt asmin vatiḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: pradhānakalpanābhāve guṇaśabdasya darśanāt /
analyzed: pradhāna kalpanā abhāve guṇa śabdasya darśanāt

original: upasargād vatau siddhā dhātau dhātvarthakalpanā // BVaky_3,14.580 //
analyzed: upasargāt vatau siddhā dhātau dhātu artha kalpanā

original: svaṃ rūpam iti caitasminn arthasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: svam rūpam iti ca etasmin arthasya api parigrahaḥ

original: rūpavaj jñāpitas tasmād āsanno 'rtho grahīṣyate // BVaky_3,14.581 //
analyzed: rūpa vat jñāpitaḥ tasmāt āsannaḥ rthaḥ grahīṣyate

original: dhātvarthenopajanitaṃ sādhanatvena sādhanam /
analyzed: dhātvarthena upajanitam sādhana tvena sādhanam

original: dhātunā kṛtam ity evam asmin sūtre pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.582 //
analyzed: dhātunā kṛtam iti evam asmin sūtre pratīyate

original: yaḥ śabdaś caritārthatvād atyantaṃ na prayujyate /
analyzed: yaḥ śabdaḥ caritārtha tvāt atyantam na prayujyate

original: viṣaye 'darśanāt tatra lopas tasyābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.583 //
analyzed: viṣaye darśanāt tatra lopaḥ tasya abhidhīyate

original: kriyāyāṃ sādhane dravye prādayo ye vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: kriyāyām sādhane dravye pra ādayaḥ ye vyavasthitāḥ

original: tebhyaḥ sattvābhidhāyibhyo vatiḥ svārthe vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.584 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sattva abhidhāyibhyaḥ vatiḥ sva arthe vidhīyate

original: pratyayena vinā prādis tatrārthe na prayujyate /
analyzed: pratyayena vinā pra ādiḥ tatra arthe na prayujyate

original: bhedena tu samākhyāne vibhāgaḥ parikalpitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.585 //
analyzed: bhedena tu samākhyāne vibhāgaḥ parikalpitaḥ

original: anaṅgīkṛtasattvaṃ tu yadi gṛhyeta sādhanam /
analyzed: anaṅgīkṛta sattvam tu yadi gṛhyeta sādhanam

original: vibhaktibhir niyogaḥ syād yathaiva tasilādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.586 //
analyzed: vibhaktibhiḥ niyogaḥ syāt yathā eva tasil ādiṣu

original: pāṭhād yair avibhaktitvaṃ vatyanteṣv anugamyate /
analyzed: pāṭhāt yaiḥ a vibhakti tvam vati anteṣu anugamyate

original: teṣām udvata ity atra vaktavyā savibhaktitā // BVaky_3,14.587 //
analyzed: teṣām udvataḥ iti atra vaktavyā sa vibhakti tā

original: vatyarthaṃ nāvagāhete puṃvad ity asya darśanāt /
analyzed: vati artham na avagāhete puṃvat iti asya darśanāt

original: nañsnañāv apavādasya bādhakaṃ tan nipātanam // BVaky_3,14.588 //
analyzed: nañ snañau apavādasya bādhakam tat nipātanam

original: etam utkrāmato nūnaṃ vatyarthaṃ nañsnañāv iti /
analyzed: etam utkrāmataḥ nūnam vati artham nañ snañau iti

original: tayoḥ pravṛttāv utsargo bādhanān nopapadyate // BVaky_3,14.589 //
analyzed: tayoḥ pravṛttau utsargaḥ bādhanāt na upapadyate

original: nañsnañau vihitau yena sa yogo nāvagāhate /
analyzed: nañ snañau vihitau yena sa yogaḥ na avagāhate

original: vatiprakaraṇaṃ tad dhi liṅgam evaṃ samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.590 //
analyzed: vati prakaraṇam tat hi liṅgam evam samarthyate

original: abhedenopamānasya bhinnārthopanipātitā /
analyzed: abhedena upamānasya bhinna artha upanipāti tā

original: ūhas tathopamānānām aṅgavan nopalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.591 //
analyzed: ūhaḥ tathā upamānānām aṅga vat na upalabhyate

original: gāvedhuke carau dṛṣṭā govikartākṣavāpayoḥ /
analyzed: gāvedhuke carau dṛṣṭā govikartā akṣa vāpayoḥ

original: paśū rudra iva hy etāv ity ekavacanaśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.592 //
analyzed: paśuḥ rudraḥ iva hi etau iti ekavacana śrutiḥ

original: upamānasya bhedāc ca bahuṣu syād año vidhiḥ /
analyzed: upamānasya bhedāt ca bahuṣu syāt a ñaḥ vidhiḥ

original: kāśyapā iti lopaḥ syāt tathā pratikṛtiṣv api // BVaky_3,14.593 //
analyzed: kāśyapāḥ iti lopaḥ syāt tathā pratikṛtiṣu api

original: evaṃ tu yuktavadbhāvād atraikavacanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam tu yuktavat bhāvāt atra ekavacanam bhavet

original: lum manuṣye tathoktaṃ syāl liṅgasyaikasya siddhaye // BVaky_3,14.594 //
analyzed: lum manuṣye tathā uktam syāt liṅgasya ekasya siddhaye

original: upameyeṣu bhinneṣu kiṃ cid ekaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: upameyeṣu bhinneṣu kim cit ekam pravartate

original: pratyayasya vidhau tatra nityaṃ yuktavad iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.595 //
analyzed: pratyayasya vidhau tatra nityam yukta vat iṣyate

original: yadā pratyupameyaṃ tu tad ekaikam avasthitam /
analyzed: yadā pratyupameyam tu tat ekaikam avasthitam

original: tadā bāhyārthabhedena taddhitāntaṃ pracīyate // BVaky_3,14.596 //
analyzed: tadā bāhya artha bhedena taddhita antam pracīyate

original: yathā samūhapracaye dvigūnāṃ bhinnasaṃkhyatā /
analyzed: yathā samūha pracaye dvigūnām bhinna saṃkhya tā

original: pañcapūlyādiṣu tathā lubantapracayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.597 //
analyzed: pañcapūlī ādiṣu tathā lup anta pracayaḥ bhavet

original: pracaye bhidyamāne tu saṃkhyā pūleṣu bhidyate /
analyzed: pracaye bhidyamāne tu saṃkhyā pūleṣu bhidyate

original: arthabhedo lubanteṣu naivaṃ kaś cana dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.598 //
analyzed: artha bhedaḥ lup anteṣu na evam kaḥ cana dṛśyate

original: yeṣūpameyavacanaḥ śabdo 'nyo na prayujyate /
analyzed: yeṣu upameya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ nyaḥ na prayujyate

original: upamānasya tatrānyaiḥ saṃkhyāyā bheda iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.599 //
analyzed: upamānasya tatra anyaiḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ bhedaḥ iṣyate

original: yathā guḍatilādīnāṃ prayogād ekasaṃkhyatā /
analyzed: yathā guḍa tila ādīnām prayogāt eka saṃkhya tā

original: pākāder aprayoge tu bhinnā saṃkhyābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.600 //
analyzed: pāka ādeḥ aprayoge tu bhinnā saṃkhyā abhidhīyate

original: yaḥ saṃbandhigato bhedaḥ sa prayoge pratīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ saṃbandhi gataḥ bhedaḥ sa prayoge pratīyate

original: saṃbandhinām ato bheda upameye na gamyate // BVaky_3,14.601 //
analyzed: saṃbandhinām atas bhedaḥ upameye na gamyate

original: tasmāt sāmānyaśabdatva- prasaṅgavinivṛttaye /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmānya śabda tva prasaṅga vinivṛttaye

original: upameyagato bheda upamāneṣu dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.602 //
analyzed: upameya gataḥ bhedaḥ upamāneṣu dṛśyate

original: upamānaṃ samastānām abhinnam śrūyate kva cit /
analyzed: upamānam samastānām abhinnam śrūyate kva cit

original: bhinnānām upameyanām ekaikam vopamīyate // BVaky_3,14.603 //
analyzed: bhinnānām upameyanām ekaikam vā upamīyate

original: yathā garuḍa ity etad vyūhāpekṣaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: yathā garuḍaḥ iti etat vyūha apekṣam prayujyate

original: ekena yatra sādṛśyaṃ vainateyena hastinām // BVaky_3,14.604 //
analyzed: ekena yatra sādṛśyam vainateyena hastinām

original: ekasyāpi pratīyeta bhinnā pratikṛtiḥ saha /
analyzed: ekasya api pratīyeta bhinnā pratikṛtiḥ saha

original: kāśyapasyeti tenāyaṃ pratyekam avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.605 //
analyzed: kāśyapasya iti tena ayam pratyekam avatiṣṭhate

original: meghāḥ śaila ivety ukte samastānāṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: meghāḥ śailaḥ iva iti ukte samastānām pratīyate

original: sādṛśyam giriṇaikena pratyekaṃ tena bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.606 //
analyzed: sādṛśyam giriṇā ekena pratyekam tena bhidyate

original: chāpekṣā tadviṣayatā vidheyatvān na gamyate /
analyzed: chā apekṣā tad viṣaya tā vidheya tvāt na gamyate

original: kākatālīyam ity atra prasiddham hy upalakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,14.607 //
analyzed: kākatālīyam iti atra prasiddham hi upalakṣaṇam

original: rājāśvādiś ca viṣayaḥ syād anyo vety aniścitam /
analyzed: rāja aśva ādiḥ ca viṣayaḥ syāt anyaḥ vā iti aniścitam

original: tena cchasya vidhānāt prāg vyapadeśo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.608 //
analyzed: tena c śasya vidhānāt prāk vyapadeśaḥ na vidyate

original: dvayor ivārthayor atra nimittatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: dvayoḥ iva arthayoḥ atra nimitta tvam pratīyate

original: ekenāvayavo yuktaḥ pratyayo 'nyena yujyate // BVaky_3,14.609 //
analyzed: ekena avayavaḥ yuktaḥ pratyayaḥ nyena yujyate

original: caitrasya tatrāgamanaṃ kākasyāgamanaṃ yathā /
analyzed: caitrasya tatra āgamanam kākasya āgamanam yathā

original: dasyor abhinipātas tu tālasya patanaṃ yathā // BVaky_3,14.610 //
analyzed: dasyoḥ abhinipātaḥ tu tālasya patanam yathā

original: saṃnipāte tayor yānyā kriyā tatropajāyate /
analyzed: saṃnipāte tayoḥ yā anyā kriyā tatra upajāyate

original: vadhādir upameye 'rthe tayā chavidhir iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.611 //
analyzed: vadha ādiḥ upameye rthe tayā cha vidhiḥ iṣyate

original: kriyāyāṃ samavetāyāṃ dravyaśabdo 'vatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: kriyāyām samavetāyām dravya śabdaḥ vatiṣṭhate

original: pātāgamanayoḥ kāka- tālaśabdau tathā sthitau // BVaky_3,14.612 //
analyzed: pāta āgamanayoḥ kāka tāla śabdau tathā sthitau

original: yad anvākhyāyakaṃ vākyaṃ tad evaṃ parikalpyate /
analyzed: yat anvākhyāyakam vākyam tat evam parikalpyate

original: prayogavākvaṃ yal loke tad evaṃ na prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.613 //
analyzed: prayogavākvam yat loke tat evam na prayujyate

original: yayor atarkitā prāptir dṛśyate kākatālavat /
analyzed: yayoḥ a tarkitā prāptiḥ dṛśyate kāka tāla vat

original: tayoḥ samāsaprakṛter vṛttir abhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.614 //
analyzed: tayoḥ samāsa prakṛteḥ vṛttiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: kākasya tālena yathā vadho yasya tu dasyunā /
analyzed: kākasya tālena yathā vadhaḥ yasya tu dasyunā

original: tatra citrīkṛte 'nyasminn upameye cha iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.615 //
analyzed: tatra citrīkṛte ni asmin upameye chaḥ iṣyate

original: cañcatprakāraś cañcatko bṛhatka iti cāpare /
analyzed: cañcat prakāraḥ cañcatkaḥ bṛhatkaḥ iti ca apare

original: maṇimaḍḍūkakhadyotān sādṛśvena pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.616 //
analyzed: maṇi maḍḍūka khadyotān sādṛśvena pracakṣate

original: tatronmeṣanimeṣābhyāṃ khadyota upamīyate /
analyzed: tatra unmeṣa nimeṣābhyām khadyotaḥ upamīyate

original: śvāsaprabandhair maṇḍūkaḥ spandamānaprabho maṇiḥ // BVaky_3,14.617 //
analyzed: śvāsa prabandhaiḥ maṇḍūkaḥ spandamāna prabhaḥ maṇiḥ

original: pravikāsiprabho 'lpo 'pi mahān ya upalabhyate /
analyzed: mahān yaḥ upalabhyate

original: bṛhatka iti tatraiṣa maṇau śabdaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.618 //
analyzed: bṛhatkaḥ iti tatra eṣa maṇau śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: sādṛśyam eva sarvatra prakāraḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
analyzed: sādṛśyam eva sarvatra prakāraḥ kaiḥ cit iṣyate

original: bhede 'pi tu prakārākhyā kaiś cid abhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.619 //
analyzed: bhede tu prakāra ākhyā kaiḥ cit abhyupagamyate

original: prakāravacanaḥ kaś cit prakāravati saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: prakāra vacanaḥ kaḥ cit prakāravati saṃsthitaḥ

original: prakāramātre vartitvā kaś cit tadvati vartate // BVaky_3,14.620 //
analyzed: prakāra mātre vartitvā kaḥ cit tadvati vartate

original: sādṛśyagrahaṇaṃ sūtre sadṛśasyopalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sādṛśya grahaṇam sūtre sadṛśasya upalakṣaṇam

original: tulyayor avyayībhāve sahaśabdo 'bhidhāyakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.621 //
analyzed: tulyayoḥ avyayībhāve saha śabdaḥ bhidhāyakaḥ

original: vipsāsādṛśyayor vṛttir yā yathārthābhidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: vipsā sādṛśyayoḥ vṛttiḥ yā yathā artha abhidhāyinaḥ

original: sa cāyam avyayībhāve bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.622 //
analyzed: sa ca ayam avyayībhāve bhedaḥ bhedena darśitaḥ

original: sādṛśyaṃ yogyatā kaiś cid anāv abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: sādṛśyam yogyatā kaiḥ cit anau abhyupagamyate

original: yat tu mūrtigataṃ sāmyaṃ tat sahenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.623 //
analyzed: yat tu mūrti gatam sāmyam tat sahena abhidhīyate

original: itthaṃbhāve 'pi sādṛśyaṃ buddhyavasthānibandhanam /
analyzed: itthaṃbhāve pi sādṛśyam buddhi avasthā nibandhanam

original: grahaṇe bhedamātrasya tatrānyaivābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.624 //
analyzed: grahaṇe bheda mātrasya tatra anyā eva abhidhīyate

original: gaur vāhīka iti dvitve sādṛśyaṃ pratyudāhṛtam /
analyzed: gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti dvi tve sādṛśyam pratyudāhṛtam

original: śuklādau sati niṣpanne vāhīko na dvir ucyate // BVaky_3,14.625 //
analyzed: śukla ādau sati niṣpanne vāhīkaḥ na dvis ucyate

original: iti bhartṛharikṛtaṃ vākyapadīyam samāptam
analyzed: iti bhartṛhari kṛtam vākyapadīyam samāptam
